atk-s0503a:30_4: Yathā hi yaṃ telādi minitabbavatthu mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:30_7: Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:30_10: Evameva yaṃ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vitakkavipphāraṃ antohadayaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:30_11: so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi vacīdvārena nikkhanto paṭiggāhakanirapekkho udāhāraviseso “udāna”nti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:31_0: Tayidaṃ katthaci gāthābandhavasena katthaci vākyavasena pavattaṃ.
atk-s0503a:31_3: Yebhuyyena hi udānaṃ gāthābandhavasena bhāsitaṃ pītisomanassasamuṭṭhāpitañca.
atk-s0503a:31_7: yattha neva pathavī na āpo”tiādīsu “sukhakāmāni bhūtāni,
atk-s0503a:31_10: sace vo dukkhamappiya”nti evamādīsu ca labbhati.
atk-s0503a:33_0: “Sabbo rāgo pahīno me, sabbo doso samūhato;
atk-s0503a:34_0: Sabbo me vihato moho, sītibhūtosmi nibbuto”ti. –
atk-s0503a:38_1: Tāni pana tesaṃ therānaṃ therīnañca na kevalaṃ udānāni eva,
atk-s0503a:38_5: ārāmadaṇḍabrāhmaṇādīhi manussehi ca bhāsitāni “namo tassa bhagavato”tiādīni tisso saṅgītiyo ārūḷhāni udānāni santi eva,
atk-s0503a:38_7: Yāni pana sammāsambuddhena sāmaṃ āhacca bhāsitāni jinavacanabhūtāni,
atk-s0503a:38_8: yāni sandhāya bhagavatā pariyattidhammaṃ navadhā vibhajitvā uddisantena udānanti vuttāni,
atk-s0503a:38_9: tāneva dhammasaṅgāhakehi “udāna”nti saṅgītanti tadevettha saṃvaṇṇetabbabhāvena gahitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:39_0: Yā pana “anekajātisaṃsāra”ntiādigāthāya dīpitā bhagavatā bodhimūle udānavasena pavattitā anekasatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0503a:39_2: etā aparabhāge pana dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa bhagavatā desitattā dhammasaṅgāhakehi udānapāḷiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ anāropetvā dhammapade saṅgītā.
atk-s0503a:39_6: bho koṇḍañño”ti udānavacanaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuyā devamanussānaṃ pavedanasamatthanigghosavipphāraṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:39_8: sāvakesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ therena adhigatattā attano parissamassa saphalabhāvapaccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ paṭhamabodhiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:39_9: sabbesaṃ eva bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattipaccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ “ārādhayiṃsu vata maṃ bhikkhū ekaṃ samaya”ntiādivacanaṃ
atk-s0503a:39_11: “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”tiādivacanaṃ viya pavattiyā nivattiyā vā na pakāsananti,
atk-s0503a:40_7: khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu nikāyesu khuddakanikāyapariyāpannaṃ, suttaṃ, geyyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:42_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0503a:43_0: Evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭiññātesu caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasaṅgahaṃ.
atk-s0503a:43_19: akkharato sattasahassādhikāni saṭṭhi sahassāni tīṇi ca satāni dvāsīti ca akkharāni.
atk-s0503a:54_0: Tīṇi dvāsīti ca tathā, udānassa paveditā”ti.
atk-s0503a:55_2: tassāpi evaṃ me sutantiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttanidānamādi.
atk-s0503a:55_3: Sā panāyaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti vinayapiṭake tantimārūḷhā eva.
atk-s0503a:55_4: Yo panettha nidānakosallatthaṃ vattabbo kathāmaggo sopi sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto evāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:58_5: haratīti ākhyātapadanti imināva nayena sabbattha padavibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:59_3: kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti evamādīsu upamāyaṃ āgato.
atk-s0503a:59_8: “Evamevaṃ panāyaṃ vasalī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu garahaṇe. “Evaṃ,
atk-s0503a:59_9: bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”ntiādīsu vacanasampaṭiggahe.
atk-s0503a:59_14: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha
atk-s0503a:59_15: ‘subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī’ti,
atk-s0503a:59_16: evañca vadehi ‘sādhu kira bhavaṃ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:59_19: ime dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vā’ti? ‘Akusalā, bhante’.
atk-s0503a:59_32: Tathā hi vidhayuttagatasadde lokiyā pakāratthe vadanti.
atk-s0503a:60_1: evamāyupariyanto”ti cettha evaṃsaddena pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ vuttattā ākārattho eva evaṃsaddoti. Na,
atk-s0503a:60_6: Evañca katvā “evaṃ jātena maccenā”tiādīni upamānaudāharaṇāni yujjanti.
atk-s0503a:62_0: Evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti. –
atk-s0503a:63_2: maritabbasabhāvatāya maccena kattabbāti abhedatāya puppharāsi mālāguṇā ca upamā,
atk-s0503a:63_5: So pana upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “upamāyaṃ āgato”ti.
atk-s0503a:64_0: Tathā “evaṃ iminā ākārena abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya ākappasampattiyā yo tattha upadesākāro,
atk-s0503a:65_1: evametaṃ sugatā”ti ettha bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ yaṃ tattha vijjamānaguṇānaṃ
atk-s0503a:66_1: So ca garahaṇākāro “vasalī”tiādikhuṃsanasaddasannidhānato idha evaṃsaddena pakāsitoti viññāyati.
atk-s0503a:66_3: evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ sannidhānato vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:67_0: “Evaṃ no”ti etthāpi tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāvena sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ anumatiggahaṇavasena
atk-s0503a:67_1: “no vā kathaṃ vo ettha hotī”ti pucchāya katāya “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃsaddena āvikataṃ.
atk-s0503a:67_2: So pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno avadhāraṇattho hotīti vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:68_0: “Evañca vadehī”ti yathāhaṃ vadāmi evaṃ samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ vadehīti vadanākāro idāni vattabbo evaṃsaddena nidassīyatīti “nidassanattho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:69_0: Evamākāravisesavācīnampi etesaṃ evaṃsaddānaṃ upamādivisesatthavuttitāya upamādiatthatā vuttā. “Evaṃ,
atk-s0503a:69_1: bhante”ti pana dhammassa sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāre niyojitehi bhikkhūhi tattha patiṭṭhitabhāvassa paṭijānanavasena
atk-s0503a:70_2: sabbasattānaṃ sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena ko samattho viññātuṃ,
atk-s0503a:70_3: sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi evaṃ me sutaṃ,
atk-s0503a:72_1: so ca sassatādibhedena apparajakkhatādibhedena ca anekavidho.
atk-s0503a:72_2: Attajjhāsayādiko eva vā aneko ajjhāsayo anekajjhāsayo.
atk-s0503a:73_1: chahi atthapadehi akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesavasena chahi byañjanapadehi ca samannāgatattā
atk-s0503a:74_0: Iddhiādesanānusāsanībhedena tesu ca ekekassa visayādibhedena vividhaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vā pāṭihāriyaṃ etassāti vividhapāṭihāriyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:74_1: Tattha paṭipakkhaharaṇato rāgādikilesāpanayanato pāṭihāriyanti atthe sati bhagavato na paṭipakkhā rāgādayo santi ye haritabbā,
atk-s0503a:74_2: puthujjanānampi vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0503a:74_3: tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha pāṭihāriyanti vattuṃ.
atk-s0503a:74_4: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā,
atk-s0503a:74_7: Atha vā bhagavato ceva sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
atk-s0503a:74_9: Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā honti.
atk-s0503a:74_10: Paṭīti vā ayaṃ saddo pacchāti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi,
atk-s0503a:74_12: Tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:74_13: Attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:74_14: Iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
atk-s0503a:74_15: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti.
atk-s0503a:74_17: paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanīsamudāye bhavaṃ ekekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:74_18: Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato.
atk-s0503a:74_19: Tattha jātaṃ nimittabhūtato tato vā āgatanti pāṭihāriyanti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:75_0: Yasmā pana tantiatthadesanā tabbohārābhisamayasaṅkhātā hetuhetuphalatadubhayapaññattipaṭivedhasaṅkhātā vā dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā gambhīrā,
atk-s0503a:75_1: sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo anupacitakusalasambhārehi alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭhā duppariyogāhā ca,
atk-s0503a:75_2: tasmā tehi catūhi gambhīrabhāvehi yuttanti bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhagambhīraṃ.
atk-s0503a:76_1: ekasmiṃ khaṇe pavattamāno nānābhāsānaṃ sattānaṃ attano attano bhāsāvasena apubbaṃ acarimaṃ gahaṇūpago hoti.
atk-s0503a:76_2: Acinteyyo hi buddhānaṃ buddhānubhāvoti sabbasattānaṃ sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathaṃ āgacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:77_1: na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento “evaṃ me sutaṃ,
atk-s0503a:77_2: mayāpi evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0503a:78_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando,
atk-s0503a:78_11: pubbāparakusalo”ti evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ dassento sattānaṃ sotukāmataṃ janeti.
atk-s0503a:78_13: tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikaṃ,
atk-s0503a:78_15: Aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato aññathā na pana bhagavatā desitākārato.
atk-s0503a:78_17: sā neva sabbākārena sakkā viññātunti vuttovāyamattho.
atk-s0503a:79_1: Tathā hissa “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”ntiādīsu mayāti attho.
atk-s0503a:79_3: bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu mayhanti attho.
atk-s0503a:80_0: Ettha ca yo paro na hoti,
atk-s0503a:80_1: so attāti evaṃ vattabbe niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte sasantāne vattanato tividhopi mesaddo kiñcāpi ekasmiṃyeva atthe dissati,
atk-s0503a:80_3: saddo tīsu atthesu dissatī”ti vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:81_0: Sutanti ayaṃ sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca gamanavissutakilinnūpacitānuyogasotaviññeyya sotadvārānusāra viññātādianekatthappabhedo.
atk-s0503a:81_2: jotakabhāvato pana satipi tasmiṃ sutasaddo eva taṃ tamatthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa sutasaddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ na virujjhati.
atk-s0503a:82_7: Idha panassa “sotadvārānusārena upadhārita”nti vā “upadhāraṇa”nti vā attho. Me-
atk-s0503a:82_8: saddassa hi mayāti atthe sati “evaṃ mayā sutaṃ sotadvārānusārena upadhārita”nti yujjati.
atk-s0503a:82_9: Mamāti atthe sati “evaṃ mama sutaṃ sotadvārānusārena upadhāraṇa”nti yujjati.
atk-s0503a:83_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu yasmā sutasaddasannidhāne payuttena evaṃsaddena savanakiriyājotakena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:83_3: Sabbāni hi vākyāni evakāratthasahitāniyeva avadhāraṇaphalattā tesaṃ.
atk-s0503a:83_5: Yathā hi sutaṃ sutamevāti vattabbataṃ arahati tathā taṃ sammā sutaṃ anūnaggahaṇaṃ anadhikaggahaṇaṃ aviparītaggahaṇañca hotīti.
atk-s0503a:83_6: Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti etasmiṃ pakkhe yasmā sutanti etassa asutaṃ na hotīti ayamattho vutto,
atk-s0503a:83_16: tadapekkhassa sutasaddassa niyamattho sambhavatīti tadapekkhassa sutasaddassa assavanabhāvappaṭikkhepo
atk-s0503a:83_18: Iti savanahetusavanavisesavasenapi sutasaddassa atthayojanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:84_0: Tathā evanti tassā sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇato nānappakārena
atk-s0503a:84_5: nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā karaṇabhūtāya mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0503a:85_0: Tathā evanti nidassitabbappakāsanaṃ nidassanattho evaṃsaddoti katvā nidassetabbassa niddisitabbabhāvato.
atk-s0503a:85_1: Tasmā evaṃsaddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:85_6: na ca puggalavohārarahite dhammappabandhe savanakiriyā labbhati.
atk-s0503a:86_0: Tathā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānārammaṇappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:86_1: tassa nānākāraniddeso ākārattho eva evaṃsaddoti katvā.
atk-s0503a:86_2: Evanti hi ayamākārapaññatti dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ pavattiākāraṃ upādāya paññapetabbasabhāvattā.
atk-s0503a:86_5: sotabbo hi dhammo savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:86_6: Ettāvatā nānappakārena pavattena cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino kattu visaye gahaṇasanniṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:87_1: sutānañhi dhammānaṃ gahitākārassa nidassanassa avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanasabhāvena evaṃsaddena tadākārādidhāraṇassa
atk-s0503a:87_4: puggalavādinopi hi savanakiriyā viññāṇanirapekkhā na hotīti.
atk-s0503a:87_6: Meti hi saddappavatti ekanteneva sattavisesavisayā viññāṇakiccañca tattheva samodahitabbanti.
atk-s0503a:87_8: mayā savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena viññāṇavasena laddhasavanakiccavohārena sutanti.
atk-s0503a:88_0: Tathā evanti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti.
atk-s0503a:88_1: Sabbassa hi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā sabbapaññattīnañca vijjamānādīsu chasu paññattīsu avarodho,
atk-s0503a:88_2: tasmā yo māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtattho anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamatthopi na hoti.
atk-s0503a:88_3: So rūpasaddādiko ruppanānubhavanādiko ca paramatthasabhāvo saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena vijjati.
atk-s0503a:88_4: Yo pana evanti ca meti ca vuccamāno ākārattho,
atk-s0503a:88_5: so aparamatthasabhāvo saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena anupalabbhamāno avijjamānapaññatti nāma.
atk-s0503a:88_7: yaṃ evanti vā meti vā niddesaṃ labhetha?
atk-s0503a:89_0: Tathā evanti sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādīnaṃ paccāmasanavasena.
atk-s0503a:89_1: Meti sasantatipariyāpanne khandhe karaṇādivisesavisiṭṭhe upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti.
atk-s0503a:89_3: Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro dutiyaṃ tatiyantiādiko viya paṭhamādīni,
atk-s0503a:89_4: diṭṭhamutaviññāte apekkhitvā sutanti viññeyyattā diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbo hoti.
atk-s0503a:89_5: Asutaṃ na hotīti hi sutanti pakāsitoyamatthoti.
atk-s0503a:90_1: Paṭividdhā hi attanā sutassa pakāravisesā evanti idha āyasmatā ānandena paccāmaṭṭhā,
atk-s0503a:90_4: paccayākāravasena nānappakārā duppaṭividdhā ca suttantāti dīpitanti.
atk-s0503a:90_8: na so kālantare mayā sutanti paṭijānāti.
atk-s0503a:90_10: sammohābhāvena paññāya eva vā savanakālasambhūtāya taduttarikālapaññāsiddhi,
atk-s0503a:90_14: yathāsutaṃ dhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko,
atk-s0503a:90_15: paññā tattha guṇībhūtā hoti paññāya pubbaṅgamāti katvā.
atk-s0503a:90_17: Atthassa hi paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro gambhīroti paññāya byāpāro adhiko,
atk-s0503a:90_18: sati tattha guṇībhūtāyevāti satiyā pubbaṅgamāyāti katvā.
atk-s0503a:91_2: tena ca vuccamānānaṃ ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthānaṃ upari vakkhamānānaṃ nānappakārappaṭivedhajotakānaṃ aviparītasiddhi dhammavisayattā.
atk-s0503a:91_3: Na hi ayoniso manasikaroto nānappakārappaṭivedho sambhavati.
atk-s0503a:91_5: “paṭhamabodhisuttaṃ kattha bhāsita”ntiādipucchāvasena pakaraṇapattassa vakkhamānassa suttassa savanaṃ
atk-s0503a:91_7: Tathā hi vikkhittacitto puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ,

atk-s0503a:105_3: Adhikaraṇaṃ samayaṃ vūpasamanaṃ apagamoti abhisamayo pahānaṃ.

atk-s0503a:106_0: Ettha ca sahakārīkāraṇasannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samavāyo samayo.
atk-s0503a:106_1: Sameti samāgacchati ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadādhārapuggalehīti khaṇo samayo.
atk-s0503a:106_2: Sameti ettha etena vā saṃgacchati satto sabhāvadhammo vā uppādādīhi sahajātādīhi vāti kālo samayo.
atk-s0503a:106_3: Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ viya ca kappanāmattasiddhenānurūpena voharīyatīti. Samaṃ,

atk-s0503a:106_12: Samucchedappahānabhāvato pana adhiko samayoti abhisamayo yathā abhidhammoti.

atk-s0503a:106_15: Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo,
atk-s0503a:106_17: Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.

atk-s0503a:108_5: vā”ti evaṃ vutte na sakkā sukhena dhāretuṃ vā uddisituṃ vā uddisāpetuṃ vā,

atk-s0503a:110_0: Kasmā panettha yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti ca ito aññesu suttapadesu “yasmiṃ samaye,

atk-s0503a:110_4: tathā akatvā “ekaṃ samaya”nti accantasaṃyogatthe upayogavacanena niddeso katoti?
atk-s0503a:110_7: Tattha hi abhidhamme ito aññesu ca suttantesu ādhāravisayasaṅkhāto adhikaraṇattho kiriyāya kiriyantaralakkhaṇasaṅkhāto
atk-s0503a:110_9: Adhikaraṇañhi kālattho samūhattho ca samayo tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ,

atk-s0503a:110_17: Tathā khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa samayassa bhāvena tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati.

atk-s0503a:127_0: Imāya gāthāya ca vasena bhagavāti padassa attho veditabbo.

atk-s0503a:129_0: Ettāvatā cettha evaṃ me sutanti vacanena yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ savanavasena bhāsanto bhagavato dhammasarīraṃ paccakkhaṃ karoti,

atk-s0503a:129_6: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavāti vacanena tasmiṃ samaye bhagavato avijjamānabhāvaṃ dassento rūpakāyaparinibbānaṃ sādheti,

atk-s0503a:130_6: Ekaṃ samayanti kālasampattiṃ niddisati bhagavato uruvelāyaṃ viharaṇasamayabhāvena buddhuppādappaṭimaṇḍitabhāvadīpanato.
atk-s0503a:131_4: Velātikkamanahetu ābhatā uru uruvelāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0503a:132_0: Atīte kira anuppanne buddhe dasasahassatāpasā tasmiṃ padese viharantā “kāyakammavacīkammāni paresampi pākaṭāni honti,

atk-s0503a:133_1: Idha pana ṭhānanisajjāgamanasayanappabhedesu iriyāpathesu āsanasaṅkhātairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ ariyavihārasamaṅgitāparidīpanañcāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:133_2: Tattha yasmā ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavatteti,

atk-s0503a:134_3: Nerañjarāyāti nelaṃ jalamassāti “nelañjalāyā”ti vattabbe lakārassa rakāraṃ katvā “nerañjarāyā”ti vuttaṃ,

atk-s0503a:134_7: Tassā nadiyā tīre yattha bhagavā vihāsi,
atk-s0503a:134_9: Tattha “bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti ettha maggañāṇaṃ bodhīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:134_11: Tadubhayampi bodhiṃ bhagavā ettha pattoti rukkhopi bodhirukkhotveva nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0503a:134_12: Atha vā satta bojjhaṅge bujjhīti bhagavā bodhi,
atk-s0503a:134_13: tena bujjhantena sannissitattā so rukkhopi bodhirukkhoti nāmaṃ labhi,
atk-s0503a:134_16: Ayañhi mūlasaddo “mūlāni uddhareyya antamaso usīranāḷamattānipī”tiādīsu mūlamūle dissati.
atk-s0503a:134_22: tasmā bodhirukkhassa mūle samīpeti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0503a:135_2: Ettāvatā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena udānadesanāya nidānaṃ ṭhapentena kāladesadesakāpadesā saha visesena pakāsitā honti.
atk-s0503a:136_1: nanu bhagavatā bhāsitavacanasseva saṅgaho kātabbo”ti? Vuccate –
atk-s0503a:136_3: Kāladesadesakavatthuādīhi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā hoti asammosā saddheyyā ca desakālakattuhetunimittehi
atk-s0503a:136_7: udānaṃ kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā desādīsu pucchāya katāya vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “evaṃ me suta”ntiādinā udānassa nidānaṃ bhāsitanti.
atk-s0503a:137_2: Na hi sammāsambuddhassa pubbaracanādīhi attho atthi sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya ekappamāṇattā ñeyyadhammesu.
atk-s0503a:137_4: Na hi sabbaso parikkhīṇāsavassa katthacipi ācariyamuṭṭhiādīnaṃ sambhavoti suvisuddhassa parānuggahappavatti.
atk-s0503a:137_5: Iti desakadosabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhisīlasampattidūsakānaṃ accantaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ abhāvasaṃsūcakehi ñāṇasampadāpahānasampadābhibyañjakehi
atk-s0503a:137_7: tato ca antarāyikaniyyānikadhammesu sammohābhāvasiddhito pacchimavesārajjadvayasiddhīti bhagavato catuvesārajjasamannāgamo
atk-s0503a:137_9: tattha tattha sampattaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ṭhānuppattikappaṭibhānena dhammadesanādīpanato.
atk-s0503a:138_1: Ñāṇakaruṇāpariggahitasabbakiriyassa hi bhagavato natthi niratthakā paṭipatti attahitā vā.
atk-s0503a:138_2: Tasmā paresaṃyeva atthāya pavattasabbakiriyassa sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ yathāpavattaṃ
atk-s0503a:138_3: vuccamānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ sattānaṃ anusāsanaṭṭhena sāsanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:138_5: Tayidaṃ satthu caritaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesādīhi saddhiṃ tattha tattha nidānavacanena yathārahaṃ pakāsīyati,
atk-s0503a:139_0: Apica satthuno pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:139_1: Sā cassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatā heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:139_4: ayamattho sabbathā pakāsito hotīti idamettha nidānavacanappayojanassa mukhamattadassanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:140_0: Taṃ panetaṃ “evaṃ me suta”nti ārabhitvā yāva “imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti padaṃ,
atk-s0503a:140_2: Tathā hi taṃ yathā paṭipanno bhagavā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi,
atk-s0503a:140_3: ādito paṭṭhāya tassa kāyikacetasikappaṭipattiyā pakāsanatthaṃ saṅgītikārehi saṅgītikāle bhāsitavacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:141_0: Nanu ca “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”tiādi bhagavato eva vacanaṃ bhavituṃ arahati,
atk-s0503a:141_1: na hi satthāraṃ muñcitvā añño paṭiccasamuppādaṃ desetuṃ samattho hotīti?
atk-s0503a:141_3: yathā pana bhagavā bodhirukkhamūle dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇavasena paṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasākāsi,
atk-s0503a:141_4: tatheva naṃ bodhaneyyabandhavānaṃ bodhanatthaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasīhanādasuttādīsu desitassa ca vacanānaṃ
atk-s0503a:141_5: desitākārassa anukaraṇavasena paṭiccasamuppādassa manasikāraṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā bhagavatā bhāsitassa
atk-s0503a:141_6: imassa udānassa dhammasaṅgāhakā mahātherā nidānaṃ saṅgāyiṃsūti yathāvuttavacanaṃ saṅgītikārānameva vacananti
atk-s0503a:142_0: Ettha ca attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo pucchāvasiko aṭṭhuppattikoti cattāro suttanikkhepā veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:142_1: Yathā hi anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi suttāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādipaṭṭhānanayena soḷasavidhataṃ nātivattanti,
atk-s0503a:142_2: evaṃ tāni sabbānipi attajjhāsayādisuttanikkhepavasena catubbidhabhāvaṃ nātivattanti.
atk-s0503a:142_3: Kāmañcettha attajjhāsayassa aṭṭhuppattiyā ca parajjhāsayapucchāvasikehi saddhiṃ saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati ajjhāsayānusandhipucchānusandhisambhavato,
atk-s0503a:142_4: attajjhāsayaaṭṭhuppattīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggo natthīti niravaseso paṭṭhānanayo na sambhavati.
atk-s0503a:142_5: Tadantogadhattā vā sambhavantānaṃ sesanikkhepānaṃ mūlanikkhepavasena cattāro suttanikkhepāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:143_15: Atha vā nikkhipīyati suttaṃ etenāti nikkhepo,
atk-s0503a:143_17: Etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo.
atk-s0503a:143_23: Tathā atthuppattiyeva aṭṭhuppattikoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:144_0: Ettha ca paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇanirapekkhattā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ suttanikkhepabhāvo yutto
atk-s0503a:144_2: parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanāpavattihetubhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattitānaṃ kathamaṭṭhuppattiyā anavarodho,
atk-s0503a:144_3: pucchāvasikaaṭṭhuppattipubbakānaṃ vā parajjhāsayānurodhena pavattitānaṃ kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodhoti?
atk-s0503a:144_7: Tathā hi brahmajāladhammadāyādasuttādīnaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaāmisuppādādidesanānimittaṃ aṭṭhuppatti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:144_8: paresaṃ pucchāya vinā ajjhāsayameva nimittaṃ katvā desito parajjhāsayo,
atk-s0503a:145_20: dvepi dabbasuttānīti etesaṃ udānānaṃ aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo.
atk-s0503a:145_24: visākhāsuttañcāti imesaṃ udānānaṃ attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo ca nikkhepo.
atk-s0503a:146_0: Ettha ca yāni udānāni bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sammukhā bhāsitāni,
atk-s0503a:146_1: tāni tehi yathābhāsitasuttāni vacasā paricitāni manasānupekkhitāni dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa kathitāni.
atk-s0503a:146_2: Yāni pana bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ asammukhā bhāsitāni,
atk-s0503a:146_3: tānipi aparabhāge bhagavatā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa puna bhāsitāni.
atk-s0503a:146_4: Evaṃ sabbānipi tāni āyasmā ānando ekajjhaṃ katvā dhārento bhikkhūnañca vācento aparabhāge paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle
atk-s0503a:147_0: Tena kho pana samayenātiādīsu tena samayenāti ca bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:147_4: Yaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho.
atk-s0503a:147_8: Yasmā bhagavā taṃ sattāhaṃ nirantaratāya accantameva phalasamāpattisukhena vihāsi,
atk-s0503a:147_10: Ekapallaṅkenāti visākhāpuṇṇamāya anatthaṅgateyeva sūriye aparājitapallaṅkavare vajirāsane nisinnakālato
atk-s0503a:147_11: paṭṭhāya sakimpi anuṭṭhahitvā yathāābhujitena ekeneva pallaṅkena.
atk-s0503a:148_0: Vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedīti vimuttisukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamāno nisinno hotīti attho.
atk-s0503a:148_6: Tāsu yaṃ deyyadhammapariccāgādīhi tehi tehi guṇaṅgehi nāmarūpaparicchedādīhi vipassanaṅgehi ca yāva tassa tassa aṅgassa aparihānivasena pavatti,
atk-s0503a:148_26: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā yāvassa aparihānivasena pavatti,
atk-s0503a:148_31: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato ariyassa santāne yathārahaṃ “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:148_32: nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa puna accantaṃ appavattibhāvena samucchedappahānavasena
atk-s0503a:148_39: Idha pana bhagavato nibbānārammaṇā phalavimutti adhippetā.
atk-s0503a:148_41: “vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedīti vimuttisukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamāno nisinno hotīti attho”ti.
atk-s0503a:149_0: Vimuttīti ca upakkilesehi paṭippassaddhivasena cittassa vimuttabhāvo,
atk-s0503a:149_2: tāya vimuttiyā jātaṃ sampayuttaṃ vā sukhaṃ vimuttisukhaṃ. “Yāyaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:149_3: upekkhā sante sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti vacanato upekkhāpi cettha sukhamicceva veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:149_4: Tathā ca vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “upekkhā pana santattā,
atk-s0503a:149_8: Atha vā “tesaṃ vūpasamo sukho”tiādīsu yathā saṅkhāradukkhūpasamo sukhoti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:149_9: evaṃ sakalakilesadukkhūpasamabhāvato aggaphale labbhamānā paṭippassaddhivimutti eva idha sukhanti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:149_10: Tayidaṃ vimuttisukhaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ kālantareti phalacittassa pavattivibhāgena duvidhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:149_11: Ekekassa hi ariyamaggassa anantarā tassa tasseva vipākabhūtāni nibbānārammaṇāni tīṇi dve vā phalacittāni
atk-s0503a:149_29: Sā panāyaṃ phalasamāpatti atthato lokuttarakusalānaṃ vipākabhūtā nibbānārammaṇā appanāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0503a:150_4: uparimāpi ariyā heṭṭhimaṃ na samāpajjantiyeva puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena paṭippassaddhabhāvato.
atk-s0503a:150_5: Attano eva phalaṃ te te ariyā samāpajjanti.
atk-s0503a:150_7: uparimā dveyeva samāpajjanti samādhismiṃ paripūrakāribhāvato”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:150_10: Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “katamā dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena uppajjanti,
atk-s0503a:150_11: katame dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti imesaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjane sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāya
atk-s0503a:150_13: Tasmā sabbepi ariyā yathāsakaṃ phalaṃ samāpajjantīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:151_4: evaṃ ariyā “lokuttarasukhaṃ anubhavissāmā”ti addhānaparicchedaṃ katvā icchitakkhaṇe phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjanti.
atk-s0503a:152_3: Dvīhi tāva ākārehi assā samāpajjanaṃ hoti nibbānato aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā,
atk-s0503a:154_1: phalasamāpattitthikena ariyasāvakena rahogatena paṭisallīnena udayabbayādivasena saṅkhārā vipassitabbā.
atk-s0503a:154_2: Tassevaṃ pavattānupubbavipassanasseva saṅkhārārammaṇagotrabhuñāṇānantaraṃ phalasamāpattivasena nirodhe cittamappeti,
atk-s0503a:154_3: phalasamāpattininnabhāvena ca sekkhassāpi phalameva uppajjati, na maggo.
atk-s0503a:154_4: Ye pana vadanti “sotāpanno attano phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjissāmīti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sakadāgāmī hoti,
atk-s0503a:154_10: tasmā yathābhinivesaṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ vipassanā atthaṃ sādhetīti sekkhassāpi phalameva uppajjati, na maggo.
atk-s0503a:154_11: Phalampi tassa sace anena paṭhamajjhāniko maggo adhigato,
atk-s0503a:155_0: Kasmā panettha gotrabhuñāṇaṃ maggañāṇapurecārikaṃ viya nibbānārammaṇaṃ na hotīti?
atk-s0503a:155_5: Tasmā ekanteneva niyyānikabhāvassa ubhato vuṭṭhānabhāvena pavattamānassa anantarapaccayabhūtena ñāṇena
atk-s0503a:155_6: nimittato vuṭṭhiteneva bhavitabbanti tassa nibbānārammaṇatā yuttā,
atk-s0503a:155_7: na pana ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā tassa vipākabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamucchindanato aniyyānikattā
atk-s0503a:155_8: avuṭṭhānasabhāvānaṃ phalañāṇānaṃ purecārikañāṇassa kadācipi nibbānārammaṇatā ubhayattha anulomañāṇānaṃ
atk-s0503a:155_10: Ariyamaggavīthiyañhi anulomañāṇāni anibbiddhapubbānaṃ thūlathūlānaṃ lobhakkhandhādīnaṃ sātisayaṃ padālanena
atk-s0503a:155_12: phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana tāni tāni tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā tattha nirussukkāni
atk-s0503a:155_13: kevalaṃ ariyānaṃ phalasamāpattisukhasamaṅgibhāvassa parikammamattāni hutvā uppajjantīti na tesaṃ kutoci
atk-s0503a:155_15: yato tesaṃ pariyosāne ñāṇaṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ vuṭṭhānato nibbānārammaṇaṃ siyā.
atk-s0503a:155_16: Evañca katvā sekkhassa attano phalasamāpattivaḷañjanatthāya udayabbayādivasena saṅkhāre sammasantassa vipassanāñāṇānupubbāya phalameva uppajjati,
atk-s0503a:155_17: na maggoti ayañca attho samatthito hoti.
atk-s0503a:157_1: Tattha pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāroti samāpattito pubbe kālaparicchedo.
atk-s0503a:157_2: “Asukasmiṃ nāma kāle vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti paricchinnattā hissā yāva so kālo nāgacchati,
atk-s0503a:159_2: Kāmañca na sabbānevetāni ekato manasi karoti,
atk-s0503a:159_5: tassa manasikaraṇena phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti evaṃ assā vuṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:162_2: “vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedīti vimuttisukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamāno nisinno hotīti attho”ti.
atk-s0503a:163_2: Tesu adhikāratthena athāti iminā vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedanato aññaṃ adhikāraṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:163_5: Athāti vā pacchāti etasmiṃ atthe nipāto,
atk-s0503a:163_6: tena “tassa sattāhassa accayenā”ti vakkhamānameva atthaṃ joteti.
atk-s0503a:163_10: Idha pana ṭhatvā paṭipāṭiyā satta sattāhāni dassetabbānīti keci tāni vitthārayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:163_11: Mayaṃ pana tāni khandhakapāṭhena imissā udānapāḷiyā avirodhadassanamukhena parato vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0503a:163_14: Bhagavā hi tassā rattiyā sakalampi paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ teneva manasikārena yutto ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:164_11: yadidaṃ avijjā”ti evaṃ avijjādayo hetūti vuttā.
atk-s0503a:165_1: aññamaññaṃ paṭicca paṭimukhaṃ katvā kāraṇasamavāyaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā sahite uppādetīti paṭiccasamuppādo.
atk-s0503a:165_2: Atha vā paṭicca paccetabbaṃ paccayārahataṃ paccayaṃ paṭigantvā na vinā tena sambandhassa uppādo paṭiccasamuppādo.
atk-s0503a:165_3: Paṭiccasamuppādoti cettha samuppādapadaṭṭhānavacanaviññeyyo phalassa uppādanasamatthatāyutto hetu,
atk-s0503a:165_5: Atha vā paccetuṃ arahanti naṃ paṇḍitāti paṭicco,
atk-s0503a:165_7: paṭicco ca so samuppādo cāti paṭiccasamuppādoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0503a:166_0: Anulomanti “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena vutto avijjādiko paccayākāro attanā kattabbakiccakaraṇato anulomoti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:166_1: Atha vā ādito paṭṭhāya antaṃ pāpetvā vuttattā pavattiyā vā anulomato anulomo,
atk-s0503a:166_4: Yo yo paccayadhammo yassa yassa paccayuppannadhammassa yathā yathā hetupaccayādinā paccayabhāvena paccayo hoti,
atk-s0503a:166_5: taṃ sabbaṃ aviparītaṃ aparihāpetvā anavasesato paccavekkhaṇavasena citte akāsīti attho.
atk-s0503a:166_7: taṃ saṅkhepena tāva dassetuṃ “iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:167_2: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye sati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:167_3: Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa uppādā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:167_5: imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatīti avijjādīnaṃ abhāve saṅkhārādīnaṃ abhāvassa avijjādīnaṃ nirodhe saṅkhārādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:167_6: nirodhassa ca dutiyatatiyasuttavacanena etasmiṃ paccayalakkhaṇe niyamo dassito hoti –
atk-s0503a:167_12: Tenetaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ antogadhaniyamaṃ idha paṭiccasamuppādassa vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:167_13: Nirodhoti ca avijjādīnaṃ virāgādhigamena āyatiṃ anuppādo appavatti.
atk-s0503a:167_16: Nirodhanirodhī ca uppādanirodhībhāvena vutto “imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:168_3: “Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti idameva hi lakkhaṇaṃ pariyāyantarena “imassa uppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti vadantena parena purimaṃ visesitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:168_4: Tasmā na dharamānataṃyeva sandhāya “imasmiṃ satī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:168_6: Yasmā ca “imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0503a:168_7: imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti dvidhāpi uddiṭṭhassa lakkhaṇassa niddesaṃ vadantena “avijjāya tveva
atk-s0503a:168_9: tasmā natthibhāvopi nirodho evāti natthibhāvaviruddho atthibhāvo anirodhoti dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:168_11: Tato na idha atthibhāvamattaṃ uppādoti attho adhippeto,
atk-s0503a:168_12: atha kho anirodhasaṅkhāto atthibhāvo cāti ayamattho vibhāvitoti.
atk-s0503a:169_7: Ye pana na pahātabbā kusalābyākatā dhammā,
atk-s0503a:169_8: yāni tesu saṃyojanāni akhīṇāsavānaṃ tesaṃ aparikkhīṇatā ca.
atk-s0503a:170_2: avijjāya nivutassa bālassa yāya ca taṇhāya sampayuttassa ayaṃ kāyo samudāgato,
atk-s0503a:170_8: tasmā bālo kāyassa bhedā kāyūpago hoti,
atk-s0503a:170_9: so kāyūpago samāno na parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇenā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:171_1: taṇhupādānānaṃ abhāvato upādānabhavānaṃ asambhavoti vaṭṭassa upacchedo paññāyissatīti.
atk-s0503a:173_0: Na hi aggamaggādhigamato uddhaṃ yāva parinibbānā saḷāyatanādīnaṃ appavatti.
atk-s0503a:173_1: Atha kho natthitā nirodhasaddavacanīyatā khīṇasaṃyojanatāti nirodho vutto.
atk-s0503a:173_2: Apica cirakatampi kammaṃ anibbattitaphalatāya appahīnāhāratāya ca phalārahaṃ santaṃ eva nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:173_5: Phaluppattipaccayānaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ vuttanayeneva phalārahabhāvo anirodhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:173_6: Evaṃ aniruddhabhāveneva hi yena vinā phalaṃ na sambhavati,
atk-s0503a:173_7: taṃ kāraṇaṃ atītantipi imasmiṃ satīti iminā vacanena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:173_8: Tatoyeva ca avusitabrahmacariyassa appavattidhammataṃ anāpanno paccayuppādo kālabhedaṃ anāmasitvā anivattanāya eva imassa uppādāti vutto.
atk-s0503a:173_9: Atha vā avasesapaccayasamavāye avijjamānassapi vijjamānassa viya pageva vijjamānassa yā phaluppattiabhimukhatā,
atk-s0503a:173_11: Tathā hi tato phalaṃ uppajjatīti tadavatthaṃ kāraṇaṃ phalassa uppādanabhāvena uṭṭhitaṃ uppatitaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:173_12: na vijjamānampi atadavatthanti tadavatthatā uppādoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:174_0: Tattha satīti iminā vijjamānatāmattena paccayabhāvaṃ vadanto abyāpārataṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa dasseti.
atk-s0503a:174_1: Uppādāti uppattidhammataṃ asabbakālabhāvitaṃ phaluppattiabhimukhatañca dīpento aniccataṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa dasseti. “Sati, nāsati, uppādā,
atk-s0503a:174_2: na nirodhā”ti pana hetuatthehi bhummanissakkavacanehi samatthitaṃ nidānasamudayajātipabhavabhāvaṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa dasseti.
atk-s0503a:174_3: Hetuatthatā cettha bhummavacane yassa bhāve tadavinābhāviphalassa bhāvo lakkhīyati,
atk-s0503a:174_4: tattha pavattiyā veditabbā yathā “adhanānaṃ dhane ananuppadīyamāne dāliddiyaṃ vepullaṃ agamāsī”ti ca “nipphannesu sassesu subhikkhaṃ jāyatī”ti ca.
atk-s0503a:174_5: Nissakkavacanassāpi hetuatthatā phalassa pabhave pakatiyañca pavattito yathā “kalalā hoti abbudaṃ,
atk-s0503a:174_6: abbudā jāyatī pesī”ti ca “himavatā gaṅgā pabhavanti,
atk-s0503a:174_9: avijjādīhi ca saṅkhārādayo pabhavanti pakariyanti cāti te tesaṃ pabhavo pakati ca,
atk-s0503a:174_10: tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ “imasmiṃ sati imassa uppādā”ti hetuatthe bhummanissakkaniddesā katāti.
atk-s0503a:175_1: imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti saṅkhepena uddiṭṭhassa paṭiccasamuppādassa “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādiko niddeso,
atk-s0503a:175_2: tasmā yathāvutto atthibhāvo uppādo ca tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvoti viññāyati.
atk-s0503a:175_3: Na hi aniruddhatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthibhāvaṃ uppādañca anivattasabhāvatāsaṅkhātaṃ udayāvatthatāsaṅkhātaṃ vā “sati eva, nāsati,
atk-s0503a:175_5: na nirodhā”ti antogadhaniyamehi vacanehi abhihitaṃ muñcitvā añño paccayabhāvo nāma atthi,
atk-s0503a:175_6: tasmā yathāvutto atthibhāvo uppādo ca paccayabhāvoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:175_7: Yepi paṭṭhāne āgatā hetuādayo catuvīsati paccayā,
atk-s0503a:175_9: Iti yathā vitthārena anulomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasi akāsi,
atk-s0503a:176_5: antavirahite saṃsāre bhavādīsu satte javāpetīti avijjā,
atk-s0503a:176_6: avijjamānesu javati vijjamānesu na javatīti avijjā,
atk-s0503a:176_9: Paṭicca na vinā phalaṃ eti uppajjati ceva pavattati cāti paccayo,
atk-s0503a:176_11: Avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo,
atk-s0503a:176_45: atha kho sabbapadehi “sambhavantī”ti padassa yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0503a:176_46: Evañhi “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantī”ti paccayapaccayuppannavavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:177_72: vitthāro pana sabbākārasampannaṃ vinicchayaṃ icchantena sammohavinodaniyā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāya gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:179_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yvāyaṃ avijjādivasena saṅkhārādikassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti vutto,
atk-s0503a:179_2: Tāyaṃ velāyanti tāyaṃ tassa atthassa viditavelāyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:179_3: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imaṃ tasmiṃ atthe vidite hetuno ca hetusamuppannadhammassa ca pajānanāya ānubhāvadīpakaṃ
atk-s0503a:180_3: Keci pana “haveti āhave yuddhe”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0503a:180_4: “yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhenā”ti vacanato kilesamārena yujjhanasamayeti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:180_14: Athassa kaṅkhā vapayanti sabbāti athassa evaṃ pātubhūtadhammassa yā etā “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0503a:180_16: No kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā nayena,
atk-s0503a:180_20: No kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā nayena paccayākāre kaṅkhā vuttā,
atk-s0503a:180_21: yā ca paccayākārasseva appaṭividdhattā “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinā soḷasa kaṅkhā āgatā.
atk-s0503a:180_22: Tā sabbā vapayanti apagacchanti nirujjhanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:180_24: yasmā avijjādikena hetunā sahetukaṃ imaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhadhammaṃ pajānāti aññāsi paṭivijjhīti.
atk-s0503a:181_0: Kadā panassa bodhipakkhiyadhammā catusaccadhammā vā pātubhavanti uppajjanti pakāsenti vā?
atk-s0503a:181_2: Tattha vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā satiādayo vipassanāñāṇañca yathārahaṃ attano visayesu tadaṅgappahānavasena
atk-s0503a:181_3: subhasaññādike pajahantā kāyānupassanādivasena visuṃ visuṃ uppajjanti,
atk-s0503a:181_4: maggakkhaṇe pana te nibbānamālambitvā samucchedavasena paṭipakkhe pajahantā catūsupi ariyasaccesu asammohappaṭivedhasādhanavasena sakideva uppajjanti.
atk-s0503a:181_5: Evaṃ tāvettha bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ uppajjanaṭṭhena pātubhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:182_0: Ariyasaccadhammānaṃ pana lokiyānaṃ vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāya ārammaṇakaraṇavasena,
atk-s0503a:182_3: sabbesampi kiccābhisamayavasena pākaṭabhāvato pakāsanaṭṭhena pātubhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:183_0: Iti bhagavā satipi sabbākārena sabbadhammānaṃ attano ñāṇassa pākaṭabhāve paṭiccasamuppādamukhena vipassanābhinivesassa
atk-s0503a:183_1: katattā nipuṇagambhīrasududdasatāya paccayākārassa taṃ paccavekkhitvā uppannabalavasomanasso paṭipakkhasamucchedavibhāvanena
atk-s0503a:184_0: Ayampi udāno vutto bhagavatā iti me sutanti ayaṃ pāḷi kesuciyeva potthakesu dissati.
atk-s0503a:184_1: Tattha ayampīti pisaddo “idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ,
atk-s0503a:184_4: Vuttoti ayaṃ vuttasaddo kesohāraṇavappanavāpasamīkaraṇajīvitavuttipamuttabhāvapāvacanabhāvena pavattana ajjhenakathanādīsu dissati.
atk-s0503a:184_5: Tathā hesa “kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu kesohāraṇe āgato.
atk-s0503a:186_0: Vuttānaṃ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhatī”ti. –
atk-s0503a:187_3: “Paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritattāyā”tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve.
atk-s0503a:187_12: Me sutanti padadvayassa attho nidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ sabbākārato vuttoyeva.
atk-s0503a:187_13: Pubbe “evaṃ me suta”nti nidānavasena vuttoyeva hi attho idha nigamanavasena “iti me suta”nti puna vutto.
atk-s0503a:187_14: Vuttasseva hi atthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti.
atk-s0503a:187_16: saddena samānatthatāya “evaṃ me suta”nti ettha viya,
atk-s0503a:187_17: atthayojanā ca itivuttakavaṇṇanāya amhehi pakāsitāyevāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
atk-s0503a:191_1: Dutiye paṭilomanti “avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādinā nayena vutto avijjādikoyeva paccayākāro anuppādanirodhena
atk-s0503a:191_2: nirujjhamāno attano kattabbakiccassa akaraṇato paṭilomoti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:191_4: antato pana majjhato vā paṭṭhāya ādiṃ pāpetvā avuttattā ito aññenatthenettha paṭilomatā na yujjati.
atk-s0503a:191_5: Paṭilomanti ca “visamaṃ candasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu viya bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso.
atk-s0503a:191_6: Imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye asati maggena pahīne idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ na hoti nappavattati.
atk-s0503a:191_7: Imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa nirodhā maggena anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditattā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ nirujjhati,
atk-s0503a:191_10: imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti ettha “imasmiṃ satiyeva, nāsati,
atk-s0503a:192_0: Evaṃ yathā bhagavā paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasi akāsi,
atk-s0503a:192_1: taṃ saṅkhepena dassetvā idāni vitthārena dassetuṃ “avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:192_4: Yadipi heṭṭhimamaggehi pahīyamānā avijjā accantasamugghāṭavaseneva pahīyati,
atk-s0503a:192_7: Tathā sakideva imasmiṃ loke sabbattha ca anariyabhūmiyaṃ upapattipaccayabhūtā avijjā yathākkamaṃ dutiyatatiyamaggehi pahīyati,
atk-s0503a:192_11: Evaṃ niruddhānaṃ pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:192_12: viññāṇādīnañca nirodhā nāmarūpādīni niruddhāni eva hontīti dassetuṃ “saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho”tiādiṃ
atk-s0503a:192_13: vatvā “evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:193_1: saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho”ti ettāvatāpi sakalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anavasesato nirodho vutto hoti,
atk-s0503a:193_2: tathāpi yathā anulome yassa yassa paccayadhammassa atthitāya yo yo paccayuppannadhammo na nirujjhati
atk-s0503a:193_3: pavattati evāti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā…pe…
atk-s0503a:193_5: Evaṃ tappaṭipakkhato tassa tassa paccayadhammassa abhāve so so paccayuppannadhammo nirujjhati nappavattatīti
atk-s0503a:193_9: na pana anulome viya kālattayapariyāpannassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodhadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0503a:193_10: Anāgatasseva hi ariyamaggabhāvanāya asati uppajjanārahassa dukkhakkhandhassa ariyamaggabhāvanāya nirodho icchitoti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:194_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yvāyaṃ “avijjānirodhādivasena saṅkhārādikassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti vutto,
atk-s0503a:194_2: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imasmiṃ atthe vidite “avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”ti evaṃ pakāsitassa avijjādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:194_3: paccayānaṃ khayassa avabodhānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti attho.
atk-s0503a:195_1: yasmā avijjādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ khayaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi,
atk-s0503a:195_2: tasmā etassa vuttanayena ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa vuttappakārā bodhipakkhiyadhammā catusaccadhammā vā pātubhavanti uppajjanti pakāsenti vā.
atk-s0503a:195_3: Atha yā paccayanirodhassa sammā aviditattā uppajjeyyuṃ pubbe vuttappabhedā kaṅkhā,
atk-s0503a:198_3: Nanu ca pubbepi anulomavasena paṭilomavasena ca paṭiccasamuppāde manasikārappavatti suttadvaye vuttā,
atk-s0503a:198_4: idha kasmā punapi tadubhayavasena manasikārappavatti vuccatīti?
atk-s0503a:198_7: Na hi sakkā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa manasikāraṃ pavattetunti?
atk-s0503a:198_8: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “tadubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ manasākāsī”ti,
atk-s0503a:198_10: Bhagavā hi paṭhamaṃ anulomavasena paṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasi karitvā tadanurūpaṃ paṭhamaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:198_11: Dutiyampi paṭilomavasena taṃ manasi karitvā tadanurūpameva udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:198_12: Tatiyavāre pana kālena anulomaṃ kālena paṭilomaṃ manasikaraṇavasena anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasi akāsi.
atk-s0503a:198_16: Iminā manasikārassa paguṇabalavabhāvo ca vasībhāvo ca pakāsito hoti.
atk-s0503a:198_19: anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasi karissāmī”ti evaṃ pavattānaṃ pubbābhogānaṃ vasena nesaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:199_0: Tattha avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya tu eva.
atk-s0503a:199_4: Heṭṭhimena hi maggattayena keci saṅkhārā nirujjhanti,
atk-s0503a:199_6: Aggamaggena panassā anavasesanirodhā na keci saṅkhārā na nirujjhantīti.
atk-s0503a:200_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yvāyaṃ avijjādivasena saṅkhārādikassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo nirodho ca avijjādīnaṃ samudayā nirodhā ca hotīti vutto,
atk-s0503a:200_2: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti idaṃ yena maggena yo dukkhakkhandhassa samudayanirodhasaṅkhāto attho kiccavasena ārammaṇakiriyāya ca vidito,
atk-s0503a:200_3: tassa ariyamaggassa ānubhāvadīpakaṃ vuttappakāraṃ udānaṃ udānesīti attho.
atk-s0503a:201_1: yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa,
atk-s0503a:201_2: tadā so brāhmaṇo tehi uppannehi bodhipakkhiyadhammehi yassa vā ariyamaggassa catusaccadhammā pātubhūtā,
atk-s0503a:201_4: “kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādinā nayena vuttappakāraṃ mārasenaṃ vidhūpayanto vidhamento viddhaṃsento tiṭṭhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0503a:201_6: yathā sūriyo abbhuggato attano pabhāya antalikkhaṃ obhāsentova andhakāraṃ vidhamento tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0503a:201_7: evaṃ sopi khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo tehi dhammehi tena vā ariyamaggena saccāni paṭivijjhantova mārasenaṃ vidhūpayanto tiṭṭhatīti.
atk-s0503a:202_2: tatiyaṃ ariyamaggassa ānubhāvappakāsanāni imāni tīṇi udānāni tīsu yāmesu bhāsitāni.
atk-s0503a:202_5: Bhagavā hi visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā
atk-s0503a:202_6: pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā nānānayehi tebhūmakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā “idāni aruṇo uggamissatī”ti
atk-s0503a:202_9: Tato teneva pallaṅkena bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṃ vītināmento sampattāya pāṭipadarattiyā tīsu yāmesu vuttanayena
atk-s0503a:202_10: paṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasi karitvā yathākkamaṃ imāni udānāni udānesi.
atk-s0503a:203_0: Khandhake pana tīsupi vāresu “paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasākāsī”ti āgatattā khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:203_1: “tīsupi yāmesu evaṃ manasi katvā paṭhamaṃ udānaṃ paccayākārapaccavekkhaṇavasena,
atk-s0503a:203_3: tatiyaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇavasenāti evaṃ imāni bhagavā udānāni udānesī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:203_5: Bhagavā hi ṭhapetvā ratanagharasattāhaṃ sesesu chasu sattāhesu antarantarā dhammaṃ paccavekkhitvā yebhuyyena vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī vihāsi,
atk-s0503a:206_1: Catutthe ajapālanigrodheti tassa kira chāyāyaṃ ajapālā gantvā nisīdanti,
atk-s0503a:206_3: Keci pana “yasmā tattha vede sajjhāyituṃ asamatthā mahallakabrāhmaṇā pākāraparikkhepayuttāni nivesanāni katvā sabbe vasiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:206_8: ajapā lanti ādiyanti nivāsaṃ etthāti ajapāloti.
atk-s0503a:206_9: Yasmā vā majjhanhike samaye anto paviṭṭhe aje attano chāyāya pāleti rakkhati,
atk-s0503a:207_0: Vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedīti tatrapi dhammaṃ vicinanto vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:207_2: Sattāhanti ca idaṃ na pallaṅkasattāhato anantarasattāhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:207_3: Bhagavā hi pallaṅkasattāhato aparānipi tīṇi sattāhāni bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmesi.
atk-s0503a:208_1: bhagavati kira sammāsambodhiṃ patvā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinne “na bhagavā vuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0503a:208_2: kinnu kho aññepi buddhattakarā dhammā atthī”ti ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ kaṅkhā udapādi.
atk-s0503a:208_3: Atha bhagavā aṭṭhame divase samāpattito vuṭṭhāya devatānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ ñatvā kaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse uppatitvā
atk-s0503a:208_4: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā tāsaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vidhametvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā
atk-s0503a:208_5: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca upacitānaṃ pāramīnaṃ balādhigamaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bodhirukkhañca
atk-s0503a:208_8: Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antarā puratthimato ca pacchimato ca āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0503a:208_11: tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ visesato anantanayaṃ samantapaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0503a:208_13: Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhato ajapālanigrodhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa mūle pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:209_0: Tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāsīti tato phalasamāpattisamādhito yathākālaparicchedaṃ vuṭṭhahi,
atk-s0503a:209_1: vuṭṭhahitvā ca pana tattha evaṃ nisinne bhagavati eko brāhmaṇo taṃ gantvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0503a:209_3: Tattha aññataroti nāmagottavasena anabhiññāto apākaṭo eko.
atk-s0503a:209_4: Huṃhuṅkajātikoti so kira diṭṭhamaṅgaliko mānathaddho mānavasena kodhavasena ca sabbaṃ avokkhajātikaṃ
atk-s0503a:210_0: Yena bhagavāti yassaṃ disāyaṃ bhagavā nisinno.
atk-s0503a:210_8: Nānappakārarogadukkhābhipīḷitattā āturakāyehi mahājanehi mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya rogatikicchanatthaṃ,
atk-s0503a:210_9: nānāvidhakilesabyādhipīḷitattā āturacittehi devamanussehi kilesabyādhitikicchanatthaṃ dhammassavanapañhapucchanādikāraṇehi bhagavā upasaṅkamitabbo.
atk-s0503a:210_10: Tena ayampi brāhmaṇo attano kaṅkhaṃ chinditukāmo upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:211_2: tatopi bhagavato samīpabhūtaṃ āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ upagantvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:211_5: sopi bhagavatā “kacci bhoto khamanīyaṃ kacci yāpanīya”ntiādinā paṭisanthārakaraṇavasena samappavattamodo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:211_13: atisammukhādike cha nisajjadose vajjetvā ekasmiṃ padeseti attho.
atk-s0503a:211_14: Etadavocāti etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ “kittāvatā nu kho”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0503a:212_8: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ brāhmaṇo sampatisamāgato bhagavato gottaṃ jānātīti?
atk-s0503a:212_10: chabbassāni padhānakaraṇakāle upaṭṭhahantehi pañcavaggiyehi saddhiṃ caramānopi,
atk-s0503a:212_11: aparabhāge taṃ vataṃ chaḍḍetvā uruvelāyaṃ senanigame eko adutiyo hutvā piṇḍāya caramānopi tena brāhmaṇena diṭṭhapubbo ceva sallapitapubbo ca.
atk-s0503a:212_12: Tena so pubbe pañcavaggiyehi gayhamānaṃ bhagavato gottaṃ anussaranto,
atk-s0503a:212_14: Yato paṭṭhāya vā bhagavā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamanto anomanadītīre pabbajito,
atk-s0503a:212_15: tato pabhuti “samaṇo gotamo”ti cando viya sūriyo viya ca pākaṭo paññāto,
atk-s0503a:213_2: Ettha ca kittāvatāti etena yehi dhammehi brāhmaṇo hoti,
atk-s0503a:213_4: Katame ca panāti iminā tesaṃ sarūpaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0503a:214_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tena puṭṭhassa pañhassa sikhāpattaṃ atthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi,
atk-s0503a:214_1: na pana tassa brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ desesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:214_3: Tathā hi tassa brāhmaṇassa imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā na saccābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:214_6: Dhammacakkappavattanato hi pubbabhāge bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ paresaṃ suṇantānampi tapussabhallikānaṃ saraṇadānaṃ viya vāsanābhāgiyameva jātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:215_0: Tattha yo brāhmaṇoti yo bāhitapāpadhammatāya brāhmaṇo,
atk-s0503a:215_1: na diṭṭhamaṅgalikatāya huṃhuṅkārakasāvādipāpadhammayutto hutvā kevalaṃ jātimattakena brahmaññaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-s0503a:215_9: dhammena so brahmavādaṃ vadeyya “brāhmaṇo aha”nti etaṃ vādaṃ dhammena ñāyena vadeyya.
atk-s0503a:218_2: Tañhi savatthassa nāma isino nivāsaṭṭhāne māpitattā sāvatthīti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:218_7: yaṃkiñci manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ sabbamettha atthīti sāvatthi.
atk-s0503a:218_8: Satthasamāyoge ca kimettha bhaṇḍamatthīti pucchite sabbamatthītipi vacanaṃ upādāya sāvatthīti.
atk-s0503a:221_3: raññā vā paccatthikajane jite jātoti jeto,
atk-s0503a:221_4: maṅgalakamyatāya vā tassa evaṃ nāmameva katanti jeto.
atk-s0503a:221_6: attano sampattiyā sattānaṃ attani bhattiṃ karoti uppādetīti attho.
atk-s0503a:221_9: ca “etha maṃ paribhuñjathā”ti pāṇino yācati viyāti attho.
atk-s0503a:221_11: Tañhi jetena kumārena ropitaṃ saṃvaddhitaṃ paripālitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:222_0: Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmeti mātāpitūhi gahitanāmavasena sudatto nāma so mahāseṭṭhi,
atk-s0503a:222_1: sabbakāmasamiddhitāya pana vigatamalamaccheratāya karuṇādiguṇasamaṅgitāya ca niccakālaṃ anāthānaṃ piṇḍaṃ deti,
atk-s0503a:222_3: Āramanti ettha pāṇino visesena pabbajitāti ārāmo,
atk-s0503a:222_4: pupphaphalādisobhāya nātidūranāccāsannatādipañcavidhasenāsanaṅgasampattiyā ca tato tato āgamma ramanti abhiramanti anukkaṇṭhitā hutvā vasantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:222_5: Vuttappakārāya vā sampattiyā tattha tattha gatepi attano abbhantaraṃyeva ānetvā rametīti ārāmo.
atk-s0503a:222_6: So hi anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā jetassa rājakumārassa hatthato aṭṭhārasahi hiraññakoṭīhi koṭisanthārena
atk-s0503a:222_7: kiṇitvā aṭṭhārasahi hiraññakoṭīhi senāsanāni kārāpetvā aṭṭhārasahi hiraññakoṭīhi vihāramahaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0503a:223_2: Ubhayampi dvinnaṃ pariccāgavisesaparidīpanena puññakāmānaṃ āyatiṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanatthaṃ.
atk-s0503a:223_3: Tattha hi dvārakoṭṭhakapāsādakaraṇavasena bhūmivikkayaladdhā aṭṭhārasa hiraññakoṭiyo anekakoṭiagghanakā rukkhā ca jetassa pariccāgo,
atk-s0503a:223_5: Iti tesaṃ pariccāgaparikittanena “evaṃ puññakāmā puññāni karontī”ti dassento dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko aññepi
atk-s0503a:224_5: Na hi sakkā ubhayattha ekaṃ samayaṃ viharitunti.
atk-s0503a:225_7: Ekasmiñhi divase bhagavā rattasāṇiparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇayūpo,
atk-s0503a:225_10: sattaratanasamujjalāya caturaṅginiyā senāya parivārito viya cakkavatti rājā,
atk-s0503a:225_11: mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gaganamajjhe candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya catunnaṃ parisānaṃ majjhe dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:225_12: Tasmiṃ samaye ime aggasāvakā mahāsāvakā ca bhagavato pāde vandanatthāya upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:226_0: Bhikkhū āmantesīti attānaṃ parivāretvā nisinnabhikkhū te āgacchante dassetvā abhāsi.
atk-s0503a:226_1: Bhagavā hi te āyasmante sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇasampanne paramena upasamena samannāgate paramāya ākappasampattiyā
atk-s0503a:226_2: yutte upasaṅkamante passitvā pasannamānaso tesaṃ guṇavisesaparikittanatthaṃ bhikkhū āmantesi “ete,
atk-s0503a:226_9: Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ bhagavatā te āyasmante “brāhmaṇā”ti vutte.
atk-s0503a:226_14: Tassa kira evaṃ ahosi “ime lokiyā ubhatosujātiyā brāhmaṇasikkhānipphattiyā ca brāhmaṇo hoti,
atk-s0503a:226_16: bhagavā ca ete āyasmante brāhmaṇāti vadati,
atk-s0503a:226_17: handāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ brāhmaṇalakkhaṇaṃ puccheyya”nti etadatthameva hi bhagavā tadā te there “brāhmaṇā”ti abhāsi.
atk-s0503a:226_18: Brahmaṃ aṇatīti brāhmaṇoti hi jātibrāhmaṇānaṃ nibbacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:227_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ brāhmaṇasaddassa paramatthato sikhāpattamatthaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:227_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ paramatthabrāhmaṇabhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:228_1: attano santānato nīharitvā samucchedappahānavasena pajahitvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:228_7: Ye caranti sadā satāti ye sativepullappattatāya sabbakālaṃ rūpādīsu chasupi ārammaṇesu satatavihāravasena
atk-s0503a:228_8: satā satimanto hutvā catūhi iriyāpathehi caranti.
atk-s0503a:228_10: Khīṇasaṃyojanāti catūhipi ariyamaggehi dasavidhassa saṃyojanassa samucchinnattā parikkhīṇasaṃyojanā.
atk-s0503a:228_16: Te ve lokasmi brāhmaṇāti te seṭṭhatthena brāhmaṇasaṅkhāte dhamme ariyāya jātiyā jātā,
atk-s0503a:228_17: brāhmaṇabhūtassa vā bhagavato orasaputtāti imasmiṃ sattaloke paramatthato brāhmaṇā nāma,
atk-s0503a:228_20: Evaṃ imesu dvīsu suttesu brāhmaṇakarā dhammā arahattaṃ pāpetvā kathitā,
atk-s0503a:228_21: nānajjhāsayatāya pana sattānaṃ desanāvilāsena abhilāpanānattena desanānānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:231_3: “Durabhibhavanīyattā paṭirājūnaṃ gahabhūtanti rājagaha”ntiādinā aññenettha pakārena vaṇṇayanti. Kintehi?
atk-s0503a:231_5: Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:231_6: sesakāle suññaṃ yakkhapariggahitaṃ tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0503a:231_7: Veḷuvane kalandakanivāpeti veḷuvananti tassa vihārassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0503a:231_8: Taṃ kira aṭṭhārasahatthubbedhena pākārena parikkhittaṃ buddhassa bhagavato vasanānucchavikāya mahatiyā
atk-s0503a:231_9: gandhakuṭiyā aññehi ca pāsādakuṭileṇamaṇḍapacaṅkamadvārakoṭṭhakādīhi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ bahi veḷūhi parikkhittaṃ
atk-s0503a:231_14: Pubbe kira aññataro rājā taṃ uyyānaṃ kīḷanatthaṃ paviṭṭho surāmadamatto divāseyyaṃ upagato supi,
atk-s0503a:231_15: parijanopissa “sutto rājā”ti pupphaphalādīhi palobhiyamāno ito cito ca pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:231_16: Atha surāgandhena aññatarasmā rukkhasusirā kaṇhasappo nikkhamitvā rañño abhimukho āgacchati.
atk-s0503a:231_17: Taṃ disvā rukkhadevatā “rañño jīvitaṃ dassāmī”ti kalandakavesena gantvā kaṇṇamūle saddamakāsi.
atk-s0503a:231_20: So taṃ disvā “imāya kāḷakāya mama jīvitaṃ dinna”nti kāḷakānaṃ nivāpaṃ tattha paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0503a:231_22: Tasmā tato paṭṭhāya taṃ “kalandakanivāpa”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0503a:232_0: Mahākassapoti mahantehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatattā mahanto kassapoti mahākassapo,
atk-s0503a:232_1: apica kumārakassapattheraṃ upādāya ayaṃ mahāthero “mahākassapo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:232_2: Pippaliguhāyanti tassā kira guhāya dvārasamīpe eko pippalirukkho ahosi,
atk-s0503a:232_7: Dukkhitoti kāyasannissitaṃ dukkhaṃ sañjātaṃ assāti dukkhito,
atk-s0503a:232_10: taṃ pana gelaññaṃ sato sampajāno hutvā adhivāsesi.
atk-s0503a:232_11: Athassa bhagavā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā tattha gantvā bojjhaṅgaparittaṃ abhāsi,
atk-s0503a:233_0: “Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākassapo pippaliguhāyaṃ viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
atk-s0503a:233_1: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0503a:233_10: paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo’ti? ‘Na me, bhante,
atk-s0503a:234_1: bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattanti.
atk-s0503a:234_4: mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati…pe…
atk-s0503a:234_6: mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. Ime kho, kassapa,
atk-s0503a:234_7: satta bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahūlīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī’ti.
atk-s0503a:235_1: Attamano āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi.
atk-s0503a:235_3: tathā pahīno cāyasmato mahākassapassa so ābādho ahosī”ti.
atk-s0503a:236_0: Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo aparena samayena tamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:237_0: Etadahosīti pubbe gelaññadivasesu saddhivihārikehi upanītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā vihāre eva ahosi.
atk-s0503a:237_1: Athassa tamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhitassa etaṃ “yaṃnūnāhaṃ rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya paviseyya”nti parivitakko ahosi.
atk-s0503a:237_2: Pañcamattāni devatāsatānīti sakkassa devarañño paricārikā pañcasatā kakuṭapādiniyo accharāyo.
atk-s0503a:237_3: Ussukkaṃ āpannāni hontīti therassa piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmāti pañcapiṇḍapātasatāni sajjetvā suvaṇṇabhājanehi ādāya antarāmagge ṭhatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0503a:237_5: saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti vadamānā piṇḍapātadāne yuttappayuttāni honti.
atk-s0503a:238_0: Sakko kira devarājā therassa cittappavattiṃ ñatvā tā accharāyo uyyojesi “gacchatha tumhe ayyassa mahākassapattherassa
atk-s0503a:238_2: Evaṃ hissa ahosi “imāsu sabbāsu gatāsu kadāci ekissāpi hatthato piṇḍapātaṃ thero paṭiggaṇheyya,
atk-s0503a:238_3: taṃ tassā bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:238_6: mayhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadantiyo “gacchatha tumhe katapuññā mahābhogā,
atk-s0503a:238_9: saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti vadantiyo punapi paṭikkhipitvā punapi apagantuṃ anicchamānā yācantiyo “na attano pamāṇaṃ jānātha,
atk-s0503a:238_11: Tā therassa accharāsaddaṃ sutvā santajjitā ṭhātuṃ asakkontiyo palāyitvā devalokameva gatā.
atk-s0503a:239_3: Pattacīvaramādāyāti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ hatthena gahetvā.
atk-s0503a:239_9: “Ābādhā vuṭṭhito mama putto kassapo kinnu kho karotī”ti āvajjento veḷuvane nisinno eva bhagavā dibbacakkhunā addasa.
atk-s0503a:240_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yāyaṃ āyasmato mahākassapassa pañcahi accharāsatehi upanītaṃ anekasūpaṃ anekabyañjanaṃ
atk-s0503a:240_3: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ paramappicchatādassanamukhena khīṇāsavassa tādībhāvānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:241_5: Thero hi kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena ca piṇḍapātena attānameva posento paramappiccho hutvā viharati,
atk-s0503a:241_6: aññaṃ ñātimittādīsu kañci na poseti katthaci alaggabhāvato.
atk-s0503a:241_7: Atha vā aññena aññatarena posetabbatāya abhāvato anaññaposī.
atk-s0503a:241_8: Yo hi ekasmiṃyeva paccayadāyake paṭibaddhacatupaccayo so anaññaposī nāma na hoti ekāyattavuttito.
atk-s0503a:241_9: Thero pana “yathāpi bhamaro puppha”nti gāthāya vuttanayena jaṅghābalaṃ nissāya piṇḍāya caranto kulesu niccanavo hutvā missakabhattena yāpeti.
atk-s0503a:241_10: Tathā hi naṃ bhagavā candūpamappaṭipadāya thomesi.
atk-s0503a:241_14: Atha vā aññātanti sabbaso pahīnataṇhatāya lābhasakkārasilokanikāmanahetu attānaṃ jānāpanavasena na ñātaṃ.
atk-s0503a:241_15: Avītataṇho hi pāpiccho kuhakatāya sambhāvanādhippāyena attānaṃ jānāpeti.
atk-s0503a:241_19: Khīṇāsavaṃ vantadosanti kāmāsavādīnaṃ catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ anavasesaṃ pahīnattā khīṇāsavaṃ.
atk-s0503a:241_20: Tato eva rāgādidosānaṃ sabbaso vantattā vantadosaṃ.
atk-s0503a:241_21: Tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇanti taṃ yathāvuttaguṇaṃ paramatthabrāhmaṇaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇanti vadāmīti.
atk-s0503a:244_2: Ajakalāpake cetiyeti ajakalāpakena nāma yakkhena pariggahitattā “ajakalāpaka”nti laddhanāme manussānaṃ cittīkataṭṭhāne.
atk-s0503a:244_3: So kira yakkho aje kalāpe katvā bandhanena ajakoṭṭhāsena saddhiṃ baliṃ paṭicchati,
atk-s0503a:244_8: Tassa kira sattā baliṃ upanetvā yadā ajasaddaṃ katvā baliṃ upaharanti,
atk-s0503a:244_11: So pana yakkho ānubhāvasampanno kakkhaḷo pharuso tattha ca sannihito,
atk-s0503a:244_12: tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ manussā cittiṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:244_15: Ajakalāpakassa yakkhassa bhavaneti tassa yakkhassa vimāne.
atk-s0503a:245_0: Tadā kira satthā taṃ yakkhaṃ dametukāmo sāyanhasamaye eko adutiyo pattacīvaraṃ ādāya ajakalāpakassa yakkhassa
atk-s0503a:245_1: bhavanadvāraṃ gantvā tassa dovārikaṃ bhavanapavisanatthāya yāci.
atk-s0503a:245_4: samaṇoti vā brāhmaṇoti vā gāravaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0503a:245_6: mayhaṃ pana tassa anārocanaṃ na yutta”nti tāvadeva yakkhasamāgamaṃ gatassa ajakalāpakassa santikaṃ vātavegena agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:245_7: Satthā antobhavanaṃ pavisitvā ajakalāpakassa nisīdanamaṇḍape paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:245_8: Yakkhassa orodhā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:245_9: Satthā tāsaṃ kālayuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0503a:245_11: “pāvāyaṃ viharati ajakalāpake cetiye ajakalāpakassa yakkhassa bhavane”ti.
atk-s0503a:246_0: Tasmiṃ samaye sātāgirahemavatā ajakalāpakassa bhavanamatthakena yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchantā attano gamane
atk-s0503a:246_1: asampajjamāne “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti āvajjentā satthāraṃ ajakalāpakassa bhavane nisinnaṃ disvā tattha
atk-s0503a:246_3: yakkhasamāgamaṃ gamissāmā”ti āpucchitvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gatā yakkhasannipāte ajakalāpakaṃ disvā tuṭṭhiṃ pavedayiṃsu “lābhā te, āvuso,
atk-s0503a:246_5: yassa te bhavane sadevake loke aggapuggalo bhagavā nisinno,
atk-s0503a:246_8: So tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ime tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa mama bhavane nisinnabhāvaṃ kathentī”ti kodhābhibhūto
atk-s0503a:246_9: hutvā “ajja mayhaṃ tena samaṇena saddhiṃ saṅgāmo bhavissatī”ti cintetvā yakkhasannipātato uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0503a:246_10: dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ ukkhipitvā saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ pabbatakūṭaṃ akkami,
atk-s0503a:247_0: Ajakalāpakassa samāgamo hi āḷavakasamāgamasadisova ṭhapetvā pañhakaraṇaṃ vissajjanaṃ bhavanato tikkhattuṃ nikkhamanaṃ pavesanañca.
atk-s0503a:247_1: Ajakalāpako hi āgacchantoyeva “etehiyeva taṃ samaṇaṃ palāpessāmī”ti vātamaṇḍalādike navavasse samuṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0503a:247_2: tehi bhagavato calanamattampi kātuṃ asakkonto nānāvidhappaharaṇahatthe ativiya bhayānakarūpe bhūtagaṇe
atk-s0503a:247_3: nimminitvā tehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā antanteneva caranto sabbarattiṃ nānappakāraṃ vippakāraṃ
atk-s0503a:247_4: katvāpi bhagavato kiñci kesaggamattampi nisinnaṭṭhānato calanaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0503a:247_5: Kevalaṃ pana “ayaṃ samaṇo maṃ anāpucchā mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ pavisitvā nisīdatī”ti kodhavasena pajjali.
atk-s0503a:247_6: Athassa bhagavā cittappavattiṃ ñatvā “seyyathāpi nāma caṇḍassa kukkurassa nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyya,
atk-s0503a:247_8: evamevāyaṃ yakkho mayi idha nisinne cittaṃ padūseti,
atk-s0503a:247_9: yaṃnūnāhaṃ bahi nikkhameyya”nti sayameva bhavanato nikkhamitvā abbhokāse nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:247_11: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattandhakāratimisāyaṃ abbhokāse nisinno hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:248_3: Devoti megho ekamekaṃ phusitakaṃ udakabinduṃ pāteti.
atk-s0503a:248_4: Atha yakkho “iminā saddena tāsetvā imaṃ samaṇaṃ palāpessāmī”ti bhagavato samīpaṃ gantvā “akkulo”tiādinā taṃ bhiṃsanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0503a:248_11: nanu pubbe attanā kātabbaṃ vippakāraṃ akāsīti?
atk-s0503a:248_13: taṃ panesa “antobhavane khemaṭṭhāne thirabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa na kiñci kātuṃ asakkhi,
atk-s0503a:248_14: idāni bahi ṭhitaṃ evaṃ bhiṃsāpetvā palāpetuṃ sakkā”ti maññamāno upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:248_16: “tattha ṭhitattā ayaṃ samaṇo na bhāyatī”ti ca.
atk-s0503a:249_0: Tikkhattuṃ “akkulo pakkulo”ti akkulapakkulikaṃ akāsīti tayo vāre “akkulo pakkulo”ti bhiṃsāpetukāmatāya evarūpaṃ saddaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0503a:249_2: Tadā hi so yakkho sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya mahāpathaviṃ parivattento viya ca mahatā ussāhena asanisatasaddasaṅghāṭaṃ
atk-s0503a:249_3: viya ekasmiṃ ṭhāne puñjīkataṃ hutvā viniccharantaṃ disāgajānaṃ hatthigajjitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:249_9: attano gambhīratāya vipphārikatāya bhayānakatāya ca avasesasaddaṃ avahasantamiva abhibhavantamiva ca
atk-s0503a:249_10: kappavuṭṭhānamahāvātamaṇḍalikāya vinigghosaṃ puthujjanānaṃ hadayaṃ phālentaṃ viya mahantaṃ paṭibhayanigghosaṃ
atk-s0503a:249_11: abyattakkharaṃ tikkhattuṃ attano yakkhagajjitaṃ gajji “etena imaṃ samaṇaṃ bhiṃsāpetvā palāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:249_14: vanappatijeṭṭhake upādāya sabbesu rukkhalatāgumbesu pattaphalapupphāni sīdayiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:249_16: bhummadevatā ādiṃ katvā yebhuyyena devatānampi ahudeva bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso,
atk-s0503a:249_18: Aññesañca apadadvipadacatuppadānaṃ mahāpathaviyā undriyanakālo viya mahatī vibhiṃsanakā ahosi,
atk-s0503a:249_20: Bhagavā pana taṃ saddaṃ “kimī”ti amaññamāno niccalo nisīdi,
atk-s0503a:250_0: Yasmā pana so saddo “akkula pakkula” iti iminā ākārena sattānaṃ sotapathaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:250_2: yakkhassa ca tassaṃ nigghosanicchāraṇāyaṃ akkulapakkulakaraṇaṃ atthīti katvā “akkulapakkulikaṃ akāsī”ti saṅgahaṃ āropayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:250_3: Keci pana “ākulabyākula iti padadvayassa pariyāyābhidhānavasena akkulo bakkuloti ayaṃ saddo vutto”ti vadanti yathā “ekaṃ ekaka”nti.
atk-s0503a:250_4: Yasmā ekavāraṃ jāto paṭhamuppattivaseneva nibbattattā ākuloti ādiattho ākāro,
atk-s0503a:250_5: tassa ca kakārāgamaṃ katvā rassattaṃ katanti.
atk-s0503a:250_8: Vuttaadhippāyānuvidhāyī ca saddappayogoti paṭhamena padena jalābujasīhabyagghādayo,
atk-s0503a:250_10: tasmā sīhādiko viya āsīvisādiko viya ca “ahaṃ te jīvitahārako”ti imaṃ atthaṃ yakkho padadvayena dassetīti aññe.
atk-s0503a:250_11: Apare pana “akkhulo bhakkhulo”ti pāḷiṃ vatvā “akkhetuṃ khepetuṃ vināsetuṃ ulati pavattetīti akkhulo,
atk-s0503a:250_14: Yakkharakkhasapisācasīhabyagghādīsu aññataro yo koci manussānaṃ anatthāvaho”ti tassa atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0503a:251_2: tava pisitāsano pisāco upaṭṭhito”ti mahantaṃ bheravarūpaṃ abhinimminitvā bhagavato purato ṭhatvā attānaṃ sandhāya yakkho vadati.
atk-s0503a:252_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tena yakkhena kāyavācāhi pavattiyamānaṃ vippakāraṃ.
atk-s0503a:252_1: Tena ca attano anabhibhavanīyassa hetubhūtaṃ lokadhammesu nirupakkilesataṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:252_3: Imaṃ udānanti taṃ vippakāraṃ agaṇetvā assa agaṇanahetubhūtaṃ dhammānubhāvadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:253_0: Tattha yadā sakesu dhammesūti yasmiṃ kāle sakaattabhāvasaṅkhātesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhadhammesu.
atk-s0503a:253_5: Hoti brāhmaṇoti evaṃ sabbaso bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:253_8: “imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca lokasamudayañca paññapemī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:253_9: Atha vā sakesu dhammesūti attano dhammesu,
atk-s0503a:253_10: attano dhammā nāma atthakāmassa puggalassa sīlādidhammā.
atk-s0503a:253_11: Sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiādayo hi vodānadhammā ekantahitasukhasampādanena purisassa attano dhammā nāma,
atk-s0503a:253_13: Pāragūti tesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ pāripūriyā pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gato.
atk-s0503a:254_8: Tattha lokiyasamādhi saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo,
atk-s0503a:254_18: Evaṃ etesaṃ sīlādidhammānaṃ attano santāne arahattaphalādhigamena anavasesato nibbattapāripūriyā pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gatoti sakesu dhammesu pāragū.
atk-s0503a:255_6: Arahā hi paññāvepullappattiyā aggabhūtāya akuppāya cetovimuttiyā adhigatattā paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa ca
atk-s0503a:255_8: Evaṃ sabbathāpi catūsu ariyasaccesu catumaggavasena pariññādisoḷasavidhāya kiccanipphattiyā yathāvuttesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle sakesu dhammesu pāragato.
atk-s0503a:256_0: Hoti brāhmaṇoti tadā so bāhitapāpadhammatāya paramatthabrāhmaṇo hoti.
atk-s0503a:256_4: etaṃ tayā dassitaṃ pisitāsanatthamāgataṃ pisācaṃ bhayajananatthaṃ samuṭṭhāpitaṃ akkulapakkulikañca ativattati,
atk-s0503a:257_1: Atha ajakalāpako attanā katena tathārūpenapi paṭibhayarūpena vibhiṃsanena akampanīyassa bhagavato taṃ
atk-s0503a:257_2: tādibhāvaṃ disvā “aho acchariyamanussovatāya”nti pasannamānaso pothujjanikāya saddhāya attani niviṭṭhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:260_2: Ayañhi āyasmā sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto,
atk-s0503a:260_3: vayappattakāle mātāpitūhi patirūpena dārena niyojetvā sāpateyyaṃ niyyātetvā gharabandhanena baddho hoti.
atk-s0503a:260_4: So ekadivasaṃ sāvatthivāsino upāsake pubbaṇhasamayaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā sāyanhasamaye suddhavatthe
atk-s0503a:260_5: suddhuttarāsaṅge gandhamālādihatthe dhammassavanatthaṃ jetavanābhimukhe gacchante disvā “kattha tumhe
atk-s0503a:260_6: gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “dhammassavanatthaṃ jetavane satthu santika”nti vutte “tena hi ahampi gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0503a:260_8: Tena ca samayena bhagavā kañcanaguhāyaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadanto kesarasīho viya saddhammamaṇḍape paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0503a:261_0: Atha kho te upāsakā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:261_1: saṅgāmajipi kulaputto tassā parisāya pariyante dhammaṃ suṇanto nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:261_2: Bhagavā anupubbikathaṃ kathetvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0503a:261_4: Saṅgāmajipi kulaputto sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā parisāya vuṭṭhitāya bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāci “pabbājetha maṃ bhagavā”ti.
atk-s0503a:261_8: tathāgatā mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ pabbājentī”ti. “Sohaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:261_11: So bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0503a:262_0: Atha so “pabbajitvā attānaṃ dassessāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ datvā anuññāto mātāpitūhi bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0503a:262_1: Alattha kho ca bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca,
atk-s0503a:262_2: acirūpasampanno ca pana so uparimaggatthāya ghaṭento vāyamanto aññatarasmiṃ araññāvāse vassaṃ vasitvā
atk-s0503a:262_3: chaḷabhiñño hutvā vutthavasso bhagavantaṃ dassanāya mātāpitūnañca paṭissavamocanatthaṃ sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:262_5: “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā saṅgāmaji sāvatthiṃ anuppatto hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:263_0: So hāyasmā dhuragāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto jetavanaṃ pavisitvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:263_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ katapaṭisanthāro aññaṃ byākaritvā puna bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:263_2: katvā nikkhamitvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:263_3: Athassa mātāpitaro ñātimittā cassa āgamanaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0503a:263_5: kira idhāgato”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā turitaturitā vihāraṃ gantvā pariyesantā naṃ tattha nisinnaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0503a:263_6: paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “mā aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājāno hareyyuṃ,
atk-s0503a:263_10: Taṃ sutvā thero “ime mayhaṃ kāmehi anatthikabhāvaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0503a:263_11: gūthadhārī viya gūthapiṇḍe kāmesuyeva allīyanaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0503a:263_12: nayime sakkā dhammakathāya saññāpetu”nti assuṇanto viya nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:263_13: Te nānappakāraṃ yācitvā attano vacanaṃ aggaṇhantaṃ disvā gharaṃ pavisitvā puttena saddhiṃ tassa bhariyaṃ
atk-s0503a:263_14: saparivāraṃ uyyojesuṃ “mayaṃ nānappakāraṃ taṃ yācantāpi tassa manaṃ alabhitvā āgatā,
atk-s0503a:263_18: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā dārakamādāya mahatā parivārena jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:264_0: Tattha purāṇadutiyikāti pubbe gihikāle pādaparicaraṇavasena dutiyikā,
atk-s0503a:264_6: posa manti āpannasattameva maṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajito,
atk-s0503a:264_8: tādisaṃ maṃ chaḍḍetvāva tava samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ ayuttaṃ, tasmā, samaṇa,
atk-s0503a:265_0: Sā tikkhattuṃ tatheva vatvā tuṇhībhūtameva taṃ disvā “purisā nāma bhariyāsu nirapekkhāpi puttesu sāpekkhā honti,
atk-s0503a:265_2: tasmā puttapemenāpi mayhaṃ vase vatteyyā”ti maññamānā puttaṃ therassa aṅke nikkhipitvā ekamantaṃ apakkamma “eso te, samaṇa, putto,
atk-s0503a:265_4: Sā kira samaṇatejenassa sammukhe ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0503a:265_5: Thero dārakampi neva oloketi nāpi ālapati.
atk-s0503a:265_6: Atha sā itthī avidūre ṭhatvā mukhaṃ parivattetvā olokentī therassa ākāraṃ ñatvā paṭinivattitvā “puttenapi
atk-s0503a:265_7: ayaṃ samaṇo anatthiko”ti dārakaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:266_0: Tattha puttenapīti ayaṃ samaṇo attano orasaputtenapi anatthiko,
atk-s0503a:266_3: Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu hoti.
atk-s0503a:266_4: Idampi catutthajjhānasamādhinibbattaṃ abhiññācakkhuṃ tādisanti dibbaṃ viyāti dibbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:266_10: Imaṃ evarūpaṃ vippakāranti imaṃ evaṃ vippakāraṃ yathāvuttaṃ pabbajitesu asāruppaṃ aṅke puttaṭṭhapanasaṅkhātaṃ virūpakiriyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:267_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ āyasmato saṅgāmajissa puttadārādīsu sabbattha nirapekkhabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:267_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ tassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:268_2: Nābhinandatīti daṭṭhuṃ maṃ āgatāti na nandati na tussati.
atk-s0503a:268_3: Pakkamantinti sā ayaṃ mayā asammoditāva gacchatīti gacchantiṃ.
atk-s0503a:268_5: Yena pana kāraṇena thero evaṃ nābhinandati na socati,
atk-s0503a:268_7: Tattha saṅgāti rāgasaṅgo dosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgoti pañcavidhāpi saṅgā samucchedappaṭipassaddhivimuttīhi vimuttaṃ saṅgāmajiṃ bhikkhuṃ.
atk-s0503a:268_8: Tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇanti taṃ tādibhāvappattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ ahaṃ sabbaso bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇanti vadāmīti.
atk-s0503a:271_1: Navame gayāyanti ettha gayāti gāmopi titthampi vuccati.
atk-s0503a:271_2: Gayāgāmassa hi avidūre viharanto bhagavā “gayāyaṃ viharatī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:271_4: Gayātitthanti hi gayāgāmassa avidūre ekā pokkharaṇī atthi nadīpi,
atk-s0503a:271_6: Gayāsīseti gajasīsasadisasikharo tattha eko pabbato gayāsīsanāmako,
atk-s0503a:271_7: yattha hatthikumbhasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇo bhikkhusahassassa okāso pahoti,
atk-s0503a:272_2: Antaraṭṭhake himapātasamayeti hemantassa utuno abbhantarabhūte māghamāsassa avasāne cattāro phagguṇamāsassa
atk-s0503a:272_4: Gayāyaṃ ummujjantīti keci tasmiṃ titthasammate udake paṭhamaṃ nimuggasakalasarīrā tato ummujjanti vuṭṭhahanti uppilavanti.
atk-s0503a:273_0: Tattha hi keci “ekummujjaneneva pāpasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā,
atk-s0503a:273_2: Ummujjanaṃ pana nimujjanamantarena natthīti avinābhāvato nimujjanampi te karontiyeva.
atk-s0503a:273_4: tepi ekavārameva nimujjitvā vuttanayena avinābhāvato ummujjanampi katvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0503a:273_5: Ye pana “tasmiṃ titthe nimujjaneneva pāpasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā,
atk-s0503a:273_6: te tattha nimujjitvā assāse sannirumbhitvā maruppapātapatitā viya tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0503a:273_7: Apare “punappunaṃ ummujjananimujjanāni katvā nhāte pāpasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā,
atk-s0503a:273_13: ummujjanaṃ tadubhayañca karontā bahūti tesaṃ yebhuyyabhāvadassanatthaṃ ummujjanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:273_14: Tathā sambahulā jaṭilāti jaṭilānaṃ yebhuyyatāya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:273_15: muṇḍasikhaṇḍinopi ca brāhmaṇā udakasuddhikā tasmiṃ kāle tattha tathā karonti.
atk-s0503a:274_0: Osiñcantīti keci gayāya udakaṃ hatthena gahetvā attano sīse ca sarīre ca osiñcanti,
atk-s0503a:274_1: apare ghaṭehi udakaṃ gahetvā tīre ṭhatvā tathā karonti.
atk-s0503a:274_2: Aggiṃ juhantīti keci gayātīre vediṃ sajjetvā dhūmadabbhipūjādike upakaraṇe upanetvā aggihutaṃ juhanti aggihutaṃ paricaranti.
atk-s0503a:274_3: Iminā suddhīti iminā gayāyaṃ ummujjanādinā aggiparicaraṇena ca pāpamalato suddhi pāpapavāhanā saṃsārasuddhi eva vā hotīti evaṃdiṭṭhikā hutvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:275_3: keci tasmiṃ udake ṭhatvā candimasūriye anuparivattanti,
atk-s0503a:275_8: keci uttaranti keci uttaritvā suddhikaācamanaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:275_11: Yasmā vā te evarūpā vikārakiriyā karontāpi tasmiṃ udake nimujjanaummujjanapubbakameva karonti,
atk-s0503a:275_12: tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ nimujjanummujjanantogadhameva katvā “ummujjantī”tipiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:275_13: Evaṃ tattha ākulabyākule vattamāne uparipabbate ṭhito bhagavā tesaṃ taṃ kolāhalaṃ sutvā “kinnu kho eta”nti olokento taṃ kiriyavikāraṃ addasa,
atk-s0503a:276_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ atthaṃ udakorohanādiasuddhimagge tesaṃ suddhimaggaparāmasanaṃ saccādike ca
atk-s0503a:276_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ udakasuddhiyā asuddhimaggabhāvadīpakaṃ saccādidhammānañca yāthāvato suddhimaggabhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:277_0: Tattha na udakena sucī hotīti ettha udakenāti udakummujjanādinā.
atk-s0503a:277_1: Udakummujjanādi hi idha uttarapadalopena “udaka”nti vuttaṃ yathā rūpabhavo rūpanti.
atk-s0503a:277_2: Atha vā udakenāti ummujjanādikiriyāya sādhanabhūtena udakena suci sattassa suddhi nāma na hoti,
atk-s0503a:277_4: Atha vā sucīti tena yathāvuttena udakena suci pāpamalato suddho nāma satto na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:277_6: Yadi hi udakorohanādinā yathāvuttena pāpasuddhi nāma siyā,
atk-s0503a:277_8: mātughātādipāpakammakārī añño ca gomahiṃsādiko antamaso macchakacchape upādāya,
atk-s0503a:277_13: so tassa paṭipakkho yathā āloko andhakārassa,
atk-s0503a:277_16: Tasmā niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ “na udakena suci hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:278_8: so sucī so ca brāhmaṇoti so ariyapuggalo visesato khīṇāsavo accantasuddhiyā suci ca brāhmaṇo cāti.
atk-s0503a:278_9: Kasmā panettha saccaṃ dhammato visuṃ katvā gahitaṃ?
atk-s0503a:278_15: sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā cā”tiādinā anekesu suttapadesu saccaguṇā pakāsitā.
atk-s0503a:278_18: abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upetī”ti ca ādinā pakāsitāti.
atk-s0503a:282_1: ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttarasammāsambuddhakāle eko kulaputto haṃsavatīnagare dasabalassa
atk-s0503a:282_2: dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ khippābhiññānaṃ etadagge ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mahā vatāyaṃ bhikkhu,
atk-s0503a:282_4: aho vatāhampi anāgate evarūpassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā satthārā edise ṭhāne etadagge ṭhapetabbo
atk-s0503a:282_5: bhaveyyaṃ yathāyaṃ bhikkhū”ti taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā tadanurūpaṃ adhikārakammaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ puññaṃ
atk-s0503a:282_6: katvā saggaparāyaṇo hutvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapadasabalassa sāsane pabbajitvā paripuṇṇasīlo
atk-s0503a:282_7: samaṇadhammaṃ karontova jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0503a:282_8: So ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke vasitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bāhiyaraṭṭhe kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0503a:282_10: So vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto vaṇijjatthāya bahūnaṃ bhaṇḍānaṃ nāvaṃ pūretvā samuddaṃ pavisitvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0503a:282_11: sañcaranto satta vāre saddhiṃyeva parisāya attano nagaraṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0503a:283_0: Aṭṭhame vāre pana “suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gamissāmī”ti āropitabhaṇḍo nāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0503a:283_1: Nāvā mahāsamuddaṃ ajjhogāhetvā icchitadesaṃ apatvāva samuddamajjhe vipannā.
atk-s0503a:283_3: Bāhiyo pana ekaṃ nāvāphalakaṃ gahetvā taranto ūmivegena mandamandaṃ khipamāno bhassitvā samudde patitattā jātarūpeneva samuddatīre nipanno.
atk-s0503a:283_4: Parissamaṃ vinodetvā assāsamattaṃ labhitvā uṭṭhāya lajjāya gumbantaraṃ pavisitvā acchādanaṃ aññaṃ kiñci
atk-s0503a:283_5: apassanto akkanāḷāni chinditvā vākehi paliveṭhetvā nivāsanapāvuraṇāni katvā acchādesi.
atk-s0503a:283_6: Keci pana “dāruphalakāni vijjhitvā vākena āvuṇitvā nivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ katvā acchādesī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:283_7: Evaṃ sabbathāpi dārumayacīradhāritāya “dārucīriyo”ti purimavohārena “bāhiyo”ti ca paññāyittha.
atk-s0503a:284_0: Taṃ ekaṃ kapālaṃ gahetvā vuttaniyāmena suppārakapaṭṭane piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā manussā cintesuṃ “sace loke arahanto nāma honti,
atk-s0503a:284_2: kinnu kho ayaṃ ayyo vatthaṃ diyyamānaṃ gaṇheyya,
atk-s0503a:284_3: udāhu appicchatāya na gaṇheyyā”ti vīmaṃsantā nānādisāhi vatthāni upanesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:284_7: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imāni paṭikkhipitvā imināva nīhārena vihareyyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:284_9: So evaṃ cintetvā kohaññe ṭhatvā vatthāni na paṭiggaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:284_10: Manussā “aho appiccho vatāyaṃ ayyo”ti bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānasā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:285_0: Sopi bhattakiccaṃ katvā avidūraṭṭhāne ekaṃ devāyatanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:285_1: Mahājano tena saddhiṃ eva gantvā taṃ devāyatanaṃ paṭijaggitvā adāsi.
atk-s0503a:285_2: So “ime mayhaṃ cīradhāraṇamatte pasīditvā evaṃvidhaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:285_3: etesaṃ mayā ukkaṭṭhavuttinā bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sallahukaparikkhāro appicchova hutvā vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:285_8: “tena kho pana samayena bāhiyo dārucīriyo suppārake paṭivasati samuddatīre sakkato garukato”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:286_0: Tattha sakkatoti sakkaccaṃ ādarena upaṭṭhānavasena sakkato.
atk-s0503a:286_1: Garukatoti guṇavisesena yuttoti adhippāyena pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukaraṇavasena garukato.
atk-s0503a:286_6: parikkhārānanti paṇītapaṇītānaṃ uparūpari upanīyamānānaṃ cīvarādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ labhanavasena lābhī.
atk-s0503a:287_6: Yassa hi cattāro paccaye sakkatvā suabhisaṅkhate paṇītapaṇīte denti,
atk-s0503a:287_19: Ettha ca cīvaraṃ so aggaṇhantopi “ehi, bhante,
atk-s0503a:287_20: imaṃ vatthaṃ paṭiggaṇhāhī”ti upanāmanavasena cīvarassāpi “lābhī”tveva vutto.
atk-s0503a:288_1: Paṭisallīnassāti ekībhūtassa bahūhi manussehi “arahā”ti vuccamānassa tassa idāni vuccamānākārena cetaso
atk-s0503a:288_2: parivitakko udapādi cittassa micchāsaṅkappo uppajji. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0503a:288_3: Ye kho keci loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā,
atk-s0503a:288_6: ye imasmiṃ sattaloke kilesārīnaṃ hatattā pūjāsakkārādīnañca arahabhāvena arahanto,
