atk-s0503a:289_0: Purāṇasālohitāti purimasmiṃ bhavesālohitā bandhusadisā ekato katasamaṇadhammā devatā.
atk-s0503a:289_1: Keci pana “purāṇasālohitāti purāṇakāle bhavantare sālohitā mātubhūtā ekā devatā”ti vadanti,
atk-s0503a:290_0: Pubbe kira kassapadasabalassa sāsane osakkamāne sāmaṇerādīnaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā satta bhikkhū saṃvegappattā “yāva sāsanaṃ na antaradhāyati,
atk-s0503a:290_1: tāva attano patiṭṭhaṃ karissāmā”ti suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ vanditvā araññaṃ paviṭṭhā ekaṃ pabbataṃ disvā “jīvite sālayā nivattantu,
atk-s0503a:290_2: nirālayā imaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruhantū”ti vatvā nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā sabbe taṃ pabbataṃ abhiruyha nisseṇiṃ pātetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:290_4: So uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ ānetvā te bhikkhū, “āvuso,
atk-s0503a:290_8: mayampi sace tumhe viya visesaṃ nibbattessāma,
atk-s0503a:290_9: sayameva āharitvā bhuñjissāmā”ti bhuñjituṃ na icchiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:290_11: sopi tatheva piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya tattha gantvā itare nimantesi,
atk-s0503a:290_15: Itare pana pañca janā ghaṭentā vāyamantāpi visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:290_16: Te asakkontā tattheva parisussitvā devaloke nibbattā.
atk-s0503a:290_17: Ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesuyeva saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devalokato cavitvā tattha tattha kulaghare nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:290_18: Tesu hi eko pakkusāti rājā ahosi,
atk-s0503a:290_23: Tattha yo so anāgāmī brahmaloke nibbatto,
atk-s0503a:290_25: Devaputtopi hi devadhītā viya devo eva devatāti katvā devatāti vuccati “atha kho aññatarā devatā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0503a:291_0: Tassa hi brahmuno tattha nibbattasamanantarameva attano brahmasampattiṃ oloketvā āgataṭṭhānaṃ āvajjentassa
atk-s0503a:291_3: anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā attano ca ettha nibbattabhāvo upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:291_4: So “kattha nu kho itare pañca janā”ti āvajjento kāmāvacaradevaloke tesaṃ nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā aparabhāge
atk-s0503a:291_5: kālānukālaṃ “kinnu kho karontī”ti tesaṃ pavattiṃ oloketiyeva.
atk-s0503a:291_6: Imasmiṃ pana kāle “kahaṃ nu kho”ti āvajjento bāhiyaṃ suppārakapaṭṭanaṃ upanissāya dārucīradhāriṃ kohaññena
atk-s0503a:291_7: jīvikaṃ kappentaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mayā saddhiṃ pubbe nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ abhiruhitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:291_8: karonto atisallekhavuttiyā jīvite anapekkho arahatāpi ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ aparibhuñjitvā idāni sambhāvanādhippāyo
atk-s0503a:291_9: anarahāva arahattaṃ paṭijānitvā vicarati lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamāno,
atk-s0503a:291_11: handa naṃ saṃvejetvā buddhuppādaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti tāvadeva brahmalokato otaritvā rattibhāge suppārakapaṭṭane dārucīriyassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
atk-s0503a:291_12: Bāhiyo attano vasanaṭṭhāne uḷāraṃ obhāsaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti bahi nikkhamitvā olokento ākāse ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0503a:291_13: mahābrahmānaṃ disvā añjaliṃ paggayha “ke tumhe”ti pucchi.
atk-s0503a:291_14: Athassa so brahmā “ahaṃ te porāṇakasahāyo tadā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā brahmaloke nibbatto,
atk-s0503a:291_15: tvaṃ pana kiñci visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto tadā puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ katvā saṃsaranto idāni titthiyavesadhārī
atk-s0503a:291_16: anarahāva samāno ‘arahā aha’nti imaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā vicarasīti ñatvā āgato,
atk-s0503a:291_19: mā te ahosi dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya,
atk-s0503a:292_2: Purimapadena cettha bāhiyassa dukkhāpanayanakāmataṃ tassā devatāya dasseti,
atk-s0503a:292_8: Tenupasaṅkamīti seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0503a:292_10: evameva brahmaloke antarahito bāhiyassa purato pātubhavanavasena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:292_11: Etadavocāti “ye kho keci loke arahanto vā”tiādipavattamicchāparivitakkaṃ bāhiyaṃ sahoḍhaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto viya “neva kho tvaṃ, bāhiya,
atk-s0503a:292_12: arahā”tiādikaṃ etaṃ idāni vuccamānavacanaṃ brahmā avoca.
atk-s0503a:292_14: arahāti etena tadā bāhiyassa asekkhabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-s0503a:292_15: nāpi arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannoti etena sekkhabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:292_18: yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assa arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannoti iminā panassa kalyāṇaputhujjanabhāvampi paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0503a:293_1: “Appicchatāya santuṭṭhitāya sallekhatāya dīgharattaṃ katādhikārattā tadaṅgappahānavasena kilesānaṃ vihatattā arahattādhimāno uppanno”ti keci vadanti.
atk-s0503a:293_3: tasmāssa vikkhambhanappahānena kilesānaṃ asamudācārato arahattādhimāno uppajjatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:293_4: Tadubhayampi tesaṃ matimattameva “sambhāvanādhippāyo lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamāno”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā.
atk-s0503a:294_0: Atha bāhiyo ākāse ṭhatvā kathentaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ oloketvā cintesi –
atk-s0503a:294_4: atthi nu kho loke koci arahā”ti?
atk-s0503a:294_7: “atha ke carahi devate loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā”ti.
atk-s0503a:295_4: bhājanalokabhūte sakalasmiṃ jambudīpatale kasmiṃ ṭhāne arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā etarahi viharanti,
atk-s0503a:295_5: yattha mayaṃ te upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissāmāti.
atk-s0503a:296_1: Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi suvidūravidūre ṭhito maggena savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattā.
atk-s0503a:296_3: Bhagavatā hi kilesārayo anavasesato ariyamaggena hatā samucchinnāti.
atk-s0503a:296_5: Yañca avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhi puññādiabhisaṅkhārāraṃ jarāmaraṇanemi āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā
atk-s0503a:296_7: Tassānena bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakarañāṇapharasuṃ gahetvā sabbepi arā hatā vihatā viddhaṃsitāti.
atk-s0503a:296_9: Bhagavā hi sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyattā uḷāre cīvarādipaccaye pūjāvisesañca arahati.
atk-s0503a:296_11: Tathāgato hi sabbaso samucchinnarāgādikilesattā pāpakilesassāpi asambhavato pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahanti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:299_0: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:300_1: akusale dhamme sāvajjadukkhavipākatotiādinā sabbattikadukādivasena ayamattho netabbo.
atk-s0503a:300_2: Iti aviparītaṃ sayambhuñāṇena sabbākārato sabbadhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā sammāsambuddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0503a:300_5: Dhammaṃ desetīti ādikalyāṇādiguṇavisesayuttaṃ sīlādipaṭipadādhammaṃ samathavipassanādhammameva vā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ upadisati katheti.
atk-s0503a:301_3: sammāsambuddhañca loke uppajjitvā dhammaṃ desentaṃ na jāniṃ,
atk-s0503a:301_8: Suppārakā pakkāmīti buddhoti nāmamapi savanena uppannāya buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā saṃvegena ca codiyamānahadayo
atk-s0503a:301_10: Sabbattha ekarattiparivāsenāti sabbasmiṃ magge ekarattivāseneva agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:302_3: “Sabbattha ekarattiparivāsenā”ti pana vuttattā maggassa ca vīsayojanasatikattā antarāmagge gāmanigamarājadhānīsu yattha yattha rattiyaṃ vasati,
atk-s0503a:302_4: tattha tattha dutiyaṃ aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā sabbattha ekarattivāseneva sāvatthiṃ upasaṅkamīti ayamattho dīpito hotīti.
atk-s0503a:302_6: Sabbasmiṃ vīsayojanasatike magge ekarattivāsenāti imassa atthassa adhippetattā.
atk-s0503a:302_7: Ekarattimattaṃ so sakalasmiṃ tasmiṃ magge vasitvā pacchimadivase pubbaṇhasamaye sāvatthiṃ anuppattoti.
atk-s0503a:303_0: Bhagavāpi bāhiyassa āgamanaṃ ñatvā “na tāvassa indriyāni paripākaṃ gatāni,
atk-s0503a:303_1: khaṇantare pana paripākaṃ gamissantī”ti tassa indriyānaṃ paripākaṃ āgamayamāno mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tasmiṃ khaṇe sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0503a:303_2: So ca jetavanaṃ pavisitvā bhuttapātarāse kāyālasiyavimocanatthaṃ abbhokāse caṅkamante sambahule bhikkhū
atk-s0503a:303_3: passitvā “kahaṃ nu kho etarahi bhagavā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0503a:303_4: Bhikkhū “bhagavā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti vatvā pucchiṃsu “tvaṃ pana kuto āgato”ti?
atk-s0503a:303_7: tāva pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā thokaṃ vissamāhi,
atk-s0503a:303_10: ekarattenevamhi katthacipi ciraṃ aṭṭhatvā anisīditvā vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ āgato,
atk-s0503a:303_11: satthāraṃ passitvāva vissamissāmī”ti vatvā taramānarūpo sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā anopamāya buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ passi.
atk-s0503a:303_12: Tena vuttaṃ “tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū abbhokāse caṅkamanti.
atk-s0503a:303_13: Atha kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:304_5: Mayañhi taṃ bhagavantaṃ andho viya cakkhuṃ,
atk-s0503a:304_12: mahāsamudde bhinnanāvo viya mahākullaṃ passituṃ upasaṅkamituñca icchāmāti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:305_1: attano sarīrasobhāsampattiyā rūpakāyadassanabyāvaṭassa janassa sabbabhāgato pasādāvahaṃ.
atk-s0503a:305_3: buddhadhammappabhutiaparimāṇaguṇagaṇasamannāgatāya dhammakāyasampattiyā sarikkhakajanassa pasādanīyaṃ pasīditabbayuttaṃ pasādārahaṃ vā.
atk-s0503a:305_6: Uttamadamathasamathamanuppattanti lokuttarapaññāvimutticetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ uttamaṃ damathaṃ samathañca anuppatvā adhigantvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:305_7: Dantanti suparisuddhakāyasamācāratāya ceva hatthapādakukkuccābhāvato davādiabhāvato ca kāyena dantaṃ.
atk-s0503a:305_8: Guttanti suparisuddhavacīsamācāratāya ceva niratthakavācābhāvato davādiabhāvato ca vācāya guttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:305_9: Yatindriyanti suparisuddhamanosamācāratāya ariyiddhiyogena abyāvaṭaappaṭisaṅkhānupekkhābhāvato ca manindriyavasena yatindriyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:305_13: punabbhavassa ca agamanatoti imehi kāraṇehi nāgaṃ.
atk-s0503a:305_14: Ettha ca pāsādikanti iminā rūpakāyena bhagavato pamāṇabhūtataṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0503a:305_17: Tena catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse anavasesato sattānaṃ bhagavato pamāṇabhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:306_0: Evaṃbhūtañca bhagavantaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “cirassaṃ vata me sammāsambuddho diṭṭho”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho
atk-s0503a:306_1: pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭasarīro pītivipphāritavivaṭaniccalalocano diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0503a:306_2: oṇatasarīro bhagavato sarīrappabhāvemajjhaṃ ajjhogāhetvā tattha nimujjanto bhagavato samīpaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0503a:306_3: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā bhagavato pāde sambāhanto paricumbanto “desetu me, bhante,
atk-s0503a:307_8: Tena hesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gato,
atk-s0503a:307_10: Sundarañcesa ṭhānaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ gatoti sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā sugato.
atk-s0503a:307_11: Sammā ca gatattā sugato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna apaccāgamanato.
atk-s0503a:308_1: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato.
atk-s0503a:309_0: Atha vā sammā gatattāti tīsupi avatthāsu sammāpaṭipattiyā gatattā,
atk-s0503a:309_2: Dīpaṅkarapādamūlato hi paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhimaṇḍā tāva samatiṃsapāramipūritāya sammāpaṭipattiyā ñātatthacariyāya
atk-s0503a:309_3: lokatthacariyāya buddhatthacariyāya koṭiṃ pāpuṇitvā sabbalokassa hitasukhameva paribrūhanto sassataṃ
atk-s0503a:309_4: ucchedaṃ kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathanti ime ante anupagacchantiyā anuttarāya bojjhaṅgabhāvanāsaṅkhātāya
atk-s0503a:309_5: majjhimāya paṭipadāya ariyasaccesu tato paraṃ samadhigatadhammādhipateyyo sabbasattesu avisayāya sammāpaṭipattiyā
atk-s0503a:309_6: ca gato paṭipannoti evampi sammā gatattā sugato.
atk-s0503a:309_7: Sammā cesa gadati yuttaṭṭhāne yuttameva vācaṃ bhāsatīti sugato.
atk-s0503a:310_5: nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasaṃhita”nti.
atk-s0503a:314_0: Yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti yaṃ dhammassa upadisanaṃ cirakālaṃ mama jhānavimokkhādihitāya tadadhigantabbasukhāya ca siyā.
atk-s0503a:314_1: Akālo kho tāva bāhiyāti tava dhammadesanāya na tāva kāloti attho.
atk-s0503a:314_2: Kiṃ pana bhagavato sattahitapaṭipattiyā akālopi nāma atthi,
atk-s0503a:314_5: Yasmā pana tadā bāhiyassa attano indriyānaṃ paripakkāparipakkabhāvo dubbiññeyyo,
atk-s0503a:314_6: tasmā bhagavā taṃ avatvā attano antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitabhāvamassa kāraṇaṃ apadisanto āha “antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhamhā”ti.
atk-s0503a:314_8: Jīvitantarāyānanti jīvitassa antarāyakaradhammānaṃ vattanaṃ avattanaṃ vāti vattukāmo sambhamavasena “jīvitantarāyāna”nti āha.
atk-s0503a:314_9: Tathā hi anekapaccayappaṭibaddhavuttijīvitaṃ anekarūpā ca tadantarāyā.
atk-s0503a:316_0: Na hi no saṅgaraṃ tena, mahāsenena maccunā”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:317_4: Na hi tesaṃ appattaarahattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo hoti.
atk-s0503a:317_5: Kiṃ pana kāraṇā bhagavā tassa dhammaṃ desetukāmova dvikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipi?
atk-s0503a:317_6: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “imassa maṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ,
atk-s0503a:317_8: dhammaṃ sutvāpi na tāva sakkhissati paṭivijjhituṃ.
atk-s0503a:317_11: vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ āgatattā darathopissa kāye balavā,
atk-s0503a:317_14: Keci pana “dhammassavane ādarajananatthaṃ bhagavā evamakāsī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:317_15: Tatiyavāraṃ yācito pana majjhattupekkhaṃ darathappaṭipassaddhiṃ paccupaṭṭhitañcassa jīvitantarāyaṃ disvā
atk-s0503a:317_16: “idāni dhammadesanāya kālo”ti cintetvā “tasmā tihā”tiādinā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0503a:318_0: Tattha tasmāti yasmā tvaṃ ussukkajāto hutvā ativiya maṃ yācasi,
atk-s0503a:318_2: indriyāni ca te paripākaṃ gatāni, tasmā.
atk-s0503a:318_4: Teti tayā evanti idāni vattabbākāraṃ vadati.
atk-s0503a:319_0: Sikkhitabbanti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ tissannampi sikkhānaṃ vasena sikkhanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:320_0: Tattha diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattanti rūpāyatane cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhamattaṃ.
atk-s0503a:320_1: Yathā hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpe rūpamattameva passati,
atk-s0503a:320_4: Cakkhudvārikaviññāṇena hi me diṭṭhamattameva bhavissatīti sikkhitabbanti attho.
atk-s0503a:320_5: Atha vā diṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇena rūpavijānananti attho.
atk-s0503a:320_10: yathā āpāthagate rūpe cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na rajjati,
atk-s0503a:320_13: evaṃ rāgādivirahena cakkhuviññāṇamattameva me javanaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:321_0: Atha vā diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0503a:321_5: evaṃ āpāthagate rūpe teneva sampaṭicchanādippamāṇena javanaṃ uppādessāmi,
atk-s0503a:321_6: nāhaṃ taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā rajjanādivasena uppajjituṃ dassāmīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0503a:321_9: Viññāte viññātamattanti ettha pana viññātaṃ nāma manodvārāvajjanena viññātārammaṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:321_14: evaṃ rajjanādivasena ca uppajjituṃ adatvā āvajjanappamāṇeneva cittaṃ ṭhapessāmīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0503a:321_16: sikkhitabbanti evaṃ imāya paṭipadāya tayā, bāhiya,
atk-s0503a:322_0: Iti bhagavā bāhiyassa saṃkhittarucitāya chahi viññāṇakāyehi saddhiṃ chaḷārammaṇabhedabhinnaṃ vipassanāya
atk-s0503a:322_1: visayaṃ diṭṭhādīhi catūhi koṭṭhāsehi vibhajitvā tatthassa ñātatīraṇapariññaṃ dasseti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0503a:322_2: Ettha hi rūpāyatanaṃ passitabbaṭṭhena diṭṭhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0503a:322_5: na ettha koci kattā vā kāretā vā,
atk-s0503a:322_8: avasavattanaṭṭhena anattāti kuto tattha paṇḍitassa rajjanādīnaṃ okāsoti?
atk-s0503a:323_0: Idāni ñātatīraṇapariññāsu patiṭṭhitassa upari saha maggaphalena pahānapariññaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:323_9: tava yasmiṃ kāle yena vā kāraṇena diṭṭhādīsu mayā vuttavidhiṃ paṭipajjantassa aviparītasabhāvāvabodhena diṭṭhādimattaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:323_10: tasmiṃ kāle tena vā kāraṇena diṭṭhādipaṭibaddhena rāgādinā saha na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:323_11: ratto vā duṭṭho vā mūḷho vā na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:323_12: pahīnarāgādikattā tena vā diṭṭhādinā saha paṭibaddho na bhavissasīti.
atk-s0503a:323_14: na tatthāti yadā yasmā vā tvaṃ tena rāgena vā ratto dosena vā duṭṭho mohena vā mūḷho na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:323_15: tadā tasmā vā tvaṃ tattha diṭṭhādike na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:323_16: tasmiṃ diṭṭhe vā sutamutaviññāte vā “etaṃ mama,
atk-s0503a:323_18: eso me attā”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi allīno patiṭṭhito na bhavissasi.
atk-s0503a:323_19: Ettāvatā pahānapariññaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā khīṇāsavabhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0503a:324_1: nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarenāti yadā tvaṃ, bāhiya,
atk-s0503a:324_2: tena rāgādinā tattha diṭṭhādīsu paṭibaddho na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:324_3: tadā tvaṃ neva idhaloke na paraloke na ubhayatthāpi.
atk-s0503a:324_4: Esevanto dukkhassāti kilesadukkhassa ca vaṭṭadukkhassa ca ayameva hi anto ayaṃ parivaṭumabhāvoti ayameva hi ettha attho.
atk-s0503a:324_5: Ye pana “ubhayamantarenā”ti padaṃ gahetvā antarābhavaṃ nāma icchanti,
atk-s0503a:325_0: Atha vā antarenāti vacanaṃ pana vikappantarābhāvadīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:325_4: Yepi ca “antarāparinibbāyī sambhavesī”ti ca imesaṃ suttapadānaṃ atthaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “atthiyeva antarābhavo”ti vadanti,
atk-s0503a:325_5: tepi yasmā avihādīsu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarā aggamaggādhigamena anavasesakilesaparinibbānena
atk-s0503a:325_13: Catūsu vā yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujasattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti,
atk-s0503a:325_15: aṇḍakosato vatthikosato ca bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma.
atk-s0503a:325_16: Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesī nāma,
atk-s0503a:325_23: Sati hi ujuke pāḷianugate atthe kiṃ aniddhāritasāmatthiyena antarābhavena parikappitena payojananti.
atk-s0503a:326_0: Ye pana “santānavasena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ avicchedena desantaresu pātubhāvo diṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:326_2: evaṃ saviññāṇakasantānepi avicchedena desantaresu pātubhāvena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:326_5: Tena hi iddhimato cetovasippattassa cittānugatikaṃ kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa khaṇena brahmalokato idhūpasaṅkamane ito vā brahmalokagamane yutti vattabbā.
atk-s0503a:326_6: Yadi sabbattheva avicchinnadese dhammānaṃ pavatti icchitā,
atk-s0503a:326_13: Tathā hi mukhaghosādīhi paccayehi aññasmiṃ dese ādāsapabbatappadesādike paṭibimbapaṭighosādikaṃ paccayuppannaṃ nibbattamānaṃ dissati,
atk-s0503a:326_14: tasmā na sabbaṃ sabbattha upanetabbanti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0503a:326_15: Vitthāro pana paṭibimbassa udāharaṇabhāvasādhanādiko antarābhavakathāvicāro kathāvatthupakaraṇassa ṭīkāyaṃ gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:327_10: Evaṃ tāva “diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā diṭṭhādivasena catudhā tebhūmakadhammā saṅgahetabbā.
atk-s0503a:327_14: na tenā”ti iminā rāgādīnaṃ samucchedassa adhippetattā maggo.
atk-s0503a:328_0: Imāya saṃkhittapadāya desanāya tāvadevāti tasmiṃyeva khaṇe,
atk-s0503a:328_3: Āsavehīti ābhavaggaṃ āgotrabhuṃ savanato pavattanato cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madirādiāsavasadisatāya ca “āsavā”ti laddhanāmehi kāmarāgādīhi.
atk-s0503a:328_4: Vimuccīti samucchedavimuttiyā paṭippassaddhivimuttiyā ca vimucci nissajji.
atk-s0503a:328_5: So hi satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto eva sīlāni sodhetvā yathāladdhaṃ cittasamādhiṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0503a:328_6: khippābhiññatāya tāvadeva sabbāsave khepetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:328_7: So saṃsārasotaṃ chinditvā katavaṭṭapariyanto antimadehadharo hutvā ekūnavīsatiyā paccavekkhaṇāsu pavattāsu
atk-s0503a:328_10: Atha naṃ satthā “tena hi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesā”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:329_0: So kira kassapadasabalassa sāsane vīsavassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ karonto “bhikkhunā nāma attanā paccaye
atk-s0503a:329_1: labhitvā yathādānaṃ karontena attanāva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ekassa bhikkhussapi pattena vā cīvarena
atk-s0503a:329_5: “so kira buddhasuññe loke coro hutvā dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvā araññe corikaṃ karonto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0503a:329_6: disvā pattacīvaralobhena taṃ usunā vijjhitvā pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0503a:329_8: satthā taṃ ñatvā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ na adāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:329_9: Tampi pattacīvarapariyesanaṃ caramānaṃ ekā dhenu vegena āpatantī paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0503a:329_10: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha kho acirapakkantassa bhagavato bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:330_0: Tattha acirapakkantassāti na ciraṃ pakkantassa bhagavato.
atk-s0503a:330_3: Jīvitā voropesīti purimasmiṃ attabhāve laddhāghātatāya diṭṭhamatteneva vericittaṃ uppādetvā siṅgena paharitvā jīvitā voropesi.
atk-s0503a:331_0: Satthā piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nagarato nikkhamanto bāhiyassa sarīraṃ
atk-s0503a:331_3: ekasmiṃ gharadvāre ṭhatvā mañcakaṃ āharāpetvā idaṃ sarīraṃ nagarato nīharitvā jhāpetvā thūpaṃ karothā”ti,
atk-s0503a:331_5: Katvā ca pana vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attanā katakiccaṃ ārocetvā tassa abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:331_6: Atha nesaṃ bhagavā tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0503a:331_10: “Mama dhammaṃ sutakāle”ti ca vutte “kadā panassa tumhehi dhammo kathito”ti?
atk-s0503a:331_16: mama dhammaṃ ‘appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā’ti pamiṇatha,
atk-s0503a:331_18: atthanissitaṃ pana ekampi gāthāpadaṃ seyyo”ti dassento –
atk-s0503a:333_0: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti. –
atk-s0503a:334_0: Dhammapade imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā “na kevalaṃ so parinibbānamattena,
atk-s0503a:334_1: atha kho mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggabhāvenapi pūjāraho”ti dassento “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0503a:334_4: yadidaṃ bāhiyo dārucīriyo”ti taṃ āyasmantaṃ etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:335_5: Thūpañcassa karothāti assa bāhiyassa sarīradhātuyo gahetvā cetiyañca karotha.
atk-s0503a:335_11: yaṃ tumhe seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmaṃ adhisīlādipaṭipattidhammaṃ sandiṭṭhaṃ caratha,
atk-s0503a:335_12: taṃ so tumhehi samānaṃ brahmaṃ acarīti sabrahmacārī maraṇakālassa pattiyāva kālakato,
atk-s0503a:336_0: Tassa kā gatīti pañcasu gatīsu tassa katamā gati upapatti bhavabhūtā,
atk-s0503a:336_2: ariyo puthujjano vāti kā niṭṭhāti attho.
atk-s0503a:336_4: Kiñcāpi tassa thūpakaraṇāṇattiyāva parinibbutabhāvo atthato pakāsito hoti,
atk-s0503a:336_5: ye pana bhikkhū tattakena na jāniṃsu,
atk-s0503a:336_7: Pākaṭataraṃ vā kārāpetukāmā tathā bhagavantaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:337_0: Paṇḍitoti aggamaggapaññāya adhigatattā paṇḍena ito gato pavattoti paṇḍito.
atk-s0503a:337_6: Na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇanti dhammadesanāhetu na ca maṃ vihesesi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipannattā.
atk-s0503a:337_7: Yo hi satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā gahetvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ na paṭipajjati,
atk-s0503a:337_12: Atha vā na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇanti na ca imaṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:337_14: vaṭṭadukkhato niyyānahetubhūtaṃ imaṃ mama sāsanadhammaṃ suppaṭipannattā na viheseti.
atk-s0503a:337_15: Duppaṭipanno hi sāsanaṃ bhindanto satthu dhammasarīre pahāraṃ deti nāma.
atk-s0503a:337_16: Ayaṃ pana sammāpaṭipattiṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0503a:338_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ therassa bāhiyassa anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:338_1: tathā parinibbutānañca khīṇāsavānaṃ gatiyā pacurajanehi dubbiññeyyabhāvaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:338_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ appatiṭṭhitaparinibbānānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:339_0: Tattha yatthāti yasmiṃ nibbāne āpo ca na gādhati,
atk-s0503a:339_1: pathavī ca tejo ca vāyo ca na gādhati,
atk-s0503a:339_4: Na hi tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ lesopi sambhavati.
atk-s0503a:339_7: Ādicco nappakāsatīti tīsu dīpesu ekasmiṃ khaṇe ālokapharaṇasamattho ādiccopi ābhāvasena na dibbati.
atk-s0503a:339_8: Na tattha candimā bhātīti satipi bhāsurabhāve kantasītalakiraṇo candopi tasmiṃ nibbāne abhāvato eva attano juṇhāvibhāsanena na virocati.
atk-s0503a:339_10: lokantaro viya niccandhakārameva taṃ bhaveyyāti āsaṅkaṃ sandhāyāha “tamo tattha na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:339_11: Sati hi rūpābhāve tamo nāma na siyā.
atk-s0503a:340_1: muni monena brāhmaṇoti catusaccamunanato monanti laddhanāmena maggañāṇena kāyamoneyyādīhi ca samannāgatattā
atk-s0503a:340_2: “munī”ti laddhanāmo ariyasāvakabrāhmaṇo teneva monasaṅkhātena paṭivedhañāṇena yadā yasmiṃ kāle aggamaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0503a:340_3: attanā sayameva anussavādike pahāya attapaccakkhaṃ katvā nibbānaṃ vedi paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0503a:340_7: sukhadukkhā pamuccatīti athāti tassa nibbānassa jānanato pacchā.
atk-s0503a:340_9: tena pañcavokārabhavo ekavokārabhavo ca gahito hoti.
atk-s0503a:340_18: Evametasmā sakalatopi vaṭṭato accantameva muccatīti gāthādvayenapi bhagavā “mayhaṃ puttassa bāhiyassa evarūpā nibbānagatī”ti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:345_1: Mucalindavaggassa paṭhame mucalindamūleti ettha mucalindo vuccati nīparukkho.
atk-s0503a:345_5: taṃ vanajeṭṭhakatāya pana mucalindoti vutta”nti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:345_7: So hi gimhānaṃ pacchime māse sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūrento udapādi.
atk-s0503a:345_8: Sattāhavaddalikāti tasmiṃ uppanne sattāhaṃ avicchinnavuṭṭhikā ahosi.
atk-s0503a:345_9: Sītavātaduddinīti sā ca sattāhavaddalikā udakaphusitasammissena sītavātena samantato paribbhamantena dusitadivasattā duddinī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0503a:345_10: Mucalindo nāma nāgarājāti tasseva mucalindarukkhassa samīpe pokkharaṇiyā heṭṭhā nāgabhavanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0503a:345_13: Sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvāti sattavāre attano sarīrabhogehi bhagavato kāyaṃ parivāretvā.
atk-s0503a:345_14: Uparimuddhani mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ vihaccāti bhagavato muddhappadesassa upari attano mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ pasāretvā.
atk-s0503a:346_0: Tassa kira nāgarājassa etadahosi “bhagavā ca mayhaṃ bhavanasamīpe rukkhamūle nisinno,
atk-s0503a:346_3: So sattaratanamayaṃ pāsādaṃ nimminituṃ sakkontopi “evaṃ kate kāyasāro gahito na bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:346_4: dasabalassa kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ karissāmī”ti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā satthāraṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā dhāresi.
atk-s0503a:346_7: “Icchiticchitena iriyāpathena satthā viharissatī”ti kira nāgarājassa ajjhāsayo.
atk-s0503a:346_9: Tañca ṭhānaṃ supihitavātapānaṃ suphusitaaggaḷadvāraṃ kūṭāgāraṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0503a:346_10: Mā bhagavantaṃ sītantiādi tassa tathā karitvā ṭhānakāraṇaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:346_11: So hi “mā bhagavantaṃ sītaṃ bādhayittha, mā uṇhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:346_12: mā ḍaṃsādisamphasso bādhayitthā”ti tathā karitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:347_3: tampi mā bādhayitthāti evaṃ tassa cintetuṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:347_4: Keci panettha vadanti “uṇhaggahaṇaṃ bhogaparikkhepassa vipulabhāvakaraṇe kāraṇakittanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:347_5: Khuddake hi tasmiṃ bhagavantaṃ nāgassa sarīrasambhūtā usmā bādheyya,
atk-s0503a:347_6: vipulabhāvakaraṇena pana tādisaṃ ‘mā uṇhaṃ bādhayitthā’ti tathā karitvā aṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:349_0: Etamatthanti vivekasukhappaṭisaṃvedino yattha katthaci sukhameva hotīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārena jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:349_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ vivekasukhānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:350_0: Tattha sukho vivekoti nibbānasaṅkhāto upadhiviveko sukho.
atk-s0503a:350_5: taṃ sabbaṃ attano vīriyabalādhigatena ñāṇacakkhunā passantassa.
atk-s0503a:350_8: Pāṇabhūtesu saṃyamoti sattesu ca saṃyamo avihiṃsanabhāvo sukhoti attho.
atk-s0503a:351_0: Sukhā virāgatā loketi vigatarāgatāpi loke sukhā. Kīdisī?
atk-s0503a:351_5: Asmimānassa yo vinayoti iminā pana arahattaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:354_1: Dutiye sambahulānanti vinayapariyāyena tayo janā “sambahulā”ti vuccanti,
atk-s0503a:354_7: Sā hi dhammaṃ desetuṃ āgatassa tathāgatassa bhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhānakaraṇaṭṭhānanti “upaṭṭhānasālā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:354_8: Atha vā yattha bhikkhū vinayaṃ vinicchinanti,
atk-s0503a:354_13: Tatthāpi hi buddhāsanaṃ niccaṃ paññattameva hoti.
atk-s0503a:354_16: Sannipatitānanti tato tato āgantvā sannipatanavasena sannipatitānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:354_17: Atha vā buddhāsanaṃ purato katvā satthu sammukhe viya ādaruppattiyā sakkaccaṃ nisīdanavasena sannisinnānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:354_18: samānajjhāsayattā aññamaññasmiṃ ajjhāsayena suṭṭhu sammā ca nipatanavasena sannipatitānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:354_22: sāyaṃ labhitabbassa dhammassavanassa ca antarā pavattattā antarākathā,
atk-s0503a:354_23: samaṇasamācārasseva vā antarā pavattā aññā ekā kathāti antarākathā.
atk-s0503a:355_1: Mahaddhanataro vātiādīsu pathaviyaṃ nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitaṃ sattaratananicayasaṅkhātaṃ mahantaṃ dhanaṃ etassāti mahaddhano,
atk-s0503a:355_7: Devasikaṃ pavisanaāyabhūto mahanto koso etassāti mahākoso.
atk-s0503a:355_8: Apare pana “devasikaṃ pavisanaāyabhūtaṃ maṇisārapheggugumbādibhedabhinnaṃ pariggahavatthu dhanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:355_9: tadeva sāragabbhādīsu nihitaṃ koso”ti vadanti. Vajiro, mahānīlo, indanīlo, marakato, veḷuriyo,
atk-s0503a:355_20: Satta lohāni kahāpaṇo ca sāro nāma.
atk-s0503a:355_23: Tattha purimena ādisaddena sālivīhiādimuggamāsādipubbaṇṇāparaṇṇabhedaṃ dhaññavikatiṃ ādiṃ katvā yaṃ sattānaṃ upabhogaparibhogabhūtaṃ vatthu,
atk-s0503a:355_28: Icchitanibbattisaṅkhātā puññakammanipphannā mahatī iddhi etassāti mahiddhiko.
atk-s0503a:355_29: Tejasaṅkhāto ussāhamantapabhusattisaṅkhāto vā mahanto ānubhāvo etassāti mahānubhāvo.
atk-s0503a:356_7: aṭṭhamena pabhāvasampadā tesaṃ rājūnaṃ pakāsitā hoti.
atk-s0503a:357_0: Dānādīhi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ rañjetīti rājā.
atk-s0503a:357_2: Mahatiyā senāya samannāgatattā seniyagottattā vā seniyo.
atk-s0503a:357_10: Ayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antarākathā aniṭṭhitāti attho.
atk-s0503a:358_1: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti tato tato rūpādiārammaṇato cittassa paṭisaṃharaṇato paṭisallānasaṅkhātāya phalasamāpattito yathākālaparicchedaṃ vuṭṭhito.
atk-s0503a:358_2: Bhagavā hi pubbaṇhasamayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā bhikkhūnaṃ sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā
atk-s0503a:358_3: katabhattakicco bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sāvatthito nikkhamitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā gandhakuṭippamukhe ṭhatvā
atk-s0503a:358_4: vattaṃ dassetvā ṭhitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsamuṭṭhitaṃ sugatovādaṃ datvā tesu araññarukkhamūlādidivāṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:358_5: uddissa gatesu gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā phalasamāpattisukhena divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā yathākālaparicchede
atk-s0503a:358_7: “mayhaṃ upagamanaṃ āgamayamānā catasso parisā sakalavihāraṃ paripūrentiyo nisinnā,
atk-s0503a:358_8: idāni me dhammadesanatthaṃ dhammasabhāmaṇḍalaṃ upagantuṃ kālo”ti āsanato vuṭṭhāya,
atk-s0503a:358_9: kesarasīho viya kañcanaguhāya surabhigandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā yūthaṃ upasaṅkamanto mattavaravāraṇo viya
atk-s0503a:358_12: chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjentiyā acinteyyānubhāvāya anupamāya buddhalīlāya samannāgatāya rūpakāyasampattiyā
atk-s0503a:359_0: Evaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vattaṃ dassetvā nisinne te bhikkhū tuṇhībhūte disvā “mayi akathente ime bhikkhū buddhagāravena
atk-s0503a:359_3: Tattha kāya nutthāti katamāya nu bhavatha.
atk-s0503a:359_10: katamāya nāma kathāya idha sannisinnā bhavatha,
atk-s0503a:359_11: katamā ca tumhākaṃ kathā mamāgamanapaccayā aniṭṭhitā,
atk-s0503a:360_14: tumhe neva rājābhinītā na corābhinītā na iṇaṭṭā na jīvitapakatā pabbajitā,
atk-s0503a:360_15: atha kho saddhāya agārato nikkhamitvā mama sāsane pabbajitā,
atk-s0503a:360_16: tumhe etarahi evarūpiṃ rājappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ katheyyātha,
atk-s0503a:360_18: etaṃ tumhākaṃ na kho patirūpaṃ na yuttamevā”ti.
atk-s0503a:361_0: Evaṃ sannipatitānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ appatirūpaṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni nesaṃ patirūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ anujānanto “sannipatitānaṃ vo,
atk-s0503a:361_2: dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī vā kathā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:361_4: Karaṇīyanti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā kattari sāmivacanametaṃ,
atk-s0503a:361_13: Keci pana “vacīsaṅkhārapaṭipakkhabhāvato dutiyajjhānaṃ ariyo tuṇhībhāvo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:361_17: cittavivekassa paribrūhanatthaṃ vivekaṭṭhakāyā suññāgāre viharantā sace kadāci sannipatatha,
atk-s0503a:361_18: evaṃ sannipatitehi tumhehi ‘assutaṃ sāveti sutaṃ vā pariyodapetī’ti vuttanayena aññamaññassūpakārāya
atk-s0503a:362_0: Tattha purimena karaṇīyavacanena anotiṇṇānaṃ sāsane otaraṇūpāyaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0503a:362_4: Atha vā purimena sammādiṭṭhiyā paṭhamaṃ uppattihetuṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0503a:363_2: hetū dve paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya parato ca ghoso,
atk-s0503a:364_1: pacchimena lokuttarasammādiṭṭhiyā mūlakāraṇanti evamādinā ettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:365_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti tehi bhikkhūhi kittitakāmasampattito jhānādisampatti santatarā ceva paṇītatarā cāti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:365_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ ariyavihārasukhānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:366_0: Tattha yañca kāmasukhaṃ loketi lokasaddo “khandhaloko āyatanaloko dhātuloko”tiādīsu saṅkhāresu āgato.
atk-s0503a:371_1: “Addasā kho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento”tiādīsu sattesu.
atk-s0503a:371_2: Idha pana sattaloke okāsaloke ca veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:371_3: Tasmā avīcito paṭṭhāya upari brahmalokato heṭṭhā etasmiṃ loke yaṃ vatthukāme paṭicca kilesakāmavasena uppajjanato kāmasahagataṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:371_4: Yañcidaṃ diviyaṃ sukhanti yañca idaṃ divi bhavaṃ dibbavihāravasena ca laddhabbaṃ brahmānaṃ manussānañca rūpasamāpattisukhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:371_6: taṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā taṇhāya ca paṭipassambhanavasena pavattaphalasamāpattisukhaṃ taṇhakkhayasukhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0503a:372_2: cakkavattisukhaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbasmiṃ manussaloke manussasukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:372_4: cātumahārājikādidevaloke chabbidhaṃ kāmasukhanti yaṃ ekādasavidhe kāmaloke uppajjantaṃ kāmasukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:372_5: yañca idaṃ rūpārūpadevesu dibbavihārabhūtesu rūpārūpajjhānesu ca uppannattā “diviya”nti laddhanāmaṃ lokiyajjhānasukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:372_6: sakalampi tadubhayaṃ taṇhakkhayasukhasaṅkhātaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ soḷasa bhāge katvā tato ekabhāgaṃ
atk-s0503a:372_7: soḷasabhāgaguṇe laddhaṃ ekabhāgasaṅkhātaṃ kalaṃ na agghatīti.
atk-s0503a:373_1: Pāḷiyaṃ avisesena taṇhakkhayassa āgatattā paṭhamaphalasamāpattisukhassāpi kalaṃ lokiyaṃ na agghati eva.
atk-s0503a:377_2: rājā cakkavattī catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāretvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ
atk-s0503a:377_3: saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahabyataṃ,
atk-s0503a:377_4: so tattha nandane vane accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti,
atk-s0503a:378_2: ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ…pe...
atk-s0503a:378_10: Imehi catūhi dhammehi samannāgato hoti. Yo ca,
atk-s0503a:378_14: catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ paṭilābho catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭilābhassa kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi”nti.
atk-s0503a:379_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sabbattha lokiyasukhaṃ sauttaraṃ sātisayaṃ,
atk-s0503a:382_2: Antarā ca sāvatthiṃ antarā ca jetavananti antarāsaddo “tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya,
atk-s0503a:382_7: aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe.
atk-s0503a:382_12: tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare.
atk-s0503a:382_14: Tasmā sāvatthiyā ca jetavanassa ca vivareti,
atk-s0503a:382_16: Antarāsaddayogato cettha upayogavacanaṃ “antarā ca sāvatthiṃ antarā ca jetavana”nti.
atk-s0503a:382_17: Īdisesu ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca gacchatī”ti ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti,
atk-s0503a:383_0: Ahiṃ daṇḍena hanantīti bilato nikkhamitvā gocarāya gacchantaṃ kaṇhasappaṃ chātajjhattaṃ anubandhitvā yaṭṭhīhi pothenti.
atk-s0503a:383_1: Tena ca samayena bhagavā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya gacchanto antarāmagge te dārake ahiṃ daṇḍena hanante disvā
atk-s0503a:383_2: “kasmā kumārakā imaṃ ahiṃ daṇḍena hanathā”ti pucchitvā “ḍaṃsanabhayena,
atk-s0503a:383_3: bhante”ti ca vutte “ime attano sukhaṃ karissāmāti imaṃ paharantā nibbattaṭṭhāne dukkhaṃ anubhavissanti,
atk-s0503a:384_0: Tattha etamatthaṃ viditvāti “ime dārakā attasukhāya paradukkhaṃ karontā sayaṃ parattha sukhaṃ na labhissantī”ti etamatthaṃ jānitvāti evameke vaṇṇenti.
atk-s0503a:384_1: Aññesaṃ duppaṭipannānaṃ sukhapariyesanaṃ āyatiṃ dukkhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0503a:384_3: Tasmā “paravihesāvinimuttā accantameva sukhabhāgino vata mayhaṃ ovādappaṭikarā”ti somanassavasenevetampi satthā udānaṃ udānesīti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:384_4: Apare pana bhaṇanti “evaṃ tehi kumārakehi pavattitaṃ paraviheṭhanaṃ sabbākārena ādīnavato viditvā paravihesāya
atk-s0503a:384_5: parānukampāya ca yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:385_0: Tattha sukhakāmānīti ekanteneva attano sukhassa icchanato sukhānugiddhāni.
atk-s0503a:385_2: Yo daṇḍena vihiṃsatīti ettha daṇḍenāti desanāmattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:385_6: yo sukhakāmāni sabbabhūtāni jātiādinā ghaṭṭanavasena vacīdaṇḍena vā pāṇimuggarasatthādīhi pothanatāḷanacchedanādivasena
atk-s0503a:385_7: sarīradaṇḍena vā sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā ṭhāpanavasena dhanadaṇḍena vāti imesu daṇḍesu yena kenaci daṇḍena
atk-s0503a:385_10: pecca so na labhate sukhanti so puggalo attano sukhaṃ esanto gavesanto patthento pecca paraloke manussasukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:385_11: dibbasukhaṃ nibbānasukhanti tividhampi sukhaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0503a:385_12: aññadatthu tena daṇḍena dukkhameva labhatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:386_0: Pecca so labhate sukhanti yo khantimettānuddayasampanno “yathāhaṃ sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo,
atk-s0503a:386_1: evaṃ sabbepī”ti cintetvā sampattaviratiādīsu ṭhito vuttanayena kenaci daṇḍena sabbānipi bhūtāni na hiṃsati na bādhati,
atk-s0503a:386_5: Ettha ca tādisassa puggalassa avassaṃbhāvitāya taṃ sukhaṃ paccuppannaṃ viya hotīti dassanatthaṃ “labhate”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:389_1: Catutthe tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hotīti kappānaṃ satasahassādhikesu catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesu
atk-s0503a:389_2: paripūritassa puññasambhāravisesassa phalabhūtena “ito paraṃ mayhaṃ okāso natthī”ti ussahajātena viya
atk-s0503a:389_3: uparūpari vaḍḍhamānena sakkārādinā bhagavā sakkato hoti.
atk-s0503a:389_4: Sabbadisāsu hi yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo “ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ dassāmā”ti
atk-s0503a:389_11: Sakaṭasatehi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇepi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ āhacca
atk-s0503a:389_12: tiṭṭhanti ceva anubandhanti ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya.
atk-s0503a:389_13: Sabbaṃ taṃ khandhake tesu tesu ca suttesu āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:390_1: etarahi saṅghā vā gaṇā vā loke uppannā, nāhaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0503a:391_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ mahānadīnaṃ udakogho viya appameyyo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:391_2: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti…pe…
atk-s0503a:392_0: Titthiyā pana pubbe akatapuññatāya ca duppaṭipannatāya ca asakkatā agarukatā,
atk-s0503a:392_1: buddhuppādena pana visesato vipannasobhā sūriyuggamane khajjopanakā viya nippabhā nittejā hatalābhasakkārā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:392_2: Te tādisaṃ bhagavato saṅghassa ca lābhasakkāraṃ asahamānā issāpakatā “evaṃ ime pharusāhi vācāhi ghaṭṭetvāva
atk-s0503a:392_3: palāpessāmā”ti usūyā visuggāraṃ uggirantā tattha tattha bhikkhū akkosantā paribhāsantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:392_7: Atha kho te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā bhagavato sakkāraṃ asahamānā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca gāme ca araññe
atk-s0503a:392_8: ca bhikkhū disvā asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesentī”ti.
atk-s0503a:393_0: Tattha asabbhāhīti asabhāyoggāhi sabhāyaṃ sādhujanasamūhe vattuṃ ayuttāhi,
atk-s0503a:394_0: Kathaṃ panete samantapāsādike bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca akkosādīni pavattesunti?
atk-s0503a:394_1: Bhagavato uppādato pahīnalābhasakkāratāya upahatacittā pathaviṃ khaṇitvā pakkhalantā viya avaṇe veḷuriyamaṇimhi
atk-s0503a:394_2: vaṇaṃ uppādentā viya ca sundarikaṃ nāma paribbājikaṃ saññāpetvā tāya satthu bhikkhūnañca avaṇṇaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0503a:394_4: Taṃ panetaṃ sundarīvatthu parato sundarīsutte pāḷiyaṃyeva āgamissati,
atk-s0503a:395_0: Bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pavattimārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:395_2: “atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu…pe…
atk-s0503a:396_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ issāpakatānaṃ titthiyānaṃ vippaṭipattiṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:396_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ tehi kate vippakāre pasannacittehi ca parehi kate upakāre tādibhāvānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:397_0: Tattha gāme araññe sukhadukkhaphuṭṭhoti gāme vā araññe vā yattha katthaci sukhena dukkhena ca phuṭṭho sukhadukkhāni anubhavanto,
atk-s0503a:397_6: parenidaṃ mayhaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ uppādita”nti ca neva attato na parato taṃ sukhadukkhaṃ ṭhapetha. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:397_7: Na hettha khandhapañcake ahanti vā mamanti vā paroti vā parassāti vā passitabbayuttakaṃ kiñci atthi,
atk-s0503a:397_8: kevalaṃ saṅkhārā eva pana yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjitvā khaṇe khaṇe bhijjantīti.
atk-s0503a:398_0: Idāni tassa attato parato ca adahanassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti “phusanti phassā upadhiṃ paṭiccā”ti.
atk-s0503a:398_1: Ete sukhavedanīyā dukkhavedanīyā ca phassā nāma khandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ upadhiṃ paṭicca tasmiṃ sati yathāsakaṃ visayaṃ phusanti,
atk-s0503a:398_3: Adukkhamasukhā hi vedanā santasabhāvatāya sukhe eva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti duvidhasamphassavasenevāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā katā.
atk-s0503a:399_0: Yathā pana te phassā na phusanti,
atk-s0503a:399_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “nirupadhiṃ kena phuseyyuṃ phassā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:399_2: Sabbaso hi khandhūpadhiyā asati kena kāraṇena te phassā phuseyyuṃ,
atk-s0503a:399_4: Yadi hi tumhe akkosādivasena uppajjanasukhadukkhaṃ na icchatha,
atk-s0503a:399_5: sabbaso nirupadhibhāveyeva yogaṃ kareyyāthāti anupādisesanibbānadhātuyā gāthaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:402_1: Pañcame icchānaṅgalakoti icchānaṅgalanāmako kosalesu eko brāhmaṇagāmo,
atk-s0503a:402_2: taṃnivāsitāya tattha vā jāto bhavoti vā icchānaṅgalako.
atk-s0503a:402_3: Upāsakoti tīhi saraṇagamanehi bhagavato santike upāsakabhāvassa paveditattā upāsako pañcasikkhāpadiko buddhamāmako,
atk-s0503a:402_8: Ayaṃ kira upāsako pubbe abhiṇhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsati,
atk-s0503a:402_9: so katipayaṃ kālaṃ bahukaraṇīyatāya satthu dassanaṃ nābhisambhosi.
atk-s0503a:403_5: idha mama santike āgamanāya yo ayaṃ ajja kato vāro,
atk-s0503a:403_6: taṃ imaṃ cirena papañcaṃ katvā akāsīti.
atk-s0503a:403_10: Atha vā kehici kehicīti yehi vā tehi vā.
atk-s0503a:403_12: Satthari abhippasannassa hi satthudassanadhammassavanesu viya na aññattha ādaro hoti.
atk-s0503a:403_20: Evāhanti evaṃ iminā pakārena ahaṃ nāsakkhiṃ upasaṅkamituṃ,
atk-s0503a:404_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti dullabhe buddhuppāde manussattalābhe ca sattānaṃ sakiñcanabhāvena kiccapasutatāya kusalantarāyo hoti,
atk-s0503a:404_2: Imaṃ udānanti tadatthaparidīpanameva imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:405_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vata tassa na hoti kiñcīti yassa puggalassa kiñci rūpādīsu ekavatthumpi “mameta”nti taṇhāya
atk-s0503a:405_1: pariggahitabhāvena na hoti natthi na vijjati,
atk-s0503a:405_6: Keci pana na hoti kiñcīti padassa “rāgādikiñcanaṃ yassa na hotī”ti atthaṃ vaṇṇenti,
atk-s0503a:405_7: taṃ na sundaraṃ pariggahadhammavasena desanāya āgatattā.
atk-s0503a:405_8: Rāgādikiñcananti pariggahetabbassāpi saṅgahe sati yuttameva vuttaṃ siyā atha vā yassa puggalassa kiñci
atk-s0503a:405_9: appampi kiñcanaṃ palibodhajātaṃ rāgādikiñcanābhāvato eva na hoti,
atk-s0503a:405_10: taṃ tassa akiñcanattaṃ sukhassa paccayabhāvato sukhaṃ vataṃ,
atk-s0503a:405_12: Kassa pana na hoti kiñcananti ce,
atk-s0503a:405_14: Yo catūhipi maggasaṅkhāhi soḷasakiccanipphattiyā saṅkhātadhammo katakicco,
atk-s0503a:406_0: Iti bhagavā akiñcanabhāve ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā sakiñcanabhāve ādīnavaṃ dassetuṃ “sakiñcanaṃ passā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:406_3: sakiñcanattā eva aladdhānañca laddhānañca kāmānaṃ pariyesanārakkhaṇahetu kiccakaraṇīyavasena “ahaṃ mamā”ti
atk-s0503a:406_4: gahaṇavasena ca vihaññamānaṃ vighātaṃ āpajjamānaṃ passāti dhammasaṃvegappatto satthā attano cittaṃ vadati.
atk-s0503a:406_5: Jano janasmiṃ paṭibandharūpoti sayaṃ añño jano samāno aññasmiṃ jane “ahaṃ imassa,
atk-s0503a:406_6: mama aya”nti taṇhāvasena paṭibandhasabhāvo hutvā vihaññati vighātaṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0503a:408_0: Attā hi attano natthi, kuto puttā kuto dhana”nti. –
atk-s0503a:412_1: Chaṭṭhe aññatarassa paribbājakassāti ekassa kuṭumbikassa paribbājakassa.
atk-s0503a:412_6: Upavijaññāti ajja suveti paccupaṭṭhitavijāyanakālā hotīti sambandho.
atk-s0503a:412_7: So kira brāhmaṇajātiko sabhariyo vādapatthassame ṭhito,
atk-s0503a:412_11: Telasīsena cettha yaṃ yaṃ vijātāya pasavadukkhappaṭikāratthaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:412_13: Yaṃ me vijātāya bhavissatīti yaṃ telādi mayhaṃ vijātāya bahinikkhantagabbhāya upakārāya bhavissati.
atk-s0503a:412_16: yato ñātikulā vā mittakulā vā telādiṃ āhareyyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:412_18: Telaṃ āharāmīti vattamānasamīpatāya vattamānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:412_20: Samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā sappissa vā telassa vāti ca samuccayattho vā-
atk-s0503a:412_21: saddo “aggito vā udakato vā mithubhedā vā”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0503a:412_22: Sappissa vā telassa vāti paccatte sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:412_23: sappi ca telañca yāvadatthaṃ pātuṃ pivituṃ dīyatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:412_24: Apare pana “sappissa vā telassa vāti avayavasambandhe sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:412_25: Sappitelasamudāyassa hi avayavo idha yāvadatthasaddena vuccatī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:412_26: No nīharitunti bhājanena vā hatthena vā bahi netuṃ no dīyati,
atk-s0503a:412_29: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ahaṃ rañño koṭṭhāgāraṃ gantvā telaṃ kaṇṭhamattaṃ pivitvā tāvadeva gharaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0503a:412_30: ekasmiṃ bhājane yathāpītaṃ vamitvā uddhanaṃ āropetvā pacissāmi,
atk-s0503a:412_33: telaṃ pana gahetvā imissā paribbājikāya kamme upanessāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:413_1: Na pana adhoti viriñcanavasena heṭṭhā nīharituṃ na pana sakkoti.
atk-s0503a:413_2: So hi “adhikaṃ pītaṃ sayameva mukhato niggamissatī”ti pivitvā āsayassa arittatāya aniggate vamanavirecanayogaṃ
atk-s0503a:413_3: ajānanto alabhanto vā kevalaṃ dukkhāhi vedanāhi phuṭṭho āvaṭṭati ca parivaṭṭati ca.
atk-s0503a:413_8: Āvaṭṭatīti ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne anipajjitvā attano sarīraṃ ito cito ākaḍḍhanto āvaṭṭati.
atk-s0503a:413_9: Parivaṭṭatīti ekasmiṃ padese nipannopi aṅgapaccaṅgāni parito khipanto vaṭṭati,
atk-s0503a:414_1: akiñcanassa pana sabbaso ayaṃ natthī”ti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato jānitvā tadatthappakāsanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:415_0: Tattha sukhino vatāti sukhino vata sappurisā.
atk-s0503a:415_3: ye rāgādikiñcanassa pariggahakiñcanassa ca abhāvena akiñcanā,
atk-s0503a:415_7: tena vā vedena nibbānaṃ gatāti vedaguno,
atk-s0503a:415_8: te ariyajanā khīṇāsavapuggalā anavasesarāgādikiñcanānaṃ aggamaggena samucchinnattā akiñcanā nāma.
atk-s0503a:415_9: Asati hi rāgādikiñcane kuto pariggahakiñcanassa sambhavo.
atk-s0503a:415_10: Evaṃ gāthāya purimabhāgena arahante pasaṃsitvā aparabhāgena andhaputhujjane garahanto “sakiñcanaṃ passā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:418_9: kālena vā maccunā kato naṭṭho adassanaṃ gatoti kālaṅkato,
atk-s0503a:419_0: Sambahulā upāsakāti sāvatthivāsino bahū upāsakā mataputtaupāsakassa sahasokībhāvena yāva āḷāhanā pacchato
atk-s0503a:419_1: gantvā matasarīrassa kattabbaṃ kāretvā paṭinivattā yathānivatthāva udakaṃ otaritvā sīsaṃnhātā vatthāni
atk-s0503a:419_2: pīḷetvā anotāpetvāva ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā upāsakaṃ purato katvā “sokavinodanaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:420_7: tasmā jānantoyeva bhagavā kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ pucchanto “kiṃ nu kho tumhe upāsakā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:420_9: tumhe upāsakā aññesu divasesu mama santikaṃ āgacchantā otāpitasuddhavatthā sāyanhe āgacchatha,
atk-s0503a:420_10: ajja pana allavatthā allakesā ṭhitamajjhanhike kāle idhāgatā,
atk-s0503a:420_12: Tena mayanti tena puttaviyogajanitacittasantāpena balavasokābhibhūtatāya evaṃbhūtā mayaṃ idhūpasaṅkamantāti.
atk-s0503a:421_1: asati piyavatthusmiṃ sabbaso ete na santīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato jānitvā tadatthappakāsanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:422_0: Tattha piyarūpassādagadhitāseti piyasabhāvesu rūpakkhandhādīsu sukhavedanassādena gadhitā paṭibaddhacittā.
atk-s0503a:424_0: Thiyo bandhū puthu kāme, yo naro anugijjhatī”ti ca. ;
atk-s0503a:425_0: Tasmā tesu piyarūpesu assādena giddhā mucchitā ajjhāpannāti attho.
atk-s0503a:425_1: Ke pana te piyarūpassādagadhitāti te dasseti “devakāyā puthumanussā cā”ti,
atk-s0503a:425_2: cātumahārājikādayo bahudevasamūhā ceva jambudīpakādikā bahumanussā ca.
atk-s0503a:425_6: Atha vā kāmañcekantasukhasamappitānaṃ devānaṃ dukkhajarārogā na sambhavanti,
atk-s0503a:425_8: Tesampi vā pubbanimittuppattiyā paṭicchannajarāya cetasikarogassa ca vasena dukkhādīnaṃ sambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:425_9: Maccurājassa vasaṃ gacchantīti piyavatthuvisayāya taṇhāya appahīnattā punappunaṃ gabbhūpagamanato dhātuttayissaratāya
atk-s0503a:426_0: Ettāvatā vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni “ye ve divā”tiādinā vivaṭṭaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:426_1: Tattha ye ve divā ca ratto ca appamattāti “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:426_2: vuttanayena divasabhāge rattibhāge ca daḷhaṃ appamattā appamādappaṭipadaṃ pūrenti.
atk-s0503a:426_3: Jahanti piyarūpanti catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggādhigamena piyarūpaṃ piyajātikaṃ
atk-s0503a:426_6: maccuno āmisaṃ durativattanti te ariyapuggalā aghassa vaṭṭadukkhassa mūlabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0503a:426_8: ito bahiddhā kehicipi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi nivattituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya durativattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:428_0: Appamattā na mīyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:432_2: Kuṇḍadhānavaneti tassa nagarassa avidūre kuṇḍadhānasaṅkhāte vane.
atk-s0503a:433_0: Pubbe kira kuṇḍo nāma eko yakkho tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0503a:433_1: kuṇḍadhānamissakena ca balikammena tussatīti tassa tathā tattha baliṃ upaharanti,
atk-s0503a:433_4: sāpi tassa yakkhassa āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne niviṭṭhattā teneva paripālitattā kuṇḍikāti voharīyittha.
atk-s0503a:433_7: Tasmiñca vanasaṇḍe koliyarājāno bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vasanatthāya vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:433_9: Atha bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ caranto anukkamena taṃ vihāraṃ patvā tattha vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:434_2: Sā hi bhagavato aggupaṭṭhāyikā paṇītadāyikānaṃ sāvikānaṃ etadagge ṭhapitā sotāpannā ariyasāvikā.
atk-s0503a:434_3: Yañhi kiñci bhagavato yuttarūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ bhesajjaṃ vā na tattha aññāhi saṃvidhātabbaṃ atthi,
atk-s0503a:434_4: sabbaṃ taṃ sayameva attano paññāya vicāretvā sakkaccaṃ sampādetvā upaneti.
atk-s0503a:434_6: Yo koci bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā taṃ kulaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho rittahattho na gacchati.
atk-s0503a:434_7: Evaṃ muttacāgā payatapāṇī vossaggaratā yācayogā dānasaṃvibhāgaratā.
atk-s0503a:434_8: Assā kucchiyaṃ purimabuddhesu katādhikāro pacchimabhaviko sāvakabodhisatto paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:434_9: Sā taṃ gabbhaṃ kenacideva pāpakammena satta vassāni kucchinā parihari,
atk-s0503a:435_5: Gabbho hi paripakko sampajjamāno vijāyanakāle kammajavātehi sañcāletvā parivattito uddhaṃpādo adhosiro hutvā yonimukhābhimukho hoti,
atk-s0503a:435_6: evaṃ so katthaci alaggo bahi nikkhamati.
atk-s0503a:435_7: Vipajjamāno pana viparivattanavasena yonimaggaṃ pidahitvā tiriyaṃ nipajjati,
atk-s0503a:435_9: so tattha kammajavātehi aparāparaṃ parivattamāno byākulo mūḷhagabbhoti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:436_3: mātu cassāpi sotāpannāya ariyasāvikāya tathā dukkhānubhavanaṃ jātanti? Vuccate –
atk-s0503a:436_4: atīte kāsikarāje bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ kārente eko kosalarājā mahantena balenāgantvā bārāṇasiṃ gahetvā taṃ
atk-s0503a:436_5: rājānaṃ māretvā tassa aggamahesiṃ attano aggamahesiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0503a:436_6: Bārāṇasirañño pana putto pitu maraṇakāle niddhamanadvārena palāyitvā attano ñātimittabandhave ekajjhaṃ
atk-s0503a:436_7: katvā anukkamena balaṃ saṃharitvā bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā avidūre mahantaṃ khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā tassa rañño
atk-s0503a:436_10: Rājakumārassa mātā sāsanaṃ sutvā “yuddhena kammaṃ natthi,
atk-s0503a:436_12: tato dārūdakabhattaparikkhayena kilantā nagare manussā vināva yuddhena rājānaṃ gahetvā dassantī”ti paṇṇaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0503a:436_13: So mātu sāsanaṃ sutvā cattāri mahādvārāni rakkhanto satta vassāni nagaraṃ uparundhi,
atk-s0503a:436_14: nagare manussā cūḷadvārena nikkhamitvā dārūdakāni āharanti,
atk-s0503a:437_0: Atha rājakumārassa mātā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “bālo mama putto upāyaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0503a:437_2: assa cūḷadvārāni pidhāya nagaraṃ uparundhatūti vadethā”ti puttassa gūḷhasāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0503a:437_3: So mātu sāsanaṃ sutvā satta divase tathā akāsi.
atk-s0503a:437_4: Nāgarā bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhantā sattame divase tassa rañño sīsaṃ gahetvā kumārassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:437_6: So tadā satta vassāni nagararundhanakammanissandena etarahi satta vassāni mātukucchisaṅkhātāya lohitakumbhiyā vasi,
atk-s0503a:437_7: avasesato pana sattāhaṃ nagarūparundhanena sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvaṃ āpajji.
atk-s0503a:437_8: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “satta divasāni nagaraṃ rundhitvā gahitakammanissandena sattavassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:437_10: Yaṃ pana so padumuttarasammāsambuddhapādamūle “lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti mahādānaṃ datvā patthanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0503a:437_11: yañca vipassissa bhagavato kāle nāgarehi saddhiṃ sahassagghanikaṃ guḷadadhiṃ datvā patthanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0503a:437_14: tātā”ti pesitabhāvena satta vassāni kucchinā gabbhaṃ pariharitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhājātā.
atk-s0503a:437_15: Evaṃ te mātāputtā attano kammassa anurūpaṃ īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvediṃsu.
atk-s0503a:438_4: nibbānassa ca dukkhanissaraṇabhāvaṃ anussarantī attano uppajjamānadukkhaṃ amanasikaraṇeneva abhibhavitvā khamati.
atk-s0503a:439_2: yo bhagyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā lokanātho sammā aviparītaṃ sāmaṃ sayameva sabbadhamme aho vata buddho,
atk-s0503a:439_3: so bhagavā evarūpassa etarahi mayā anubhaviyamānassa aññassa ca evaṃjātikassa sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0503a:439_7: Tassa yathāvuttaguṇassa bhagavato dhammassavanante jātattā sīladiṭṭhisāmaññena saṃhatattā ca sāvakasaṅghoti
atk-s0503a:439_8: laddhanāmo aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūho suppaṭipanno vata aho vata sammā paṭipanno,
atk-s0503a:439_9: yo ariyasaṅgho evarūpassa īdisassa vaṭṭadukkhassa pahānāya anuppādanirodhāya anivattipaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0503a:439_10: Susukhaṃ vata aho vata suṭṭhu sukhaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:439_11: yasmiṃ nibbāne īdisaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ na upalabbhatīti.
atk-s0503a:439_12: Ettha ca paṭipajjamānāpi paṭipannā icceva vuttā paṭipattiyā anivattibhāvato.
atk-s0503a:439_13: Atha vā uppannasaddo viya paṭipannasaddo vattamānatthopi veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:440_2: Mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhīti mayhaṃ vacanena cakkalakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitāni vikasitapadumasassirīkāni
atk-s0503a:440_6: yā ekadese uppajjitvāpi sakalasarīraṃ ayapaṭṭena ābandhitvā viya gaṇhati.
atk-s0503a:440_15: Gilānasseva ca uṭṭhānaṃ nāma garukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:440_17: tasmā niggelaññatāya lahuparivattisaṅkhātaṃ kāyassa lahuṭṭhānaṃ sarīrabalañca pucchāti vadati.
atk-s0503a:440_18: Phāsuvihāranti ṭhānanisinnagamanasayanasaṅkhātesu catūsu iriyāpathesu sukhavihārañca pucchāti vadati.
atk-s0503a:441_5: Sukhinī hotūti sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyo satthā suppavāsāya pesitavandanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0503a:441_6: attano mettāvihārasaṃsūcakaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ sukhūpasaṃhāraṃ tassā sāmaññato pakāsetvā puna tassā puttassa
atk-s0503a:442_2: tasmiṃyeva kāle tampi kammaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:442_3: Tassa parikkhīṇabhāvaṃ oloketvā satthā tathā abhāsi.
atk-s0503a:442_6: tato parampi kiñci kālaṃ tassā taṃ dukkhaṃ anubandhissā.
atk-s0503a:442_7: Yasmā pana bhagavatā “sukhinī arogā arogañca puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:442_8: tasmā tassa vacanasamakālameva so gabbho byākulabhāvaṃ vijahitvā sukheneva bahi nikkhami,
atk-s0503a:442_11: Yathā hi paṭācārāya piyavippayogasambhūtena sokena ummādaṃ patvā –
atk-s0503a:443_0: “Ubho puttā kālakatā, panthe mayhaṃ patī mato;
atk-s0503a:444_0: Mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, ekacitakamhi jhāyare”ti. –
atk-s0503a:445_0: Vatvā jātarūpeneva carantiyā “satiṃ paṭilabhāhi bhaginī”ti bhagavato vacanasamanantarameva ummādo vūpasami,
atk-s0503a:445_1: tathā suppiyāpi upāsikā attanāva attano ūruyaṃ katena mahāvaṇena vuṭṭhātuṃ asakkontī sayanapiṭṭhe nipannā
atk-s0503a:445_2: “āgantvā maṃ vandatū”ti vacanasamanantarameva vaṇe pākatike jāte sayameva gantvā bhagavantaṃ vandīti
atk-s0503a:446_1: yathā bhagavā saputtāya mātuyā arogabhāvaṃ āsīsanto āha –
atk-s0503a:446_4: Na hi kadāci buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ vacanassa aññathābhāvoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:446_7: Abhinanditvāti karavīkarutamañjunā brahmassarena bhagavatā vuccamāne tasmiṃ vacane pītisomanassapaṭilābhato abhimukhabhāvena nanditvā.
atk-s0503a:446_11: Sakaṃ gharaṃ paccāyāsīti attano gharaṃ paṭigacchi.
atk-s0503a:447_2: Acchariyanti andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:449_1: Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā sammāsambuddhā āgatāti.
atk-s0503a:449_5: Yathā ca te bhagavanto dānapāramiṃ pūretvā sīlanekkhammapaññāvīriyakhantisaccaadhiṭṭhānamettāupekkhāpāramīti imā dasa pāramiyo,
atk-s0503a:449_7: dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā pubbayogapubbacariyadhammakkhānañātatthacariyādayo
atk-s0503a:449_10: Yathā ca te bhagavanto cattāro satipaṭṭhāne…pe…
atk-s0503a:449_11: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgatā,
atk-s0503a:450_1: Yathā sampatijātā te bhagavanto samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukhā sattapadavītihārena gatā,
atk-s0503a:450_3: āsabhiñca vācaṃ bhāsiṃsu loke attano jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ pakāsentā,
