atk-s0503a:451_0: Yathā vā te bhagavanto nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ pahāya gatā,
atk-s0503a:451_7: aṭṭhasamāpattīhi aṭṭhārasahi mahāvipassanāhi catūhi ca ariyamaggehi taṃ taṃ paṭipakkhaṃ pahāya gatā,
atk-s0503a:452_24: amatogadhassa nibbānassāti evaṃ tassa tassa dhammassa yaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:452_25: taṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto adhigatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:454_0: Apica jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…
atk-s0503a:454_3: jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho,
atk-s0503a:455_2: sadevamanussāya pajāya aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0503a:455_4: Evaṃ jānatā passatā ca tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:455_5: yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0503a:455_6: anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvipaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tathameva hoti,
atk-s0503a:456_3: sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
atk-s0503a:457_0: Evaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato. Tattha tathadassīatthe tathāgatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:458_1: Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0503a:458_3: etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇakālaṃ yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ suttageyyādi,
atk-s0503a:458_4: sabbaṃ taṃ parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ rāgamadādinimmathanaṃ ekasadisaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:459_3: yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0503a:460_0: Gadaattho ettha gatasaddo. Evaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:461_2: Tatho avitatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:462_8: vācāpi tathā gatā pavattāti tathāgato. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:465_1: Yasmā upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati
atk-s0503a:465_3: na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0503a:465_4: atha kho atulo appameyyo anuttaro devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko,
atk-s0503a:466_2: sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavatti,
atk-s0503a:467_3: Tena so mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0503a:467_4: Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho avitatho aviparīto yathāvuttova agado etassāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:468_2: Tattha sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:468_3: Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:468_4: Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato adhigatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:468_5: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:471_0: Kathaṃ tathāya āgatoti tathāgato? Yā sā bhagavatā sumedhabhūtena dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle –
atk-s0503a:475_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ abhinīhāraṃ sampādentena “ahaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ tiṇṇo tāressāmi,
atk-s0503a:484_0: Taṃ panetaṃ mahāpaṭiññaṃ sakalassāpi buddhakaradhammasamudāyassa pavicaya paccavekkhaṇasamādānānaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:484_1: avisaṃvādetvā lokanāyako yasmā mahākappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ
atk-s0503a:484_9: tasmā tasseva sā mahāpaṭiññā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
atk-s0503a:484_12: kassapo bhagavāti ime catuvīsati sammāsambuddhā paṭipāṭiyā uppannā “buddho bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:484_13: Evaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo ye te katābhinīhārehi bodhisattehi laddhabbā ānisaṃsā,
atk-s0503a:484_14: te labhitvāva āgatoti tāya yathāvuttāya mahāpaṭiññāya tathāya abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ āgato adhigatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:485_1: Yāya mahākaruṇāya lokanātho mahādukkhasambādhappaṭipannaṃ sattanikāyaṃ disvā “tassa natthañño koci paṭissaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:485_2: ahameva namito saṃsāradukkhato mutto mocessāmī”ti samussāhitamānaso mahābhinīhāramakāsi.
atk-s0503a:485_3: Katvā ca yathāpaṇidhānaṃ sakalalokahitasampādanāya ussukkamāpanno attano kāyajīvitanirapekkho paresaṃ
atk-s0503a:485_4: sotapathāgamanamattenapi cittutrāsasamuppādikā atidukkarā dukkaracariyā samācaranto yathā mahābodhiyā
atk-s0503a:485_5: paṭipatti hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na hoti,
atk-s0503a:485_7: tathā paṭipajjamāno anupubbena niravasese bodhisambhāre sampādetvā abhisambodhiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:485_8: Tato parañca tāyeva mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso pavivekaratiṃ paramañca santaṃ vimokkhasukhaṃ pahāya
atk-s0503a:485_9: bālajanabahule loke tehi samuppāditaṃ sammānāvamānavippakāraṃ agaṇetvā vineyyajanassa vinayanena niravasesaṃ
atk-s0503a:485_11: Tattha yo bhagavato sattesu mahākaruṇāya samokkamanākāro,
atk-s0503a:485_13: Yathā ca buddhabhūtassa lokanāthassa sattesu mahākaruṇā,
atk-s0503a:485_14: evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassapi mahābhinīhārakālādīsūti sabbattha sabbadā ca ekasadisatāya tathā avitathā anaññathā,
atk-s0503a:485_15: tasmā tīsupi avatthāsu sabbasattesu samānarasāya tathāya mahākaruṇāya sakalalokahitāya gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:486_5: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti evaṃ sabbañeyyadhammasaṅgāhakānaṃ pavattinivattitadubhayahetubhūtānaṃ
atk-s0503a:486_6: catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:486_9: maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetvaṭṭho dassanaṭṭho ādhipateyyaṭṭhotiādīnaṃ tabbibhāgānañca yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodhavibandhakassa
atk-s0503a:486_10: saṃkilesapakkhassa samucchindanena paṭiladdhāya tattha asammohābhisamayasaṅkhātāya aviparītākārappavattiyā
atk-s0503a:486_11: dhammānaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni,
atk-s0503a:486_12: tāni bhagavā anaññaneyyo sayameva āgato adhigato,
atk-s0503a:487_1: evaṃ bhagavato tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni catupaṭisambhidāñāṇāni catuvesārajjañāṇāni pañcagatiparicchedañāṇāni
atk-s0503a:488_1: yañhi kiñci aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ hīnādibhedabhinnāsu atītāsu khandhāyatanadhātūsu
atk-s0503a:488_3: Anindriyabaddhesu ca atisukhumatirohitavidūradesesupi rūpadhammesu yo taṃtaṃpaccayavisesehi saddhiṃ paccayuppannānaṃ
atk-s0503a:488_5: tattha sabbattheva hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalake viya paccakkhato appaṭihataṃ bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0503a:488_6: tathā anāgatāsu paccuppannāsu cāti imāni tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:490_0: Tāni panetāni tattha tattha dhammānaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni,
atk-s0503a:491_0: Tathā atthappaṭisambhidā dhammappaṭisambhidā niruttippaṭisambhidā paṭibhānappaṭisambhidāti catasso paṭisambhidā.
atk-s0503a:493_0: Ettha ca hetuanusārena araṇīyato adhigantabbato ca saṅkhepato hetuphalaṃ attho nāma.
atk-s0503a:493_1: Pabhedato pana yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannaṃ, nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:493_4: Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0503a:493_6: So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca,
atk-s0503a:493_8: pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattanako hetu ariyamaggo bhāsitaṃ kusalaṃ akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammo,
atk-s0503a:493_9: taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0503a:495_2: Ye dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā,
atk-s0503a:495_4: Yamhā dhammā te dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā,
atk-s0503a:495_9: jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā. Jātiyā, bhave, upādāne, taṇhāya, vedanāya, phasse,
atk-s0503a:496_0: “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ,
atk-s0503a:496_2: So tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho,
atk-s0503a:497_1: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0503a:497_2: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha,
atk-s0503a:498_0: Yā panetasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca sabhāvanirutti abyabhicāravohāro abhilāpo,
atk-s0503a:498_1: tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe māgadhikāya sabbasattānaṃ mūlabhāsāya “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti,
atk-s0503a:498_3: Yathāvuttesu tesu ñāṇesu gocarakiccato vitthārato pavattaṃ sabbampi taṃ ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0503a:498_5: Iti imāni cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni sayameva bhagavatā adhigatāni atthadhammādike tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attano
atk-s0503a:498_6: visaye avisaṃvādanavasena aviparītākārappavattiyā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:499_1: sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavatā sabbākārena ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ adhigataṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:499_2: Tathā hissa abhiññeyyā dhammā abhiññeyyato buddhā,
atk-s0503a:499_7: yato naṃ koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā “ime nāma te dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0503a:500_1: sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavato anavasesato bodhimūleyeva pahīnaṃ anuppattidhammaṃ,
atk-s0503a:500_2: na tassa pahānāya uttari karaṇīyaṃ atthi.
atk-s0503a:500_12: brahmā vā “ime nāma te kilesā appahīnā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0503a:501_3: brahmā vā “nālaṃ te paṭisevato antarāyāyā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0503a:502_0: Yo ca bhagavatā niravasesavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāya sīlasamādhipaññāya saṅgaho sattakoṭṭhāsiko sattatiṃsappabhedo
atk-s0503a:502_5: brahmā vā “niyyāniko dhammoti tayā desito na niyyātī”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthīti.
atk-s0503a:502_7: “sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0503a:502_8: Evametāni attano ñāṇappahānadesanāvisesānaṃ avitathabhāvāvabodhanato aviparītākārappavattitāni bhagavato
atk-s0503a:503_11: Khuppipāsitattā paradattūpajīvinijjhāmataṇhikādayo dukkhabahulatāya pākaṭasukhato itā vigatāti petā,
atk-s0503a:503_14: Parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ jambudīpādicatumahādīpavāsino manaso ussannatāya manussā,
atk-s0503a:503_16: Cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagāti ime chabbīsati devanikāyā dibbanti attano iddhānubhāvena kīḷanti jotanti cāti devā,
atk-s0503a:504_0: Tā panetā gatiyo yasmā taṃtaṃkammanibbatto upapattibhavaviseso,
atk-s0503a:504_1: tasmā atthato vipākakkhandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ.
atk-s0503a:504_2: Tattha “ayaṃ nāma gati iminā nāma kammunā jāyati,
atk-s0503a:504_3: tassa ca kammassa paccayavisesehi evaṃ vibhāgabhinnattā visuṃ ete sattanikāyā evaṃ vibhāgabhinnā”ti yathāsakaṃ
atk-s0503a:504_4: hetuphalavibhāgaparicchindanavasena ṭhānaso hetuso bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
atk-s0503a:505_8: yathā paṭipanno ca kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati,
atk-s0503a:506_0: Tāni panetāni bhagavato ñāṇāni tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visaye aviparītākārappavattiyā avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:508_27: na vipākāvaraṇena samannāgato”tiādinā ca sattānaṃ āsayādīnaṃ yathābhūtaṃ vibhāvanākārappavattaṃ bhagavato āsayānusayañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:510_1: lomakūpehi ca aggikkhandhūdakadhārāpavattanaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vividhavikubbaniddhinimmāpanakaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0503a:512_0: Yañca rāgādīhi jātiādīhi ca anekehi dukkhadhammehi upaddutaṃ sattanikāyaṃ tato nīharitukāmatāvasena nānānayehi
atk-s0503a:512_1: pavattassa bhagavato mahākaruṇokkamanassa paccayabhūtaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiñāṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:513_1: Bahukehi ākārehi passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati,
atk-s0503a:513_2: āditto lokasannivāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati. Uyyutto, payāto,
atk-s0503a:513_8: ūno loko atitto taṇhādāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.
atk-s0503a:514_5: avijjāgato lokasannivāso aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho tantākulakajāto kulaguṇḍikajāto muñjapabbajabhūto apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattati,
atk-s0503a:517_0: “Jātiyā anugato, jarāya anusaṭo, byādhinā abhibhūto, maraṇena abbhāhato, dukkhe patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0503a:519_1: āditto lokasannivāso rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
atk-s0503a:519_2: unnītako lokasannivāso haññati niccamatāṇo pattadaṇḍo takkaro,
atk-s0503a:520_0: “Andho acakkhuko, hatanetto apariṇāyako, vipathapakkhando añjasāparaddho, mahoghapakkhando.
atk-s0503a:521_29: lokasannivāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.
atk-s0503a:522_17: parinibbuto parinibbāpetunti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:524_0: Yaṃ pana yāvatā dhammadhātuyā yattakaṃ ñātabbaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatādikassa sabbassa paropadesanirapekkhaṃ
atk-s0503a:524_4: Ekameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ visayappavattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ duvidhena uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:524_6: na ca taṃ yuttaṃ kiñcāpi imāya yuttiyā.
atk-s0503a:526_0: Evametāni bhagavato chaasādhāraṇañāṇāni aviparītākārappavattiyā yathāsakavisayassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:528_17: ariyasāvako vā yathāvuttāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā bodhīti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:528_18: tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā”ti evaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇato.
atk-s0503a:529_2: cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā”tiādinā sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ aññamaññopakāravasena ekakkhaṇe pavattidassanato,
atk-s0503a:529_7: atthi bahiddhā dhammesu satī”tiādinā tesaṃ visayavibhāgena pavattidassanato.
atk-s0503a:529_10: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmi”ntiādinā bhāvanāvidhidassanato.
atk-s0503a:529_12: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti…pe…
atk-s0503a:529_13: tasmiṃ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti satisambojjhaṅgo…pe…
atk-s0503a:529_17: anussatī”tiādinā channavutiyā nayasahassavibhāgehīti evaṃ nānākārato pavattāni bhagavato sambojjhaṅgavibhāvanañāṇāni
atk-s0503a:529_18: tassa tassa atthassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:531_5: Sabbakilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalappaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo,
atk-s0503a:531_9: sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggatīti maggoti evaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇato.
atk-s0503a:531_18: Sammādiṭṭhi aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-s0503a:531_24: Sammādiṭṭhi pubbabhāge nānakkhaṇā visuṃ visuṃ dukkhādiārammaṇā hutvā maggakāle ekakkhaṇā nibbānameva
atk-s0503a:531_25: ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati,
atk-s0503a:531_26: sammāsaṅkappādayopi pubbabhāge nānakkhaṇā nānārammaṇā maggakāle ekakkhaṇā ekārammaṇā.
atk-s0503a:532_0: Tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato nekkhammasaṅkappotiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati,
atk-s0503a:532_1: sammāvācādayo tayo pubbabhāge musāvādāveramaṇītiādivibhāgā viratiyopi cetanāyopi hutvā maggakkhaṇe viratiyova,
atk-s0503a:532_2: sammāvāyāmasatiyo kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhanti.
atk-s0503a:532_3: Sammāsamādhi pana maggakkhaṇepi paṭhamajjhānādivasena nānā evāti evaṃ pubbabhāgaparabhāgesu pavattivibhāgato, “idha,
atk-s0503a:532_9: tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo”tiādinā caturāsītiyā nayasahassavibhāgehīti
atk-s0503a:532_10: evaṃ anekākārato pavattāni bhagavato ariyamaggavibhāvanañāṇāni atthassa avisaṃvādanato sabbānipi tathāni
atk-s0503a:533_0: Tathā paṭhamajjhānasamāpatti yā ca nirodhasamāpattīti etāsu anupaṭipāṭiyā viharitabbaṭṭhena samāpajjitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:533_1: ca anupubbavihārasamāpattīsu sampādanapaccavekkhaṇādivasena yathārahaṃ sampayogavasena ca pavattāni bhagavato
atk-s0503a:533_4: idaṃ aṭṭhāna”nti aviparītaṃ tassa tassa phalassa kāraṇākāraṇajānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:533_5: tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ atītādibhedabhinnassa kammasamādānassa anavasesato yathābhūtaṃ vipākantarajānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:533_6: āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva tassa tassa sattassa “ayaṃ nirayagāminī paṭipadā…pe…
atk-s0503a:533_8: 0.khandhāyatanādīnaṃ upādinnānupādinnādianekasabhāvaṃ nānāsabhāvañca tassa lokassa “imāya nāma dhātuyā
atk-s0503a:533_9: ussannattā imasmiṃ dhammappabandhe ayaṃ viseso jāyatī”tiādinā nayena yathābhūtaṃ dhātunānattajānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:533_13: sattānaṃ aparimāṇāsu jātīsu tappaṭibandhena saddhiṃ anavasesato pubbenivutthakkhandhasantatijānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:533_15: “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva catusaccajānananti imāni bhagavato dasabalañāṇāni avirajjhitvā
atk-s0503a:533_16: yathāsakaṃ visayāvagāhanato yathādhippetatthasādhanato ca yathābhūtavuttiyā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:534_0: “Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:536_2: paññāvisesānaṃ vasena bhagavā tathāni ñāṇāni āgato adhigatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:537_1: Yā sā bhagavato abhijāti abhisambodhi dhammavinayapaññāpanā anupādisesanibbānadhātu, sā tathā.
atk-s0503a:537_3: Yadatthaṃ lokanāthena abhisambodhi patthitā pavattitā ca,
atk-s0503a:537_4: tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyā avisaṃvādanato aviparītatthavuttiyā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:537_5: Tathā hi ayaṃ bhagavā bodhisattabhūto samatiṃsapāramiparipūraṇādikaṃ vuttappabhedaṃ sabbaṃ buddhattahetuṃ
atk-s0503a:537_6: sampādetvā tusitapure ṭhitova buddhakolāhalaṃ sutvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi ekato sannipatitāhi
atk-s0503a:540_0: Āyācito uppannapubbanimitto pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā “idānāhaṃ manussayoniyaṃ uppajjitvā abhisambujjhissāmī”ti
atk-s0503a:540_1: āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya sakyarājakule mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasa māse devamanussehi
atk-s0503a:540_2: mahatā parihārena parihariyamāno visākhapuṇṇamāya paccūsasamaye abhijātiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:541_0: Abhijātikkhaṇe panassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakkhaṇe viya dvattiṃsapubbanimittāni pāturahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:541_1: Ayañhi dasasahassī lokadhātu kampi saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi,
atk-s0503a:541_3: tassa taṃ siriṃ daṭṭhukāmā viya jaccandhā cakkhūni paṭilabhiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:541_17: aghaṭṭitāni eva manussānaṃ hatthūpagādīni ābharaṇāni madhurenākārena raviṃsu,
atk-s0503a:541_25: upakkilesavimutte sūriye dissamāne eva ākāsagatā sabbā jotiyo jaliṃsu,
atk-s0503a:541_26: ṭhapetvā arūpāvacare deve avasesā sabbe devā sabbepi nerayikā dissamānarūpā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:541_31: mahāsamuddo sabbatthakameva pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannatalo ahosi,
atk-s0503a:541_36: mahītale silātalāni bhinditvā uparūpari satta satta hutvā daṇḍapadumāni nāma nikkhamiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:541_40: sakaladasasahassī lokadhātu vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamālāguḷaṃ viya uppīḷetvā baddhamālākalāpo viya alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0503a:541_41: mālāsanaṃ viya ca ekamālāmālinī vipphurantavāḷabījanī pupphadhūpagandhaparivāsitā paramasobhaggappattā ahosi,
atk-s0503a:541_42: tāni ca pubbanimittāni upari adhigatānaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ nimittabhūtāni eva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:541_43: Evaṃ anekacchariyapātubhāvappaṭimaṇḍitā cāyaṃ abhijāti yadatthaṃ anena abhisambodhi patthitā,
atk-s0503a:541_44: tassā abhisambodhiyā ekantasiddhiyā tathāva ahosi avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:542_1: te sabbepi anavasesato sayameva bhagavatā vinītā.
atk-s0503a:542_3: tepi sāvakādīhi vinītā vinayaṃ gacchanti gamissanti cāti yadatthaṃ bhagavatā abhisambodhi abhipatthitā,
atk-s0503a:542_4: tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyā abhisambodhi tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:543_0: Apica yassa yassa ñeyyadhammassa yo yo sabhāvo bujjhitabbo,
atk-s0503a:543_1: so so hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya āvajjanamattappaṭibaddhena attano ñāṇena aviparītaṃ anavasesato
atk-s0503a:543_2: bhagavatā abhisambuddhoti evampi abhisambodhi tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:544_0: Tathā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ tathā tathā desetabbappakāraṃ tesaṃ tesañca sattānaṃ āsayānusayacaritādhimuttiṃ
atk-s0503a:544_1: sammadeva oloketvā dhammataṃ avijahanteneva paññattinayavohāramaggaṃ anatidhāvanteneva ca dhammataṃ vibhāvantena
atk-s0503a:544_2: yathāparādhaṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ yathādhammañca anusāsantena bhagavatā veneyyā vinītā ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpitāti
atk-s0503a:544_3: dhammavinayapaññāpanāpissa tadatthasiddhiyā yathābhūtavuttiyā ca tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:545_0: Tathā yā sā bhagavatā anuppattā pathaviyādiphassavedanādirūpārūpasabhāvavinimuttā lujjanabhāvābhāvato
atk-s0503a:545_1: lokasabhāvātītā tamasā visaṃsaṭṭhattā kenaci anobhāsanīyā lokasabhāvābhāvato eva gatiādibhāvarahitā appatiṭṭhā
atk-s0503a:545_2: anārammaṇā amatamahānibbānadhātu khandhasaṅkhātānaṃ upādīnaṃ lesamattassapi abhāvato anupādisesāti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:546_3: yattha neva pathavī na āpo na tejo na vāyo na ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ na viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ na ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0503a:546_4: na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nāyaṃ loko na paro loko na ca ubho candimasūriyā,
atk-s0503a:546_7: neva āgatiṃ vadāmi na gatiṃ na ṭhitiṃ na cutiṃ na upapattiṃ,
atk-s0503a:547_6: accantasantilakkhaṇoti yathāvuttasabhāvassa kadācipi avisaṃvādanato tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:547_7: Evametā abhijātiādikā tathā gato upagato adhigato paṭipanno pattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:548_4: Yathāvidhā te bhagavanto maggasīlena phalasīlena sabbenapi lokiyalokuttarasīlena,
atk-s0503a:548_21: na pana sīlavisuddhiyādīsu visuddhīsu samathavipassanāpaṭipattiyaṃ attanā paṭiladdhaguṇesu ca kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ atthi.
atk-s0503a:548_22: Atha kho majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya aññamaññaṃ nibbisesā te buddhā bhagavanto.
atk-s0503a:548_27: tathā hi lokiyā vidhayuttagatasadde pakāratthe vadanti.
atk-s0503a:549_1: Anaññasādhāraṇena iddhānubhāvena samannāgatattā atthappaṭisambhidādīnaṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattiyā anāvaraṇañāṇappaṭilābhena
atk-s0503a:549_2: ca bhagavato kāyappavattiyādīnaṃ katthaci paṭighātābhāvato yathā ruci tathā gataṃ gati gamanaṃ kāyavacīcittappavatti
atk-s0503a:550_1: Bodhisambhārasambharaṇe tappaṭipakkhappavattisaṅkhātaṃ natthi etassa gatanti agato.
atk-s0503a:550_2: So panassa agatabhāvo maccheradānapāramiādīsu aviparītaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇādinayappavattehi ñāṇehīti tathehi ñāṇehi agatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:551_0: Atha vā kilesābhisaṅkhārappavattisaṅkhātaṃ khandhappavattisaṅkhātameva vā pañcasupi gatīsu gataṃ gamanaṃ etassa natthīti agato.
atk-s0503a:551_1: Saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānappattiyā svāyamassa agatabhāvo tathehi ariyamaggañāṇehīti evampi bhagavā tathehi agatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:552_1: Tathā gatabhāvenāti ca tathāgatassa sabbhāvena atthitāyāti attho.
atk-s0503a:552_5: Saddhammo hi ariyamaggo tāva yathā yuganaddhasamathavipassanābalena anavasesato kilesapakkhaṃ samūhanantena samucchedappahānavasena gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:552_7: Phaladhammo yathā attano maggānurūpaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānavasena gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:552_9: Nibbānadhammo pana yathā gato paññāya paṭividdho sakalavaṭṭadukkhavūpasamāya sampajjati,
atk-s0503a:552_11: Pariyattidhammopi yathā purimabuddhehi suttageyyādivasena pavattiādippakāsanavasena ca veneyyānaṃ āsayādianurūpaṃ pavattito,
atk-s0503a:552_12: amhākampi bhagavatā tathā gato gadito pavattitoti vā tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:552_14: tathā bhagavato sāvakehi gato avagatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:553_1: evaṃ ariyasaṅghopi yathā attahitāya parahitāya ca paṭipannehi suvisuddhaṃ pubbabhāgasamathavipassanāpaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0503a:553_5: tathāva buddhattā tathā gadanato ca tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:554_1: sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0503a:554_3: tassa appamādapadassa viya tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ yuttito atthabhāvena āharanto “atitthena dhammakathiko pakkhando”ti na vattabboti.
atk-s0503a:604_2: Cirakālasambhūtena suvidūrappaṭipakkhena icchitatthanipphattihetubhūtena mahājutikena puññatejena samannāgamo mahānubhāvatā.
atk-s0503a:604_7: yā hi nāma ayaṃ suppavāsā tathā dukkhanimuggā kicchāpannā bhagavato vacanasamakālameva sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyīti.
atk-s0503a:604_10: Kilesapariyuṭṭhitañhi cittaṃ vase avattanato attamanoti na sakkā vattunti.
atk-s0503a:604_18: yaṃ sve buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dānavasena payirupāsanavasena ca bhavissati puññaṃ tadatthaṃ.
atk-s0503a:605_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ āmantesīti kasmā āmantesi?
atk-s0503a:605_6: Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ pāṭibhogoti mama bhogādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ ahāniyā avināsāya ayyo mahāmoggallāno yadi pāṭibhogo yadi patibhū,
atk-s0503a:605_7: ito satta divase atikkamitvā mama sakkā dānaṃ dātunti yadi ayyena ñātanti dīpeti.
atk-s0503a:605_8: Theropi tassa tesu divasesu bhogānaṃ jīvitassa ca anupaddavaṃ passitvā āha –
atk-s0503a:605_11: Saddhā panassa cittappaṭibaddhāti tasseva bhāraṃ karonto “saddhāya pana tvaññeva pāṭibhogo”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:605_13: tassa saddhāya aññathābhāvo natthīti tathā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:605_14: Teneva ca kāraṇena bhagavatā “pacchāpi tvaṃ karissasīti saññāpehī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:605_15: Upāsakopi satthari there ca gāravena subbacatāya tassā ca puññena vaḍḍhiṃ icchanto “karotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā satta bhattāni,
atk-s0503a:606_0: Tañca dārakanti vijātadivasato paṭṭhāya ekādasamaṃ divasaṃ atikkamitvā tato paraṃ sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:606_1: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhojetvā sattame divase taṃ sattavassikaṃ dārakaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca vandāpesi.
atk-s0503a:606_2: Satta me vassānīti satta me saṃvaccharāni,
atk-s0503a:606_4: Lohitakumbhiyaṃ vutthānīti mātukucchiyaṃ attano gabbhavāsadukkhaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0503a:606_5: Aññānipi evarūpāni satta puttānīti “aññepi evarūpe satta putte”ti vattabbe liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttaṃ “evarūpānī”ti.
atk-s0503a:606_6: Evaṃ satta vassāni gabbhadhāraṇavasena sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhatāya ca mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpetvā uppajjanakaputteti attho.
atk-s0503a:606_7: Etena mātugāmānaṃ puttalolatāya puttalābhena titti natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:607_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ sattadivasādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni gabbhadhāraṇādivasena pavattaṃ mahantaṃ
atk-s0503a:607_1: dukkhaṃ ekapade visaritvā puttalolatāvasena tāya vuttamatthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:607_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ cittasukhappamatto viya pamattapuggale iṭṭhākārena vañcetvā taṇhāsinehassa mahānatthakarabhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:608_5: yasmā asātaṃ appiyaṃ dukkhameva samānaṃ sakalampi vaṭṭagataṃ saṅkhārajātaṃ appahīnavipallāsattā ayonisomanasikārena
atk-s0503a:608_6: iṭṭhaṃ viya piyaṃ viya sukhaṃ viya ca hutvā upaṭṭhahamānaṃ sativippavāsena pamattapuggalaṃ ativattati
atk-s0503a:608_8: tasmā imampi suppavāsaṃ punapi sattakkhattuṃ evarūpaṃ asātaṃ appiyaṃ dukkhaṃ sātādipatirūpakena dukkhena
atk-s0503a:611_1: Navame pubbārāmeti sāvatthiyā pācīnadisābhāge anurādhapurassa uttamadevīvihārasadise ṭhāne kārite ārāme.
atk-s0503a:612_1: atīte satasahassakappamatthake padumuttaradasabalaṃ ekā upāsikā aññataraṃ upāsikaṃ attano aggupaṭṭhāyikaṭṭhāne
atk-s0503a:612_2: ṭhapentaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusatasahassassa dānaṃ datvā bhagavato
atk-s0503a:612_3: nipaccakāraṃ katvā “anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0503a:612_4: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa
atk-s0503a:612_5: dhanañjayaseṭṭhino gehe sumanadeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:612_8: tadā pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ katvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-s0503a:613_0: Aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā,
atk-s0503a:613_1: tattha naṃ sasuro migāraseṭṭhi upakāravasena mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:613_3: Sā attano mahallatāpasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navakoṭīhi bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vasanatthāya karīsamatte
atk-s0503a:613_4: bhūmibhāge uparibhūmiyaṃ pañcagabbhasatāni heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ pañcagabbhasatānīti gabbhasahassehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0503a:614_3: Visākhāya ñātikulato maṇimuttādiracitaṃ tādisaṃ bhaṇḍajātaṃ tassā paṇṇākāratthāya pesitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:614_4: taṃ nagaradvārappattaṃ suṅkikā tattha suṅkaṃ gaṇhantā tadanurūpaṃ aggahetvā atirekaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:614_5: Taṃ sutvā visākhā rañño tamatthaṃ nivedetukāmā patirūpaparivārena rājanivesanaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:614_6: tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā mallikāya deviyā saddhiṃ antepuraṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0503a:614_8: idāni labhissāmī”ti bhojanavelaṃ atikkamitvā chinnabhattā hutvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:614_9: Evaṃ dvīhatīhaṃ gantvāpi okāsaṃ na labhiyeva.
atk-s0503a:614_10: Iti rājā aniveditopi tassa atthavinicchayassa okāsākaraṇena “yathādhippāyaṃ na tīretī”ti vutto.
atk-s0503a:614_13: Mahāupāsikāya hi rājāyattasuṅkameva rañño datvā itaraṃ vissajjāpetuṃ adhippāyo,
atk-s0503a:614_14: so raññā na diṭṭhattā eva na tīrito.
atk-s0503a:614_18: Kenacideva karaṇīyena dvīhatīhaṃ rājanivesanadvāraṃ gacchantī tassa atthassa aniṭṭhitattā niratthakameva upasaṅkamiṃ,
atk-s0503a:614_19: bhagavati upasaṅkamanameva pana dassanānuttariyādippaṭilābhakāraṇattā sātthakanti evāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:614_20: imāya velāya idhāgatāti imamatthaṃ dassentī mahāupāsikā “idha me,
atk-s0503a:615_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ parāyattatāya adhippāyāsamijjhanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:615_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ parādhīnāparādhīnavuttīsu ādīnavānisaṃsaparidīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:616_0: Tattha sabbaṃ paravasaṃ dukkhanti yaṃ kiñci atthajātaṃ payojanaṃ paravasaṃ parāyattaṃ attano icchāya
atk-s0503a:616_1: nipphādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dukkhaṃ dukkhāvahaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0503a:616_2: Sabbaṃ issariyaṃ sukhanti duvidhaṃ issariyaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca.
atk-s0503a:616_3: Tattha lokiyaṃ rājissariyādi ceva lokiyajjhānābhiññānibbattaṃ cittissariyañca,
atk-s0503a:616_6: yañca sakkādīnaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ devanikāye ādhipaccabhūtaṃ issariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:616_7: tadubhayaṃ yadipi kammānubhāvena yathicchitanipphattiyā sukhanimittatāya sukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:616_10: nirodhissariyameva pana lokadhammehi akampanīyato anivattisabhāvattā ca ekantasukhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0503a:616_11: Yaṃ panettha sabbattheva aparādhīnatāya labhati cittasukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:616_12: taṃ sandhāya satthā “sabbaṃ issariyaṃ sukha”nti āha.
atk-s0503a:617_0: Sādhāraṇe vihaññantīti idaṃ “sabbaṃ paravasaṃ dukkha”nti imassa padassa atthavivaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:617_2: sādhāraṇe payojane sādhetabbe sati tassa parādhīnatāya yathādhippāyaṃ anipphādanato ime sattā vihaññanti vighātaṃ āpajjanti kilamanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:617_3: Yogā hi duratikkamāti yasmā kāmayogabhavayogadiṭṭhiyogaavijjāyogā anādikālabhāvitā anupacitakusalasambhārehi pajahituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya duratikkamā.
atk-s0503a:617_7: Iti ariyamaggānaṃ duradhigamanīyattā ime yogā duratikkamā.
atk-s0503a:617_9: asādhāraṇe pana cittissariye nirodhissariye ca sati na kadācipi vighātassa sambhavoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:618_0: Atha vā sabbaṃ paravasanti yaṃ attano aññappaṭibaddhavuttisaṅkhātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:618_3: Sabbaṃ issariyanti yaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭaṃ issariyaṭṭhānatāya issariyanti laddhanāmaṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:618_6: Sādhāraṇeti evaṃ dukkhasukhe vavatthite ime sattā bahusādhāraṇe dukkhakāraṇe nimuggā hutvā vihaññanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:618_7: Yogā hi duratikkamāti yasmā te sabbattha nimujjanassa hetubhūtā kāmayogādayo duratikkamā,
atk-s0503a:618_8: tasmā tvampi visākhe parāyattamatthaṃ patthetvā alabhamānā vihaññasīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:621_2: Ambavaneti tassa nagarassa avidūre mallarājūnaṃ ekaṃ ambavanaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0503a:621_5: Anupiyaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā tattha bhagavā viharati,
atk-s0503a:621_8: Kāḷīgodhāya puttoti kāḷīgodhā nāma sākiyānī sakyarājadevī ariyasāvikā āgataphalā viññātasāsanā,
atk-s0503a:621_11: So pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā na cirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi,
atk-s0503a:621_16: yadidaṃ bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya putto”ti uccakulikabhāve etadagge ṭhapito asītiyā sāvakānaṃ abbhantaro.
atk-s0503a:622_0: Suññāgāragatoti “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ araññaṃ rukkhamūlañca ṭhapetvā
atk-s0503a:622_1: aññaṃ pabbatakandarādi pabbajitasāruppaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ janasambādhābhāvato idha suññāgāranti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0503a:622_2: Atha vā jhānakaṇṭakānaṃ saddānaṃ abhāvato vivittaṃ yaṃ kiñci agārampi suññāgāranti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:622_5: Udānaṃ udānesīti so hi āyasmā araññe divāvihāraṃ upagatopi rattivāsūpagatopi yebhuyyena phalasamāpattisukhena nirodhasukhena ca vītināmeti,
atk-s0503a:622_6: tasmā taṃ sukhaṃ sandhāya pubbe attanā anubhūtaṃ sabhayaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ jigucchitvā “aho sukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:622_7: aho sukha”nti somanassasahitaṃ ñāṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ pītisamuṭṭhānaṃ samuggirati.
atk-s0503a:623_0: Sutvāna nesaṃ etadahosīti nesaṃ sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tassa āyasmato “aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:623_1: aho sukha”nti udānentassa udānaṃ sutvā “nissaṃsayaṃ esa anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti evaṃ parivitakkitaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0503a:623_2: Te bhikkhū puthujjanā tassa āyasmato vivekasukhaṃ sandhāya udānaṃ ajānantā evaṃ amaññiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:623_5: “Yaṃ so pubbe agāriyabhūto samāno”ti pāḷiṃ vatvā “anubhavī”ti vacanasesena keci atthaṃ vaṇṇenti,
atk-s0503a:623_12: assa āyasmato bhaddiyassa pabbajitato pubbe agāriyabhūtassa gahaṭṭhassa sato yaṃ rajjasukhaṃ anubhūtaṃ.
atk-s0503a:623_13: Sā tamanussaramānoti so taṃ sukhaṃ etarahi ukkaṇṭhanavasena anussaranto.
atk-s0503a:624_0: Te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocunti te sambahulā bhikkhū ullapanasabhāvasaṇṭhitā tassa anuggahaṇādhippāyena bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ,
atk-s0503a:624_8: aho sukha”nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti yathā te bhikkhū vadanti,
atk-s0503a:624_9: taṃ evaṃ tathevāti attano udānaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-s0503a:624_10: Kiṃ pana tvaṃ bhaddiyāti kasmā bhagavā pucchati,
atk-s0503a:624_13: teneva pana tamatthaṃ vadāpetvā te bhikkhū saññāpetuṃ pucchati.
atk-s0503a:625_2: Rakkhā susaṃvihitāti ārakkhādikatapurisehi gutti suṭṭhu samantato vihitā.
atk-s0503a:625_3: Bahipi antepureti aḍḍakaraṇaṭṭhānādike antepurato bahibhūte rājagehe.
atk-s0503a:625_4: Evaṃ rakkhito gopito santoti evaṃ rājageharājadhānirajjadesesu anto ca bahi ca anekesu ṭhānesu anekasatehi
atk-s0503a:625_5: susaṃvihitarakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā mameva nibbhayatthaṃ phāsuvihāratthaṃ rakkhito gopito samāno.
atk-s0503a:625_8: Ubbiggoti sakarajjepi pakatito uppajjanakabhayubbegena ubbiggo calito.
atk-s0503a:625_9: Ussaṅkīti “raññā nāma sabbakālaṃ avissatthena bhavitabba”nti vacanena sabbattha avissāsavasena tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:625_10: tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīyānaṃ paccayaparisaṅkāya ca uddhamukhaṃ saṅkamāno.
atk-s0503a:625_11: Utrāsīti “santikāvacarehipi ajānantasseva me kadāci anattho bhaveyyā”ti uppannena sarīrakampaṃ uppādanasamatthena tāsena utrāsī.
atk-s0503a:626_4: Bhayādinimittassa pariggahassa taṃ nimittassa ca kilesassa abhāvenevassa abhītāditāti.
atk-s0503a:626_11: Migabhūtena cetasāti vissatthavihāritāya migassa viya jātena cittena.
atk-s0503a:626_12: Migo hi amanussapathe araññe vasamāno vissattho tiṭṭhati, nisīdati,
atk-s0503a:631_2: bhagavā yadidaṃ mama etarahi paramaṃ vivekasukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:632_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ bhaddiyattherassa puthujjanavisayātītaṃ vivekasukhasaṅkhātamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:632_1: Imaṃ udānanti idaṃ sahetukabhayasokavigamānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:633_0: Tattha yassantarato na santi kopāti yassa ariyapuggalassa antarato abbhantare attano citte cittakālussiyakaraṇato
atk-s0503a:633_1: cittappakopā rāgādayo āghātavatthuādikāraṇabhedato anekabhedā dosakopā eva kopā na santi maggena pahīnattā
atk-s0503a:633_3: Ayañhi antarasaddo kiñcāpi “mañca tvañca kimantara”ntiādīsu kāraṇe dissati,
atk-s0503a:633_5: “antarā ca jetavanaṃ antarā ca sāvatthi”ntiādīsu vivare,
atk-s0503a:634_13: khuddakamahantaupapattibhavānaṃ vasena iti anekappakārā bhavābhavatā vuccati.
atk-s0503a:634_14: Catūhipi ariyamaggehi yathāsambhavaṃ tena tena nayena taṃ itibhavābhavatañca vītivatto atikkanto hoti.
atk-s0503a:634_16: Taṃ vigatabhayanti taṃ evarūpaṃ yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgataṃ khīṇāsavaṃ cittakopābhāvato itibhavābhavasamatikkamato ca bhayahetuvigamena vigatabhayaṃ,
atk-s0503a:634_19: Devā nānubhavanti dassanāyāti adhigatamagge ṭhapetvā sabbepi upapattidevā vāyamantāpi cittacāradassanavasena
atk-s0503a:634_20: dassanāya daṭṭhuṃ nānubhavanti na abhisambhuṇanti na sakkonti,
atk-s0503a:634_22: Sekkhāpi hi puthujjanā viya arahato cittappavattiṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0503a:639_1: Nandavaggassa paṭhame aññataro bhikkhūti nāmagottena apākaṭo eko khīṇāsavabhikkhu.
atk-s0503a:639_2: So kira rājagahavāsī kulaputto moggallānattherena saṃvejito saṃsāradosaṃ disvā satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0503a:639_3: sīlāni sodhetvā catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā na cirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:639_8: So ekadivasaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ desentassa nātidūre ṭhāne dukkhaṃ adhivāsento pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:640_2: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0503a:640_5: Purāṇakammavipākajanti pubbe katassa kammassa vipākabhāvena jātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:640_6: purāṇakammavipāke vā sukhadukkhappakāre vipākavaṭṭasamudāye tadekadesabhāvena jātaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:640_7: Purāṇakammavipākajanti ca iminā tassa ābādhassa kammasamuṭṭhānataṃ dassento opakkamikautuvipariṇāmajādibhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0503a:641_0: Sato sampajānoti vedanāpariggāhakānaṃ satisampajaññānaṃ vasena satimā sampajānanto ca.
atk-s0503a:641_4: uppajjitvā ekantena bhijjanasabhāvattā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti vedanāya aniccatāsallakkhaṇavasena satokāritāya sato,
atk-s0503a:641_6: Atha vā sativepullapattiyā sabbattheva kāyavedanācittadhammesu suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitasatitāya sato,
atk-s0503a:641_10: puthujjano aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ kandati
atk-s0503a:641_11: sammohaṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttanayena andhaputhujjano viya na vihaññamāno maggeneva samugghātitattā cetodukkhaṃ
atk-s0503a:641_12: anuppādento kevalaṃ kammavipākajaṃ sarīradukkhaṃ adhivāsento samāpattiṃ samāpanno viya nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:641_13: Addasāti taṃ āyasmantaṃ adhivāsanakhantiyā tathā nisinnaṃ addakkhi.
atk-s0503a:642_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ tādisassapi rogassa vejjādīhi tikicchanatthaṃ anussukkāpajjanakāraṇaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0503a:642_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ yehi kehici dukkhadhammehi avighātapattivibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:643_1: Aggamaggassa hi uppannakālato paṭṭhāya arahato sabbāni kusalākusalakammāni pahīnāni nāma honti paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ asamatthabhāvato,
atk-s0503a:643_4: Dhunamānassa pure kataṃ rajanti arahattappattito pubbe kataṃ rāgarajādimissatāya rajanti laddhanāmaṃ
atk-s0503a:643_5: dukkhavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ vipākapaṭisaṃvedanena taṃ dhunantassa viddhaṃsentassa,
atk-s0503a:643_6: arahattappattiyā parato pana sāvajjakiriyāya sambhavoyeva natthi,
atk-s0503a:643_7: anavajjakiriyā ca bhavamūlassa samucchinnattā samucchinnamūlatāya pupphaṃ viya phaladānasamatthatāya abhāvato kiriyamattāva hoti.
atk-s0503a:644_0: Amamassāti rūpādīsu katthaci mamanti gahaṇābhāvato amamassa mamaṅkārarahitassa.
atk-s0503a:644_5: Ṭhitassāti catubbidhampi oghaṃ taritvā nibbānathale ṭhitassa,
atk-s0503a:644_7: Sekkhaputhujjanā hi kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ appahīnattā cutipaṭisandhivasena saṃsāre dhāvanti nāma,
atk-s0503a:644_9: Atha vā dasavidhe khīṇāsavasaṅkhāte ariyadhamme ṭhitassa.
atk-s0503a:644_10: Tādinoti “paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī viharatī”tiādinā nayena vuttāya pañcavidhāya ariyiddhiyā aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi
atk-s0503a:644_11: akampaniyāya chaḷaṅgupekkhāya ca samannāgatena iṭṭhādīsu ekasadisatāsaṅkhātena tādībhāvena tādino.
atk-s0503a:644_12: Attho natthi janaṃ lapetaveti “mama bhesajjādīni karothā”ti janaṃ lapituṃ kathetuṃ payojanaṃ natthi sarīre nirapekkhabhāvato.
atk-s0503a:644_13: Paṇḍupalāso viya hi bandhanā pavutto sayamevāyaṃ kāyo bhijjitvā patatūti khīṇāsavānaṃ ajjhāsayo.
atk-s0503a:647_0: Atha vā yaṃkiñci nimittaṃ dassetvā “kiṃ ayyassa icchitabba”nti janaṃ lapetave paccayehi nimantanavasena
atk-s0503a:647_1: lapāpetuṃ khīṇāsavassa attho natthi tādisassa micchājīvassa maggeneva samugghātitattāti attho.
atk-s0503a:647_2: Iti bhagavā “kissāyaṃ thero attano rogaṃ vejjehi atikicchāpetvā bhagavato avidūre nisīdatī”ti cintentānaṃ tassa atikicchāpane kāraṇaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0503a:650_2: So hi cakkavattilakkhaṇūpetattā mātāpitaro saparijanaṃ sakalañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ nandayanto jātoti “nando”ti nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0503a:650_9: Brahmacariyanti brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ cariyaṃ ekāsanaṃ ekaseyyaṃ methunaviratiṃ.
atk-s0503a:650_10: Sandhāretunti paṭhamacittato yāvacarimakacittaṃ sammā paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ dhāretuṃ pavattetuṃ.
atk-s0503a:650_11: Dutiyena cettha brahmacariyapadena maggabrahmacariyassāpi saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:650_12: Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāyāti upasampadakāle bhikkhubhāvena saddhiṃ samādinnaṃ nibbattetabbabhāvena anuṭṭhitaṃ tividhampi sikkhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā,
atk-s0503a:651_2: bhagavā pavattavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane viharanto “puttaṃ me ānetvā dassethā”ti suddhodanamahārājena
atk-s0503a:651_3: pesitesu sahassasahassaparivāresu dasasu dūtesu saha parivārena arahattaṃ pattesu sabbapacchā gantvā
atk-s0503a:651_4: arahattappattena kāḷudāyittherena gamanakālaṃ ñatvā maggavaṇṇanaṃ vaṇṇetvā jātibhūmigamanāya yācito vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivutto
atk-s0503a:651_5: kapilavatthunagaraṃ gantvā ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā vessantarajātakaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0503a:651_6: punadivase piṇḍāya paviṭṭho “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”ti gāthāya pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā nivesanaṃ
atk-s0503a:652_0: Bhattakiccāvasāne pana rāhulamātuguṇakathaṃ nissāya candakinnarījātakaṃ kathetvā tatiyadivase nandakumārassa
atk-s0503a:652_1: abhisekagehappavesanavivāhamaṅgalesu vattamānesu piṇḍāya pavisitvā nandakumārassa hatthe pattaṃ datvā
atk-s0503a:652_2: maṅgalaṃ vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamanto kumārassa hatthato pattaṃ na gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:652_12: Kumāro nivattitukāmo anicchāya gacchanto gāravena “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:653_4: Sā udakabindūhi paggharantehi aḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi vegena pāsādaṃ āruyha sīhapañjaradvāre ṭhatvā “tuvaṭaṃ kho,
atk-s0503a:653_7: Taṃ tassā vacanaṃ tassa hadaye tiriyaṃ patitvā viya ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:653_8: Satthāpissa hatthato pattaṃ aggahetvāva taṃ vihāraṃ netvā “pabbajissasi nandā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:653_11: Satthā tena hi nandaṃ pabbājethāti kapilavatthupuraṃ gantvā tatiyadivase taṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0503a:653_12: Sattame divase mātarā alaṅkaritvā pesitaṃ “dāyajjaṃ me, samaṇa,
atk-s0503a:653_13: dehī”ti vatvā attanā saddhiṃ ārāmāgataṃ rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0503a:653_14: Punekadivasaṃ mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathetvā rājānaṃ anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0503a:654_1: pitaraṃ tīsu phalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto punadeva rājagahaṃ gantvā tato anāthapiṇḍikena
atk-s0503a:654_2: sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya gahitapaṭiñño niṭṭhite jetavanamahāvihāre tattha gantvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0503a:654_3: Evaṃ satthari jetavane viharante āyasmā nando attano anicchāya pabbajito kāmesu anādīnavadassāvī janapadakalyāṇiyā
atk-s0503a:654_4: vuttavacanamanussaranto ukkaṇṭhito hutvā bhikkhūnaṃ attano anabhiratiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:654_5: Tena vuttaṃ “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nando…pe…
atk-s0503a:655_0: Kasmā pana naṃ bhagavā evaṃ pabbājesīti?
atk-s0503a:655_1: “Puretarameva ādīnavaṃ dassetvā kāmehi naṃ vivecetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0503a:655_2: pabbājetvā pana upāyena tato vivecetvā uparivisesaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti veneyyadamanakusalo satthā evaṃ naṃ paṭhamaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0503a:656_1: Janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī rūpena uttamā chasarīradosarahitā,
atk-s0503a:656_3: Sā hi yasmā nātidīghā nātirassā nātikisā nātithūlā nātikāḷikā naccodātā atikkantā mānusakavaṇṇaṃ appattā dibbavaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:656_5: Chavikalyāṇaṃ maṃsakalyāṇaṃ nakhakalyāṇaṃ aṭṭhikalyāṇaṃ vayakalyāṇanti imehi pañcahi kalyāṇehi samannāgatā.
atk-s0503a:657_0: Tattha attano sarīrobhāsena dasadvādasahatthe ṭhāne ālokaṃ karoti,
atk-s0503a:657_3: Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca lākhārasaparikammakataṃ viya rattapavāḷarattakambalena sadisaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:657_5: Vīsati nakhapattāni maṃsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasaparikitāni viya muttaṭṭhāne khīradhārāsadisāni honti,
atk-s0503a:657_7: Dvattiṃsadantā suphusitā parisuddhapavāḷapantisadisā vajirapantī viya khāyanti,
atk-s0503a:657_9: Vīsativassasatikāpi samānā soḷasavassuddesikā viya hoti nippalitā,
atk-s0503a:658_8: Apaloketvāti sineharasavipphārasaṃsūcakena aḍḍhakkhinā ābandhantī viya oloketvā. Maṃ,
atk-s0503a:658_9: bhanteti pubbepi “ma”nti vatvā ukkaṇṭhākulacittatāya puna “maṃ etadavocā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:658_12: taṃ vā tassā ākārasahitaṃ vacanaṃ anussaranto.
atk-s0503a:659_0: Bhagavā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “upāyenassa rāgaṃ vūpasamessāmī”ti iddhibalena naṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ nento
atk-s0503a:659_1: antarāmagge ekasmiṃ jhāmakhette jhāmakhāṇumatthake nisinnaṃ chinnakaṇṇanāsānaṅguṭṭhaṃ ekaṃ paluṭṭhamakkaṭiṃ
atk-s0503a:659_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana ekakkhaṇeneva satthārā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gataṃ viya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:659_4: taṃ gamanaṃ avatvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:659_5: Gacchantoyeva hi bhagavā āyasmato nandassa antarāmagge taṃ paluṭṭhamakkaṭiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:659_8: Evaṃ satthā taṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā sakkassa devarañño upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatāni kakuṭapādāni pañca accharāsatāni
atk-s0503a:659_9: attānaṃ vanditvā ṭhitāni dassetvā janapadakalyāṇiyā tāsaṃ pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ rūpasampattiṃ paṭicca
atk-s0503a:659_12: “atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā…pe…
atk-s0503a:660_0: Tattha bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti bāhumhi gahetvā viya.
atk-s0503a:660_1: Bhagavā hi tadā tādisaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāresi,
atk-s0503a:660_2: yathā āyasmā nando bhuje gahetvā bhagavatā nīyamāno viya ahosi.
atk-s0503a:660_3: Tattha ca bhagavatā sace tassa āyasmato tāvatiṃsadevalokassa dassanaṃ pavesanameva vā icchitaṃ siyā,
atk-s0503a:660_4: yathānisinnasseva tassa taṃ devalokaṃ dasseyya lokavivaraṇiddhikāle viya,
atk-s0503a:660_6: Yasmā panassa dibbattabhāvato manussattabhāvassa yo nihīnajigucchanīyabhāvo,
atk-s0503a:660_7: tassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ antarāmagge taṃ makkaṭiṃ dassetukāmo,
atk-s0503a:660_10: Evañhissa tadatthaṃ brahmacariyavāse visesato abhirati bhavissatīti.
atk-s0503a:661_1: Tā kira sabbāpi kassapassa bhagavato sāvakānaṃ pādamakkhanateladānena tādisā sukumārapādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:662_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā avassutacittaṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ accharāyo olokāpesi?
atk-s0503a:662_2: Yathā hi kusalo vejjo ussannadosaṃ puggalaṃ tikicchanto sinehapānādinā paṭhamaṃ dose ukkiledetvā pacchā vamanavirecanehi sammadeva nīharāpeti,
atk-s0503a:662_3: evaṃ vineyyadamanakusalo bhagavā ussannarāgaṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ devaccharāyo dassetvā ukkiledesi ariyamaggabhesajjena
atk-s0503a:663_2: tumhehi mayhaṃ dassitā chinnakaṇṇanāsā paluṭṭhamakkaṭī janapadakalyāṇiṃ upādāya,
atk-s0503a:663_3: evameva janapadakalyāṇī imāni pañca accharāsatāni upādāyāti attho.
atk-s0503a:663_7: tena pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ rūpasampattiṃ upanidhāyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:663_12: ekaṃ soḷasakoṭṭhāse katvā tato ekakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā soḷasadhā gaṇite tattha yo ekeko koṭṭhāso,
atk-s0503a:663_15: Upanidhinti “imāya ayaṃ sadisī”ti upamābhāvena gahetvā samīpe ṭhapanampi.
atk-s0503a:664_1: taṃ brahmacariyaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ pākaṭañcāti taṃ anāmasitvā tattha abhiratiyaṃ ādarajananatthaṃ abhirama, nanda, abhirama,
atk-s0503a:664_3: Ahaṃ te pāṭibhogoti kasmā bhagavā tassa brahmacariyavāsaṃ icchanto abrahmacariyavāsassa pāṭibhogaṃ upagañchi?
atk-s0503a:664_5: taṃ āgantukārammaṇe saṅkāmetvā sukhena sakkā jahāpetunti pāṭibhogaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0503a:665_1: Bhagavā hi tadā āyasmante nande vattaṃ dassetvā attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gate upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:665_2: taṃ pavattiṃ kathetvā yathā nāma kusalo puriso anikkhantaṃ āṇiṃ aññāya āṇiyā nīharitvā puna taṃ hatthādīhi
atk-s0503a:665_4: evameva āciṇṇavisaye tassa rāgaṃ āgantukavisayena nīharitvā puna tadapi brahmacariyamaggahetuṃ katvā apanetukāmo “etha tumhe,
atk-s0503a:665_6: nandaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhatakavādena ca upakkitakavādena ca samudācarathā”ti āṇāpesi,
atk-s0503a:665_9: yathā te bhikkhū tamatthaṃ jāniṃsū”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:666_3: ayampi āyasmā accharāsambhoganimittaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caranto bhatako viya hotīti vuttaṃ “bhatakavādenā”ti.
atk-s0503a:666_6: ayampi āyasmā accharānaṃ hetu attano brahmacariyaṃ kiṇāti,
atk-s0503a:666_8: Atha vā bhagavato āṇāya accharāsambhogasaṅkhātāya bhatiyā brahmacariyavāsasaṅkhātaṃ jīvitaṃ pavattento
atk-s0503a:666_9: tāya bhatiyā yāpane bhagavatā bhariyamāno viya hotīti “bhatako”ti vutto,
atk-s0503a:666_10: tathā accharāsambhogasaṅkhātaṃ vikkayaṃ ādātabbaṃ katvā bhagavato āṇattiyaṃ tiṭṭhanto tena vikkayena
atk-s0503a:667_4: Vūpakaṭṭhoti vatthukāmehi kilesakāmehi ca kāyena ceva cittena ca vūpakaṭṭho.
atk-s0503a:667_8: Pahitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pesitatto vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo,
atk-s0503a:667_12: Kulaputtāti duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā ca ācārakulaputtā ca,
atk-s0503a:667_18: taṃ ettha natthīti pabbajjā anagāriyāti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:667_22: Tassa hi atthāya kulaputtā idha pabbajanti.
atk-s0503a:667_24: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0503a:667_26: Upasampajja vihāsīti pāpuṇitvā sampādetvā vā vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:668_0: Tattha khīṇā jātīti na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā,
atk-s0503a:668_3: Maggassa pana abhāvitattā yā ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti uppajjeyya,
atk-s0503a:668_4: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā.
atk-s0503a:668_5: Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāvena vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanena abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0503a:668_9: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma,
atk-s0503a:668_11: tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0503a:668_12: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:668_13: Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ karonti nāma,
atk-s0503a:668_15: tasmā so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0503a:668_16: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti “idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanāya kiccaṃ me natthī”ti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0503a:668_17: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti vā “itthabhāvato imasmā evaṃpakārā vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi,
atk-s0503a:668_18: ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā viya rukkhā,
atk-s0503a:668_19: te carimakacittanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissanti,
atk-s0503a:668_22: Arahatanti bhagavato sāvakānaṃ arahantānaṃ abbhantaro eko mahāsāvako ahosīti attho.
atk-s0503a:669_1: Sā hi sayaṃ asekkhattā asekkhavisayaṃ abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0503a:669_8: Obhāsetvāti attano pabhāya cando viya sūriyo viya ca jetavanaṃ ekobhāsaṃ katvā.
atk-s0503a:669_9: Tenupasaṅkamīti āyasmato nandassa arahattappattiṃ viditvā pītisomanassajātā “taṃ bhagavato paṭivedessāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:670_2: Atha vā āgotrabhuṃ ābhavaggaṃ vā savantīti āsavā,
atk-s0503a:670_3: ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ anto karitvā pavattantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:670_6: koṭi na paññāyati avijjāyā”tiādivacanehi nesaṃ cirapārivāsiyatā veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:670_7: Atha vā āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi, āsavā.
atk-s0503a:670_13: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
atk-s0503a:673_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinalīkatā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:674_0: Ettha tebhūmikaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā āsavāti āgatā.
atk-s0503a:674_2: samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti parūpaghātavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā.
atk-s0503a:675_1: “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti dvidhā āgatā.
atk-s0503a:675_6: Abhidhamme teyeva diṭṭhāsavena saddhiṃ catudhā āgatā.
atk-s0503a:675_12: āsavā saṃvarāya pahātabbā”tiādinā nayena chadhā āgatā.
atk-s0503a:675_13: Sabbāsavapariyāye teyeva dassanapahātabbehi saddhiṃ sattadhā āgatā.
atk-s0503a:675_14: Idha pana abhidhammanayena cattāro āsavā veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:676_0: Khayāti ettha pana “yo āsavānaṃ khayo bhedo paribhedo”tiādīsu āsavānaṃ sarasabhedo āsavakkhayoti vutto.
atk-s0503a:676_3: passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī”tiādīsu āsavānaṃ āyatiṃ anuppādo āsavakkhayoti vutto.
atk-s0503a:678_0: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:679_0: Ādīsu maggo āsavakkhayoti vutto. “Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”tiādīsu phalaṃ.
atk-s0503a:681_0: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:682_0: Ādīsu nibbānaṃ. Idha pana āsavānaṃ accantakhayo anuppādo vā maggo vā “āsavānaṃ khayo”ti vutto.
atk-s0503a:683_3: Ubhayavacanaṃ magge viya phalepi samathavipassanānaṃ yuganandhabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0503a:683_5: Devatāya vacanasamanantarameva “kathaṃ nu kho”ti āvajjentassa bhagavato ñāṇaṃ uppajji “nandena arahattaṃ sacchikata”nti.
atk-s0503a:683_6: So hi āyasmā sahāyabhikkhūhi tathā uppaṇḍiyamāno “bhāriyaṃ vata mayā kataṃ,
atk-s0503a:683_7: yohaṃ evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā accharānaṃ paṭilābhāya satthāraṃ pāṭibhogaṃ akāsi”nti uppannasaṃvego
atk-s0503a:683_8: hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto arahattaṃ patvā cintesi –
atk-s0503a:683_10: So bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano adhippāyaṃ satthu ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:684_0: Athassa bhagavā “yasmā tayā aññā ārādhitāti ñātametaṃ mayā,
atk-s0503a:684_2: tasmā nāhaṃ paṭissavā idāni mocetabbo arahattappattiyāva mocitattā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:684_8: yasmiṃyeva kāle āsavehi tava cittaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:685_0: Sopi āyasmā vipassanākāleyeva “yadevāhaṃ indriyāsaṃvaraṃ nissāya imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto,
atk-s0503a:685_1: tameva suṭṭhu niggahessāmī”ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo tattha ca katādhikārattā indriyasaṃvare ukkaṭṭhapaṭipadampi agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:686_3: sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato na
atk-s0503a:687_2: nandassa pacchimā…pe… uttarā… dakkhiṇā… uddhaṃ… adho…
atk-s0503a:687_4: sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me…pe…
atk-s0503a:688_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:689_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato nandassa sabbāsave khepetvā sukhādīsu tādibhāvappattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:689_1: Imaṃ udānanti tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:690_0: Tattha yassa nittiṇṇo paṅkoti yena ariyapuggalena ariyamaggasetunā sabbo diṭṭhipaṅko saṃsārapaṅko eva vā nibbānapāragamanena tiṇṇo.
atk-s0503a:690_2: “Kāmakaṇḍako”ti laddhanāmo sabbo kilesakāmo sabbo kāmavisūko aggañāṇadaṇḍena maddito bhaggo anavasesato mathito.
atk-s0503a:690_3: Mohakkhayaṃ anuppattoti evaṃbhūto ca dukkhādivisayassa sabbassa sammohassa khepanena mohakkhayaṃ patto,
atk-s0503a:690_5: Sukhadukkhesu na vedhatī sa bhikkhūti so bhinnakileso bhikkhu iṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogato uppannesu sukhesu
atk-s0503a:690_6: aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogato uppannesu dukkhesu ca na vedhati na kampati,
atk-s0503a:693_1: Tatiye yasojappamukhānīti ettha yasojoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0503a:693_2: taṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pabbajitattā vicaraṇato ca tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni “yasojappamukhānī”ti vuttāni.
atk-s0503a:694_1: atīte kira kassapadasabalassa sāsane aññataro bhikkhu āraññako araññe piṭṭhipāsāṇe katapaṇṇakuṭiyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0503a:694_2: Tasmiñca samaye pañcasatā corā gāmaghātakādīni katvā corikāya jīvantā corakammaṃ katvā janapadamanussehi
atk-s0503a:694_3: anubaddhā palāyamānā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha kiñci gahaṇaṃ vā paṭisaraṇaṃ vā apassantā avidūre taṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0503a:694_4: pāsāṇe nisinnaṃ disvā vanditvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “amhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:694_10: attano jīvitaṃ vināsayantesupi mā manaṃ padosayitthā”ti kakacūpamavidhiṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0503a:694_12: Atha te jānapadā taṃ sampattā ito cito ca gavesantā te core disvā sabbeva jīvitā voropesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:694_13: Te tesu manopadosamattampi akatvā akkhaṇḍasīlā kālaṃ katvā kāmāvacaradevesu nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:695_0: Te aparāparaṃ saṃsarantā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke khepetvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle devalokato cavitvā
atk-s0503a:695_1: jeṭṭhadevaputto sāvatthinagaradvāre kevaṭṭagāme pañcasatakulagāmajeṭṭhakassa kevaṭṭassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0503a:695_4: Te pubbasannivāsena sabbepi sahāyakā hutvā sahapaṃsukīḷitaṃ kīḷantā anupubbena vayappattā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:695_6: Te sabbeva ekato hutvā jālāni gahetvā naditaḷākādīsu macche bandhantā vicaranti.
atk-s0503a:696_0: Athekadivasaṃ aciravatiyā nadiyā jāle khitte suvaṇṇavaṇṇo maccho antojāle pāvisi.
atk-s0503a:696_1: Taṃ disvā sabbepi kevaṭṭā “amhākaṃ puttā macche bandhantā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ macchaṃ bandhiṃsū”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:696_2: Atha te pañcasatāpi sahāyakā macchaṃ nāvāya pakkhipitvā nāvaṃ ukkhipitvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:696_3: Rājā taṃ disvā “bhagavā etassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇakāraṇaṃ jānissatī”ti macchaṃ gāhāpetvā bhagavato dassesi.
atk-s0503a:696_4: Satthā “ayaṃ kassapasammāsambuddhassa sāsane osakkamāne pabbajitvā micchā paṭipajjanto sāsanaṃ osakkāpetvā
atk-s0503a:696_5: niraye nibbatto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā tato cuto aciravatiyaṃ maccho hutvā nibbatto”ti vatvā
atk-s0503a:696_7: tassa bhātikattherassa parinibbutabhāvañca teneva kathāpetvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā kapilasuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0503a:697_0: Satthu desanaṃ sutvā te pañcasatā kevaṭṭaputtā saṃvegajātā hutvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā,
atk-s0503a:697_1: upasampannā hutvā vivekavāsaṃ vasantā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:697_3: “tena kho pana samayena yasojappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatānī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:698_6: Senāsanāni paññāpayamānāti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ attano ca pāpuṇakāni senāsanāni pucchitvā tehi nevāsikehi tesaṃ “idaṃ tumhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:698_8: idaṃ tumhākaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti senāsanāni saṃvidhāpetvā attanā ca tattha gantvā,
atk-s0503a:698_10: mañcapīṭhakaṭasārakādīni nīharitvā papphoṭetvā yathāṭhānaṃ ṭhapanādivasena paññāpentā ca.
atk-s0503a:699_5: idaṃ me kattarayaṭṭhi”nti evaṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ saṃgopayamānā.
atk-s0503a:699_6: Uccāsaddā mahāsaddāti uddhaṃ gataṭṭhena ucco saddo yesante uccāsaddā akārassa ākāraṃ katvā.
atk-s0503a:699_7: Samantato patthaṭaṭṭhena mahanto saddo yesante mahāsaddā.
atk-s0503a:699_8: Kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilopeti kevaṭṭā viya macchavilumpane.
atk-s0503a:699_9: Yathā nāma kevaṭṭā udake vaṭṭanato macchaggahaṇatthaṃ pavattanato “kevaṭṭā”ti laddhanāmā macchabandhā
atk-s0503a:699_10: macchaggahaṇatthaṃ jale jālaṃ pakkhipitvā “paviṭṭho na paviṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:699_12: Yathā ca te macchapacchiādīni ṭhapitaṭṭhāne mahājane gantvā “mayhaṃ ekaṃ macchaṃ detha,
atk-s0503a:699_15: mayhaṃ khuddako”tiādīni vatvā vilumpamāne tesaṃ paṭisedhanādivasena uccāsaddamahāsaddā ca honti,
atk-s0503a:699_23: Na vo mama santike vatthabbanti tumhehi mayhaṃ santike na vasitabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:699_24: Ye tumhe mādisassa buddhassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā evaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karotha,
atk-s0503a:699_25: attano dhammatāya vasantā kiṃ nāma sāruppaṃ karissatha,
atk-s0503a:699_26: tumhādisānaṃ mama santike vasanakiccaṃ natthīti dīpeti.
atk-s0503a:699_27: Evaṃ paṇāmitesu ca bhagavatā tesu ekabhikkhupi “bhagavā tumhe mahāsaddamattakena amhe paṇāmethā”ti vā
atk-s0503a:699_28: aññaṃ vā kiñci paṭivacanaṃ avatvā buddhagāravena sabbe bhagavato vacanaṃ sampaṭicchantā “evaṃ,
atk-s0503a:699_30: Evaṃ pana tesaṃ ahosi “mayaṃ satthāraṃ passissāma,
atk-s0503a:699_33: evarūpassa pana garuno satthu santikaṃ āgantvā mahāsaddaṃ karimhā,
atk-s0503a:700_3: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena “vajjī”tveva vuccati.
atk-s0503a:700_5: Vaggumudāti evaṃnāma lokassa puññasammatā ekā nadī.
atk-s0503a:700_7: Atthakāmenāti kiñci payojanaṃ anapekkhitvā atthameva icchantena.
atk-s0503a:700_9: “kinti me sāvakā vaṭṭadukkhā parimucceyyu”nti tassa atthasaṅkhātassa atthassa vā hetubhūtassa hitassa esanasīlena.
atk-s0503a:700_10: Tato eva attano sarīrakhedaṃ agaṇetvā dūrepi veneyyasantikaṃ gantvā anukampanato anukampakena.
atk-s0503a:700_13: Yasmā dhammagaruno buddhā bhagavanto sammāpaṭipattiyāva pūjetabbā,
atk-s0503a:700_16: tathā vihāraṃ kappema sabbattha satisampajaññayogena apaṇṇakappaṭipadaṃ pūrentā yathāgahitakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:700_18: Yathā no viharatanti yathā amhesu viharantesu,
atk-s0503a:701_1: Sabbeva tisso vijjā sacchākaṃsūti sabbeyeva te pañcasatā bhikkhū pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:701_4: Lokiyābhiññāsu imāyeva dve abhiññā āsavakkhayañāṇassa bahūpakārā,
atk-s0503a:701_5: na tathā dibbasotacetopariyaiddhividhañāṇānīti dassanatthaṃ vijjattayamevettha tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhigamadassanavasena uddhaṭaṃ.
atk-s0503a:701_6: Tathā hi verañjasutte bhagavā verañjabrāhmaṇassa attano adhigamaṃ dassento vijjattayameva desesi,
atk-s0503a:701_8: Evaṃ tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ vijjamānānipi dibbasotañāṇādīni na uddhaṭāni.
atk-s0503a:701_10: Evañca katvā “vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre antarahitā mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ bhagavato sammukhe pāturahesu”nti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhivaḷañjanaṃ vakkhati.
atk-s0503a:702_1: Buddhānañhi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ chāyūdakavipattiṃ vā aphāsukasenāsanaṃ vā manussānaṃ assaddhādibhāvaṃ vā āgamma anabhirati nāma natthi,
atk-s0503a:702_3: Yattha pana bhagavati viharante manussā saraṇesu vā patiṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0503a:702_6: satthā tāsu sampattīsu tesaṃ patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ vasati,
atk-s0503a:702_10: “atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:703_1: Cārikā ca nāmesā bhagavato duvidhā turitacārikā aturitacārikāti.
atk-s0503a:703_2: Tattha dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthaṃ sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma,
atk-s0503a:703_4: Yā pana gāmanigamarājadhānīpaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ yojanaddhayojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto gacchati,
atk-s0503a:704_2: Vesāliyanti tikkhattuṃ visālībhūtattā “vesālī”ti laddhanāme licchavirājūnaṃ nagare.
atk-s0503a:704_3: Mahāvaneti mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:704_4: Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:704_7: Kūṭāgārasālāyanti tasmiṃ mahāvane bhagavantaṃ uddissa kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ anto katvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena
atk-s0503a:704_8: katā sabbākārasampannā buddhassa bhagavato gandhakuṭi kūṭāgārasālā nāma,
atk-s0503a:704_11: Cetasā ceto paricca manasi karitvāti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ paricchijja manasi karitvā,
atk-s0503a:704_12: cetopariyañāṇena vā sabbaññutaññāṇena vā tehi adhigatavisesaṃ jānitvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:705_3: Yasmā te yasojappamukhā pañcasatā bhikkhū sabbaso avijjandhakāravidhamanena ālokabhūtā obhāsabhūtā hutvā viharanti,
atk-s0503a:705_4: tasmā bhagavā tehi ṭhitadisāya “ālokajātā viya me, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:705_5: esā disā”tiādinā vaṇṇabhaṇanāpadesena te bhikkhū pasaṃsati.
atk-s0503a:706_0: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0503a:708_1: Satthā āyasmantānaṃ dassanakāmoti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike paheṇākāradassanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:708_2: Iti bhagavā yadatthaṃ te bhikkhū paṇāmesi,
atk-s0503a:708_3: tamatthaṃ matthakappattaṃ disvā āraddhacitto tesaṃ dassanakāmataṃ therassa ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:708_4: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ahaṃ ime uccāsaddamahāsaddakaraṇe paṇāmessāmi,
atk-s0503a:708_5: atha te bhadro assājānīyo viya kasābhighātena,
atk-s0503a:708_6: tena coditā saṃvegappattā mamārādhanatthaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭentā vāyamantā khippameva arahattaṃ sacchikarissantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:708_7: Idāni te aggaphalappatte disvā tāya arahattappattiyā ārādhitacitto tesaṃ dassanakāmo hutvā evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0503a:709_0: So bhikkhūti ānandattherena tathā āṇatto chaḷabhiñño eko bhikkhu.
atk-s0503a:709_5: Kasmā pana bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanaṃ jānanto paṭisanthāraṃ akatvā samāpattiṃyeva samāpajji?
atk-s0503a:709_7: tesaṃ pubbe paṇāmitānaṃ idāni attanā samānasambhogadassanatthaṃ,
atk-s0503a:709_10: Apare panāhu “pubbe paṇāmitānaṃ idāni attano santikaṃ āgatānaṃ anuttarasukhuppādanena anaññasādhāraṇapaṭisanthārakaraṇattha”nti.
atk-s0503a:709_11: Tepi āyasmanto bhagavato ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā taṃyeva samāpattiṃ samāpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:709_13: “katamena nu kho bhagavā vihārena etarahi viharatī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:710_0: Ettha ca rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ kosajjādīnaṃ pāripantikadhammānaṃ suvidūrabhāvato iddhiyā mūlabhūtehi
atk-s0503a:710_1: anoṇamanādīhi soḷasahi vodānadhammehi samannāgamanato āneñjappattaṃ sayaṃ aniñjanaṭṭhena āneñjanti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:711_1: Anuṇṇataṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_2: Anabhirataṃ cittaṃ rāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_3: Anapanataṃ cittaṃ byāpāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_4: Anissitaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭhiyā na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_5: Appaṭibaddhaṃ cittaṃ chandarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_6: Vippamuttaṃ cittaṃ kāmarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_7: Visaṃyuttaṃ cittaṃ kilese na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_8: Vimariyādikataṃ cittaṃ kilesamariyādāya na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_9: Ekattagataṃ cittaṃ nānattakilese na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_10: Saddhāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ assaddhiye na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_11: Vīriyena pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ kosajje na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_12: Satiyā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ pamāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_13: Samādhinā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_14: Paññāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ avijjāya na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_15: Obhāsagataṃ cittaṃ avijjandhakāre na iñjatīti āneñja”nti.
atk-s0503a:712_1: ārammaṇavibhāgena catubbidhaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānanti etesaṃ pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ āneñjavohāro.

atk-s0503a:713_3: Tuṇhī ahosīti bhagavā ariyena tuṇhībhāvena tuṇhī ahosi.

atk-s0503a:714_0: Tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvāti yathāparicchedaṃ tato āneñjasamādhito arahattaphalasamāpattito uṭṭhāya.
atk-s0503a:714_2: jāneyyāsīti bhagavā “ime ca bhikkhū ettakaṃ kālaṃ iminā nāma samāpattisukhena vītināmentī”ti, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:714_4: Ettakampi te nappaṭibhāseyyāti lokiyapaṭisammodanaṃ sandhāya yadidaṃ te “abhikkantā, bhante,

atk-s0503a:714_10: Ahaṃ pana imehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ lokuttarapaṭisammodaneneva tiyāmarattiṃ vītināmesinti dassento bhagavā āha – “ahañca, ānanda,

atk-s0503a:715_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ attanā samaṃ āneñjasamādhisamāpajjanasamatthatāsaṅkhātaṃ vasībhāvatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:715_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anavasesarāgādippahānasaṃsiddhitādisabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:716_0: Tattha yassa jito kāmakaṇḍakoti kusalapakkhavijjhanaṭṭhena kaṇḍakabhūto kilesakāmo yena ariyapuggalena anavasesaṃ jito pahīno,
atk-s0503a:716_4: gāme kaṇṭako kaṇṭakaṭṭhāniyo sakalo vatthukāmo yassa jitoti.
atk-s0503a:716_8: Vadho ca bandhanañcāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
atk-s0503a:716_11: Tena taṃnimittakassa byāpādassa anavasesappahānena tatiyamaggo vutto hoti.
atk-s0503a:716_12: Atha vā akkosādijayavacanena tatiyamaggo vutto hoti,
atk-s0503a:716_15: Pabbato viya so ṭhito anejoti ejā vuccati calanakilesaparipantho,
atk-s0503a:716_17: anejattāyeva sabbakilesehi paravādavātehi ca akampanīyattā ṭhito ekagghanapabbatasadiso.
atk-s0503a:716_18: Sukhadukkhesu na vedhati sa bhikkhūti so bhinnakileso bhikkhu sukhadukkhanimittaṃ na kampatīti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:716_19: Iti bhagavā tesaṃ pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ arahattādhigamena tādibhāvappattiṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā ekapuggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti.

atk-s0503a:720_0: “Ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti supaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā,
atk-s0503a:721_7: Niyyānanti ca satiyā ogāhitabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:721_8: Ettha ca purimo pacchimo ca attho sabbasaṅgāhakavasena,
atk-s0503a:721_10: Satīti vā satisīsena jhānaṃ vuttaṃ “ye kāyagatāsatiṃ paribhuñjantī”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0503a:721_14: Āneñjasamādhiyogena therassa savisesaṃ niccalabhāvaṃ kenaci akampanīyatañca pabbatopamāya pakāsento bhagavā

atk-s0503a:721_18: Pubbeyeva hi sūkarakhataleṇe attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa bhagavati dhammaṃ desente
atk-s0503a:722_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ therassa āneñjasamādhiyogena tādibhāvappattiyā ca kenaci akampanīyatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0503a:722_1: sabbākārato viditvā tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:723_0: Tattha yathāpi pabbato seloti yathā silāmayo ekagghanasilāpabbato,
atk-s0503a:723_2: Acalo suppatiṭṭhitoti suppatiṭṭhitamūlo pakativātehi acalo akampanīyo hoti.
atk-s0503a:723_4: pabbatova na vedhatīti mohassa anavasesappahānā mohamūlakattā ca sabbākusalānaṃ pahīnasabbākusalo bhikkhu,
atk-s0503a:723_6: evaṃ lokadhammehi na vedhati na kampati.
atk-s0503a:723_7: Mohakkhayoti vā yasmā nibbānaṃ arahattañca vuccati,
atk-s0503a:723_8: tasmā mohakkhayassa hetu nibbānassa arahattassa vā adhigatattā catūsu ariyasaccesu suppatiṭṭhito asamāpannakālepi
atk-s0503a:726_1: Pañcame kāyagatāya satiyāti kāyānupassanāvasena kāye gatāya kāyārammaṇāya satiyā,
atk-s0503a:726_5: Atha vā yasmā kammaṭṭhānabhūto kesādiko dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsasamudāyo idha kāyoti adhippeto,
atk-s0503a:726_6: tasmā ajjhattanti padassa gocarajjhattanti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:726_7: Sūpaṭṭhitāyāti niyakajjhattabhūte gocarajjhattabhūte vā kāye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitāya.
atk-s0503a:726_10: Yvāyaṃ bhagavatā “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā”tiādinā ajjhattakesādiko dvattiṃsākāro kāyo vutto,
atk-s0503a:726_11: tattha yā paṭikūlamanasikāraṃ pavattentassa upacārappanāvasena kāye upaṭṭhitā sati,
atk-s0503a:726_14: evaṃ ānāpānacatuiriyāpathasatisampajaññānaṃ vasena uddhumātakavinīlakādivasena ca manasikāraṃ pavattentassa
atk-s0503a:726_15: yathārahaṃ upacārappanāvasena kāye upaṭṭhitā sati “kāyagatā satī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:726_16: Idha pana ajjhattaṃ kāyagatā sati pathavīādikā catasso dhātuyo sasambhārasaṅkhepādīsu catūsu yena kenaci
atk-s0503a:726_17: ekenākārena vavatthapetvā tesaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena upaṭṭhitā vipassanāsampayuttā sati
atk-s0503a:726_19: Thero pana tathā vipassitvā attano phalasamāpattimeva samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:726_20: Idhāpi gāthāya evaṃ imassa atthassa viññātabbatā “na cāyaṃ nisajjā”tiādinā vuttanayānusārena yojetabbā.
atk-s0503a:727_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ therassa catudhātuvavatthānamukhena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānena vipassanaṃ ogāhetvā
atk-s0503a:727_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya nibbānādhigamadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:728_0: Tattha sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti pubbe vuttalakkhaṇā sati saddhāpubbaṅgamānaṃ samādhivīriyapaññānaṃ yathāsakaṃ
atk-s0503a:728_1: kiccanipphādanena sahāyabhāvaṃ āpannattā pahīnappaṭipakkhā tato eva tikkhavisadabhūtā ca yathāvuttakāyasaṃvaraṇavasena
atk-s0503a:728_2: ekatthasamosaraṇavasena ca aviparītasabhāvaṃ sallakkhentī upagantvā ṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0503a:728_3: etena kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ tannissitānañca upādārūpānaṃ sallakkhaṇavasena,
atk-s0503a:728_4: paccaye vavatthapetvā tato paraṃ tesaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena ca pavattaṃ ñāṇaparamparāgataṃ satiṃ dasseti,
atk-s0503a:728_6: Chasu phassāyatanesu saṃvutoti yathāvuttāya kāye upaṭṭhitāya satiyā samannāgato cakkhādīsu phassassa
atk-s0503a:728_7: kāraṇabhūtesu chasu dvāresu kāyānupassanāya abhāvitāya uppajjanārahānaṃ abhijjhādīnaṃ tassā bhāvitattā
atk-s0503a:728_8: ñāṇappavattiṃ paṭivedhento te pidahanto “tattha saṃvuto”ti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:729_0: Satataṃ bhikkhu samāhitoti so bhikkhu evaṃ upaṭṭhitassati sabbattha ca saṃvuto puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ
atk-s0503a:729_1: avissajjetvā aniccādivasena sammasanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ñāṇe tikkhe sūre vahante vipassanāsamādhinā
atk-s0503a:729_2: tāva satataṃ nirantaraṃ samāhito anulomañāṇānantaraṃ gotrabhuñāṇodayato paṭṭhāya.
atk-s0503a:729_3: Jaññā nibbānamattanoti aññesaṃ puthujjanānaṃ supinantepi agocarabhāvato,
atk-s0503a:729_4: ariyānaṃ pana tassa tasseva āveṇikattā attasadisattā ca “attā”ti laddhavohārassa maggaphalañāṇassa sātisayavisayabhāvato
atk-s0503a:729_10: Ariyā hi adhicittappavattikālepi ekanteneva nibbāne ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena viharanti.
atk-s0503a:729_11: Ettha ca yassa sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitā,
atk-s0503a:729_13: tato eva satataṃ samāhito attapaccakkhakaraṇena nibbānaṃ attano jāneyyāti evaṃ gāthāpadānaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:729_14: Evaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānamukhena yāva arahattā ekassa bhikkhuno niyyānamaggaṃ dasseti dhammarājā.
atk-s0503a:730_1: sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti etena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:730_2: Chasu phassāyatanesu saṃvutoti phasso āyatanaṃ kāraṇaṃ etesanti phassāyatanāni,
atk-s0503a:730_4: Phassahetukesu phassapaccayā nibbattesu chasu cakkhusamphassajādivedayitesu taṇhādīnaṃ appavattiyā saṃvuto,
atk-s0503a:730_6: Satataṃ bhikkhu samāhitoti satataṃ niccakālaṃ nirantaraṃ vikkhepābhāvato samāhito bhikkhu.
atk-s0503a:730_7: So cāyaṃ avikkhepo sabbaso satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya matthakappattāya hoti.
atk-s0503a:730_8: Sammasanto hi atītādibhedabhinnesu pañcupādānakkhandhesu anavasesatova pariggahetvā sammasatīti.
atk-s0503a:730_10: Jaññā nibbānamattanoti evaṃ catusatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhito bhinnakileso bhikkhu attano
atk-s0503a:731_0: Atha vā sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti attano paresañca kāyassa yathāsabhāvapariññādīpanena therassa sativepullappatti dīpitā.
atk-s0503a:731_1: Chasu phassāyatanesu saṃvutoti cakkhādīsu chasu dvāresu accantasaṃvaradīpanena satatavihārivasena therassa
atk-s0503a:731_3: Satataṃ bhikkhu samāhitoti samāpattibahulatādassanena navānupubbavihārasamāpattiyo dassitā.
atk-s0503a:731_4: Evaṃbhūto pana bhikkhu jaññā nibbānamattanoti katakiccattā uttari karaṇīyābhāvato kevalaṃ attano anupādisesanibbānameva jāneyya cinteyya,
atk-s0503a:734_6: Te theraṃ tathā samudācarantaṃ disvā “arahāva samāno appahīnavāsanattā evaṃ bhaṇatī”ti ajānantā “dosantaro

atk-s0503a:737_1: Pañca jātisatāni brāhmaṇakule paccājātānīti sabbāni tāni vacchassa pañca jātisatāni paṭipāṭiyā brāhmaṇakule eva jātāni,

atk-s0503a:739_0: Tattha yamhi na māyā vasati na mānoti yasmiṃ ariyapuggale santadosappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā,

atk-s0503a:739_2: maggena samugghātitattā na pavattati na uppajjati.

atk-s0503a:739_4: tato eva rūpādīsu katthaci mamāyanābhāvato amamo apariggaho,
atk-s0503a:739_6: Panuṇṇakodhoti kujjhanalakkhaṇassa kodhassa anāgāmimaggena sabbaso pahīnattā panuṇṇakodho samucchinnāghāto.
atk-s0503a:739_7: Abhinibbutattoti yo evaṃ māyāmānalobhakodhānaṃ samugghātena tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbassa saṃkilesapakkhassa
atk-s0503a:739_9: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhūti so evarūpo khīṇāsavo sabbaso bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo,
atk-s0503a:739_10: so eva samitapāpattā samacariyāya ca samaṇo,
atk-s0503a:739_11: so eva ca sabbaso bhinnakilesattā bhikkhu nāma.
atk-s0503a:739_14: vaccho so kathaṃ dosantaro kiñci kāyakammādiṃ pavatteyya,

atk-s0503a:742_3: Tañhi so āyasmā bahulaṃ samāpajjati diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ,

atk-s0503a:747_0: Pucchitvā “dvīhi balehī”ti dve balāni samathabalaṃ vipassanābalanti vitthāro.
atk-s0503a:747_2: Kasmā panāyaṃ thero phalasamāpattiṃ asamāpajjitvā nirodhaṃ samāpajji?
atk-s0503a:747_6: Tañhi samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitassa kato appakopi sakkāro visesato mahapphalo mahānisaṃso hotīti.

atk-s0503a:748_2: anāgāmī ce anāgāmiphalassa uppādena vuṭṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-s0503a:749_0: Tena kho pana samayena sakko devānamindo āyasmato mahākassapassa piṇḍapātaṃ dātukāmo hotīti kathaṃ tassa dātukāmatā jātā?
atk-s0503a:749_2: tā sakkassa devarañño paricārikā kakuṭapādiniyo pubbe “ayyo mahākassapo rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
atk-s0503a:749_3: gacchatha therassa dānaṃ dethā”ti sakkena pesitā upagantvā dibbāhāraṃ dātukāmā ṭhitā therena paṭikkhittā devalokameva gatā.
atk-s0503a:749_4: Idāni purimappaṭikkhepaṃ cintetvā “kadāci gaṇheyyā”ti samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa therassa dānaṃ dātukāmā
atk-s0503a:749_5: sakkassa anārocetvā sayameva āgantvā dibbabhojanāni upanentiyo purimanayeneva therena paṭikkhittā devalokaṃ
atk-s0503a:749_6: gantvā sakkena “kahaṃ gatatthā”ti puṭṭhā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “dinno vo therassa piṇḍapāto”ti sakkena vutte
atk-s0503a:749_13: jarājiṇṇo khaṇḍadanto palitakeso obhaggasarīro mahallako tantavāyo hutvā,
atk-s0503a:749_15: ekaṃ pesakāravīthiṃ māpetvā tantaṃ pasārento acchi,
atk-s0503a:750_0: Tattha tantaṃ vinātīti pasāritatantaṃ vinanto viya hoti.
atk-s0503a:750_2: Yena sakkassa devānamindassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamīti thero nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya “duggatajanasaṅgahaṃ
atk-s0503a:750_3: karissāmī”ti nagarābhimukho gacchanto bahinagare sakkena māpitaṃ pesakāravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā olokento
atk-s0503a:750_4: addasa oluggaviluggajiṇṇasālaṃ tattha ca te jāyampatike yathāvuttarūpe tantavāyakammaṃ karonte disvā cintesi –
atk-s0503a:750_6: Imasmiṃ nagare imehi duggatatarā natthi maññe.
atk-s0503a:750_7: Imehi dinnaṃ sākamattampi gahetvā imesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:750_9: Sakko taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā sujaṃ āha – “bhadde,
atk-s0503a:750_11: taṃ tvaṃ apassantī viya tuṇhī hutvā nisīda.
atk-s0503a:750_12: Khaṇeneva vañcetvā piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmā”ti thero gantvā gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:750_13: Tepi apassantā viya attano kammameva karontā thokaṃ āgamayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:750_14: Atha sakko “gehadvāre ṭhito eko thero viya khāyati,
atk-s0503a:750_17: So gehā nikkhamitvā theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ubhohi hatthehi jaṇṇukāni olumbitvā nitthunanto
atk-s0503a:750_18: uṭṭhāya “kataratthero nu kho ayyo”ti thokaṃ osakkitvā “akkhīni me dhūmāyantī”ti vatvā nalāṭe hatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:750_19: ṭhapetvā uddhaṃ ulloketvā “aho dukkhaṃ ayyo no mahākassapattherova cirassaṃ me kuṭidvāraṃ āgato.
atk-s0503a:750_20: Atthi nu kho kiñci gehe”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:750_23: lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti acintetvā saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:750_24: Thero pattaṃ dento “imesaṃ eva duggatānaṃ jarājiṇṇānaṃ mayā saṅgaho kātabbo”ti cintesi.
atk-s0503a:750_25: So anto pavisitvā ghaṭiodanaṃ nāma ghaṭito uddharitvā,
atk-s0503a:751_2: tassa ghaṭiodanaṃ nāma devānaṃ koci āhāravisesoti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0503a:751_4: Anekasūpo so eva āhāro patte pakkhipitvā therassa hatthe ṭhapanakāle kapaṇānaṃ upakappanakalūkhāhāro viya paññāyittha,
atk-s0503a:751_5: hatthe ṭhapitamatte pana attano dibbasabhāveneva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:751_6: Anekasūpoti muggamāsādisūpehi ceva khajjavikatīhi ca anekavidhasūpo.
atk-s0503a:751_8: Anekarasabyañjanoti anekehi sūpehi ceva byañjanehi ca madhurādimūlarasānañceva sambhinnarasānañca abhibyañjako,
atk-s0503a:752_0: So kira piṇḍapāto therassa hatthe ṭhapitakāle rājagahanagaraṃ attano dibbagandhena ajjhotthari,
atk-s0503a:752_8: ajja mayhaṃ dānaṃ datvā kocideva duggato senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ vā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ vā labheyyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:752_13: mayā pana anuppanne buddhe kalyāṇakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0503a:752_14: buddhuppāde pana vattamāne puññakammaṃ katvā cūḷarathadevaputto mahārathadevaputto anekavaṇṇadevaputtoti
atk-s0503a:752_15: ime tayo devaputtā mamāsannaṭṭhāne nibbattā mahātejavantatarā.
atk-s0503a:752_16: Ahaṃ tesu devaputtesu ‘nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā’ti paricārikāyo gahetvā antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇesu palāyitvā gehaṃ pavisāmi.
atk-s0503a:752_17: Tesañhi sarīrato tejo mama sarīraṃ ottharati,
atk-s0503a:752_18: mama sarīrato tejo tesaṃ sarīraṃ na ottharati.
atk-s0503a:752_21: “Evaṃ santepi ito paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ mā evaṃ vañcetvā dānamadāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:752_22: “Vañcetvā tumhākaṃ dāne dinne mayhaṃ kusalaṃ atthi natthī”ti? “Atthi, āvuso”ti.
atk-s0503a:752_24: bhante”ti vatvā theraṃ vanditvā sujaṃ ādāya theraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā,
atk-s0503a:752_27: Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho āyasmato mahākassapassa etadahosī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:753_0: Tattha kosiyāti sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ gottena ālapati.
atk-s0503a:753_4: Ākāse antalikkheti ākāsameva pariyāyasaddena antalikkheti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:753_5: Atha vā antalikkhasaṅkhāte ākāse na kasiṇugghāṭimādiākāseti visesento vadati.
atk-s0503a:753_6: Aho dānanti ettha ahoti acchariyatthe nipāto.
atk-s0503a:753_8: “yasmā nirodhā vuṭṭhitassa ayyassa mahākassapattherassa sakkaccaṃ sahatthena cittīkatvā anapaviddhaṃ kālena paresaṃ anupahacca,
atk-s0503a:753_9: sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā idamīdisaṃ mayā dibbabhojanadānaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0503a:753_11: tividhāyapi sampattiyā samannāgatattā sabbaṅgasampannaṃ vata mayā dānaṃ pavattita”nti acchariyabbhutacittajāto
atk-s0503a:753_12: tadā attano hadayabbhantaragataṃ pītisomanassaṃ samuggiranto “aho dāna”nti vatvā tassa dānassa vuttanayena
atk-s0503a:753_13: uttamadānabhāvaṃ khettaṅgatabhāvañca pakāsento “paramadānaṃ kassape suppatiṭṭhita”nti udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:754_0: Evaṃ pana sakkassa udānentassa bhagavā vihāre ṭhitoyeva dibbasotena saddaṃ sutvā “passatha,
atk-s0503a:754_2: sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā ākāsena gacchanta”nti bhikkhūnaṃ vatvā tehi “kiṃ pana, bhante,
atk-s0503a:754_3: tena kata”nti puṭṭho “mama puttassa kassapassa vañcetvā dānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0503a:754_5: Tena vuttaṃ “assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:755_1: Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattā pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhā upakkilesavinimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:755_3: Ayañcāpi bhagavato vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattā ñāṇamayā sotadhātu tādisā evāti dibbasadisattā dibbā.
atk-s0503a:755_4: Api ca dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbā.
atk-s0503a:755_9: Atikkantamānusikāyāti manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā saddassavanena mānusikamaṃsasotadhātuṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitāya.
