atk-s0503a:756_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti “sammāpaṭipattiyā guṇavisese patiṭṭhitaṃ purisātisayaṃ devāpi manussāpi ādarajātā
atk-s0503a:756_1: ativiya pihayantī”ti imamatthaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:757_0: Tatra piṇḍapātikaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ samādāya tassa paripūraṇena piṇḍapātikassa.
atk-s0503a:757_1: Nanu cāyaṃ gāthā āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ nimittaṃ katvā bhāsitā,
atk-s0503a:757_2: thero ca sabbesaṃ dhutavādānaṃ aggo terasadhutaṅgadharo,
atk-s0503a:757_6: iminā desanāsīsena sabbepissa dhutaṅgā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:757_7: Atha vā “yathāpi bhamaro puppha”nti gāthāya vuttanayena paramappicchatāya kulānuddayatāya cassa sabbaṃ
atk-s0503a:757_8: piṇḍapātikavattaṃ akkhaṇḍetvā tattha sātisayaṃ paṭipattiyā pakāsanatthaṃ “piṇḍapātikassā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:757_9: Piṇḍapātikassāti ca pihayantīti padaṃ apekkhitvā sampadānavacanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:757_11: Attabharassāti “appāni ca tāni sulabhāni anavajjānī”ti evaṃ vuttehi appānavajjasulabharūpehi catūhi paccayehi attānameva bharantassa.
atk-s0503a:757_12: Anaññaposinoti āmisasaṅgaṇhanena aññe sissādike posetuṃ anussukkatāya anaññaposino.
atk-s0503a:757_13: Padadvayenassa kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena vicaraṇato sallahukavuttitaṃ subharataṃ paramañca santuṭṭhiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:757_14: Atha vā attabharassāti ekavacanicchāya attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃyeva imaṃ attānaṃ bharati,
atk-s0503a:757_16: tato eva attanā aññassa posetabbassa abhāvato anaññaposī,
atk-s0503a:758_1: satīmatoti taṃ aggaphalādhigamena sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamena paṭippassaddhiyā upasantaṃ,
atk-s0503a:758_3: tato eva iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ sakkādayo devā pihayanti patthenti,
atk-s0503a:758_4: tassa sīlādiguṇavisesesu bahumānaṃ uppādentā ādaraṃ janenti,
atk-s0503a:761_1: Aṭṭhame pacchābhattanti ekāsanikakhalupacchābhattikānaṃ pātova bhuttānaṃ antomajjhanhikopi pacchābhattameva,
atk-s0503a:761_2: idha pana pakatibhattasseva pacchato pacchābhattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:761_4: piṇḍapātaṃ pariyesitvā bhattakiccassa niṭṭhāpanavasena tato nivattānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:761_6: So kira gandhakuṭiyā maṇḍapassa sālāya ca antare hoti,
atk-s0503a:761_9: Tasmā karerirukkhassa avidūre kate nisīdanasālasaṅkhāte maṇḍalamāḷe.
atk-s0503a:762_4: Iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvo ca puggalavasena ca dvāravasena ca gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:762_5: Ekaccassa hi iṭṭhābhimato ekaccassa aniṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0503a:762_7: Tathā ekassa dvārassa iṭṭho aññassa aniṭṭho.
atk-s0503a:762_11: Cakkhunā rūpe passitunti gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho upāsakehi gehaṃ pavesetvā pūjāsakkārakaraṇatthaṃ upanītesu
atk-s0503a:762_12: āsanavitānādīsu nānāvirāgasamujjalavaṇṇasaṅkhāte rajanīye aññe ca saviññāṇakarūpe cakkhudvārikaviññāṇehi passituṃ.
atk-s0503a:762_13: Saddeti tatheva issarajanānaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭho tesaṃ payutte gītavāditasadde sotuṃ.
atk-s0503a:762_14: Gandheti tathā tehi pūjāsakkāravasena upanīte pupphadhūmādigandhe ghāyituṃ.
atk-s0503a:762_16: Phoṭṭhabbeti mahagghapaccattharaṇesu āsanesu nisinnakāle sukhasamphasse phoṭṭhabbe phusituṃ.
atk-s0503a:762_17: Evañca pañcadvārikaiṭṭhārammaṇappaṭilābhaṃ kittetvā idāni manodvārikaiṭṭhārammaṇappaṭilābhaṃ dassetuṃ “sakkato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:763_0: Kiṃ pana apiṇḍapātikānaṃ ayaṃ nayo na labbhatīti? Labbhati.
atk-s0503a:763_1: Tesampi hi nimantanasalākabhattādiatthaṃ gāmaṃ gatakāle uḷāravibhavā upāsakā tathā sakkārasammānaṃ karontiyeva,
atk-s0503a:763_3: Piṇḍapātikānaṃ pana tadā niccameva tattha pūjāsakkāraṃ kariyamānaṃ disvā,
atk-s0503a:764_2: Tenupasaṅkamīti tattha surabhigandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno tesaṃ taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā “ime bhikkhū mādisassa
atk-s0503a:764_3: nāma buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā mayā saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasantāpi evaṃ ayonisomanasikāravasena kathaṃ
atk-s0503a:764_6: handa te tato nivāretvā sallekhavihāre niyojessāmī”ti maṇḍalamāḷaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:765_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti “appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāsallekhānaṃ vasena kilese dhunituṃ taṇhaṃ visosetuṃ paṭipannoti piṇḍapātikassa sato devā pihayanti,
atk-s0503a:765_2: na ito aññathā”ti imamatthaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:766_0: Tattha no ce saddasilokanissitoti “aho ayyo appiccho santuṭṭho paramasallekhavuttī”tiādinā parehi kittitabbasaddasaṅkhātaṃ silokaṃ.
atk-s0503a:766_1: Taṇhāya nissito na hoti ceti attho.
atk-s0503a:769_3: amhesu idha sannipatitesu ko nu jīvitanimittaṃ sikkhitabbaṭṭhena “sippa”nti laddhanāmaṃ yaṃkiñci ājīvaṃ vijānāti?
atk-s0503a:769_4: Ko kiṃ sippaṃ sikkhīti ko dīgharattaṃ sippācariyakulaṃ payirupāsitvā āgamato payogato ca hatthisippādīsu kiṃ sippaṃ sikkhi?
atk-s0503a:769_5: Kataraṃ sippaṃ sippānaṃ agganti sabbasippānaṃ agārayhatāya mahapphalatāya akicchasiddhiyā ca kataraṃ sippaṃ aggaṃ uttamaṃ?
atk-s0503a:769_6: Yaṃ nissāya sukhena sakkā jīvitunti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:769_12: taṃ uddissa pavattaṃ sabbampi sippaṃ idha “hatthisippa”nti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0503a:769_14: Rathasippaṃ pana rathayoggānaṃ damanasāraṇādividhānavasena ceva rathassa karaṇavasena ca veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:769_22: so rukkhampi disvā “ettakāni ettha paṇṇānī”ti gaṇituṃ jānāti.
atk-s0503a:769_25: Kāveyyasippanti attano cintāvasena vā parato paṭiladdhasutavasena vā,
atk-s0503a:769_27: evaṃ naṃ yojessāmī”ti evaṃ atthavasena vā,
atk-s0503a:769_29: “tappaṭibhāgaṃ kabbaṃ karissāmī”ti ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānavasena vā cintākaviādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kavīnaṃ kabbakaraṇasippaṃ.
atk-s0503a:770_0: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, kavī – cintākavi, sutakavi, atthakavi, paṭibhānakavī”ti.
atk-s0503a:771_1: balākā rattā lohitassa rattattā”ti evamādinayappavattaṃ paralokanibbānānaṃ paṭisedhakaṃ vitaṇḍasatthasippaṃ.
atk-s0503a:772_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ sabbasippāyatanānaṃ jīvikatthatāya vaṭṭadukkhato anissaraṇabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:772_2: taṃ samaṅginoyeva ca bhikkhubhāvaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:773_0: Tattha asippajīvīti catunnaṃ taṇhuppādānaṃ samucchedavikkhambhanena paccayāsāya visositattā yaṃkiñci
atk-s0503a:773_1: sippaṃ upanissāya jīvikaṃ na kappetīti asippajīvī,
atk-s0503a:773_3: Lahūti appakiccatāya sallahukavuttitāya ca lahu abahulasambhāro,
atk-s0503a:773_5: Atthakāmoti sadevakassa lokassa atthameva kāmetīti atthakāmo,
atk-s0503a:773_6: etena sattānaṃ anatthaparivajjanassa pakāsitattā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ dasseti pāṇātipātādianatthaviramaṇaparidīpanato.
atk-s0503a:773_7: Yatindriyoti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ abhijjhādyappavattito saṃyamena yatindriyo,
atk-s0503a:773_9: Sabbadhi vippamuttoti evaṃ suparisuddhasīlo catupaccayasantose avaṭṭhito sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetvā
atk-s0503a:773_10: aniccādivasena saṅkhāre sammasanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā tato paraṃ paṭipāṭiyā pavattitehi catūhi ariyamaggehi
atk-s0503a:773_11: saṃyojanānaṃ pahīnattā sabbadhi sabbattha bhavādīsu vippamutto.
atk-s0503a:774_0: Anokasārī amamo nirāsoti tathā sabbadhi vippamuttattā eva okasaṅkhātesu chasupi āyatanesu taṇhābhisaraṇassa abhāvena anokasārī,
atk-s0503a:774_3: Hitvā mānaṃ ekacaro sa bhikkhūti evaṃbhūto ca so arahattamaggappattisamakālameva anavasesaṃ mānaṃ hitvā
atk-s0503a:774_4: pajahitvā ime bhikkhū viya gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ akatvā pavivekakāmatāya taṇhāsahāyavirahena ca sabbiriyāpathesu ekacaro,
atk-s0503a:774_5: so sabbaso bhinnakilesattā paramatthato bhikkhu nāma.
atk-s0503a:774_9: na sippaṃ nissāya micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappentassa,
atk-s0503a:774_10: tasmā sippesu sāraggahaṇaṃ vissajjetvā adhisīlādīsuyeva tumhehi sikkhitabba”nti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:777_1: Dasame buddhacakkhunāti ettha āsayānusayañāṇaṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇañca buddhacakkhu nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:778_0: “Addasā kho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:779_0: Lokanti tayo lokā – okāsaloko, saṅkhāraloko, sattalokoti. Tattha –
atk-s0503a:785_0: Tattha lokīyati vicittākārato dissatīti cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto loko okāsaloko,
atk-s0503a:785_2: lokīyati ettha puññapāpaṃ tabbipāko cāti sattaloko.
atk-s0503a:785_3: Tesu bhagavā mahākaruṇāya anukampamāno saṃsāradukkhato mocetukāmo sattalokaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0503a:785_6: Bhagavā hi pallaṅkasattāhassa pariyosāne pacchimayāmāvasāne “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā…pe…
atk-s0503a:785_7: sūriyova obhāsayamantalikkha”nti imaṃ ariyamaggānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā,
atk-s0503a:785_8: “ahaṃ tāva evaṃ suduttaraṃ saṃsāramahoghaṃ imāya dhammanāvāya samuttaritvā nibbānapāre ṭhito,
atk-s0503a:785_10: kīdiso nu kho loko”ti lokaṃ volokesi.
atk-s0503a:785_12: “atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:786_1: hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya attano ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0503a:786_6: Tañca dukkhadukkhādivasena ceva jātiādivasena ca anekappakāraṃ.
atk-s0503a:786_10: Pariḍayhamāneti indhanaṃ viya agginā samantato ḍayhamāne.
atk-s0503a:786_18: Yato te cittaṃ kāyañca kilesentīti kilesāti vuccanti.
atk-s0503a:786_19: Ettha ca pariḍayhamāneti etena bhagavā rāgādikilesānaṃ pavattidukkhataṃ,
atk-s0503a:787_0: Bhagavā hi bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinno paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme
atk-s0503a:787_1: dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā kilesamūlakaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ abhiññāya
atk-s0503a:787_2: saṅkhāre pariggahetvā sammasanto anukkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggādhigamena sayaṃ vigataviddhastakileso
atk-s0503a:787_3: abhisambuddho hutvā paccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ anavasesānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā attano vaṭṭadukkhassa parikkhīṇabhāvadīpakaṃ
atk-s0503a:787_4: sabbabuddhānaṃ avijahitaṃ “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā teneva pallaṅkena sattāhaṃ vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī
atk-s0503a:787_5: nisinno sattamāya rattiyā tīsu yāmesu vuttanayena tīṇi udānāni udānetvā tatiyaudānānantaraṃ buddhacakkhunā
atk-s0503a:787_8: tehi ime sattā santappanti pariḍayhanti cā”ti passi.
atk-s0503a:788_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ lokassa yathāvuttasantāpapariḷāhehi abhibhuyyamānataṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:788_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ sabbasantāpapariḷāhato parinibbānavibhāvanaṃ mahāudānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:789_0: Tattha ayaṃ loko santāpajātoti ayaṃ sabbopi loko jarārogamaraṇehi ceva nānāvidhabyasanehi ca kilesapariyuṭṭhānehi ca jātasantāpo,
atk-s0503a:789_2: Phassaparetoti tato eva anekehi dukkhasamphassehi parihato upadduto.
atk-s0503a:789_3: Atha vā phassaparetoti sukhādisaṅkhātānaṃ tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ paccayabhūtehi chahi phassehi abhibhūto,
atk-s0503a:789_4: tato tato dvārato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe pavattivasena upassaṭṭho.
atk-s0503a:789_5: Rogaṃ vadati attatoti phassapaccayā uppajjamānaṃ vedanāsaṅkhātaṃ rogaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:789_6: khandhapañcakameva vā yathābhūtaṃ ajānanto “aha”nti saññāya diṭṭhigāhavasena “ahaṃ sukhito dukkhito”ti attato vadati.
atk-s0503a:789_9: yvāyaṃ loko kenaci dukkhadhammena phuṭṭho abhāvitattatāya adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “aho dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:789_10: īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ attanopi mā hotū”tiādinā vippalapanto kevalaṃ attano rogaṃ vadati,
atk-s0503a:789_11: tassa pana pahānāya na paṭipajjatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:789_12: Atha vā taṃ yathāvuttaṃ dukkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ajānanto taṇhāgāhavasena “mama”nti saññāya attato vadati,
atk-s0503a:790_0: Yena yena hi maññatīti evamimaṃ rogabhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ attato attano vā vadanto loko yena yena rūpavedanādinā kāraṇabhūtena,
atk-s0503a:790_1: yena vā sassatādinā pakārena diṭṭhimānataṇhāmaññanāhi maññati.
atk-s0503a:790_2: Tato taṃ hoti aññathāti tato attanā parikappitākārato taṃ maññanāya vatthubhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ aññathā anattānattaniyameva hoti.
atk-s0503a:790_3: Vase vattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ahaṅkāramamaṅkārattaṃ na nipphādetīti attho.
atk-s0503a:790_4: Atha vā tatoti tasmā maññanāmattabhāvato taṃ khandhapañcakaṃ niccādivasena maññitaṃ aññathā aniccādisabhāvameva hoti.
atk-s0503a:790_5: Na hi maññanā bhāvaññathattaṃ vā lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ vā kātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0503a:791_0: Aññathābhāvī bhavasattoti asambhave vaḍḍhiyaṃ hitasukhe satto laggo sattaloko maññanāya yathāruci cintiyamānopi
atk-s0503a:791_1: viparītappaṭipattiyā tato aññathābhāvī ahitadukkhabhāvī vighātaṃyeva pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0503a:791_2: Bhavamevābhinandatīti evaṃ santepi taṃ maññanāparikappitaṃ avijjamānaṃ bhavaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ abhinandati eva abhikaṅkhati eva.
atk-s0503a:791_3: Atha vā aññathābhāvīti “nicco me attā”tiādinā maññanāya parikappitākārato sayaṃ aññathābhāvī samāno anicco adhuvoti attho.
atk-s0503a:791_4: Bhavasattoti kāmādibhavesu bhavataṇhāya satto laggo gadhito.
atk-s0503a:791_8: Yadabhinandati taṃ bhayanti yaṃ vaḍḍhisaṅkhātaṃ bhavaṃ kāmādibhavaṃ vā abhinandati,
atk-s0503a:791_9: taṃ aniccādivipariṇāmasabhāvattā anekabyasanānubandhattā ca bhavahetubhāvato ativiya bhayānakaṭṭhena bhayaṃ.
atk-s0503a:791_11: taṃ jarāmaraṇādi dukkhādhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhadukkhabhāvato ca dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:791_12: Atha vā yassa bhāyatīti bhavābhinandanena yassa vibhavassa bhāyati,
atk-s0503a:791_14: tato bhāyanañca dukkhavatthubhāvato jātiādidukkhassa anativattanato ca dukkhaṃ dukkhasabhāvamevāti attho.
atk-s0503a:791_15: Atha vā yassa bhāyati taṃ dukkhanti yassa aniccādikassa bhāyati taṃ nissaraṇaṃ ajānanto,
atk-s0503a:792_0: Ettakena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:792_9: ekanteneva kāmādibhavassa samudayappahānena anavasesapajahanatthāya idaṃ mayā satasahassakappādhikāni
atk-s0503a:792_10: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atidukkarāni ācaritvā pāramiyo pūretvā bodhimaṇḍe tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā
atk-s0503a:793_0: Evaṃ ariyamaggassa ekaṃseneva niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni aññamaggassa tadabhāvaṃ dassento “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:793_10: Bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṃsūti ekacce kāmabhavena rūpabhavena vā sabbabhavato vimuttiṃ saṃsārasuddhiṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:794_1: Diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādino tesu hi keci “uḷārehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito attā diṭṭheva dhamme paramaṃ nibbutiṃ patto hotī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:794_3: keci “dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānasamaṅgī attā diṭṭheva dhamme paramaṃ nibbutiṃ patto hotī”ti vadanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:795_2: ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃdiṭṭhi ‘yato kho bho ayaṃ attā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito”’ti vitthāro.
atk-s0503a:796_0: Te pana yasmā yāvadatthaṃ pītattā suhitāya jalūkāya viya ruhirapipāsā kāmādisukhehi samappitassa tassa attano kāmesanādayo na bhavissanti,
atk-s0503a:796_2: yasmiṃ yasmiñca bhave ṭhitassa ayaṃ nayo labbhati,
atk-s0503a:796_3: tena tena bhavena sabbabhavato vimutti hotīti vadanti,
atk-s0503a:796_5: Yesañca “ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ saṃsaritvā bālā ca paṇḍitā ca pariyosānabhave ṭhatvā saṃsārato vimuccantī”ti laddhi,
atk-s0503a:796_6: tepi bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhaṃ vadanti nāma.
atk-s0503a:797_0: “Cullāsīti mahākappino satasahassāni yāni bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:798_1: Bhavati sassataṃ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi bhavadiṭṭhīti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:798_2: bhavadiṭṭhi evettha uttarapadalopena bhavataṇhātiādīsu viya bhavoti vutto.
atk-s0503a:798_3: Bhavadiṭṭhivasena ca ekacce bhavavisesaṃyeva kilesānaṃ vūpasantavuttiyā āyuno ca dīghāvāsatāya niccādisabhāvaṃ bhavavimokkhaṃ maññanti,
atk-s0503a:798_8: Tesamevaṃ viparītagāhīnaṃ anissaraṇe nissaraṇadiṭṭhīnaṃ kuto bhavavimokkho.
atk-s0503a:799_1: Bhavassa nissaraṇamāhaṃsūti sabbabhavato niggamanaṃ nikkhantiṃ saṃsārasuddhiṃ vadiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:799_2: Te hi “bhavena bhavassa vippamokkho”ti vadantānaṃ vādaṃ ananujānantā bhavūpacchedena nissaraṇaṃ paṭijāniṃsu.
atk-s0503a:799_4: Vibhavati vinassati ucchijjati attā ca loko cāti pavattanato ucchedadiṭṭhi vuttanayena “vibhavo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:799_5: Ucchedadiṭṭhivasena hi sattā adhimuccitvā tattha tattha uppannā ucchijjanti,
atk-s0503a:800_0: “Yato kho bho ayaṃ attā rūpī cātumahābhūtiko…pe…
atk-s0503a:800_2: ettāvatā kho bho ayaṃ attā sammā samucchinno hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:802_2: bāle ca paṇḍite ca kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṃ maraṇā”ti ca.
atk-s0503a:803_3: Na hi ariyamaggabhāvanāya anavasesakilesaṃ asamugghātetvā kadācipi bhavato nissaraṇavimutti sambhavati.
atk-s0503a:803_4: Tathā hi tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yathābhūtāvabodhābhāvato “atthi natthī”ti antadvayanipatitānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhivasena samparitasitavipphanditamattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:803_5: yato te diṭṭhigatikā pavattihetūsupi sammūḷhā sakkāyabhūmiyaṃ sunikhāte viparītadassanathambhe taṇhābandhanena
atk-s0503a:803_6: baddhā gaddūlabandhanā viya sā na vijahanti bandhanaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:804_0: Ye pana catusaccavibhāvanena pavattiādīsu asammohato taṃ antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ samāruḷhā,
atk-s0503a:804_1: tesaṃyeva bhavavippamokkho nissaraṇañcāti dassento satthā “upadhiṃ hī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:805_3: Tattha sabbupādānakkhayāti kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānanti sabbesaṃ imesaṃ
atk-s0503a:805_5: Tattha diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānanti imāni tīṇi upādānāni sotāpattimaggena khīyanti,
atk-s0503a:805_12: Natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti evaṃ sabbaso upādānakkhayā tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbassapi kilesagaṇassa anuppādanato
atk-s0503a:806_0: Evaṃ bhagavā hetunā saddhiṃ pavattiṃ nivattiñca dassetvā “imaṃ nayaṃ ajānanto ayaṃ sattaloko vaṭṭatopi
atk-s0503a:806_2: Tattha lokamimaṃ passāti attano buddhacakkhunā paccakkhato visayabhāvassa upagatattā “lokamimaṃ passā”ti
atk-s0503a:806_6: Avijjāya paretāti “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā nayena vuttāya catusaccapaṭicchādikāya avijjāya abhibhūtā.
atk-s0503a:806_8: Bhūtaratāti bhūtesu mātāpituputtadārādisaññāya aññasattesu taṇhāya ratā,
atk-s0503a:806_9: bhūte vā khandhapañcake aniccāsubhadukkhānattasabhāve taṃsabhāvānavabodhato itthipurisādiparikappavasena
atk-s0503a:806_11: Bhavā aparimuttāti yathāvuttena taṇhādiṭṭhigāhena bhavato saṃsārato na parimuttā.
atk-s0503a:807_0: Ettha ca “lokamima”nti paṭhamaṃ tāva sakalampi sattanikāyaṃ sāmaññato ekattaṃ upanento ekavacanena anodhiso
atk-s0503a:807_1: gahaṇaṃ dīpetvā “svāyaṃ loko bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsādivasena ceva tatthāpi taṃtaṃsattanikāyādivasena
atk-s0503a:807_2: ca anekabhedabhinno paccekaṃ mayā volokito”ti attano buddhacakkhuñāṇānubhāvaṃ pakāsento satthā puna vacanabhedaṃ
atk-s0503a:807_3: katvā bahuvacanena odhiso gahaṇaṃ dīpeti “puthū avijjāya paretā bhūtā”tiādinā.
atk-s0503a:807_4: Evañca katvā “lokamima”nti upayogavacanaṃ katvā “avijjāya paretā”tiādinā paccattabahuvacananiddesopi aviruddho hoti bhinnavākyattā.
atk-s0503a:807_5: Keci pana ekavākyatādhippāyena “avijjāya paretaṃ bhūtaṃ bhūtarataṃ bhavā aparimutta”nti paṭhanti,
atk-s0503a:808_1: taṃ sabbaṃ titthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ buddhagocaraṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ dassento “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:808_2: Tattha ye hi keci bhavāti kāmabhavādi saññībhavādi ekavokārabhavādivibhāgena nānābhedabhinnā sātavanto
atk-s0503a:808_3: vā asātavanto vā dīghāyukā vā ittarakkhaṇā vā ye hi keci bhavā.
atk-s0503a:808_4: Sabbadhīti uddhaṃ adho tiriyanti ādivibhāgena sabbattha.
atk-s0503a:808_6: Sabbe tetiādīsu sabbepi te bhavā rūpavedanādidhammā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā,
atk-s0503a:808_8: jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatāya vipariṇāmadhammā.
atk-s0503a:809_0: Evaṃ lakkhaṇattayapaṭivijjhanākārena etaṃ bhavasaṅkhātaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ yathābhūtaṃ aviparītaṃ sammappaññāya
atk-s0503a:809_1: sammā ñāyena vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya passato pariññābhisamayādivasena paṭivijjhato “bhavo nicco”ti
atk-s0503a:809_4: ucchedadiṭṭhiyā sabbaso pahīnattā vibhavaṃ vicchedaṃ nābhinandati na pattheti.
atk-s0503a:809_5: Evaṃbhūtassa tassa yā kāmataṇhādivasena aṭṭhasatabhedā avatthādivibhāgena anantabhedā ca,
atk-s0503a:809_6: tāsaṃ sabbaso sabbappakārena taṇhānaṃ khayā pahānā,
atk-s0503a:809_7: tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbassapi saṃkilesapakkhassa asesaṃ nissesaṃ virāgena ariyamaggena yo anuppādanirodho,
atk-s0503a:810_0: Evaṃ taṇhāya pahānamukhena saupādisesanibbānaṃ dassetvā idāni anupādisesanibbānaṃ dassento “tassa nibbutassā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:810_2: yo so sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā kilesaparinibbānena nibbuto vuttanayena bhinnakileso khīṇāsavabhikkhu,
atk-s0503a:810_3: tassa nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupādā upādānābhāvato kilesābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ vā aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti,
atk-s0503a:810_6: ariyamaggakkhaṇe kilesamāro abhisaṅkhāramāro devaputtamāro ca carimakacittakkhaṇe khandhamāro maccumāro cāti pañcavidho māro abhibhūto parājito,
atk-s0503a:810_7: puna sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ appadānena nibbisevano kato,
atk-s0503a:810_8: yato tena vijito saṅgāmo mārehi tattha tattha pavattito.
atk-s0503a:810_9: Evaṃ vijitasaṅgāmo pana iṭṭhādīsu sabbesu vikārābhāvena tādilakkhaṇappattiyā tādī arahā sabbabhavāni
atk-s0503a:810_12: aññadatthu anupādāno viya jātavedo parinibbānato uddhaṃ apaññattikova hotīti.
atk-s0503a:810_13: Iti bhagavā imaṃ mahāudānaṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā kūṭaṃ gahetvā niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:815_1: Meghiyavaggassa paṭhame cālikāyanti evaṃ nāmake nagare.
atk-s0503a:815_2: Tassa kira nagarassa dvāraṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samantato calapaṅkaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:815_3: taṃ calapaṅkaṃ nissāya ṭhitattā olokentānaṃ calamānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0503a:815_5: Cālike pabbateti tassa nagarassa avidūre eko pabbato,
atk-s0503a:815_6: sopi sabbasetattā kālapakkhauposathe olokentānaṃ calamāno viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0503a:815_9: bhagavā tadā taṃ nagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā tasmiṃ cālikapabbatamahāvihāre viharati.
atk-s0503a:815_14: Bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ upaṭṭhākā anibaddhā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:815_20: “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:816_0: Jantugāmanti evaṃ nāmakaṃ tasseva vihārassa aparaṃ gocaragāmaṃ.
atk-s0503a:816_4: Pāsādikanti aviraḷarukkhatāya siniddhapattatāya ca passantānaṃ pasādamāvahatīti pāsādikaṃ.
atk-s0503a:816_6: Anto paviṭṭhānaṃ pītisomanassajananaṭṭhena cittaṃ rametīti ramaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:816_12: Therena kira pubbe taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupaṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni raññā eva satā anubhūtaṃ uyyānaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0503a:816_13: tenassa diṭṭhamatteyeva tattha viharituṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0503a:816_14: Āgamehi tāvāti satthā therassa vacanaṃ sutvā upadhārento “na tāvassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gata”nti ñatvā paṭikkhipanto evamāha.
atk-s0503a:816_15: Ekakamhi tāvāti idaṃ panassa “evamayaṃ gantvāpi kamme anipphajjamāne nirāsaṅko hutvā pemavasena puna āgacchissatī”ti cittamaddavajananatthaṃ āha.
atk-s0503a:816_16: Yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatīti añño koci bhikkhu mama santikaṃ yāva āgacchati,
atk-s0503a:817_0: Natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ kiccānaṃ katattā,
atk-s0503a:817_1: abhisambodhiyā vā adhigatattā tato aññaṃ uttari karaṇīyaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0503a:817_2: Natthi katassa vā paticayoti katassa vā puna paticayopi natthi.
atk-s0503a:817_4: pahīnakilesānaṃ vā puna pahānena kiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0503a:817_5: Atthi katassa paticayoti mayhaṃ santāne nipphāditassa sīlādidhammassa ariyamaggassa anadhigatattā tadatthaṃ puna vaḍḍhanasaṅkhāto paticayo atthi,
atk-s0503a:817_7: Padhānanti kho meghiya vadamānaṃ kinti vadeyyāmāti “samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti taṃ vadamānaṃ mayaṃ aññaṃ kiṃ nāma vadeyyāma?
atk-s0503a:818_1: Nisinno ca yasmiṃ maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe pubbe anupaṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni rājā hutvā uyyānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto vividhanāṭakaparivāro nisinnapubbo,
atk-s0503a:818_3: Athassa nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇabhāvo vigato viya ahosi,
atk-s0503a:818_4: rājavesaṃ gahetvā nāṭakaparivāraparivuto setacchattassa heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke nisinno viya jāto.
atk-s0503a:818_5: Athassa taṃ sampattiṃ assādayato kāmavitakko udapādi.
atk-s0503a:818_6: So tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sahoḍḍhaṃ gahite dve core ānetvā purato ṭhapite viya addasa.
atk-s0503a:818_7: Tesu ekassa vadhaṃ āṇāpanavasena byāpādavitakko uppajji,
atk-s0503a:818_9: evaṃ so latājālena rukkho viya madhumakkhikāhi madhughātako viya ca akusalavitakkehi parikkhitto samparikiṇṇo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:818_10: Taṃ sandhāya “atha kho āyasmato meghiyassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:819_0: Acchariyaṃ vata bhoti garahaṇacchariyaṃ nāma kiretaṃ yathā āyasmā ānando bhagavato valiyagattaṃ disvā avoca “acchariyaṃ, bhante, abbhutaṃ,
atk-s0503a:819_2: Apare pana “tasmiṃ samaye pupphaphalapallavādīsu lobhavasena kāmavitakko,
atk-s0503a:819_6: vanacarake tattha tattha disvā tesu cittadubbhanena byāpādavitakko,
atk-s0503a:819_7: tesaṃ viheṭhanādhippāyena vihiṃsāvitakko tassa uppajjī”tipi vadanti.
atk-s0503a:819_8: Yathā vā tathā vā tassa micchāvitakkuppattiyeva acchariyakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:819_10: Attani garumhi ca ekattepi bahuvacanaṃ dissati.
atk-s0503a:820_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ micchāvitakkehi samparikiṇṇo kammaṭṭhānasappāyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto “idaṃ
atk-s0503a:820_1: vata disvā dīghadassī bhagavā paṭisedhesī”ti sallakkhetvā “imaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasabalassa ārocessāmī”ti nisinnāsanato
atk-s0503a:821_5: Vitakketi ūhati ārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ abhiniropetīti vitakko,
atk-s0503a:821_10: Tesu kāmānaṃ abhinandanavasena pavatto nekkhammapaṭipakkho kāmavitakko,
atk-s0503a:821_11: “ime sattā haññantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu”nti sattesu sampadussanavasena pavatto mettāpaṭipakkho byāpādavitakko,
atk-s0503a:821_12: pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi sattānaṃ viheṭhetukāmatāvasena pavatto karuṇāpaṭipakkho vihiṃsāvitakko.
atk-s0503a:822_0: Kasmā panassa bhagavā tattha gamanaṃ anujāni?
atk-s0503a:822_2: ‘paricārakāmatāya maññe bhagavā gantuṃ na detī’ti cassa siyā aññathattaṃ.
atk-s0503a:822_3: Tadassa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti anujāni.
atk-s0503a:823_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ attano pavattiṃ ārocetvā nisinne athassa bhagavā sappāyaṃ dhammaṃ desento “aparipakkāya, meghiya,
atk-s0503a:823_4: Pubbabhāge hi tadaṅgavasena ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca kilesehi cetaso vimutti hoti,
atk-s0503a:823_8: Tattha vimuttiparipācanīyehi dhammehi āsaye paripācite pabodhite vipassanāya maggagabbhaṃ gaṇhantiyā
atk-s0503a:823_9: paripākaṃ gacchantiyā cetovimutti paripakkā nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:831_2: aniccasaññā dukkhasaññā anattasaññā pahānasaññā virāgasaññāti imā pañca nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā,
atk-s0503a:831_4: Tesu vineyyadamanakusalo satthā vineyyassa meghiyattherassa ajjhāsayavasena idha kalyāṇamittatādayo vimuttiparipācanīye
atk-s0503a:831_5: dhamme dassento “pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattantī”ti vatvā te vitthārento “idha, meghiya,
atk-s0503a:832_0: Tattha kalyāṇamittoti kalyāṇo bhaddo sundaro mitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto.
atk-s0503a:832_2: hitassa vidhātā”ti evaṃ sabbākārena upakāro mitto hoti,
atk-s0503a:832_4: Yathāvuttehi kalyāṇapuggaleheva sabbiriyāpathesu saha ayati pavattati,
atk-s0503a:832_5: na vinā tehīti kalyāṇasahāyo.Kalyāṇapuggalesu eva cittena ceva kāyena ca ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena pavattatīti kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
atk-s0503a:833_1: idha kalyāṇamitto saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
atk-s0503a:833_2: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ kammaphalañca,
atk-s0503a:833_3: tena sammāsambodhihetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitesitaṃ na pariccajati.
atk-s0503a:833_4: Sīlasampattiyā sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo,
atk-s0503a:833_5: sutasampattiyā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti,
atk-s0503a:833_6: cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:833_11: So satiyā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā,
atk-s0503a:833_13: vīriyena satte ahitā nisedhetvā hite niyojeti. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:835_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojaye”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:836_2: sabbesañca kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bahukāratāya padhānabhāvato ca imesu pañcasu dhammesu ādito vuttattā paṭhamo
atk-s0503a:836_3: anavajjadhammo avisuddhānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ visuddhikaraṇavasena cetovimuttiyā paripākāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0503a:836_4: Ettha ca kalyāṇamittassa bahukāratā padhānatā ca “upaḍḍhamidaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:837_0: Puna caparanti puna ca aparaṃ dhammajātaṃ.
atk-s0503a:837_10: Apare pana “siraṭṭho sītalaṭṭho sīlaṭṭho saṃvaraṭṭho”ti niruttinayena atthaṃ vaṇṇenti.
atk-s0503a:837_11: Tayidaṃ pāripūrito atisayato vā sīlaṃ assa atthīti sīlavā,
atk-s0503a:838_4: taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:839_3: puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī,
atk-s0503a:839_5: Aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭīyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī,
atk-s0503a:839_6: maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa patanasīloti vā pātī,
atk-s0503a:840_0: Atha vā avijjādihetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti,
atk-s0503a:840_1: “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:840_2: Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho,
atk-s0503a:841_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkhehīti pāti, cittaṃ.
atk-s0503a:841_4: Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti,
atk-s0503a:842_6: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro.
atk-s0503a:843_0: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā patīti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:843_4: Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā tammūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca,
atk-s0503a:844_4: samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:844_6: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho.
atk-s0503a:844_10: Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo ca yathārahaṃ saṃkilesanibbāpanato.
atk-s0503a:844_13: patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evaṃ tāvettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:845_2: Atthato pana tato tato vītikkamitabbato viratiyo cetanā ca.
atk-s0503a:845_3: Tena pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto samannāgato pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti vutto.
atk-s0503a:846_0: “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato,
atk-s0503a:848_0: Ācāragocarasampannoti veḷudānādimicchājīvassa kāyapāgabbhiyādīnañca akaraṇena sabbaso anācāraṃ vajjetvā
atk-s0503a:848_1: “kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo”ti evaṃ vuttabhikkhusāruppaācārasampattiyā,
atk-s0503a:848_2: vesiyādiagocaraṃ vajjetvā piṇḍapātādiatthaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānasaṅkhātena gocarena ca sampannattā ācāragocarasampanno.
atk-s0503a:849_0: Apica yo bhikkhu satthari sagāravo sappatisso sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno sunivattho
atk-s0503a:849_1: supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena iriyāpathasampanno
atk-s0503a:849_2: indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho
atk-s0503a:849_3: pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati,
atk-s0503a:850_0: Gocaro pana upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti tividho.
atk-s0503a:850_7: yañca anusikkhanto saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena,
atk-s0503a:851_0: Yo bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassāvī cakkhundriyasaṃvutova gacchati,
atk-s0503a:853_0: “Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo, yadidaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
atk-s0503a:854_0: Tattha upanissayagocarassa pubbe vuttattā itaresaṃ vasenettha gocaro veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:855_0: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti appamattakattā aṇuppamāṇesu assatiyā asañcicca āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu vajjesu bhayadassanasīlo.
atk-s0503a:855_1: Yo hi bhikkhu paramāṇumattaṃ vajjaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanapamāṇādhikayojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatarājasadisaṃ katvā passati,
atk-s0503a:855_2: yopi sabbalahukaṃ dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā passati,
atk-s0503a:855_4: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:855_5: taṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ sammā ādiyitvā sikkhati,
atk-s0503a:856_2: Cetovivaraṇasappāyāti cetaso paṭicchādakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvakaraṇena cetovivaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ sappāyā,
atk-s0503a:856_3: samathavipassanācittasseva vā vivaraṇāya pākaṭīkaraṇāya vā sappāyā upakārikāti cetovivaraṇasappāyā.
atk-s0503a:857_0: Idāni yena nibbidādiāvahanena ayaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ca nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:857_3: Virāgāya nirodhāyāti tasseva virajjanatthāya ca nirujjhanatthāya ca.
atk-s0503a:857_8: Etesu hi ādito tīhi padehi vipassanā vuttā,
atk-s0503a:857_11: Samathavipassanā ādiṃ katvā nibbānapariyosāno ayaṃ sabbo uttarimanussadhammo dasakathāvatthulābhino sijjhatīti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:858_4: Ettha ca atriccho pāpiccho mahiccho appicchoti icchāvasena cattāro puggalā.
atk-s0503a:858_5: Tesu attanā yathāladdhena lābhena atitto uparūpari lābhaṃ icchanto atriccho nāma.
atk-s0503a:863_0: Lābhasakkārasilokanikāmayatāya asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyo pāpiccho. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:864_1: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa paccayappaṭisevanasaṅkhātena vā sāmantajappitena vā iriyāpathassa vā aṭhapanā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:865_0: Santaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyo paṭiggahaṇe amattaññū mahiccho. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:866_0: “Idhekacco saddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
atk-s0503a:866_1: sīlavā samāno ‘sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchatī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:867_0: Duttappiyatāya hissa vijātamātāpi cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0503a:870_0: Ete pana atricchatādayo dose ārakā parivajjetvā santaguṇanigūhanādhippāyo paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññū appiccho.
atk-s0503a:870_1: So attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya saddho samāno “saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati, sīlavā,
atk-s0503a:870_6: paññavā samāno “paññavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati.
atk-s0503a:871_0: Svāyaṃ paccayappiccho dhutaṅgappiccho pariyattiappiccho adhigamappicchoti catubbidho.
atk-s0503a:871_1: Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayadāyakaṃ deyyadhammaṃ attano thāmañca oloketvā sacepi hi deyyadhammo bahu hoti,
atk-s0503a:871_10: Evarūpo hi bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0503a:871_13: Dhutaṅgasamādānassa pana attani atthibhāvaṃ na jānāpetukāmo dhutaṅgappiccho.
atk-s0503a:871_14: Yo attano bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0503a:871_16: Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sabrahmacārīnampi attano sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0503a:871_20: tappaṭipakkhassa atricchādibhedassa icchācārassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā appicchakathā.
atk-s0503a:872_0: Santuṭṭhikathāti ettha santuṭṭhīti sakena attanā laddhena tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi.
atk-s0503a:872_1: Atha vā visamaṃ paccayicchaṃ pahāya samaṃ tuṭṭhi,
atk-s0503a:875_0: Sammā vā ñāyena bhagavatā anuññātavidhinā paccayehi tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi.
atk-s0503a:876_1: idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā,
atk-s0503a:876_6: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā,
atk-s0503a:876_8: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:876_10: Aparo paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ labhitvā “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:876_13: idaṃ appalābhīnaṃ vā hotū”ti tesaṃ datvā attanā saṅkārakūṭādito nantakāni uccinitvā saṅghāṭiṃ katvā tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:876_14: vā purāṇacīvarāni gahetvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:877_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0503a:877_6: lūkhaṃ pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā gāḷhaṃ rogātaṅkaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0503a:877_7: so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:877_10: so “ayaṃ piṇḍapāto cirapabbajitādīnaṃ anurūpo”ti cīvaraṃ viya tesaṃ datvā,
atk-s0503a:878_0: Idha pana bhikkhuno senāsanaṃ pāpuṇāti manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā antamaso tiṇakuṭikāpi tiṇasanthārakampi,
atk-s0503a:878_5: Atha pana ābādhiko hoti dubbalo vā,
atk-s0503a:878_6: so byādhiviruddhaṃ vā pakativiruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0503a:878_8: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:878_10: Aparo sundaraṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati “paṇītasenāsanaṃ pamādaṭṭhāna”nti,
atk-s0503a:878_12: so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitādīnaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:879_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0503a:879_5: Atha pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati,
atk-s0503a:879_8: bhesajjaṃ katvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:879_11: so taṃ cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitādīnaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0503a:879_14: yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0503a:879_17: tattha te yāvajīvaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo”ti vacanamanussaranto catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:880_0: So evaṃpabhedo sabbopi santoso santuṭṭhīti pavuccati.
atk-s0503a:880_3: tappaṭipakkhassa atricchatādibhedassa icchāpakatattassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā santuṭṭhikathā.
atk-s0503a:881_0: Pavivekakathāti ettha kāyaviveko cittaviveko upadhivivekoti tayo vivekā.
atk-s0503a:881_10: eko viharatīti evaṃ sabbiriyāpathesu sabbakiccesu gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivittavāso kāyaviveko nāma.
atk-s0503a:884_0: Asaṃsaggakathāti ettha savanasaṃsaggo dassanasaṃsaggo samullapanasaṃsaggo sambhogasaṃsaggo kāyasaṃsaggoti pañca saṃsaggā.
atk-s0503a:884_1: Tesu idhekacco bhikkhu suṇāti “asukasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā itthī abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā”ti,
atk-s0503a:884_7: apica kho sāmaṃ passati itthiṃ abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ,
atk-s0503a:884_12: Disvā pana aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena uppanno kilesasanthavo samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0503a:884_14: Attano pana santakaṃ yaṃkiñci mātugāmassa datvā vā adatvā vā tena dinnassa vanabhaṅgiyādino paribhogavasena
atk-s0503a:885_0: “Gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikena saṃsaggena sahasokī sahanandī sukhitesu sukhito,
atk-s0503a:886_2: taṃ sabbaṃ pahāya yvāyaṃ saṃsāre thirataraṃ saṃvegaṃ,
atk-s0503a:886_6: sabbakiriyāsu satisampajaññanti sabbaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā kamaladale jalabindu viya sabbattha alaggabhāvo,
atk-s0503a:887_3: vīriyañca taṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya ārambhanaṃ vīriyārambho.
atk-s0503a:887_9: So sabbopi yo bhikkhu gamane uppannaṃ kilesaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti;
atk-s0503a:887_11: nisajjāya uppannaṃ sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
atk-s0503a:887_12: tattha tattheva ajapadena daṇḍena kaṇhasappaṃ uppīḷetvā gaṇhanto viya,
atk-s0503a:887_13: tikhiṇena asinā amittaṃ gīvāya paharanto viya ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā vīriyabalena niggaṇhāti,
atk-s0503a:888_3: Tathā vipassanāya pādakabhūtā saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo lokiyo samādhi,
atk-s0503a:888_5: Tathā paññāpi lokiyā sutamayā cintāmayā jhānasampayuttā vipassanāñāṇañca.
atk-s0503a:888_9: Apare pana tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedavimuttīnampi vasenettha atthaṃ vaṇṇenti.
atk-s0503a:888_11: Iti imesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā anekākāravokāraānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena ceva tappaṭipakkhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:889_1: appicchakathañca paresaṃ kattā”ti “santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena,
atk-s0503a:889_2: itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī”ti ca ādivacanato sayañca appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatena paresampi
atk-s0503a:889_4: yā idha abhisallekhikādibhāvena visesetvā vuttā appicchakathādīti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:890_3: sabbakālaṃ imā kathā sotuṃ vicāretuñca yathāsukhaṃ labhanto.
atk-s0503a:891_1: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāyāti akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pajahanatthāya.
atk-s0503a:891_2: Kusalānaṃ dhammānanti kucchitānaṃ salanādiatthena anavajjaṭṭhena ca kusalānaṃ sahavipassanānaṃ maggaphaladhammānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:892_1: Udayatthagāminiyāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhantiyā.
atk-s0503a:892_2: Ariyāyāti vikkhambhanavasena kilesehi ārakā dūre ṭhitāya niddosāya.
atk-s0503a:892_4: Sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyāti vaṭṭadukkhassa khepanato “dukkhakkhayo”ti laddhanāmaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sammā hetunā ñāyena gacchantiyā.
atk-s0503a:893_0: Imesu ca pana pañcasu dhammesu sīlaṃ vīriyaṃ paññā ca yogino ajjhattikaṃ aṅgaṃ,
atk-s0503a:893_9: “sīlavā bhavissatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ kalyāṇamittassa bhikkhuno sīlavantatāya bhavanaṃ sīlasampannattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:893_10: tassa bhikkhuno sīlasampannattā etaṃ tassa pāṭikaṅkhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:893_11: avassaṃbhāvī ekaṃseneva tassa tattha niyojanatoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:894_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sadevake loke uttamakalyāṇamittasaṅkhātassa attano vacanaṃ anādiyitvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0503a:894_1: tādisaṃ vippakāraṃ pattassa āyasmato meghiyassa kalyāṇamittatādinā sakalaṃ sāsanasampattiṃ dassetvā,
atk-s0503a:894_2: idānissa tattha ādarajātassa pubbe yehi kāmavitakkādīhi upaddutattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajji,
atk-s0503a:894_3: tassa tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtattā ca bhāvanānayaṃ pakāsetvā,
atk-s0503a:894_6: bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:894_10: tesaṃ visodhanatthaṃ tato uddhaṃ cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā uppādetabbā vaḍḍhetabbā ca.
atk-s0503a:895_0: Asubhāti ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu yathārahaṃ yattha katthaci asubhabhāvanā.
atk-s0503a:895_3: eko hi puriso asitaṃ gahetvā koṭito paṭṭhāya sālikhette sāliyo lāyati,
atk-s0503a:895_16: vatiṃ bhinditvā gāvīnaṃ pavisanaṃ viya sahasā appaṭisaṅkhāya pamādaṃ āgamma rāgassa uppajjanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:895_21: puna ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya sālilāyanaṃ viya asubhakammaṭṭhānena rāgaṃ vikkhambhetvā,
atk-s0503a:895_23: Evaṃbhūtaṃ bhāvanāvidhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:896_4: Asmimānasamugghātāyāti asmīti uppajjanakassa navavidhassa mānassa samucchedanatthāya.
atk-s0503a:896_5: Aniccasaññinoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato pabhaṅguto tāvakālikato niccappaṭipakkhato ca “sabbe
atk-s0503a:896_7: Anattasaññā saṇṭhātīti asārakato avasavattanato parato rittato tucchato suññato ca “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti
atk-s0503a:896_8: evaṃ pavattā anattānupassanāsaṅkhātā anattasaññā citte saṇṭhahati,
atk-s0503a:896_10: Aniccalakkhaṇe hi diṭṭhe anattalakkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0503a:896_11: Tīsu hi lakkhaṇesu ekasmiṃ diṭṭhe itaradvayaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0503a:896_15: Anattalakkhaṇe diṭṭhe asmīti uppajjanakamāno suppajahova hotīti āha –
atk-s0503a:896_16: “anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānanti diṭṭheyeva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve apaccayaparinibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0503a:896_18: vitthārato pana asubhādibhāvanānayo visuddhimagge vuttanayena gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:897_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato meghiyassa micchāvitakkacorehi kusalabhaṇḍupacchedasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:897_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ avinodane vinodane ca ādīnavānisaṃsadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:898_2: Te hi sabbavitakkehi patikiṭṭhatāya idha khuddāti vuttā “na ca khuddamācare”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0503a:898_4: Ñātivitakko janapadavitakko amarāvitakko parānuddayatāya paṭisaṃyutto vitakko lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0503a:898_5: vitakko anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakkoti ete hi vitakkā kāmavitakkādayo viya dāruṇā na hontīti anoḷārikasabhāvatāya
atk-s0503a:898_8: Vitakke hi uppajjamāne cittaṃ tadanugatameva hoti tassa ārammaṇābhiniropanato.
atk-s0503a:899_0: Ete avidvā manaso vitakketi ete kāmavitakkādike manovitakke assādādīnavanissaraṇato ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi yathābhūtaṃ ajānanto.
atk-s0503a:899_1: Hurā huraṃ dhāvati bhantacittoti appahīnamicchāvitakkattā anavaṭṭhitacitto “kadāci rūpe,
atk-s0503a:899_2: kadāci sadde”tiādinā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe assādādivasena aparāparaṃ dhāvati paribbhamati.
atk-s0503a:899_3: Atha vā hurā huraṃ dhāvati bhantacittoti apariññātavitakkattā tannimittānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ vasena paribbhamanamānaso
atk-s0503a:899_4: idhalokato paralokaṃ ādānanikkhepehi aparāparaṃ dhāvati saṃsaratīti attho.
atk-s0503a:900_0: Ete ca vidvā manaso vitakketi ete yathāvuttappabhede kāmavitakkādike manovitakke assādādito yathābhūtaṃ jānanto.
atk-s0503a:900_6: ete vuttappakāre kāmavitakkādike manovitakke cittassa uppilāvitahetutāya manaso uppilāve vidvā vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya sammadeva jānanto,
atk-s0503a:900_7: tassa sahāyabhūtānaṃ sammāvāyāmasatīnaṃ atthitāya ātāpiyo satimā te ariyamaggabhāvanāya āyatiṃ uppattirahe
atk-s0503a:900_11: evaṃbhūto ca catusaccappabodhena buddho ariyasāvako arahattādhigamena asesaṃ,
atk-s0503a:903_1: Dutiye kusinārāyanti kusinārāyaṃ nāma mallarājūnaṃ nagare.
atk-s0503a:903_2: Upavattane mallānaṃ sālavaneti yathā hi anurādhapurassa thūpārāmo,
atk-s0503a:903_4: Yathā thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagarapavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivattati,
atk-s0503a:903_5: evaṃ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā uttarena nivattā,
atk-s0503a:903_8: Araññakuṭikāyanti sālapantiyā avidūre rukkhagacchasañchannaṭṭhāne katā kuṭikā,
atk-s0503a:903_10: Te pana bhikkhū paṭisaṅkhānavirahitā ossaṭṭhavīriyā pamattavihārino,
atk-s0503a:904_6: Tiracchānakathābahulatāya vikiṇṇā byākulā vācā etesanti vikiṇṇavācā.
atk-s0503a:904_10: Gaddūhanamattampi kālaṃ cittasamādhānassa abhāvato na samāhitāti asamāhitā.
atk-s0503a:905_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddhaccādivasena pamādavihāraṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:905_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ pamādavihāre appamādavihāre ca yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:906_1: Kāyenāti chaviññāṇakāyena cakkhuviññāṇena hi rūpaṃ disvā tattha nimittānubyañjanaggahaṇavasena abhijjhādipavattito
atk-s0503a:906_10: Thinamiddhābhibhūtenāti cittassa akalyatālakkhaṇena thinena kāyassa akalyatālakkhaṇena middhena ca ajjhotthaṭena,
atk-s0503a:906_12: Vasaṃ mārassa gacchatīti kilesamārādikassa sabbassapi mārassa vasaṃ yathākāmakaraṇīyataṃ upagacchati,
atk-s0503a:907_0: Imāya hi gāthāya bhagavā ye satiārakkhābhāvena sabbaso arakkhitacittā,
atk-s0503a:907_1: yonisomanasikārassa hetubhūtāya paññāya abhāvato ayoniso ummujjanena niccantiādinā vipariyesagāhino,
atk-s0503a:907_2: tato eva kusalakiriyāya vīriyārambhābhāvato kosajjābhibhūtā saṃsāravaṭṭato sīsaṃ na ukkhipissantīti tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:907_3: bhikkhūnaṃ pamādavihāragarahāmukhena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:908_0: Tattha tasmā rakkhitacittassāti yasmā arakkhitacitto mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyo hutvā saṃsāreyeva hoti,
atk-s0503a:908_1: tasmā satisaṃvarena manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ rakkhaṇena pidahanena rakkhitacitto assa.
atk-s0503a:908_2: Citte hi rakkhite cakkhādiindriyāni rakkhitāneva hontīti.
atk-s0503a:908_3: Sammāsaṅkappagocaroti yasmā micchāsaṅkappagocaro tathā tathā ayoniso vitakketvā nānāvidhāni micchādassanāni
atk-s0503a:908_4: gaṇhanto micchādiṭṭhihatena cittena mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyo hoti,
atk-s0503a:908_5: tasmā yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto nekkhammasaṅkappādisammāsaṅkappagocaro assa,
atk-s0503a:908_6: jhānādisampayuttaṃ sammāsaṅkappameva attano cittassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0503a:908_8: tato yathābhūtañāṇalakkhaṇañca sammādiṭṭhiṃ purato katvā pubbe vuttanayeneva sīlasamādhīsu yutto payutto
atk-s0503a:908_9: vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā saṅkhāre sammasanto ñatvāna udayabbayaṃ pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu samapaññāsāya
atk-s0503a:908_10: ākārehi uppādanirodhaṃ vavatthapetvā udayabbayañāṇamadhigantvā tato paraṃ bhaṅgānupassanādivasena vipassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:908_13: evaṃ so heṭṭhimamaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭhamameva pahīnattā diṭṭhivippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppādesu
atk-s0503a:908_14: uppajjanakathinamiddhānaṃ adhigatena arahattamaggena samucchindanato tadekaṭṭhānaṃ mānādīnampi pahīnattā
atk-s0503a:908_15: sabbaso bhinnakileso khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tividhadukkhatāyogena duggatisaṅkhātā sabbāpi gatiyo ucchinnabhavamūlattā jahe,
atk-s0503a:911_1: Tatiye kosalesūti kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0503a:911_10: Aññataraṃ rukkhamūlanti ghanapattasākhāviṭapasampannassa sandacchāyassa mahato rukkhassa samīpasaṅkhātaṃ mūlaṃ.
atk-s0503a:912_4: evaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa goyūthaṃ rakkhanto gopālakattena rājapīḷaṃ apaharanto attano kuṭumbaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0503a:912_5: So kālena kālaṃ pañca gorase gahetvā,
atk-s0503a:912_6: mahāseṭṭhissa santikaṃ āgantvā niyyātetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0503a:912_11: aparabhāge mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto janapadacārikaṃ caranto,
atk-s0503a:912_12: “idānissa ñāṇaṃ paripakka”nti ñatvā tassa vasanaṭṭhānassa avidūre maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi tassa āgamanaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-s0503a:912_13: Nandopi kho “satthā kira janapadacārikaṃ caranto ito āgacchatī”ti sutvā,
atk-s0503a:912_15: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro ekamantaṃ nisīdi,
atk-s0503a:912_17: So sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ pāyāsadānamadāsi,
atk-s0503a:912_18: sattame divase bhagavā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:912_20: “ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ gopālakaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi…pe…
atk-s0503a:913_1: ime dhammā akusalā”tiādinā kusalādidhamme kammavipāke idhalokaparaloke paccakkhato dassento anupubbikathāvasāne cattāri ariyasaccāni sammā dassesi.
atk-s0503a:913_2: Samādapesīti “saccādhigamāya ime nāma dhammā attani uppādetabbā”ti sīlādidhamme sammā gaṇhāpetvā tesu taṃ patiṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:913_3: Samuttejesīti te dhammā samādinnā anukkamena bhāviyamānā nibbedhabhāgiyā hutvā tikkhavisadā yathā khippaṃ ariyamaggaṃ āvahanti,
atk-s0503a:913_5: Sampahaṃsesīti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesabhāvadassanena cittassa pamodāpanavasena suṭṭhu pahaṃsesi.
atk-s0503a:913_6: Apicettha sāvajjānavajjadhammesu dukkhādīsu ca sammohavinodanena sandassanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:913_10: Evaṃ so bhagavato sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0503a:913_12: bhante bhagavā”tiādinā nimantito kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ acopento citteneva adhivāsesi sādiyi.
atk-s0503a:914_2: Navañca sappinti navanītaṃ gahetvā tāvadeva vilīnaṃ maṇḍasappiñca paṭiyādāpetvā.
atk-s0503a:914_10: Nīcanti anuccaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā āsaneyeva nisīdanaṃ ariyadesavāsīnaṃ cārittaṃ,
atk-s0503a:914_11: so pana satthu santike upacāravasena paññattassa dāruphalakāsanassa samīpe nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:914_12: Dhammiyā kathāyātiādi sattame divase kataṃ anumodanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:914_13: So kira sattāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca tattha vasāpetvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0503a:914_15: Satthā tassa tasmiṃ attabhāve uparimaggatthāya ñāṇaparipākābhāvato anumodanameva katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:915_2: Gāmavāsino kira ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya tena saddhiṃ kalahaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:915_3: So te abhibhavitvā taṃ taḷākaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:915_4: Tena baddhāghāto eko puriso taṃ satthu pattaṃ gahetvā dūraṃ anugantvā “nivattāhi upāsakā”ti vutte bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:915_5: vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca añjaliṃ katvā yāva dassanūpacārasamatikkamā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ
atk-s0503a:915_6: añjaliṃ sirasi paggayha paṭinivattitvā dvinnaṃ gāmānaṃ antare araññappadese ekakaṃ gacchantaṃ sarena
atk-s0503a:915_10: Kenacideva karaṇīyena ohīyitvā pacchā gacchantā bhikkhū taṃ tathā mataṃ disvā bhagavato tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:915_11: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:916_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yasmā diṭṭhisampannaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ nandaṃ mārentena purisena ānantariyakammaṃ bahulaṃ apuññaṃ pasutaṃ,
atk-s0503a:916_1: tasmā yaṃ corehi ca verīhi ca kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:916_2: tatopi ghorataraṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ karotīti imamatthaṃ jānitvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:917_0: Tattha diso disanti dūsako dūsanīyaṃ coro coraṃ,
atk-s0503a:917_2: Yaṃ taṃ kayirāti yaṃ tassa anayabyasanaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0503a:917_5: eko ekassa mittadubbhī coro puttadārakhettavatthugomahiṃsādīsu aparajjhanto yassa aparajjhati,
atk-s0503a:917_6: tampi tatheva attani aparajjhantaṃ coraṃ disvā,
atk-s0503a:917_7: verī vā pana kenacideva kāraṇena baddhaveraṃ veriṃ disvā attano kakkhaḷatāya dāruṇatāya yaṃ tassa anayabyasanaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0503a:917_11: dasasu akusalakammapathesu micchāṭhapitattā micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ pāpiyo naṃ tato kare,
atk-s0503a:917_13: Vuttappakāro hi diso vā verī vā disassa vā verino vā imasmiṃyeva attabhāve dukkhaṃ vā uppādeyya,
atk-s0503a:917_15: Idaṃ pana akusalakammapathesu micchāṭhapitaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme anayabyasanaṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0503a:917_16: attabhāvasatasahassesupi catūsu apāyesu khipitvā sīsamassa ukkhipituṃ na detīti.
atk-s0503a:920_2: Tasmiṃ kira pabbatakandare pubbe bahū kapotā vasiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:920_10: Abbhokāseti yattha uparicchadanaṃ parikkhepo vā natthi,
atk-s0503a:921_2: Ubhopi pana te mahātherā udiccabrāhmaṇajaccā kappānaṃ satasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ abhinīhārasampannā
atk-s0503a:921_3: chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidāppattā mahākhīṇāsavā samāpattilābhino sattasaṭṭhiyā sāvakapāramiñāṇānaṃ matthakappattā
atk-s0503a:921_4: etaṃ kapotakandaravihāraṃ upasobhayantā ekaṃ kanakaguhaṃ paviṭṭhā dve sīhā viya,
atk-s0503a:921_5: ekaṃ vijambhanabhūmiṃ otiṇṇā dve byagghā viya,
atk-s0503a:921_6: ekaṃ supupphitasālavanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve chaddantanāgarājāno viya,
atk-s0503a:921_7: ekaṃ simbalivanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve supaṇṇarājāno viya,
atk-s0503a:921_8: ekaṃ naravāhanayānaṃ abhiruḷhā dve vessavaṇā viya,
atk-s0503a:921_9: ekaṃ paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ abhinisinnā dve sakkā viya,
atk-s0503a:921_11: ekasmiṃ gaganaṭṭhāne ṭhitāni dve candamaṇḍalāni viya,
atk-s0503a:922_3: Imā eva hi tisso kāyarakkhaṇasamatthā samāpattiyo.
atk-s0503a:922_6: Uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchantīti uttarāya disāya yakkhasamāgamaṃ gantvā attano bhavanaṃ gantuṃ dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0503a:922_9: imassa sīse pahāraṃ dātuṃ cittaṃ me uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:922_11: tenassa theraṃ disvā paduṭṭhacittassa evaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0503a:923_2: Yasmā pana tassa vacanaṃ aggaṇhanto taṃ anādiyanto nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:923_5: Sīse pahāraṃ adāsīti sabbathāmena ussāhaṃ janetvā ākāse ṭhitova sīse khaṭakaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0503a:923_7: Tāva mahāti thāmamahattena tattakaṃ mahanto pahāro ahosi.
atk-s0503a:924_1: so vedanāturo ākāse ṭhātuṃ asakkonto bhūmiyaṃ pati,
atk-s0503a:924_3: mahāpathavī taṃ pāpasattaṃ dhāretuṃ asakkontī viya vivaramadāsi.
atk-s0503a:924_4: Avīcito jālā uṭṭhahitvā kandantaṃyeva taṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:924_7: “atha ca pana so yakkho ‘ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī’ti vatvā tattheva mahānirayaṃ apatāsīti.
atk-s0503a:925_0: Kiṃ pana so yakkhattabhāveneva nirayaṃ upagacchīti?
atk-s0503a:925_3: tassa balena yakkhattabhāve mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0503a:925_6: Therassa pana samāpattibalena upatthambhitasarīrassa na koci vikāro ahosi.
atk-s0503a:925_7: Samāpattito avuṭṭhitakāle hi taṃ yakkho pahari,
atk-s0503a:925_8: tathā paharantaṃ dibbacakkhunā disvā āyasmā mahāmoggallāno dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkami,
atk-s0503a:925_14: api ca me sīsaṃ thokaṃ dukkha”nti.
atk-s0503a:926_0: Tattha thokaṃ dukkhanti thokaṃ appamattakaṃ madhurakajātaṃ viya me sīsaṃ dukkhitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:926_4: Kathaṃ pana samāpattibalena sarīre upatthambhite therassa sīse thokampi dukkhaṃ ahosīti?
atk-s0503a:926_6: Antosamāpattiyaṃ apaññāyamānadukkhañhi kāyanissitattā niddaṃ upagatassa makasādijanitaṃ viya paṭibuddhassa thokaṃ paññāyittha.
atk-s0503a:927_0: “Mahābalena yakkhena tathā sabbussāhena pahaṭe sarīrepi vikāro nāma natthī”ti acchariyabbhutacittajātena āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena “acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:927_1: āvuso sāriputtā”tiādinā dhammasenāpatino mahānubhāvatāya vibhāvitāya sopissa ‘acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:927_2: āvuso moggallānā”tiādinā iddhānubhāvamahantatāpakāsanāpadesena attano issāmacchariyāhaṅkārādimalānaṃ suppahīnataṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0503a:927_3: Paṃsupisācakampi na passāmāti saṅkārakūṭādīsu vicaraṇakakhuddakapetampi na passāma.
atk-s0503a:927_4: Iti adhigamappicchānaṃ aggabhūto mahāthero tasmiṃ kāle anāvajjanena tesaṃ adassanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0503a:928_0: Bhagavā pana veḷuvane ṭhito ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ dibbasotena assosi.
atk-s0503a:929_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa samāpattibalūpagataṃ iddhānubhāvamahantataṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:929_1: Imaṃ udānanti tasseva tādibhāvappattidīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:930_1: ṭhitaṃ nānupakampatīti yassa khīṇāsavassa cittaṃ ekagghanasilāmayapabbatūpamaṃ sabbesaṃ iñjanānaṃ abhāvato
atk-s0503a:930_2: vasībhāvappattiyāva ṭhitaṃ sabbehipi lokadhammehi nānupakampati na pavedhati.
atk-s0503a:930_3: Idānissa akampanākāraṃ saddhiṃ kāraṇena dassetuṃ “viratta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:930_4: Tattha virattaṃ rajanīyesūti virāgasaṅkhātena ariyamaggena rajanīyesu rāguppattihetubhūtesu sabbesu tebhūmakadhammesu virattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:930_6: Kopaneyyeti paṭighaṭṭhānīye sabbasmimpi āghātavatthusmiṃ na kuppati na dussati na vikāraṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0503a:930_7: Yassevaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittanti yassa yathāvuttassa ariyapuggalassa cittaṃ evaṃ vuttanayena tādibhāvāvahanabhāvena bhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:930_8: Kuto taṃ dukkhamessatīti taṃ uttamapuggalaṃ kuto sattato saṅkhārato vā dukkhaṃ upagamissati,
atk-s0503a:933_1: Pañcame kosambiyanti kusumbena nāma isinā vasitaṭṭhāne māpitattā “kosambī”ti evaṃladdhanāmake nagare.
atk-s0503a:933_3: Bhagavā ākiṇṇo viharatīti bhagavā sambādhappatto viharati.
atk-s0503a:933_6: Na hi koci bhagavantaṃ anicchāya upasaṅkamituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0503a:933_7: Durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto sabbattha ca anupalittattā.
atk-s0503a:933_8: Hitesitāya pana sattesu anukampaṃ upādāya “mutto mocessāmī”ti paṭiññānurūpaṃ caturoghanittharaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:933_9: aṭṭhannaṃ parisānaṃ attano santikaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ adhivāseti,
atk-s0503a:933_10: sayañca mahākaruṇāsamussāhito kālaññū hutvā tattha upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0503a:934_0: Idha pana kosambikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalahajātānaṃ satthā dīghītissa kosalarañño vatthuṃ āharitvā,
atk-s0503a:934_3: taṃ divasaṃ tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā.
atk-s0503a:934_5: taṃ divasampi tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā.
atk-s0503a:934_11: mayametena bhaṇḍanena kalahena viggahena vivādena paññāyissāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:934_12: Satthā “pariyādinnacittā kho ime moghapurisā na dānime sakkā saññāpetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:934_15: evaṃ ime bhikkhū kalahato oramissantī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0503a:934_16: Evaṃ tehi kalahakārakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekavihāre vāsaṃ vinetabbābhāvato upāsakādīhi upasaṅkamanañca ākiṇṇavihāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:934_17: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā ākiṇṇo viharatī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:935_4: Tathā cintetvāva bhagavā pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kañci anāmantetvā
atk-s0503a:935_5: eko adutiyo gantvā kosalaraṭṭhe pālileyyake vanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:935_11: Pattacīvaramādāyāti etthāpi sāmanti padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:935_13: vihāre ca aggupaṭṭhākaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ anāmantetvā.
atk-s0503a:936_0: Evaṃ gate satthari pañcasatā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsu –
atk-s0503a:936_4: yadā bhagavā sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke ca anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ adutiyo gacchati,
atk-s0503a:936_7: tasmā na imesu divasesu bhagavā anugantabbo”ti nivāresi,
atk-s0503a:937_1: gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā cārikaṃ caramāno “ekacāravāsaṃ tāva vasamānaṃ bhikkhuṃ passissāmī”ti bālakaloṇakāragāmaṃ
atk-s0503a:937_2: gantvā tattha bhaguttherassa sakalaṃ pacchābhattañceva tiyāmañca rattiṃ ekacāravāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0503a:937_3: punadivase tena pacchāsamaṇena piṇḍāya caritvā taṃ tattheva nivattetvā “samaggavāsaṃ vasamāne tayo kulaputte
atk-s0503a:937_4: passissāmī”ti pācīnavaṃsamigadāyaṃ gantvā tesampi sakalarattiṃ samaggavāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā tepi tattheva
atk-s0503a:937_6: Pālileyyagāmavāsino paccuggantvā bhagavato dānaṃ datvā pālileyyagāmassa avidūre rakkhitavanasaṇḍo nāma atthi,
atk-s0503a:937_7: tattha bhagavato paṇṇasālaṃ katvā “ettha bhagavā vasatū”ti yācitvā vāsayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:937_8: Bhaddasāloti pana tattheko manāpo bhaddako sālarukkho,
atk-s0503a:937_9: bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vanasaṇḍe paṇṇasālasamīpe tasmiṃ rukkhamūle vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:938_4: Chinnaggānīti purato purato gacchantehi tehi hatthiādīhi chinnaggāni khāditāvasesāni khāṇusadisāni khādati.
atk-s0503a:938_5: Obhaggobhagganti tena hatthināgena uccaṭṭhānato bhañjitvā bhañjitvā pātitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:938_6: Assa sākhābhaṅganti etassa santakaṃ sākhābhaṅgaṃ te khādanti.
atk-s0503a:938_7: Āvilānīti tehi paṭhamataraṃ otaritvā pivantehi āluḷitattā āvilāni kaddamamissāni pānīyāni pivati.
atk-s0503a:939_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti so kira hatthināgo yūthavāse ukkaṇṭhito taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paviṭṭho tattha bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:939_1: disvā ghaṭasahassena nibbāpitasantāpo viya nibbuto hutvā pasannacitto bhagavato santike aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0503a:939_2: tato paṭṭhāya vattasīse ṭhatvā bhaddasālassa paṇṇasālāya ca samantato appaharitakaṃ katvā sākhābhaṅgehi sammajjati,
atk-s0503a:939_6: araññato madhurāni phalāni āharitvā satthu upaneti,
atk-s0503a:939_9: “tatra sudaṃ so hatthināgo yasmiṃ padese bhagavā viharati,
atk-s0503a:939_12: Soṇḍāya dārūni āharitvā aññamaññaṃ ghaṃsitvā aggiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā dārūni jālāpetvā tattha pāsāṇakhaṇḍāni
atk-s0503a:939_13: tāpetvā tāni daṇḍakehi pavaṭṭetvā soṇḍiyaṃ khipitvā udakassa tattabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavato santikaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0503a:939_14: bhagavā “hatthināgo mama nhānaṃ icchatī”ti tattha gantvā nhānakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0503a:940_0: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassātiādi ubhinnaṃ mahānāgānaṃ vivekasukhapaccavekkhaṇadassanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:940_2: Attano ca pavivekaṃ viditvāti kehici anākiṇṇabhāvaladdhaṃ kāyavivekaṃ jānitvā,
atk-s0503a:940_3: itare pana vivekā bhagavato sabbakālaṃ vijjantiyeva.
atk-s0503a:941_0: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ attano hatthināgassa ca pavivekābhiratiyā samānajjhāsayabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:942_1: etaṃ īsādantassa rathaīsāsadisadantassa hatthināgassa cittaṃ nāgena buddhanāgassa cittena sameti saṃsandati.
atk-s0503a:942_3: Yadeko ramatī vane yasmā buddhanāgo “ahaṃ kho pubbe ākiṇṇo vihāsi”nti purimaṃ ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā
atk-s0503a:942_4: vivekaṃ upabrūhayamāno idāni yathā eko adutiyo vane araññe ramati abhiramati,
atk-s0503a:942_5: evaṃ ayampi hatthināgo pubbe attano hatthiādīhi ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā vivekaṃ upabrūhayamāno idāni eko asahāyo vane araññe ramati abhiramati.
atk-s0503a:942_6: Tasmāssa cittaṃ nāgena sameti tassa cittena sametīti katvā ekībhāvaratiyā ekasadisaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0503a:945_1: Chaṭṭhe piṇḍolabhāradvājoti piṇḍaṃ ulamāno pariyesamāno pabbajitoti piṇḍolo.
atk-s0503a:945_2: So kira parijiṇṇabhogo brāhmaṇo hutvā mahantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ disvā piṇḍatthāya nikkhamitvā pabbajito.
atk-s0503a:945_12: Taṃ gacchante gacchante kāle ghaṃsanena parikkhīṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:945_16: Thero aparena samayena indriyabhāvanaṃ bhāvento aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:945_17: Iti so pubbe savisesaṃ piṇḍatthāya ulatīti piṇḍolo,
atk-s0503a:945_18: gottena pana bhāradvājoti ubhayaṃ ekato katvā “piṇḍolabhāradvājo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:946_0: Āraññakoti gāmantasenāsanapaṭikkhipanena araññe nivāso assāti āraññako,
atk-s0503a:946_3: parehi dinnānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ patte nipatananti attho.
atk-s0503a:946_4: Piṇḍapātaṃ uñchati taṃ taṃ kulaṃ upasaṅkamanto gavesatīti piṇḍapātiko,
atk-s0503a:946_5: piṇḍāya vā patituṃ carituṃ vatametassāti piṇḍapātī,
atk-s0503a:946_7: Saṅkārakūṭādīsu paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena paṃsukūlaṃ viyāti paṃsukūlaṃ,
atk-s0503a:946_8: paṃsu viya vā kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlaṃ,
atk-s0503a:947_10: Tesu yo sayaṃ dhutadhamme samādāya vattati,
atk-s0503a:947_13: Yo pana sayaṃ na dhutadhamme samādāya vattati,
atk-s0503a:947_22: Ekadesasarūpekasesavasena hi ayaṃ niddeso yathā taṃ “nāmarūpa”nti.
atk-s0503a:948_0: Adhicittamanuyuttoti ettha aṭṭhasamāpattisampayogato arahattaphalasamāpattisampayogato vā cittassa adhicittabhāvo veditabbo,
atk-s0503a:948_6: bhikkhunā kālena kālaṃ tīṇi nimittāni manasi kātabbānīti etasmiṃ adhicittasutte viya samathavipassanācittaṃ adhicittanti idhādhippeta”nti vadanti,
atk-s0503a:949_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa adhiṭṭhānaparikkhārasampadāsampannaṃ adhicittānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:949_1: Evaṃ “adhicittānuyogo mama sāsanānuṭṭhāna”nti dīpento imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:950_2: Pātimokkheti ettha pātimokkhapadassa attho heṭṭhā nānappakārehi vutto,
atk-s0503a:950_7: Adhicitte ca āyogoti aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ adhigamāya bhāvanānuyogo.
atk-s0503a:951_3: Anūpaghātoti kāyena kassaci upaghātassa paraviheṭhanassa akaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:951_5: Yādisaṃ panidaṃ ubhayaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanantogadhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:951_9: Pātimokkhe ca saṃvaroti pātimokkhasaṃvarabhūto anūpavādo anūpaghāto cāti attho.
atk-s0503a:952_4: Upasampadavelāyañhi avisesena pātimokkhasīlaṃ samādinnaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:952_5: tasmiṃ pātimokkhe ṭhitassa tato paraṃ upavādūpaghātānaṃ akaraṇavasena saṃvaro,
atk-s0503a:953_0: Atha vā pātimokkheti nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ yathā “cetaso avūpasamo ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0503a:954_0: Mattaññutā ca bhattasminti pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogavissajjanānaṃ vasena bhojane pamāṇaññutā.
atk-s0503a:954_2: Adhicitte ca āyogoti sabbacittānaṃ adhikattā uttamattā adhicittasaṅkhāte arahattaphalacitte sādhetabbe
atk-s0503a:954_4: Etaṃ buddhāna sāsananti etaṃ parassa anūpavadanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:954_9: yathāvuttaadhicittānuyogo ca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhīti attho.
atk-s0503a:954_10: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya tisso sikkhā kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:957_5: appamādena anavajjadhammesu sātaccakiriyāya samannāgatassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:957_7: muni tena pavuccatī”ti evaṃ ubhayalokamunanena monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:957_8: tena arahattaphalañāṇasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgatattā vā khīṇāsavo muni nāma,
atk-s0503a:957_10: Monapathesu sikkhatoti arahattañāṇasaṅkhātassa monassa pathesu sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammesu tīsu vā sikkhāsu sikkhato.
atk-s0503a:957_14: imāya sikkhāya munibhāvaṃ pattassa muninoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0503a:957_18: maggañāṇasamannāgamena muninoti evametesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ attho yujjatiyeva.
atk-s0503a:957_19: Atha vā “appamajjato sikkhato”ti padānaṃ hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā appamajjanahetu sikkhanahetu ca adhicetasoti.
atk-s0503a:958_0: Sokā na bhavanti tādinoti tādisassa khīṇāsavamunino abbhantare iṭṭhaviyogādivatthukā sokā cittasantāpā na honti.
atk-s0503a:958_1: Atha vā tādinoti tādilakkhaṇasamannāgatassa evarūpassa munino sokā na bhavantīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0503a:958_3: Sadā satīmatoti sativepullappattiyā niccakālaṃ satiyā avirahitassa.
atk-s0503a:959_5: “sokā na bhavantī”tiādīhi sikkhāpāripūriyā ānisaṃso pakāsitoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:962_1: Aṭṭhame sakkatotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vaṇṇitoyeva.
atk-s0503a:963_1: Sā kira tasmiṃ kāle sabbaparibbājikāsu abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā,
atk-s0503a:963_4: tasmā te sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ pāpakamme uyyojesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:963_5: Te hi aññatitthiyā buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya sayaṃ hatalābhasakkārā heṭṭhā akkosasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgatanayena
atk-s0503a:963_6: bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uḷāraṃ aparimitaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattamānaṃ disvā issāpakatā ekato hutvā
atk-s0503a:963_8: mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya naṭṭhā hatalābhasakkārā,
atk-s0503a:963_10: kiṃ nissāya nu kho loko samaṇe gotame abhippasanno uḷāraṃ sakkārasammānaṃ upanetīti?
atk-s0503a:963_14: añño “kāladevilaṃ vandāpetuṃ upanītassa pādā parivattitvā tassa jaṭāsu patiṭṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0503a:963_15: aparo “vappamaṅgalakāle jambucchāyāya sayāpitassa vītikkantepi majjhanhike jambucchāyā aparivattitvā ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0503a:963_17: aparo “jiṇṇāturamatapabbajitasaṅkhātanimitte disvā saṃvegajāto āgāminaṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito”ti.
atk-s0503a:963_18: Evaṃ aparimāṇakāle sambhataṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato puññañāṇasambhāraṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ nirupamaṃ
atk-s0503a:963_19: sallekhappaṭipadaṃ anuttarañca ñāṇapahānasampadādibuddhānubhāvaṃ ajānantā attanā yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ
atk-s0503a:963_20: dharamānaṃ taṃ taṃ bhagavato bahumānakāraṇaṃ kittetvā abahumānakāraṇaṃ pariyesitvā apassantā “kena nu
atk-s0503a:963_21: kho kāraṇena mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa ayasaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nāseyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:963_23: “ambho imasmiṃ sattaloke mātugāmasukhe asattasattā nāma natthi,
atk-s0503a:963_24: ayañca samaṇo gotamo abhirūpo devasamo taruṇo,
atk-s0503a:963_28: handa mayaṃ sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ tathā uyyojema,
atk-s0503a:963_29: yathā samaṇassa gotamassa ayaso pathaviyaṃ patthareyyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:964_0: Taṃ sutvā itare “idaṃ suṭṭhu tayā cintitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:964_1: evañhi kate samaṇo gotamo ayasakena upadduto sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ asakkonto yena vā tena vā palāyissatī”ti
atk-s0503a:964_2: sabbeva ekajjhāsayā hutvā tathā uyyojetuṃ sundariyā santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:964_3: Sā te disvā “kiṃ tumhe ekato āgatatthā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:964_4: Titthiyā anālapantā ārāmapariyante paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:964_5: Sā tattha gantvā punappunaṃ ālapantī paṭivacanaṃ alabhitvā kiṃ tumhākaṃ aparajjhaṃ?
atk-s0503a:964_7: Tathā hi pana tvaṃ amhe viheṭhiyamāne ajjhupekkhasīti.
atk-s0503a:964_10: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ amhe viheṭhetvā hatalābhasakkāre katvā vicaranta”nti vatvā “tattha mayā kiṃ kātabba”nti
atk-s0503a:964_11: vutte “tena hi tvaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanasamīpaṃ gantvā mahājanassa evañcevañca vadeyyāsī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:965_3: Yasmā te titthiyā tassā aññātakāpi samānā pabbajjasambandhamattena saṅgaṇhituṃ ñātakā viya hutvā “ussahasi
atk-s0503a:965_4: tvaṃ bhagini ñātīnaṃ atthaṃ kātu”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:965_5: Tasmā sāpi migaṃ valli viya pāde laggā jīvitampi me pariccattaṃ ñātīnaṃ atthāyāti āha.
atk-s0503a:966_0: Tena hīti “yasmā tvaṃ ‘jīvitampi me tumhākaṃ atthāya pariccatta’nti vadasi,
atk-s0503a:966_1: tvañca paṭhamavaye ṭhitā abhirūpā sobhaggappattā ca,
atk-s0503a:966_2: tasmā yathā taṃ nissāya samaṇassa gotamassa ayaso uppajjissati,
atk-s0503a:966_3: tathā kareyyāsī”ti vatvā “abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ gacchāhī”ti uyyojesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:966_4: Sāpi kho bālā kakacadantapantiyā pupphāvalikīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmā viya,
atk-s0503a:966_6: nalāṭena maccuṃ gaṇhantī viya titthiyānaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mālāgandhavilepanatambūlamukhavāsādīni
atk-s0503a:966_7: gahetvā mahājanassa satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nagaraṃ pavisanakāle jetavanābhimukhī gacchantī “kahaṃ
atk-s0503a:966_9: ahañhi tena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasāmī”ti vatvā aññatarasmiṃ titthiyārāme vasitvā pātova jetavanamaggaṃ
atk-s0503a:966_10: otaritvā nagarābhimukhī āgacchantī “kiṃ sundari kahaṃ gatāsī”ti ca puṭṭhā “samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ
atk-s0503a:966_11: ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā taṃ kilesaratiyā ramāpetvā āgatāmhī”ti vadati.
atk-s0503a:966_13: “evaṃ ayyāti kho sundarī paribbājikā tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ paṭissutvā abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:967_0: Titthiyā katipāhassa accayena dhuttānaṃ kahāpaṇe datvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0503a:967_1: sundariṃ māretvā samaṇassa gotamassa gandhakuṭiyā avidūre mālākacavarantare nikkhipitvā ethā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:967_3: Tato titthiyā “sundariṃ na passāmā”ti kolāhalaṃ katvā rañño ārocetvā “kattha pana tumhe parisaṅkathā”ti raññā vuttā imesu divasesu jetavane vasati,
atk-s0503a:967_6: naṃ tattha vicinathā”ti raññā anuññātā attano upaṭṭhāke gahetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā vicinantā viya hutvā
atk-s0503a:967_7: mālākacavaraṃ byūhitvā tassā sarīraṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā
atk-s0503a:967_8: ‘satthunā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ paṭicchādessāmā’ti sundariṃ māretvā mālākacavarantare nikkhipiṃsū”ti rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:967_11: Te nagaravīthīsu “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni vadantā vicaritvā puna rañño nivesanadvāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:967_12: Rājā sundariyā sarīraṃ āmakasusāne aṭṭakaṃ āropetvā rakkhāpesi.
atk-s0503a:967_13: Sāvatthivāsino ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake yebhuyyena “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni vatvā
atk-s0503a:967_14: antonagare bahinagare ca bhikkhū akkosantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:967_16: “yadā te aññiṃsu titthiyā paribbājakā ‘vodiṭṭhā kho sundarī”’tiādi.
atk-s0503a:968_2: jetavanaṃ āgacchantī ca gacchantī ca visesato diṭṭhā,
atk-s0503a:968_6: yā sā imasmiṃ nagare rūpasundaratāya “sundarī”ti pākaṭā abhiññātā paribbājikā.
atk-s0503a:968_7: Sā no na dissatīti sā amhākaṃ cakkhu viya jīvitaṃ viya ca piyāyitabbā,
atk-s0503a:968_9: Yathānikkhittanti purise āṇāpetvā mālākacavarantare attanā yathāṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:969_7: Musāvādinoti dussīlā samānā “sīlavanto maya”nti alikavāditāya musāvādino.
atk-s0503a:969_8: Abrahmacārinoti “methunappaṭisevitāya aseṭṭhacārino ime hi nāmā”ti hīḷentā vadanti.
atk-s0503a:970_0: Atha bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:970_3: tumhepi te manusse imāya gāthāya paṭicodethā”ti vatvā “abhūtavādī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0503a:970_9: saddo ciraṃ bhavissatīti idaṃ satthā tassa ayasassa nipphattiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitvā bhikkhū samassāsento āha.
atk-s0503a:971_0: Gāthāyaṃ abhūtavādīti parassa dosaṃ adisvāva musāvādaṃ katvā abhūtena atacchena paraṃ abbhācikkhanto.
atk-s0503a:971_1: Yo vāpi katvāti yo vā pana pāpakammaṃ katvā “nāhaṃ etaṃ karomī”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:971_2: Pecca samā bhavantīti te ubhopi janā ito paralokaṃ gantvā nirayūpagamanena gatiyā samā bhavanti.
atk-s0503a:971_5: Bahukañhi pāpaṃ katvā ciraṃ niraye paccati,
atk-s0503a:971_7: Yasmā pana nesaṃ ubhinnampi lāmakameva kammaṃ,
atk-s0503a:971_11: pecca parattha ito gantvā te nihīnakammā paraloke samā bhavantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:972_3: imehi samaṇehi sakyaputtiyehi addhā taṃ pāpakammaṃ na kataṃ,
atk-s0503a:972_5: yasmā ime amhesu evaṃ asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi abbhācikkhantesupi na kiñci vikāraṃ dassenti,
atk-s0503a:972_7: kevalaṃ pana “abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upetī”ti dhammaṃyeva vadantā sapantiyeva,
atk-s0503a:972_8: ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā amhe anupadhāretvā abbhācikkhante sapanti,
atk-s0503a:972_10: Atha vā “yo vāpi katvā ‘na karomi’ cāhā”ti vadantā sapanti,
atk-s0503a:972_11: attano akārakabhāvaṃ bodhetuṃ amhākaṃ sapathaṃ karonti imeti attho.
atk-s0503a:973_0: Tesañhi manussānaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitagāthāya savanasamanantarameva buddhānubhāvena sārajjaṃ okkami,
atk-s0503a:973_4: ete ca aññatitthiyā imesaṃ anatthakāmā ahitakāmā,
atk-s0503a:973_5: tasmā te saddhāya nayidaṃ amhehi vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:974_2: Atha te dhuttā tehi kahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivantā aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:974_4: “tvaṃ sundariṃ ekappahārena māretvā mālākacavarantare khipitvā tato laddhakahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivasi,
atk-s0503a:974_6: Rājapurisā taṃ sutvā te dhutte gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:974_7: Rājā “tumhehi sā māritā”ti te dhutte pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0503a:974_11: “ayaṃ sundarī tassa samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ āropetukāmehi amhehi mārāpitā,
atk-s0503a:974_14: amhākameva dosoti evaṃ vadantā nagaraṃ āhiṇḍathā”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0503a:974_19: Tato paṭṭhāya buddhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhiyyosomattāya sakkārasammāno mahā ahosi.
atk-s0503a:974_20: Bhikkhū acchariyabbhutacittajātā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā attamanā paṭivedesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:975_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā “titthiyānaṃ idaṃ kamma”nti bhikkhūnaṃ nārocesi?
atk-s0503a:975_3: tesaṃ taṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti nārocesi.
atk-s0503a:975_7: kammañca katokāsaṃ na sakkā nivattetunti abbhakkhānaṃ tannimittañca bhagavā ajjhupekkhanto nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:980_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti mammacchedanavasenāpi bālajanehi pavattitaṃ duruttavacanaṃ khantibalasamannāgatassa
atk-s0503a:980_1: dhīrassa duttitikkhā nāma natthīti imamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:980_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ adhivāsanakhantibalavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:981_1: sarehi saṅgāmagataṃva kuñjaranti kāyikasaṃvarādīsu kassacipi saṃvarassa abhāvena asaṃyatā avinītā bālajanā
atk-s0503a:981_2: sarehi sāyakehi saṅgāmagataṃ yuddhagataṃ kuñjaraṃva hatthināgaṃ paṭiyodhā viya vācāsattīhi tudanti vijjhanti,
atk-s0503a:981_5: adhivāsaye bhikkhu aduṭṭhacittoti taṃ pana tehi bālajanehi udīritaṃ bhāsitaṃ mammaghaṭṭanavasena pavattitaṃ
atk-s0503a:981_6: pharusaṃ vākyaṃ vacanaṃ abhūtaṃ bhūtato nibbeṭhento mama kakacūpamaovādaṃ anussaranto īsakampi aduṭṭhacitto
atk-s0503a:981_7: hutvā “saṃsārasabhāvo eso”ti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhaṇasīlo bhikkhu adhivāsaye,
atk-s0503a:982_2: yaṃ aparimāṇakālaṃ sakkaccaṃ upacitavipulapuññasambhāro satthā evaṃ dāruṇaṃ abhūtabbhakkhānaṃ pāpuṇīti? Vuccate –
atk-s0503a:982_3: ayaṃ so bhagavā bodhisattabhūto atītajātiyaṃ munāḷi nāma dhutto hutvā pāpajanasevī ayonisomanasikārabahulo vicarati.
atk-s0503a:982_4: So ekadivasaṃ surabhiṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ cīvaraṃ pārupantaṃ passi.
atk-s0503a:982_5: Tasmiñca samaye aññatarā itthī tassa avidūrena gacchati.
atk-s0503a:982_7: So tena kammena bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena idāni buddho
atk-s0503a:982_10: evaṃ ciñcamāṇavikādīnaṃ vikārakitthīnaṃ bhagavato abbhakkhānādīni dukkhāni pattāni,
atk-s0503a:987_0: “Suṇātha bhikkhavo mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
atk-s0503a:998_0: Taṃ abbhakkhāya niraye, ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ mayā.
atk-s0503a:1033_0: Pāde chaviṃ pakappesi, na hi kammaṃ vinassati.
atk-s0503a:1038_0: Sakkā ca sabbe haññiṃsu, yadā hani viṭaṭūbho.
atk-s0503a:1041_0: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
atk-s0503a:1052_0: Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
atk-s0503a:1063_1: Navame upasenassāti ettha upasenoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1063_2: vaṅgantabrāhmaṇassa pana puttattā “vaṅgantaputto”ti ca naṃ voharanti.
atk-s0503a:1064_1: sāsane pabbajitvā apaññatte sikkhāpade upasampadāya dvivasso upajjhāyo hutvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasampādetvā tena saddhiṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gato,
atk-s0503a:1064_2: tassa bhikkhuno bhagavatā tassa saddhivihārikabhāvaṃ pucchitvā khandhake āgatanayena “atilahuṃ kho tvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1064_5: yadidaṃ gaṇabandhiya”nti vigarahito patodābhitunno viya ājānīyo saṃviggamānaso “yadipāhaṃ idāni parisaṃ nissāya bhagavatā vigarahito,
atk-s0503a:1064_6: parisaṃyeva pana nissāya pāsaṃsiyo bhaveyya”nti ussāhajāto sabbe dhutadhamme samādāya vattamāno vipassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1064_7: ārabhitvā na cirasseva chaḷabhiñño paṭisambhidāppatto mahākhīṇāsavo hutvā attano nissitake dhutaṅgadhare
atk-s0503a:1064_8: eva katvā tehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā santhatasikkhāpade āgatanayena “pāsādikā kho tyāyaṃ,  upasena,
atk-s0503a:1064_11: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ samantapāsādikānaṃ yadidaṃ upaseno vaṅgantaputto”ti etadagge ṭhapito asītiyā mahāsāvakesu abbhantaro.
atk-s0503a:1065_0: So ekadivasaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto antevāsikesu attano attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gatesu udakakumbhato
atk-s0503a:1065_1: udakaṃ gahetvā pāde pakkhāletvā gattāni sītiṃ katvā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ attharitvā divāṭṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisinno
atk-s0503a:1065_3: Tassa te anekasatā anekasahassā poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1065_4: So “mayhaṃ tāva sāvakassa sato ime evarūpā guṇā,
atk-s0503a:1065_5: kīdisā nu kho mayhaṃ satthu guṇā”ti bhagavato guṇābhimukhaṃ manasikāraṃ pesesi.
atk-s0503a:1065_7: So “evaṃsīlo me satthā evaṃdhammo evaṃpañño evaṃvimuttī”tiādinā ca “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1065_11: Evaṃ mahāthero anekākāravokāraṃ ratanattayaguṇesu āvibhūtesu attamano pamudito uḷārapītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:1065_12: Tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “āyasmato upasenassa vaṅgantaputtassa rahogatassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1066_2: Evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādīti evaṃ idāni vuccamānākāro cittassa vitakko uppajji.
atk-s0503a:1066_5: Suladdhaṃ vata meti yañcidaṃ mayā bhagavato sāsane pabbajjūpasampadāratanattayapayirupāsanādi paṭiladdhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1066_6: taṃ me aho vata suṭṭhu laddhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1067_0: Tattha diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ satte anusāsatīti satthā.
atk-s0503a:1067_7: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0503a:1068_5: Sabrahmacārinoti seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmasaṅkhātaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ ariyamaggaṃ saha caranti paṭipajjantīti sabrahmacārino.
atk-s0503a:1068_7: Kalyāṇadhammāti samādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanādayo kalyāṇā sundarā dhammā etesaṃ atthīti kalyāṇadhammā.
atk-s0503a:1068_9: Sīlesu camhi paripūrakārīti “ahampi pabbajitvā na tiracchānakathākathiko kāyadaḷhibahulo hutvā vihāsiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1068_10: atha kho pātimokkhasaṃvarādiṃ catubbidhampi sīlaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ achiddaṃ asabalaṃ akammāsaṃ bhujissaṃ viññuppasatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1068_11: aparāmaṭṭhaṃ katvā paripūrento ariyamaggaṃyeva pāpesi”nti vadati.
atk-s0503a:1068_14: Susamāhito camhi ekaggacittoti upacārappanābhedena samādhinā sabbathāpi samāhito ca amhi avikkhittacitto.
atk-s0503a:1068_17: Arahā camhi khīṇāsavoti kāmāsavādīnaṃ sabbaso khīṇattā khīṇāsavo,
atk-s0503a:1068_18: tato eva parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya arahā camhi.
atk-s0503a:1068_20: Mahiddhiko camhi mahānubhāvoti adhiṭṭhānavikubbanādiiddhīsu mahatā vasībhāvena samannāgatattā mahiddhiko
atk-s0503a:1068_21: uḷārassa puññānubhāvassa guṇānubhāvassa ca sampattiyā mahānubhāvo ca asmi.
atk-s0503a:1068_23: Abhiññāsu vasībhāvena hi ariyā yathicchitanipphādanena mahiddhikā,
atk-s0503a:1068_24: pubbūpanissayasampattiyā nānāvihārasamāpattīhi ca visodhitasantānattā mahānubhāvā ca hontīti.
atk-s0503a:1069_0: Bhaddakaṃ me jīvitanti evaṃvidhasīlādiguṇasamannāgatassa me yāvāyaṃ kāyo dharati,
