atk-s0503a:1069_3: Bhaddakaṃ maraṇanti sace panidaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ ajja vā imasmiṃyeva vā khaṇe anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyati,
atk-s0503a:1069_4: taṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ parinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ maraṇampi me bhaddakanti ubhayattha tādibhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0503a:1069_5: Evaṃ mahāthero appahīnasomanassuppilāvitavāsanussannattā uḷārasomanassito dhammabahumānena dhammapītipaṭisaṃvedanena parivitakkesi.
atk-s0503a:1070_0: Taṃ satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitvā jīvite maraṇe ca tassa tādibhāvavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1071_0: Tattha yaṃ jīvitaṃ na tapatīti yaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ jīvitaṃ āyatiṃ khandhappavattiyā sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato na tapati na bādhati,
atk-s0503a:1071_1: vattamānameva vā jīvitaṃ sabbaso saṅkhatadhammattā satipaññāvepullappattiyā sabbattha satisampajaññasamāyogato na bādhati.
atk-s0503a:1071_2: Yo hi andhaputhujjano pāpajanasevī ayonisomanasikārabahulo akatakusalo akatapuñño,
atk-s0503a:1071_3: so “akataṃ vata me kalyāṇa”ntiādinā vippaṭisārena tapatīti tassa jīvitaṃ taṃ tapati nāma.
atk-s0503a:1071_4: Itare pana akatapāpā katapuññā kalyāṇaputhujjanena saddhiṃ satta sekhā tapanīyadhammaparivajjanena atapanīyadhammasamannāgamena
atk-s0503a:1071_5: ca pacchānutāpena na tapantīti na tesaṃ jīvitaṃ tapati.
atk-s0503a:1071_6: Khīṇāsave pana vattabbameva natthīti pavattidukkhavasena atthavaṇṇanā katā.
atk-s0503a:1072_0: Maraṇante na socatīti maraṇasaṅkhāte ante pariyosāne,
atk-s0503a:1072_1: maraṇasamīpe vā na socati anāgāmimaggeneva sokassa samugghātitattā.
atk-s0503a:1072_3: sokamajjhe na socatīti so anabhijjhādīnaṃ catunnaṃ dhammapadānaṃ nibbānasseva vā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhapado,
atk-s0503a:1072_4: dhitisampannattā dhīro khīṇāsavo socanadhammattā “sokā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ avītarāgānaṃ sattānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1072_5: sokahetūnaṃ vā lokadhammānaṃ majjhe ṭhatvāpi na socati.
atk-s0503a:1073_1: Tattha yassa aggamaggena sabbaso ucchinnā bhavataṇhā,
atk-s0503a:1076_1: Tasmā natthi tassa punabbhavoti yasmā tassa evarūpassa ariyapuggalassa āyatiṃ punabbhavo natthi,
atk-s0503a:1076_7: tato eva natthi tassa punabbhavoti attho yojetabbo.
atk-s0503a:1079_1: Dasame attano upasamanti sāvakapāramīmatthakappattiyā hetubhūtaṃ aggamaggena attano anavasesakilesavūpasamaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1080_2: nesaṃ vaṭṭamūlakadukkhaṃ parituletvā karuṇāyamāno attanāpi puthujjanakāle anubhūtaṃ kilesanimittaṃ vā
atk-s0503a:1080_3: anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ anussaritvā “īdisassa nāma mahādukkhassa hetubhūtā kilesā idāni me suppahīnā”ti attano
atk-s0503a:1080_5: Paccavekkhanto ca “ime ettakā kilesā sotāpattimaggena upasamitā,
atk-s0503a:1080_8: ettakā arahattamaggena upasamitā”ti taṃtaṃmaggañāṇehi odhiso kilesānaṃ upasamitabhāvaṃ paccavekkhati,
atk-s0503a:1081_0: Apare “thero arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā taṃ paccavekkhitvā ‘imassa vatāyaṃ santapaṇītabhāvo accantasantāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā ārammaṇato,
atk-s0503a:1081_1: sayañca sammadeva kilesavūpasamato’ti evaṃ abhiṇhaṃ upasamaṃ paccavekkhatī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1081_2: Aññe pana “anavasesakilesānaṃ upasamapariyosāne jātaṃ aggaphalamevettha upasamo nāma,
atk-s0503a:1082_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yadidaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa mahāpaññatādihetubhūtaṃ sāvakesu anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1082_2: tassa paccavekkhaṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadanubhāvadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1083_0: Tattha upasantasantacittassāti upasantameva hutvā santaṃ cittaṃ etassāti upasantasantacitto.
atk-s0503a:1083_1: Samāpattiyā vikkhambhanena hi upasantakilesattā upasantacittaṃ na sabbathā “upasantasanta”nti vuccati tassa upasamassa anaccantikabhāvato,
atk-s0503a:1083_3: Tena pana accantameva kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā arahato cittaṃ puna kilesānaṃ anupasametabbatāya samathavipassanāheṭṭhimamaggehi
atk-s0503a:1084_0: Atha vā satipi sabbesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ anavasesakilesavūpasame sāvakapāramīñāṇassa pana matthakappattihetubhūto
atk-s0503a:1084_1: sāvakesu anaññasādhāraṇo saviseso dhammasenāpatino kilesavūpasamoti dassetuṃ satthā upasantasaddena visesetvā
atk-s0503a:1085_2: tena upasantena upasantameva hutvā santaṃ upasantasantaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1085_7: mahāpañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño”tiādinā anekapariyāyena vaṇṇito thomito.
atk-s0503a:1085_8: Netticchinnassāti netti vuccati bhavataṇhā saṃsārassa nayanato,
atk-s0503a:1085_12: Mutto so mārabandhanāti so evaṃvidho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sabbasmā mārabandhanato mutto,
atk-s0503a:1090_1: Mahāvaggassa paṭhame mallikāya deviyā saddhinti mallikāya nāma attano mahesiyā saha.
atk-s0503a:1090_3: Kocañño attanā piyataroti koci añño attanā piyāyitabbataro.
atk-s0503a:1090_4: Atthi nu kho teti “kiṃ te atthī”ti deviṃ pucchati.
atk-s0503a:1091_2: Ekadivasaṃ āpaṇato pūvaṃ gahetvā mālārāmaṃ gantvā “khādissāmī”ti gacchantī paṭipathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ
atk-s0503a:1091_3: bhagavantaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā pasannacittā taṃ bhagavato adāsi.
atk-s0503a:1091_6: Bhagavā tattha nisīditvā taṃ pūvaṃ paribhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0503a:1091_10: ajjeva kosalarañño aggamahesī bhavissati piyā manāpā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1091_11: Taṃ divasameva ca rājā kāsigāme bhāgineyyena saddhiṃ yujjhitvā parājito palāyitvā āgato nagaraṃ pavisanto
atk-s0503a:1091_13: Sā rājānaṃ āgataṃ passitvā tassa vattamakāsi.
atk-s0503a:1091_14: Rājā tassā vatte pasīditvā pitaraṃ pakkosāpetvā mahantaṃ issariyaṃ datvā taṃ antepuraṃ paṭiharāpetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:1091_22: Iti so aññamaññaṃ vissāsajananatthaṃ sammodanīyaṃ karonto pucchi.
atk-s0503a:1092_0: Devī pana paṇḍitā buddhupaṭṭhāyikā saṅghupaṭṭhāyikā “nāyaṃ pañho rañño mukhaṃ ulloketvā kathetabbo”ti cintetvā yathābhūtameva vadantī “natthi kho me, mahārāja,
atk-s0503a:1092_2: Vatvāpi attanā byākatamatthaṃ upāyena rañño paccakkhaṃ kātukāmā “tuyhaṃ pana, mahārāja,
atk-s0503a:1092_3: atthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti tatheva rājānaṃ pucchi yathā raññā sayaṃ puṭṭhā.
atk-s0503a:1092_4: Rājāpi tāya sarasalakkhaṇena kathitattā nivattituṃ asakkonto sayampi sarasalakkhaṇeneva kathento tatheva byākāsi yathā deviyā byākataṃ.
atk-s0503a:1093_1: “ahaṃ rājā pathavissaro mahantaṃ pathavimaṇḍalaṃ abhivijiya ajjhāvasāmi,
atk-s0503a:1093_2: mayhaṃ tāva yuttaṃ ‘attanā piyataraṃ aññaṃ na passāmī’ti,
atk-s0503a:1093_3: ayaṃ pana vasalī hīnajaccā samānā mayā ucce ṭhāne ṭhapitā sāmibhūtaṃ maṃ na tathā piyāyati,
atk-s0503a:1093_5: yāva kakkhaḷā vatāya”nti anattamano hutvā “nanu te tīṇi ratanāni piyatarānī”ti codesi.
atk-s0503a:1093_6: Devī ‘ratanattayaṃpāhaṃ deva attano saggasukhaṃ mokkhasukhañca patthayantī sampiyāyāmi,
atk-s0503a:1093_8: Sabbo cāyaṃ loko attadatthameva paraṃ piyāyati,
atk-s0503a:1093_9: puttaṃ patthentopi “ayaṃ maṃ jiṇṇakāle posessatī”ti pattheti,
atk-s0503a:1093_13: iti attadatthameva sampassanto loko paraṃ piyāyatīti.
atk-s0503a:1094_1: “ayaṃ mallikā kusalā paṇḍitā nipuṇā ‘attāva me piyataro’ti vadati,
atk-s0503a:1094_6: Evaṃ pana cintetvā satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:1095_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ “loke sabbasattānaṃ attāva attano piyataro”ti raññā vuttamatthaṃ sabbaso jānitvā tadatthaparidīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1096_0: Tattha sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasāti sabbā anavasesā dasapi disā pariyesanavasena cittena anugantvā.
atk-s0503a:1096_1: Nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvacīti attanā atisayena piyaṃ aññaṃ koci puriso sabbussāhena pariyesanto
atk-s0503a:1096_2: kvaci katthaci sabbadisāsu neva adhigaccheyya na passeyya.
atk-s0503a:1096_3: Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresanti evaṃ kassaci attanā piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena puthu visuṃ visuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ attāva piyo.
atk-s0503a:1096_4: Tasmā na hiṃse paramattakāmoti yasmā evaṃ sabbopi satto attānaṃ piyāyati attano sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo,
atk-s0503a:1096_5: tasmā attakāmo attano hitasukhaṃ icchanto paraṃ sattaṃ antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya na hiṃse na haneyya na pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhipi viheṭheyya.
atk-s0503a:1096_6: Parassa hi attanā kate dukkhe taṃ tato saṅkamantaṃ viya kālantare attani sandissati.
atk-s0503a:1099_2: bhanteti idampi meghiyasutte viya garahaṇacchariyavasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1099_8: Tusitaṃ kāyaṃ upapajjīti tusitaṃ devanikāyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena upapajji.
atk-s0503a:1100_0: Ekadivasaṃ kira thero pacchābhattaṃ divāṭṭhāne nisinno lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ sobhaggappattaṃ
atk-s0503a:1100_2: “aho buddhānaṃ rūpakāyasampatti dassanīyā samantapāsādikā manoharā”ti uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0503a:1100_3: “vijātamātuyā nāma virūpopi putto surūpo viya manāpo hoti,
atk-s0503a:1100_4: sace pana buddhānaṃ mātā mahāmāyā devī dhareyya,
atk-s0503a:1100_5: kīdisaṃ nu kho tassā bhagavato rūpadassane pītisomanassaṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-s0503a:1100_8: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano parivitakkitaṃ ārocento tassā kālakiriyaṃ garahanto “acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1101_1: “mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ mahatā āyāsena pabbajjaṃ yācitvāpi paṭikkhittā,
atk-s0503a:1101_2: mayā pana upāyena yācito bhagavā aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇavasena tassā pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca anujāni,
atk-s0503a:1101_3: sā te dhamme paṭiggahetvā laddhapabbajjūpasampadā bhagavato dutiyaṃ parisaṃ uppādetvā catutthāya parisāya paccayo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1101_4: Sace pana bhagavato janetti mahāmāyā devī dhareyya,
atk-s0503a:1101_5: evametā cubhopi khattiyabhaginiyo ekato hutvā imaṃ sāsanaṃ sobheyyuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1101_6: bhagavā ca mātari bahumānena mātugāmassa sāsane pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca sukheneva anujāneyya,
atk-s0503a:1101_7: appāyukatāya panassā kasirena nipphannamidanti iminā adhippāyena thero bhagavato santike ‘acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1101_10: Bhagavā hi mātuyā vā aññassa vā mātugāmassa attano sāsane pabbajjaṃ anujānanto garukaṃyeva katvā anujānāti,
atk-s0503a:1102_1: “dasabalacatuvesārajjādike anaññasādhāraṇe anantāparimāṇe buddhaguṇe thero manasi karitvā yā evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:1102_2: nāma loke aggapuggalaṃ satthāraṃ kucchinā dasa māse parihari,
atk-s0503a:1102_3: sā buddhamātā kassaci paricārikā bhavissatīti ayuttamidaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1102_5: yadidaṃ sattāhajāte bhagavati janetti kālaṃ karoti,
atk-s0503a:1102_6: kālakatā ca tusitesu uppajjatīti acchariyabbhutacittajāto hutvā taṃ attano vitakkuppādanaṃ bhagavato ārocento ‘acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1103_0: Satthā pana yasmā sattāhajātesu bodhisattesu bodhisattamātu kālakiriyā dhammatā siddhā,
atk-s0503a:1103_3: Sā panāyaṃ dhammatā yasmā yathā sabbe bodhisattā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0503a:1103_4: ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi sannipatitvā abhisambodhiṃ pattuṃ manussaloke paṭisandhiggahaṇāya
atk-s0503a:1103_5: ajjhesitā kāladīpadesakulāni viya janettiyā āyuparimāṇampi oloketvā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0503a:1103_6: ayampi bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tatheva tusitapure ṭhito pañca mahāvilokanāni vilokento sattadivasādhikadasamāsaparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1103_7: mātuyā āyuparimāṇaṃ paricchinditvā “ayaṃ mama paṭisandhiggahaṇassa kālo,
atk-s0503a:1103_8: idāni uppajjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ñatvāva paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0503a:1104_0: Tattha kālaṃ karontīti yathāvuttaāyuparikkhayeneva kālaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:1104_4: na ca sakkā bodhisattamātaraṃ apanetvā aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapetunti tattakaṃ eva bodhisattamātu āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1104_6: Imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya mahābodhisattā pañcamaṃ mahāvilokanaṃ karonti.
atk-s0503a:1105_2: Paṭhamavayasmiñhi sattānaṃ attabhāve chandarāgo balavā hoti,
atk-s0503a:1105_3: tena tadā sañjātagabbhā itthiyo yebhuyyena gabbhaṃ anurakkhituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0503a:1105_6: Majjhimavayassa pana dve koṭṭhāse atikkamitvā tatiyakoṭṭhāse vatthu visadaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1105_8: tasmā bodhisattamātaro paṭhamavaye sampattiṃ anubhavitvā majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse vijāyitvā kālaṃ karontīti.
atk-s0503a:1106_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ bodhisattamātu aññesañca sabbasattānaṃ attabhāve āyussa maraṇapariyosānataṃ
atk-s0503a:1106_1: viditvā tadatthavibhāvanamukhena anavajjappaṭipattiyaṃ ussāhadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1107_6: Ettāvatā atītādivasena tiyaddhapariyāpanne satte anavasesato pariyādiyati.
atk-s0503a:1107_7: Apica gabbhaseyyakasattā gabbhato nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya bhūtā nāma,
atk-s0503a:1108_0: Sabbe gamissanti pahāya dehanti sabbe yathāvuttabhedā sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsādivasena
atk-s0503a:1108_1: anekabhedabhinnā sattā dehaṃ attano sarīraṃ pahāya nikkhipitvā paralokaṃ gamissanti,
atk-s0503a:1108_3: Ettha koci acavanadhammo nāma natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1108_4: Taṃ sabbajāniṃ kusalo viditvāti tadetaṃ sabbassa sattassa jāniṃ hāniṃ maraṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1108_5: sabbassa vā sattassa jāniṃ vināsaṃ pabhaṅgutaṃ kusalo paṇḍitajātiko maraṇānussativasena aniccatāmanasikāravasena vā jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:1108_6: Ātāpiyo brahmacariyaṃ careyyāti vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto ātāpiyasaṅkhātena vīriyena samannāgatattā
atk-s0503a:1108_7: ātāpiyo catubbidhasammappadhānavasena āraddhavīriyo anavasesamaraṇasamatikkamanūpāyaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ careyya,
atk-s0503a:1111_1: Tatiye rājagahe suppabuddho nāma kuṭṭhī ahosīti suppabuddhanāmako eko puriso rājagahe ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1111_3: Manussadaliddoti yattakā rājagahe manussā tesu sabbaduggato.
atk-s0503a:1111_4: So hi saṅkārakūṭavatiādīsu manussehi chaḍḍitapilotikakhaṇḍāni sibbitvā paridahati,
atk-s0503a:1111_5: kapālaṃ gahetvā gharā gharaṃ gantvā laddhaācāmaucchiṭṭhabhattāni nissāya jīvati,
atk-s0503a:1111_6: tampi pubbe katakammapaccayā na yāvadatthaṃ labhati.
atk-s0503a:1111_10: Mahatiyā parisāyāti mahatiyā bhikkhuparisāya ceva upāsakaparisāya ca.
atk-s0503a:1112_0: Ekadivasaṃ kira bhagavā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā bhikkhūnaṃ sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1112_1: katvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto katipayabhikkhuparivāro nikkhanto yehi dānaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1112_2: tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ avasesabhikkhūnañca āgamanaṃ āgamayamāno antonagareyeva aññatarasmiṃ ramaṇīye padese aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:1112_3: Tāvadeva bhikkhū tato tato āgantvā bhagavantaṃ parivāresuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1112_4: upāsakāpi “anumodanaṃ sutvā vanditvā nivattissāmā”ti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1112_8: Atha bhagavā asītianubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi virocamānāya byāmappabhāparikkhepasamujjalāya
atk-s0503a:1112_9: nīlapītalohitodātamañjeṭṭhapabhassarānaṃ vasena chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjentiyā anupamāya rūpakāyasiriyā
atk-s0503a:1112_10: sakalameva taṃ padesaṃ obhāsento tārāgaṇaparivuto viya puṇṇacando bhikkhugaṇaparivuto paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0503a:1112_11: nisīditvā manosilātale kesarasīho viya sīhanādaṃ nadanto karavīkarutamañjunā brahmassarena dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0503a:1113_0: Bhikkhūpi kho appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā pahitattā codakā pāpagarahino vattāro
atk-s0503a:1113_1: vacanakkhamā sīlasampannā samādhisampannā paññāsampannā vimuttisampannā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā meghavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1113_2: paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā suvammitā viya gandhahatthino bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
atk-s0503a:1113_3: Upāsakāpi suddhavatthanivatthā suddhuttarāsaṅgā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ mahādānāni pavattetvā gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0503a:1113_4: bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā vanditvā bhikkhusaṅghassa nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca parivāretvā
atk-s0503a:1113_7: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1114_0: Suppabuddho pana jighacchādubbalyapareto ghāsapariyesanaṃ caramāno antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇo dūratova taṃ mahājanasannipātaṃ disvā,
atk-s0503a:1114_3: appeva nāmettha gatena kiñci khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā laddhuṃ sakkā”ti sañjātābhilāso tattha gantvā
atk-s0503a:1114_4: addasa bhagavantaṃ pāsādikaṃ dassanīyaṃ pasādanīyaṃ uttamadamathasamathamanuppattaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1114_5: susamāhitaṃ tāya parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1114_6: disvāna purimajātisambhatāya paripakkāya upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno “yaṃnūnāhampi dhammaṃ suṇeyya”nti parisapariyante nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:1115_6: Ceto paricca manasākāsīti tassā parisāya cittaṃ paccekaṃ paricchinditvā manasi akāsi te volokesi.
atk-s0503a:1115_7: Bhabbo dhammaṃ viññātunti maggaphaladhammaṃ adhigantuṃ samattho,
atk-s0503a:1115_9: Etadahosīti ayaṃ suppabuddho kiñcāpi tagarasikhimhi paccekabuddhe aparajjhitvā īdiso jāto,
atk-s0503a:1115_10: maggaphalūpanissayo panassa paṃsupaṭicchannasuvaṇṇanikkhaṃ viya antohadayeyeva vijjotati,
atk-s0503a:1116_3: Bhagavā hi paṭhamaṃ hetunā saddhiṃ assādaṃ dassetvā tato satte vivecetuṃ nānānayehi ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā
atk-s0503a:1116_4: ādīnavasavanena saṃviggahadayānaṃ nekkhammaguṇavibhāvanamukhena ca vivaṭṭaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1117_4: idhalokaparalokesu dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ālambanaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0503a:1117_19: cakkavattisampattiṃ sakkasampattiṃ mārasampattiṃ brahmasampattiṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1118_0: Yasmā pana dānaṃ dento sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1118_2: Sīlakathanti sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ sattānaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ālambanaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1118_3: Idhalokaparalokasampattīnañhi sīlasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ālambanaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0503a:1118_7: sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlakusumapiḷandhitaṃ sīlagandhānulittaṃ sadevako loko olokento tittiṃ na gacchatīti evamādīhi sīlaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1119_0: Idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti dassetuṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0503a:1119_1: Saggakathanti saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo,
atk-s0503a:1119_3: cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhanti,
atk-s0503a:1119_4: tāvatiṃsā tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti evamādisaggaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1120_0: Evaṃ hetunā saddhiṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā puna hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ chindanto viya “ayampi saggo anicco adhuvo,
atk-s0503a:1120_1: na ettha chandarāgo kātabbo”ti dassanatthaṃ “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā,
atk-s0503a:1120_2: ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā nayena kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0503a:1120_5: aseṭṭhehi sevitabbaṃ seṭṭhehi na sevitabbaṃ nihīnasabhāvanti attho.
atk-s0503a:1120_6: Saṃkilesanti tehi sattānaṃ saṃsāre saṃkilissanaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:1121_0: Evaṃ kāmādīnavena tajjetvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi pabbajjāya jhānādīsu ca guṇaṃ dīpesi vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0503a:1121_2: heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena kammaniyacittaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1123_1: Sāmukkaṃsikāti sāmaṃ ukkaṃsikā attanāva uddharitvā gahitā,
atk-s0503a:1123_10: tāni sabbākārato vitthārena visuddhimagge vuttānīti tattha vuttanayena veditabbāni.
atk-s0503a:1124_0: Seyyathāpītiādinā upamāvasena suppabuddhassa kilesappahānaṃ ariyamagguppādañca dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1124_7: Etenassa lahuvipassanakatā tikkhapaññatā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññatā ca dassitā honti.
atk-s0503a:1124_15: Tañhi nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena eva saṅkhatadhamme paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0503a:1125_2: vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo,
atk-s0503a:1125_5: udakena temetvā temetvā gomayakhārehi kāḷake sammadditvā vatthassa dhovanappayogo viya saddhāsalilena
atk-s0503a:1125_6: temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithile katvā saddhādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho,
atk-s0503a:1125_7: tena payogena vatthe kāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1125_9: tena suddhassa vatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodāpananti.
atk-s0503a:1126_0: Evaṃ pana suppabuddho parisapariyante nisinno dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1126_1: satthu ārocetukāmo parisamajjhaṃ ogāhituṃ avisahanto mahājanassa satthāraṃ vanditvā anugantvā nivattakāle
atk-s0503a:1126_2: bhagavati vihāraṃ gate sayampi vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1126_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko devarājā “ayaṃ suppabuddho kuṭṭhī attanā satthu sāsane paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātukāmo”ti
atk-s0503a:1126_4: ñatvā “vīmaṃsissāmi na”nti gantvā ākāse ṭhito etadavoca –
atk-s0503a:1126_16: tvaṃ mayā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ na yuttarūpo,
atk-s0503a:1126_18: apica maṃ tvaṃ ‘duggato daliddo kapaṇo’ti kasmā vadesi,
atk-s0503a:1126_20: nevāhaṃ duggato na daliddo na kapaṇo,
atk-s0503a:1126_21: atha kho sukhappatto paramena sukhena apāhamasmi mahaddhano”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0503a:1128_0: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1129_0: “Yassa ete dhanā atthi, itthiyā purisassa vā;
atk-s0503a:1131_2: na tveva te buddhehi vā paccekabuddhehi vā ‘daliddā’ti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1132_0: Sakko tassa kathaṃ sutvā taṃ antarāmagge ohāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ paṭivacanañca ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:1132_2: “na kho sakka sakkā tādisānaṃ satenapi sahassenapi suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ ‘buddho na buddho,
atk-s0503a:1132_5: Suppabuddhopi kho kuṭṭhī satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārā katapaṭisanthāro attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:1133_0: Tattha diṭṭhadhammoti diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo.
atk-s0503a:1133_3: Dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1133_4: Patti ca ñāṇasampattito aññāpi vijjatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “viditadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1133_5: Sā panāyaṃ viditadhammatā dhammesu ekadesenāpi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyogāḷhadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1133_7: Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesenapi pariññeyyadhammaṃ samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:1134_0: Tattha paṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā ca aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā vicikicchā etenāti tiṇṇavicikiccho.
atk-s0503a:1134_2: na nu kho”ti evaṃ pavattitā vigatā samucchinnā kathaṃkathā etassāti vigatakathaṃkatho.
atk-s0503a:1134_3: Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā tappaṭipakkhesu ca sīlādiguṇesu suppatiṭṭhitattā vesārajjaṃ visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ pattoti vesārajjappatto.
atk-s0503a:1134_5: na parassa saddhāya ettha vattatīti aparappaccayo.
atk-s0503a:1135_0: Abhikkantantiādīsu kiñcāpi ayaṃ abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpabbhanumodanādīsu anekesu atthesu dissati,
atk-s0503a:1135_2: Teneva so pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena ca dvikkhattuṃ vutto,
atk-s0503a:1135_7: Tattha ekena abhikkantasaddena bhagavato desanaṃ thometi,
atk-s0503a:1136_4: yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti.
atk-s0503a:1136_5: Bhagavato eva vā vacanaṃ abhikkantaṃ dosanāsanato,
atk-s0503a:1137_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi.
atk-s0503a:1137_7: Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti maggaṃ upadiseyya.
atk-s0503a:1138_2: evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patiṭṭhitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena,
atk-s0503a:1138_4: evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato paṭṭhāya micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena,
atk-s0503a:1138_8: evaṃ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṃsanadesanāpajjotadhāraṇena
atk-s0503a:1138_9: bhagavatā nānānayehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
atk-s0503a:1139_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā tāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto “esāha”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1139_2: Bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti bhagavā me saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ aghassa ghātā,
atk-s0503a:1139_3: hitassa vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena bhagavantaṃ gacchāmi bhajāmi,
atk-s0503a:1139_7: Dhammanti adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo.
atk-s0503a:1140_0: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1141_0: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti ca –
atk-s0503a:1145_3: Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti pariyattidhammo vuttoti.
atk-s0503a:1146_2: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatanti ajjataggeti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvā.
atk-s0503a:1146_5: ajja agge ajja ādiṃ katvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1146_8: tāva upetaṃ anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ ratanattayassa upāsanato upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhagavā upadhāretu jānātūti attho.
atk-s0503a:1147_0: Bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvāti bhagavato vacanaṃ cittena abhinanditvā tameva abhinanditabhāvaṃ pakāsento vuttanayena vācāya anumoditvā.
atk-s0503a:1147_1: Abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmīti taṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1147_2: katvā satthu guṇaninnacitto yāva dassanavisayasamatikkamā bhagavantaṃyeva pekkhamāno pañjaliko namassamāno pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:1148_0: Pakkanto ca kuṭṭharogābhibhavena chinnahatthapādaṅguli ukkāragatto samantato vissandamānāsavo kaṇḍūtipatipīḷito
atk-s0503a:1148_1: asuci duggandho jegucchatamo paramakāruññataṃ patto “nāyaṃ kāyo imassa accantasantassa paṇītatamassa
atk-s0503a:1148_2: ariyadhammassa ādhāro bhavituṃ yutto”ti uppannābhisandhinā viya saggasaṃvattaniyena puññakammena okāse
atk-s0503a:1148_3: kate appāyukasaṃvattaniyena upacchedakena pāpakammena katūpacitena codiyamāno taruṇavacchāya dhenuyā
atk-s0503a:1148_6: “atha kho acirapakkantaṃ suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1149_0: So kira atīte eko seṭṭhiputto hutvā attano sahāyehi tīhi seṭṭhiputtehi saddhiṃ kīḷanto ekaṃ nagarasobhiniṃ
atk-s0503a:1149_1: gaṇikaṃ uyyānaṃ netvā divasaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā atthaṅgate sūriye sahāye etadavoca –
atk-s0503a:1149_2: “imissā hatthe kahāpaṇasahassaṃ bahukañca suvaṇṇaṃ mahagghāni ca pasādhanāni saṃvijjanti,
atk-s0503a:1149_5: handa imaṃ mayaṃ māretvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā gacchāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1149_6: Te cattāropi janā ekajjhāsayā hutvā taṃ māretuṃ upakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1149_7: Sā tehi māriyamānā “ime nillajjā nikkaruṇā mayā saddhiṃ kilesasanthavaṃ katvā niraparādhaṃ maṃ kevalaṃ dhanalobhena mārenti,
atk-s0503a:1149_9: ahaṃ pana yakkhinī hutvā anekavāraṃ ime māretuṃ samatthā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0503a:1149_10: Tesu kira eko pakkusāti kulaputto ahosi,
atk-s0503a:1149_14: iti imesaṃ catunnaṃ janānaṃ anekasate attabhāve sā yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbattā gāvī hutvā jīvitā voropesi.
atk-s0503a:1149_15: Te tassa kammassa nissandena tattha tattha antarāmaraṇaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1149_16: Evaṃ suppabuddhassa kuṭṭhissa sahasā maraṇaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1150_0: Atha sambahulā bhikkhū tassa kālakiriyaṃ bhagavato ārocetvā abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1151_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayāti sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāsoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavabandhanānaṃ samucchedavasena pahānā.
atk-s0503a:1153_4: Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ assa gati paṭisaraṇaṃ avassaṃ pattabbanti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-s0503a:1153_6: ko abhisamparāyo”ti pucchāya bhaddikā eva suppabuddhassa gati,
atk-s0503a:1153_9: taṃ pana pucchānusandhivasena pakāsetukāmo dhammarājā ettakameva abhāsi.
atk-s0503a:1153_10: Passati hi bhagavā “mayā ettake kathite imissaṃyeva parisati anusandhikusalo eko bhikkhu suppabuddhassa
atk-s0503a:1153_12: athāhaṃ tassa taṃ kāraṇaṃ tena pucchānusandhinā pakāsetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1153_18: Yenāti yena hetunā yena paccayena ca.
atk-s0503a:1154_1: Atīte kāle nibbattaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ “suppabuddho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1154_3: Atīte kira anuppanne tathāgate bārāṇasiyā sāmantā ekasmiṃ gāme ekā kuladhītā khettaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0503a:1154_4: Sā ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannacittā tassa pañcahi lājāsatehi saddhiṃ ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ datvā pañca puttasatāni patthesi.
atk-s0503a:1154_5: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pañcasatā migaluddakā paccekabuddhassa madhuramaṃsaṃ datvā “etissā puttā bhaveyyāma,
atk-s0503a:1154_8: Tato cutā ekasmiṃ jātassare padumagabbhe nibbatti.
atk-s0503a:1154_10: Tassā vicarantiyā pāduddhāre pāduddhāre bhūmito padumāni uṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0503a:1154_16: te vayappattā uyyāne padumasare kīḷantā ekekasmiṃ padume nisīditvā paripakkañāṇā saṅkhāresu khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1159_0: Evaṃ paccekabodhiṃ abhisambuddhesu tesu pañcasu paccekabuddhasatesu abbhantaro tagarasikhī nāma paccekasambuddho
atk-s0503a:1159_1: gandhamādanapabbate nandamūlapabbhāre sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā sattāhassa accayena nirodhā
atk-s0503a:1159_2: vuṭṭhito ākāsena āgantvā isigilipabbate otaritvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ
atk-s0503a:1159_4: Tasmiñca samaye rājagahe eko seṭṭhiputto mahatā parivārena uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ nagarato nikkhamanto tagarasikhipaccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1159_7: tathā hi kuṭṭhicīvarena sarīraṃ pārupitvā gacchatī”ti niṭṭhubhitvā apasabyaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:1160_3: Kuṭṭhīti akuṭṭhiṃyeva taṃ seṭṭhi kuṭṭharogaṃ akkosavatthuṃ pāpento vadati.
atk-s0503a:1160_5: Yebhuyyena hi kuṭṭhino ḍaṃsamakasasarīsapapaṭibāhanatthaṃ rogapaṭicchādanatthañca yaṃ vā taṃ vā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pārupati,
atk-s0503a:1160_7: Paṃsukūlacīvaradharattā vā aggaḷānaṃ anekavaṇṇabhāvena kuṭṭhasarīrasadisoti hīḷento “kuṭṭhicīvarenā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1160_9: Apasabyato karitvāti paṇḍitā tādisaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:1160_10: ayaṃ pana aviññutāya paribhavena taṃ apasabyaṃ katvā attano apasabyaṃ apadakkhiṇaṃ katvā gato.
atk-s0503a:1160_12: Tassa kammassāti tagarasikhimhi paccekabuddhe “kvāyaṃ kuṭṭhī”ti hīḷetvā niṭṭhubhanaapasabyakaraṇavasena pavattapāpakammassa.
atk-s0503a:1160_15: Tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenāti yena kammena so niraye paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0503a:1160_16: na taṃ kammaṃ manussaloke vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0503a:1160_17: Yā panassa nānakkhaṇikā cetanā tadā paccekabuddhe vippaṭipajjanavasena pavattā aparāpariyavedanīyabhūtā,
atk-s0503a:1160_18: sā aparāpariyavedanīyeneva puññakammena manussesu tihetukapaṭisandhiyā dinnāya pavattiyaṃ kuṭṭhibhāvaṃ dāliddiyaṃ paramakāruññataṃ āpādesi.
atk-s0503a:1160_19: Taṃ sandhāya kammasabhāgatāvasena “tasseva kammassa vipākavasesenā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1160_20: Sadisepi hi loke tabbohāro diṭṭho yathā taṃ “sā eva tittirī,
atk-s0503a:1161_1: hetū”ti tena bhikkhunā puṭṭhapañhaṃ vissajjetvā idāni yo “tassa kā gati,
atk-s0503a:1161_4: Tattha tathāgatappaveditanti tathāgatena bhagavatā desitaṃ akkhātaṃ pakāsitanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1161_10: suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti ratanattayasannissayaṃ pubbabhāgasaddhañceva lokuttarasaddhañcāti duvidhampi saddhaṃ sammā ādiyi.
atk-s0503a:1161_17: Pariyattidhammāpi hi tena dhammassavanakāle saccappaṭivedhāya sāvakehi yathāladdhappakāraṃ sutā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā cāti.
atk-s0503a:1161_19: yena ariyasāvakā deyyadhammesu muttacāgā ca honti payatapāṇī vossaggaratā.
atk-s0503a:1162_2: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā.
atk-s0503a:1162_4: Sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokanti padattayenāpi devalokameva vadati.
atk-s0503a:1162_5: So hi sampattīnaṃ sobhanattā sundarā gatīti sugati,
atk-s0503a:1162_18: So hi asucimakkhitaṃ jajjaraṃ mattikābhājanaṃ chaḍḍetvā anekaratanavicittaṃ pabhassararaṃsijālavinaddhasuddhajambunadabhājanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1162_19: gaṇhanto viya vuttappakāraṃ kaḷevaraṃ idha nikkhipitvā ekacittakkhaṇena yathāvuttaṃ dibbattabhāvaṃ mahatā
atk-s0503a:1163_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ pāpānaṃ aparivajjane ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1163_1: parivajjane ca ānisaṃsaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1164_1: yathā cakkhumā puriso parakkame kāyikavīriye vijjamāne sarīre vahante visamāni papātādiṭṭhānāni caṇḍabhāvena
atk-s0503a:1164_3: evaṃ jīvalokasmiṃ imasmiṃ sattaloke paṇḍito sappañño puriso tāya sappaññatāya attano hitaṃ jānanto pāpāni lāmakāni duccaritāni parivajjeyya.
atk-s0503a:1164_4: Evañhi yathāyaṃ suppabuddho tagarasikhimhi paccekabuddhe pāpaṃ aparivajjetvā mahantaṃ anayabyasanaṃ āpajji,
atk-s0503a:1164_6: Yathā vā suppabuddho kuṭṭhī mama dhammadesanaṃ āgamma idāni saṃvegappatto pāpāni parivajjento uḷāraṃ visesaṃ adhigañchi,
atk-s0503a:1164_7: evaṃ aññopi uḷāraṃ visesādhigamaṃ icchanto pāpāni parivajjeyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1167_4: Ime hi sattā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva pañcadasavassakā,
atk-s0503a:1167_8: Macchake bādhentīti maggasamīpe ekasmiṃ taḷāke nidāghakāle udake parikkhīṇe ninnaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1167_9: ussiñcitvā khuddakamacche gaṇhanti ceva hananti ca “pacitvā khādissāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1167_10: Tenupasaṅkamīti maggato thokaṃ taḷākaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0503a:1167_13: Te kumārake attani vissāsaṃ janetuṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:1167_17: Appiyaṃ vo dukkhanti “kiṃ tumhākaṃ sarīre uppajjanakadukkhaṃ appiyaṃ aniṭṭha”nti pucchati.
atk-s0503a:1168_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti ime sattā attano dukkhaṃ anicchantā eva hutvā dukkhahetuṃ paṭipajjantā attano taṃ
atk-s0503a:1168_1: icchantā eva nāma hontīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1168_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ pāpakiriyāya nisedhanaṃ ādīnavavibhāvanañca udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1169_4: āvi vā paresaṃ pākaṭabhāvavasena appaṭicchannaṃ katvā kāyena vā vācāya vā pāṇātipātādippabhedaṃ yadi
atk-s0503a:1169_5: vā raho apākaṭabhāvavasena paṭicchannaṃ katvā manodvāre eva abhijjhādippabhedaṃ aṇumattampi pāpakaṃ lāmakadhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:1169_7: atha pana taṃ pāpakammaṃ etarahi karotha,
atk-s0503a:1169_9: nirayādīsu catūsu apāyesu manussesu ca tassa phalabhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ ito vā etto vā palāyante amhe nānubandhissatīti
atk-s0503a:1169_10: adhippāyena upecca apecca palāyatampi tumhākaṃ tato mutti mokkho natthi.
atk-s0503a:1169_13: vuttanayena yattha katthaci gamane pakkamane satīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1172_1: Pañcame tadahūti tasmiṃ ahani tasmiṃ divase.
atk-s0503a:1172_3: upavasantīti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1172_4: Ayañhi uposathasaddo “aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasāmī”tiādīsu sīle āgato.
atk-s0503a:1172_11: Nisinno hotīti mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:1172_12: Nisajja pana bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni olokento ekaṃ dussīlapuggalaṃ disvā,
atk-s0503a:1172_13: “sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ puggale idha nisinneyeva pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi,
atk-s0503a:1172_14: sattadhāssa muddhā phalissatī”ti tasmiṃ anukampāya tuṇhīyeva ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1173_0: Ettha ca uddhastaṃ aruṇanti aruṇuggamanaṃ vatvāpi “uddisatu,
atk-s0503a:1173_2: bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti thero bhagavantaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ yāci tasmiṃ kāle “na,
atk-s0503a:1173_6: parisāti tikkhattuṃ therena pātimokkhuddesassa yācitattā anuddesassa kāraṇaṃ kathento “asukapuggalo aparisuddho”ti avatvā “aparisuddhā, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:1173_8: Kasmā pana bhagavā tiyāmarattiṃ tathā vītināmesi?
atk-s0503a:1173_9: Tato paṭṭhāya ovādapātimokkhaṃ anuddisitukāmo tassa vatthuṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1174_1: Attano cetopariyañāṇena tassaṃ parisati bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni parijānanto tassa moghapurisassa dussīlyacittaṃ passi.
atk-s0503a:1174_2: Yasmā pana citte diṭṭhe taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo diṭṭho nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:1174_3: tasmā “addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ dussīla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1174_4: Yatheva hi anāgate sattasu divasesu pavattamānaṃ paresaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇalābhī jānāti,
atk-s0503a:1174_9: Asucinti aparisuddhehi kāyakammādīhi samannāgatattā na suciṃ.
atk-s0503a:1174_10: Saṅkassarasamācāranti kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ iminā kataṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyatāya saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1174_11: atha vā kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ.
atk-s0503a:1175_0: Lajjitabbatāya paṭicchādetabbakāraṇato paṭicchannaṃ kammantaṃ etassāti paṭicchannakammantaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1175_2: Salākaggahaṇādīsu “kittakā samaṇā”ti ca gaṇanāya “ahampi samaṇomhī”ti micchāpaṭiññāya samaṇapaṭiññaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1175_4: Aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute supattadhare gāmanigamādīsu piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā
atk-s0503a:1175_5: abrahmacārī samāno sayampi tādisena ākārena paṭipajjanto uposathādīsu sandissanto “ahampi brahmacārī”ti
atk-s0503a:1175_7: Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūtiṃ.
atk-s0503a:1175_10: Majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnanti saṅghapariyāpanno viya bhikkhusaṅghassa anto nisinnaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1175_11: Diṭṭhosīti ayaṃ pana na pakatattoti bhagavatā diṭṭho asi.
atk-s0503a:1175_13: tasmā natthi te tava bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāso.
atk-s0503a:1175_14: Yasmā pana so saṃvāso tava natthi,
atk-s0503a:1176_0: Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosīti anekavāraṃ vatvāpi thero “sayameva nibbinno oramissatī”ti vā,
atk-s0503a:1176_1: “idāni imesaṃ paṭipattiṃ jānissāmī”ti vā adhippāyena tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1176_2: Bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti bhagavatā mayā ca yāthāvato diṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:1176_4: “idānissa nikkaḍḍhanakālo mā saṅghassa uposathantarāyo ahosī”ti taṃ bāhāyaṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0503a:1176_10: evaṃ ubhayathāpi vihārato bahi katvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1176_14: parisā”ti vacanaṃ sutvā eva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0503a:1176_15: evaṃ apakkamitvā yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessatīti acchariyamidanti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1177_3: na ca tathāgatā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:1177_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti.
atk-s0503a:1177_7: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāni.
atk-s0503a:1178_0: Tattha na dānāhanti idāni ahaṃ uposathaṃ na karissāmi,
atk-s0503a:1178_12: etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti imā pana tisso gāthā ovādapātimokkhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0503a:1178_21: tasmā amhākampi bhagavā vīsativassamattaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā imaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā tato paraṃ na uddisi.
atk-s0503a:1178_24: Kāraṇañhi yathā tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānanti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:1179_3: Yvāyaṃ aparisuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhassa anuddeso vutto,
atk-s0503a:1179_4: so imasmiṃ dhammavinaye acchariyo abbhuto dhammoti taṃ aparehi sattahi acchariyabbhutadhammehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0503a:1179_5: vibhajitvā dassetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva tesaṃ upamābhāvena mahāsamudde aṭṭha acchariyabbhutadhamme dassento
atk-s0503a:1180_0: Pakatidevā viya na suranti na isanti na virocantīti asurā,
atk-s0503a:1180_5: te tattha pavisantā nikkhamantā sinerupāde maṇḍapādiṃ nimminitvā kīḷantāva abhiramanti.
atk-s0503a:1180_6: Tattha tesaṃ abhirati ime guṇe disvāti āha –
atk-s0503a:1181_1: Na āyatakeneva papātoti na chinnataṭo mahāsobbho viya ādito eva papāto.
atk-s0503a:1181_3: gambhīro hutvā gacchanto gacchanto sinerupādamūle caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro hutvā ṭhitoti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1182_1: Na matena kuṇapena saṃvasatīti yena kenaci hatthiassādīnaṃ kaḷevarena saddhiṃ na saṃvasati.
atk-s0503a:1182_3: Thalaṃ ussāretīti hatthena gahetvā viya vīcippahāreneva thale khipati.
atk-s0503a:1182_4: Gaṅgā yamunāti anotattadahassa dakkhiṇamukhato nikkhantanadī pañca dhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne gaṅgātiādinā pañcadhā saṅkhaṃ gatā.
atk-s0503a:1183_0: Tatrāyaṃ imāsaṃ nadīnaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya uppattikathā –
atk-s0503a:1183_2: tattha catusahassayojanappamāṇo padeso udakena ajjhotthaṭo samuddoti saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0503a:1183_4: tisahassayojanappamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhito ubbedhena pañcayojanasatiko caturāsītikūṭasahassapaṭimaṇḍito samantato sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto,
atk-s0503a:1183_5: yattha āyāmena vitthārena gambhīratāya ca paṇṇāsayojanappamāṇo diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalo anotattadaho
atk-s0503a:1183_6: kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinidaho sīhapapātadahoti satta mahāsarā patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0503a:1184_0: Tesu anotattadaho sudassanakūṭaṃ cittakūṭaṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ kelāsakūṭanti imehi pañcahi pabbatakūṭehi parikkhitto.
atk-s0503a:1184_1: Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ tiyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1184_16: kāḷapakkhuposathadivase ādittaṃ viya aṅgāraṃ pajjalantaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0503a:1184_18: Sabbāni cetāni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni.
atk-s0503a:1184_19: Tattha devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena ca devo vassati,
atk-s0503a:1184_22: candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena tattha obhāsaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:1185_0: Tattha ratanamayamanuññasopānasilātalāni nimmacchakacchapāni phalikasadisāni nimmalūdakāni tadupabhogasattānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1185_2: yattha buddhapaccekabuddhā iddhimanto sāvakā isayo ca nahānādīni karonti,
atk-s0503a:1186_7: Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva
atk-s0503a:1186_9: Pacchimadisato uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva
atk-s0503a:1187_0: Dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva
atk-s0503a:1187_1: saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā uṭṭhāya parikkhepena tigāvutappamāṇaudakadhārā hutvā ākāsena
atk-s0503a:1187_2: saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā,
atk-s0503a:1187_4: Tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā tiyaggaḷā nāma pokkharaṇī jātā,
atk-s0503a:1187_5: pokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā umaṅgena
atk-s0503a:1187_6: saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā hatthatale pañcaṅgulisadisā pañcadhārā
atk-s0503a:1188_0: Sā tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne “āvaṭṭagaṅgā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:1188_4: kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne “bahalagaṅgā”ti,
atk-s0503a:1188_6: viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne gaṅgā, yamunā,
atk-s0503a:1188_9: Evametā pañca mahānadiyo himavantato pavattantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:1189_2: Savantiyoti yā kāci savamānā sandamānā gacchantiyo mahānadiyo vā kunnadiyo vā.
atk-s0503a:1189_8: jālakkhipādīni ādāya macchakacchape gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “imasmiṃ kāle atimahantī vuṭṭhi,
atk-s0503a:1189_9: na labhissāma nu kho piṭṭhipasāraṇaṭṭhāna”nti vā taṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1189_10: Paṭhamakappikakālato paṭṭhāya hi yaṃ vassitvā sinerumekhalaṃ āhacca udakaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1189_11: taṃ tato ekaṅgulamattampi udakaṃ neva heṭṭhā otarati,
atk-s0503a:1192_0: Evameva khoti kiñcāpi satthā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye soḷasapi bāttiṃsapi tato bhiyyopi acchariyabbhutadhamme vibhajitvā dassetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1192_1: tadā upamābhāvena pana gahitānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ anurūpavasena aṭṭheva te upametabbadhamme vibhajitvā dassento “evameva kho,
atk-s0503a:1192_3: imasmiṃ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1193_2: anupubbapaṭipadāya satta anupassanā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇavibhattiyo sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā ca gahitā.
atk-s0503a:1193_3: Na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedhoti maṇḍūkassa uppatitvā gamanaṃ viya āditova sīlapūraṇādīni akatvā arahattapaṭivedho nāma natthi,
atk-s0503a:1193_4: paṭipāṭiyā pana sīlasamādhipaññāyo pūretvāva arahattappattīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1194_0: Mama sāvakāti sotāpannādike ariyapuggale sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0503a:1194_1: Na saṃvasatīti uposathakammādivasena saṃvāsaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0503a:1194_4: Na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vāti asaṅkhyeyyepi mahākappe buddhesu anuppajjantesu ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1194_6: buddhakāle pana ekekasmiṃ samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi sattā amataṃ ārādhenti,
atk-s0503a:1194_9: Sabbā hi sāsanassa sampatti yāvadeva anupādāya āsavehi cittassa vimuttiyā hoti.
atk-s0503a:1195_1: Satipaṭṭhānādayo hi bhāviyamānā pubbabhāgepi anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ nibbattenti,
atk-s0503a:1198_0: Lokiyaratananimittaṃ pana pītipāmojjaṃ na tassa kalabhāgampi agghatīti ayamattho heṭṭhā dassito eva. Apica –
atk-s0503a:1201_0: Yadi ca cittīkatādibhāvena ratanaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:1201_6: Paramparakāraṇañhi dānādiupanissayoti evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena cittīkatādiatthena ca ratanabhāvo bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ sātisayo.
atk-s0503a:1202_2: Ārammaṇassa pana kāyādivasena catubbidhattā vuttaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1202_3: Tathā hi kāyavedanācittadhammesu subhasukhaniccaattasaññānaṃ pahānato asubhadukkhāniccānattatāgahaṇato ca nesaṃ kāyānupassanādibhāvo vibhatto.
atk-s0503a:1203_6: Tampi anuppannuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanapahānavasena anuppannuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādanabhāvanavasena
atk-s0503a:1204_2: Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
atk-s0503a:1204_3: Iti paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo,
atk-s0503a:1204_5: Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamūpāyoti iddhipādo.
atk-s0503a:1204_6: Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0503a:1204_7: svāyaṃ iddhipādo yasmā chandādike cattāro adhipatidhamme dhure jeṭṭhake katvā nibbattiyati,
atk-s0503a:1205_1: Tattha assaddhiyaṃ abhibhavitvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti saddhindriyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1205_5: aññāṇaṃ abhibhavitvā dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti paññindriyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1206_0: Tāniyeva assaddhiyādīhi anabhibhavanīyato akampiyaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena “balānī”ti veditabbāni.
atk-s0503a:1207_2: Yā hi esā dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyoga-
atk-s0503a:1207_8: tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0503a:1207_9: Yopesa vuttappakārāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:1207_10: tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0503a:1207_13: “Bodhiyā saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā”tiādinā nayenapi bojjhaṅgānaṃ bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1208_0: Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo.
atk-s0503a:1209_0: Sotāpannoti maggasaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ āpajjitvā pāpuṇitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0503a:1209_2: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannoti sotāpattiphalassa attapaccakkhakaraṇāya paṭipajjamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho,
atk-s0503a:1209_4: Sakadāgāmīti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena āgamanasīlo dutiyaphalaṭṭho.
atk-s0503a:1209_6: Yo pana saddhānusārī dhammānusārī ekabījīti evamādiko ariyapuggalavibhāgo,
atk-s0503a:1210_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ attano dhammavinaye matakuṇapasadisena dussīlapuggalena saddhiṃ saṃvāsābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1211_0: Tattha channamativassatīti āpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādento aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0503a:1211_1: tato paraṃ tato paranti evaṃ āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ ativiya vassati.
atk-s0503a:1211_2: Vivaṭaṃ nātivassatīti āpattiṃ āpanno taṃ appaṭicchādetvā vivaranto sabrahmacārīnaṃ pakāsento yathādhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:1211_3: yathāvinayaṃ paṭikaronto desento vuṭṭhahanto aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati,
atk-s0503a:1211_4: tenassa vivaṭaṃ puna āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ na vassati.
atk-s0503a:1211_6: tasmā channaṃ chāditaṃ āpattiṃ vivaretha pakāsetha.
atk-s0503a:1211_7: Evaṃ taṃ nātivassatīti evaṃ sante taṃ āpattiāpajjanakaṃ āpannapuggalaṃ attabhāvaṃ ativijjhitvā kilesavassaṃ na vassati na temeti.
atk-s0503a:1211_8: Evaṃ so kilesehi anavassuto parisuddhasīlo samāhito hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sammasanto anukkamena nibbānaṃ pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1214_5: Soṇo upāsako kuṭikaṇṇoti nāmena soṇo nāma,
atk-s0503a:1214_7: koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāraṇena “koṭikaṇṇo”ti vattabbe “kuṭikaṇṇo”ti evaṃ abhiññāto,
atk-s0503a:1214_9: Ayañhi āyasmato mahākaccāyanassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane abhippasanno,
atk-s0503a:1214_10: saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhito pavatte pabbate chāyūdakasampanne ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāretvā theraṃ tattha vasāpetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0503a:1215_0: So kālena kālaṃ therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0503a:1215_3: So ekadā satthena saddhiṃ vāṇijjatthāya ujjeniṃ gacchanto antarāmagge aṭaviyaṃ satthe niviṭṭhe rattiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1215_8: So pabhātāya rattiyā pabujjhitvā uṭṭhāya kañci apassanto sattheneva gatamaggaṃ gahetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gacchanto ekaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0503a:1215_9: Tattha addasa ekaṃ mahākāyaṃ virūpadassanaṃ gacchantaṃ purisaṃ aṭṭhito muttāni attano maṃsāni sayameva khādantaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1215_15: “Ahaṃ pubbe bhārukacchanagaravāsī kūṭavāṇijo hutvā paresaṃ santakaṃ vañcetvā khādiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1215_16: samaṇe ca bhikkhāya upagate ‘tumhākaṃ maṃsaṃ khādathā’ti akkosiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1215_17: tena kammena etarahi imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1215_18: Taṃ sutvā soṇo ativiya saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0503a:1216_0: Tato paraṃ gacchanto mukhato paggharitakāḷalohite dve petadārake passitvā tatheva pucchi.
atk-s0503a:1216_2: Te kira bhārukacchanagare dārakakāle gandhavāṇijjāya jīvikaṃ kappentā attano mātari khīṇāsave nimantetvā
atk-s0503a:1216_3: bhojentiyā gehaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ santakaṃ kasmā samaṇānaṃ desi,
atk-s0503a:1216_4: tayā dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjanakasamaṇānaṃ mukhato kāḷalohitaṃ paggharatū”ti akkosiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1216_5: Te tena kammena niraye paccitvā tassa vipākāvasesena petayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā tadā imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanti.
atk-s0503a:1216_6: Tampi sutvā soṇo ativiya saṃvegajāto ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1217_0: So ujjeniṃ gantvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā kulagharaṃ paccāgato theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā katapaṭisanthāro therassa tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:1217_1: Theropissa pavattinivattīsu ādīnavānisaṃse vibhāvento dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0503a:1217_2: So theraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gato sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ upagato thokaṃyeva niddāyitvā pabujjhitvā sayanatale
atk-s0503a:1217_5: te ca petattabhāve anussarato saṃsāradukkhaṃ ativiya bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0503a:1217_7: So vibhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ ārocetvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0503a:1218_0: Tattha yathā yathātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho –
atk-s0503a:1218_1: yena yena ākārena ayyo mahākaccāno dhammaṃ deseti ācikkhati paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti pakāseti,
atk-s0503a:1218_2: tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1218_3: yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akkhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1218_4: Ekadivasampi kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1218_6: Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekanta paripuṇṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0503a:1218_7: carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ceva massūni ca ohāretvā voropetvā kāsāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1218_8: carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni acchādetvā nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1218_10: Yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:1219_0: Evaṃ attanā rahovitakkitaṃ soṇo upāsako therassa ārocetvā taṃ paṭipajjitukāmo “pabbājetu maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:1219_2: Thero pana “tāvassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ katha”nti upadhāretvā ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno “dukkaraṃ kho”tiādinā pabbajjāchandaṃ nivāresi.
atk-s0503a:1220_0: Tattha ekabhattanti “ekabhattiko hoti rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ vikālabhojanaviratiṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0503a:1220_4: eko nisīdatī”tiādinā nayena vuttesu catūsu iriyāpathesu kāyavivekaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0503a:1220_12: Etañhi upāsakena pubbabhāge anuyuñjitabbaṃ buddhasāsanaṃ nāma. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:1221_1: yathāvuttakāle vā tuyhaṃ anuyuñjantassa yuttaṃ patirūpaṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1221_3: Sabbametaṃ ñāṇassa aparipakkattā tassa kāmānaṃ duppahānatāya sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ yogyaṃ kārāpetuṃ vadati,
atk-s0503a:1221_9: therena vuttavidhiṃ pana anutiṭṭhanto kālena kālaṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanto dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0503a:1221_10: Tassa vuttanayeneva dutiyaṃ pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppajji,
atk-s0503a:1221_13: Tatiyavāre pana ñāṇassa paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā “idāni naṃ pabbājetuṃ kālo”ti thero pabbājesi,
atk-s0503a:1221_14: pabbajitañca taṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni atikkamitvā gaṇaṃ pariyesitvā upasampādesi.
atk-s0503a:1222_1: Tadā kira bhikkhū yebhuyyena majjhimadese eva vasiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1222_4: ekasmiṃ dveti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vasiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1222_8: Therena hi katipaye bhikkhū ānetvā aññesu ānīyamānesu pubbe ānītā kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1222_9: kiñci kālaṃ āgametvā puna tesu ānīyamānesu itare pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1222_10: Evaṃ punappunaṃ ānayanena sannipāto cireneva ahosi,
atk-s0503a:1222_12: Dasavaggaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvāti tadā bhagavatā paccantadesepi dasavaggeneva saṅghena upasampadā anuññātā.
atk-s0503a:1222_13: Itonidānañhi therena yācito pañcavaggena saṅghena paccantadese upasampadaṃ anujāni.
atk-s0503a:1223_1: Īdiso ca īdiso cāti evarūpo ca evarūpo ca,
atk-s0503a:1223_3: evarūpāya dhammakāyasampattiyā samannāgatoti sutoyeva me so bhagavā.
atk-s0503a:1223_4: Na kho me so bhagavā sammukhā diṭṭhoti etena puthujjanasaddhāya evaṃ āyasmā soṇo bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1223_5: Aparabhāge pana satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā paccūsasamayaṃ ajjhiṭṭho soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikāni
atk-s0503a:1223_6: satthu sammukhā aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā atthadhammappaṭisaṃvedī hutvā
atk-s0503a:1223_7: bhaṇanto dhammūpasañhitapāmojjādimukhena samāhito sarabhaññapariyosāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅkhāre
atk-s0503a:1223_9: Etadatthameva hissa bhagavatā attanā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāso āṇattoti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1224_1: “na kho me so bhagavā sammukhā diṭṭho”ti idaṃ rūpakāyadassanameva sandhāya vuttanti.
atk-s0503a:1224_2: Āyasmā hi soṇo pabbajitvāva therassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto anupasampannova
atk-s0503a:1224_5: kimettha citta”nti uparimaggatthāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā antovasseyeva chaḷabhiñño hutvā visuddhipavāraṇāya pavāresi.
atk-s0503a:1224_6: Ariyasaccadassanena hi bhagavato dhammakāyo diṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-s0503a:1225_0: “Yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passati. Yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1226_0: Tasmāssa dhammakāyadassanaṃ pageva siddhaṃ, pavāretvā pana rūpakāyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1227_8: Āvusovādoyeva hi aññamaññaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhagavato dharamānakāle āciṇṇo.
atk-s0503a:1227_9: Bhagavantaṃ pāsādikantiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0503a:1228_0: Kacci bhikkhu khamanīyanti bhikkhu idaṃ tuyhaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ kacci khamanīyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1228_3: Kacci yāpanīyanti kiṃ taṃtaṃkiccesu yāpetuṃ gametuṃ sakkā,
atk-s0503a:1228_5: Kaccisi appakilamathenāti anāyāsena imaṃ ettakaṃ addhānaṃ kacci āgatosi.
atk-s0503a:1229_0: Etadahosīti buddhāciṇṇaṃ anussarantassa āyasmato ānandassa etaṃ “yassa kho maṃ bhagavā”tiādinā idāni vuccamānaṃ citte āciṇṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1230_0: Nisajjāya vītināmetvāti ettha yasmā bhagavā āyasmato soṇassa samāpattisamāpajjane paṭisanthāraṃ karonto
atk-s0503a:1230_1: sāvakasādhāraṇā sabbā samāpattiyo anulomapaṭilomaṃ samāpajjanto bahudeva rattiṃ…pe…
atk-s0503a:1230_3: tasmā āyasmāpi soṇo bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ sabbā tā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto “bahudeva rattiṃ…pe…
atk-s0503a:1230_5: Pavisitvā ca bhagavatā anuññāto cīvaraṃ tirokaraṇīyaṃ katvāpi bhagavato pādapasse nisajjāya vītināmesi.
atk-s0503a:1230_7: Paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsitunti bhikkhu tuyhaṃ dhammo bhāsituṃ upaṭṭhātu ñāṇamukhe āgacchatu,
atk-s0503a:1231_0: Soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikānīti aṭṭhakavaggabhūtāni kāmasuttādīni soḷasa suttāni.
atk-s0503a:1231_6: Ekacco uggahaṇakāle sammā uggahetvāpi pacchā sajjhāyādivasena manasi karaṇakāle byañjanāni vā micchā ropeti,
atk-s0503a:1231_9: Iminā pana sammadeva yathuggahitaṃ manasi katāni.
atk-s0503a:1231_13: Atthe hi suṭṭu upadhārite sakkā pāḷiṃ sammā ussāretuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1231_14: Kalyāṇiyāsi vācāya samannāgatoti sithiladhanitādīnaṃ yathāvidhānavacanena parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanaparipuṇṇāya poriyā vācāya samannāgato āsi.
atk-s0503a:1231_20: Atha vā anelagaḷāyāti anelāya ca agaḷāya ca niddosāya agaḷitapadabyañjanāya,
atk-s0503a:1231_24: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ yadidaṃ soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:1231_25: Atthassa viññāpaniyāti yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ viññāpetuṃ samatthāya.
atk-s0503a:1232_0: Kativassoti so kira majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse ṭhito ākappasampanno ca paresaṃ ciratarapabbajito viya khāyati.
atk-s0503a:1232_4: ettakaṃ kālaṃ kasmā pamādamāpannoti puna anuyuñjituṃ satthā “kativassosī”ti taṃ pucchati.
atk-s0503a:1232_6: “kissa pana tvaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ ciraṃ akāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1233_2: kena kāraṇena evaṃ cirakālaṃ pabbajjaṃ anupagantvā agāramajjhe vasīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1233_3: Ciraṃ diṭṭho meti cirena cirakālena mayā diṭṭho.
atk-s0503a:1233_6: Api cāti kāmesu ādīnave kenaci pakārena diṭṭhepi na tāvāhaṃ gharāvāsato nikkhamituṃ asakkhiṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1233_7: Sambādho gharāvāso uccāvacehi kiccakaraṇīyehi samupabyūḷho agāriyabhāvo.
atk-s0503a:1234_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti kāmesu yathābhūtaṃ ādīnavadassino cittaṃ cirāyitvāpi na patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0503a:1234_1: aññadatthu padumapalāse udakabindu viya vinivattatiyevāti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1234_2: Imaṃ udānanti pavattiṃ nivattiñca sammadeva jānanto pavattiyaṃ tannimitte ca na kadācipi ramatīti idamatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1235_0: Tattha disvā ādīnavaṃ loketi sabbasmiṃ saṅkhāraloke “anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo”tiādinā ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ paññāya passitvā.
atk-s0503a:1235_2: Ñatvā dhammaṃ nirupadhinti sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggattā nirupadhiṃ nibbānadhammaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā nissaraṇavivekāsaṅkhatāmatasabhāvato
atk-s0503a:1235_4: “Disvā ñatvā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ “sappiṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1235_6: paññāya disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0503a:1235_7: Ariyo na ramatī pāpeti kilesehi ārakattā ariyo sappuriso aṇumattepi pāpe na ramati. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1235_8: Pāpe na ramatī sucīti suvisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya visuddhapuggalo rājahaṃso viya ukkāraṭṭhāne pāpe saṃkiliṭṭhadhamme na ramati nābhinandati.
atk-s0503a:1235_11: pāpo pāpapuggalo suciṃ anavajjaṃ vodānadhammaṃ na ramati,
atk-s0503a:1235_12: aññadatthu gāmasūkarādayo viya ukkāraṭṭhānaṃ asuciṃ saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva ramatīti paṭipakkhato desanaṃ parivatteti.
atk-s0503a:1236_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā udāne udānite āyasmā soṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano upajjhāyassa vacanena
atk-s0503a:1236_2: Bhagavāpi tāni anujānīti taṃ sabbaṃ khandhake āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1239_2: So hi sāsane pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo viharati,
atk-s0503a:1239_5: akappiyo guḷo”ti ca ādinā vinayakukkuccasaṅkhātakaṅkhābahulo pana hoti.
atk-s0503a:1239_7: So aparabhāge satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto chaḷabhiññā sacchikatvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmeti,
atk-s0503a:1239_8: yebhuyyena pana attanā adhigataṃ ariyamaggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
atk-s0503a:1239_11: Maggapaññā hi “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinayapavattāya soḷasavatthukāya,
atk-s0503a:1239_13: paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya aṭṭhavatthukāya,
atk-s0503a:1239_14: pageva itarāsanti anavasesato sabbakaṅkhānaṃ vitaraṇato samatikkamanato,
atk-s0503a:1239_15: aññehi ca attanā pahātabbakilesehi accantavisujjhanato “kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhī”ti idhādhippetā.
atk-s0503a:1239_16: Tañhi ayamāyasmā dīgharattaṃ kaṅkhāpakatattā “imaṃ maggadhammaṃ adhigamma imā me kaṅkhā anavasesā pahīnā”ti garuṃ katvā paccavekkhamāno nisīdi,
atk-s0503a:1240_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ ariyamaggassa anavasesakaṅkhāvitaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1241_0: Tattha yā kāci kaṅkhā idha vā huraṃ vāti idha imasmiṃ paccuppanne attabhāve “ahaṃ nu khosmi no nu khosmī”tiādinā huraṃ vā,
atk-s0503a:1241_1: atītānāgatesu attabhāvesu “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinā uppajjanakā kaṅkhā.
atk-s0503a:1241_2: Sakavediyā vā paravediyā vāti tā evaṃ vuttanayeneva sakaattabhāve ārammaṇavasena paṭilabhitabbāya pavattiyā
atk-s0503a:1241_3: sakavediyā vā parassa attabhāve paṭilabhitabbāya “buddho nu kho,
atk-s0503a:1241_4: no nu kho”tiādinā vā parasmiṃ padhāne uttame paṭilabhitabbāya pavattiyā paravediyā vā yā kāci kaṅkhā vicikicchā.
atk-s0503a:1241_6: ātāpino brahmacariyaṃ carantāti ye ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyino vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0503a:1241_7: catubbidhasammappadhānapāripūriyā ātāpino maggabrahmacariyaṃ carantā adhigacchantā saddhānusārīādippabhedā
atk-s0503a:1241_9: tā sabbā kaṅkhā pajahanti samucchindanti maggakkhaṇe.
atk-s0503a:1241_10: Tato paraṃ pana tā pahīnā nāma honti,
atk-s0503a:1241_11: tasmā ito aññaṃ tāsaṃ accantappahānaṃ nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1242_0: Iti bhagavā jhānamukhena āyasmato kaṅkhārevatassa jhānasīsena ariyamaggādhigamaṃ thomento thomanāvasena udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1242_3: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yadidaṃ kaṅkhārevato”ti jhāyībhāvena etadagge ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0503a:1245_1: Aṭṭhame āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocāti abhimāre payojetvā nāḷāgiriṃ vissajjāpetvā silaṃ pavaṭṭetvā bhagavato
atk-s0503a:1245_2: anatthaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto “saṅghaṃ bhinditvā cakkabhedaṃ karissāmī”ti adhippāyena etaṃ “ajjatagge”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0503a:1245_6: Uposathaṃ karissāmi saṅghakammāni cāti bhagavato ovādakārakaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ visuṃ katvā maṃ anuvattantehi
atk-s0503a:1245_7: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammāni ca karissāmīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1245_8: Devadatto saṅghaṃ bhindissatīti bhedakarānaṃ sabbesaṃ devadattena sajjitattā ekaṃseneva devadatto ajja saṅghaṃ bhindissati dvidhā karissati.
atk-s0503a:1245_9: “Adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīsu hi aṭṭhārasasu bhedakaravatthūsu yaṃkiñci ekampi vatthuṃ dīpetvā tena tena kāraṇena “imaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0503a:1245_10: imaṃ rocethā”ti saññāpetvā salākaṃ gāhetvā visuṃ saṅghakamme kate saṅgho bhinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:1246_0: “Pañcahi, upāli, ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1247_0: Tattha kammenāti apalokanakammādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena.
atk-s0503a:1247_2: Voharantoti tāhi tāhi uppattīhi “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūni dīpento.
atk-s0503a:1247_3: Anussāvanenāti “nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca,
atk-s0503a:1247_4: mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ gāheyyāti kiṃ tumhākaṃ cittampi uppādetuṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1247_5: kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī”tiādinā nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena.
atk-s0503a:1247_6: Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anussāvetvā tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anāvattidhamme katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
atk-s0503a:1248_0: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1248_2: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasena hi voharantena tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya gāhitāyapi abhinnova hoti saṅgho.
atk-s0503a:1248_3: Yadā panevaṃ cattāro vā atirekā vā salākaṃ gāhetvā āveṇikaṃ uddesaṃ vā kammaṃ vā karonti,
atk-s0503a:1248_5: Devadatto ca sabbaṃ saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāgaṃ nipphādetvā “ekaṃseneva ajja āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammañca
atk-s0503a:1249_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ avīcimahānirayuppattisaṃvattaniyaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ atekicchaṃ devadattena nibbattiyamānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1249_2: Imaṃ udānanti kusalākusalesu yathākkamaṃ sappurisāsappurisasabhāgavisabhāgapaṭipattivasena pana sukusalāti idamatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1250_0: Tattha sukaraṃ sādhunā sādhūti attano paresañca hitaṃ sādhetīti sādhu,
atk-s0503a:1250_2: Tena sādhunā sāriputtādinā sāvakena paccekabuddhena sammāsambuddhena aññena vā lokiyasādhunā sādhu sundaraṃ
atk-s0503a:1250_3: bhaddakaṃ attano paresañca hitasukhāvahaṃ sukaraṃ sukhena kātuṃ sakkā.
atk-s0503a:1250_4: Sādhu pāpena dukkaranti tadeva pana vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sādhu pāpena devadattādinā pāpapuggalena dukkaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0503a:1250_5: na so taṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1250_6: Pāpaṃ pāpena sukaranti pāpaṃ asundaraṃ attano paresañca anatthāvahaṃ pāpena yathāvuttapāpapuggalena sukaraṃ sukhena kātuṃ sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0503a:1250_7: Pāpamariyehi dukkaranti ariyehi pana buddhādīhi taṃ taṃ pāpaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1253_0: 49. Navame māṇavakāti taruṇā. Paṭhame yobbane ṭhitā brāhmaṇakumārakā idhādhippetā.
atk-s0503a:1254_5: taṃ ācikkhantīti sadhayamānāti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā “sadhāyamānā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1254_6: Atha vā visesato sasedhe viya attānaṃ āvadantīti sadhāyamānā.
atk-s0503a:1254_10: Bhagavato avidūre atikkamantīti bhagavato savanavisaye taṃ taṃ mukhāruḷhaṃ vadantā atiyanti.
atk-s0503a:1255_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ vācāya asaññatabhāvaṃ jānitvā tadatthadīpakaṃ dhammasaṃvegavasena imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1256_2: mayamevettha jānāmā”ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe attānameva jānantaṃ katvā samudācaraṇato.
atk-s0503a:1256_3: Vācāgocarabhāṇinoti yesaṃ vācā eva gocaro visayo,
atk-s0503a:1256_6: Atha vā vācāya agocaraṃ ariyānaṃ kathāya avisayaṃ musāvādaṃ bhaṇantīti vācāgocarabhāṇino.
atk-s0503a:1256_7: Atha vā “gocarabhāṇino”ti ettha ākārassa rassabhāvo kato.
atk-s0503a:1256_11: Yāvicchanti mukhāyāmaṃ attano yāva mukhāyāmaṃ yāva mukhappasāraṇaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0503a:1256_14: attano avisayatāya ca mukhasaṅkocaṃ na karontīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1256_15: Atha vā vācāgocarā eva hutvā bhāṇino,
atk-s0503a:1256_16: sayaṃ ajānitvā parapattikā eva hutvā vattāroti attho.
atk-s0503a:1256_17: Tato eva yāvicchanti mukhāyāmaṃ yena vacanena sāvetabbā,
atk-s0503a:1256_18: taṃ acintetvā yāvadeva attano mukhappasāraṇamattaṃ icchantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1256_19: Yena nītā na taṃ vidūti yena muṭṭhassaccādinā nillajjabhāvaṃ paṇḍitamānībhāvañca nītā “mayamevaṃ bhaṇāmā”ti,
atk-s0503a:1256_20: taṃ tathā attano bhaṇantassa kāraṇaṃ na vidū,
atk-s0503a:1259_1: Dasame cūḷapanthakoti mahāpanthakattherassa kaniṭṭhabhātikattā panthe jātattā ca daharakāle laddhavohārena
atk-s0503a:1259_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ yadidaṃ cūḷapanthako,
atk-s0503a:1259_6: cetovivaṭṭakusalānaṃ yadidaṃ cūḷapanthako”ti dvīsu ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapito asītiyā mahāsāvakesu abbhantaro.
atk-s0503a:1260_0: So ekadivasaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto attano divāṭṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisinno samāpattīhi divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0503a:1260_1: vītināmetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ upāsakesu dhammassavanatthaṃ anāgatesu eva vihāramajjhaṃ pavisitvā bhagavati
atk-s0503a:1260_2: gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinne “akālo tāva bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitu”nti gandhakuṭipamukhe ekamantaṃ nisīdi
atk-s0503a:1260_5: “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā cūḷapanthako bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1260_6: So hi tadā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:1261_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato cūḷapanthakassa kāyacittānaṃ sammāpaṇihitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:1261_1: Imaṃ udānanti aññopi yo passaddhakāyo sabbiriyāpathesu upaṭṭhitassati samāhito,
atk-s0503a:1261_2: tassa bhikkhuno anupādā parinibbānapariyosānassa visesādhigamassa tattha pātubhāvavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1262_0: Tattha ṭhitena kāyenāti kāyadvārikassa asaṃvarassa pahānena akaraṇena sammā ṭhapitena copanakāyena,
atk-s0503a:1262_1: tathā cakkhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ nibbisevanabhāvakaraṇena suṭṭhu ṭhapitena pañcadvārikakāyena,
atk-s0503a:1262_2: saṃyatahatthapādatāya hatthakukkuccādīnaṃ abhāvato apariphandanena ṭhitena karajakāyena cāti saṅkhepato
atk-s0503a:1262_6: Ṭhitena cetasāti cittassa ṭhitiparidīpanena samādhisampadaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1262_8: Tasmā samathavasena vipassanāvaseneva vā ekaggatāya sati cittaṃ ārammaṇe ekodibhāvūpagamanena ṭhitaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:1262_10: Idañca yathāvuttakāyacittānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ samādahanaṃ sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbesu ca iriyāpathesu icchitabbanti dassento āha –
atk-s0503a:1262_14: Tena tiṭṭhanto vā nisinno vā sayāno vā tadaññiriyāpatho vāti ayamattho dīpito hotīti caṅkamanassāpi idha saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1263_0: Etaṃ satiṃ bhikkhu adhiṭṭhahānoti yāya pageva parisuddhasamācāro kāyacittaduṭṭhullabhāvūpasamanena kāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1263_1: cittañca asāraddhaṃ katvā paṭiladdhāya anavajjasukhādhiṭṭhāya kāyacittapassaddhivasena cittaṃ lahuṃ muduṃ
atk-s0503a:1263_2: kammaññañca katvā sammā ṭhapento samādahanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ paribrūheti matthakañca pāpeti,
atk-s0503a:1263_3: taṃ eva kammaṭṭhānānuyogassa ādimajjhapariyosānesu bahūpakāraṃ satiṃ bhikkhu adhiṭṭhahāno sīlavisodhanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1263_4: ādiṃ katvā yāva visesādhigamā tattha tattha adhiṭṭhahantoti attho.
atk-s0503a:1263_5: Labhetha pubbāpariyaṃ visesanti so evaṃ satiārakkhena cetasā kammaṭṭhānaṃ uparūpari vaḍḍhento brūhento
atk-s0503a:1263_6: phātiṃ karonto pubbāpariyaṃ pubbāpariyavantaṃ pubbāparabhāgena pavattaṃ uḷāruḷāratarādibhedavisesaṃ labheyya.
atk-s0503a:1264_0: Tattha duvidho pubbāpariyaviseso samathavasena vipassanāvasena cāti.
atk-s0503a:1264_1: Tesu samathavasena tāva nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavasībhāvo,
atk-s0503a:1265_0: Laddhāna pubbāpariyaṃ visesanti pubbāpariyavisesaṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ arahattaṃ labhitvā.
atk-s0503a:1265_1: Adassanaṃ maccurājassa gaccheti jīvitupacchedavasena sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ abhibhavanato maccurājasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0503a:1265_2: maraṇassa visayabhūtaṃ bhavattayaṃ samatikkantattā adassanaṃ agocaraṃ gaccheyya.
atk-s0503a:1270_4: Bhagavā hi veḷuvagāmake vassaṃ vasitvā tato nikkhamitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavane vihāsi.
atk-s0503a:1270_5: Tasmiṃ kāle dhammasenāpati attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ oloketvā “sattāhameva pavattissatī”ti ñatvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1270_6: anujānāpetvā nāḷakagāmaṃ gantvā tattha mātaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0503a:1270_7: Satthā cundena ābhatā tassa dhātuyo gahetvā dhātucetiyaṃ kārāpetvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1270_9: Bhagavā tassapi dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā rājagahato nikkhamitvā anupubbena ukkācelaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1270_10: Tattha gaṅgātīre bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisīditvā aggasāvakānaṃ parinibbānappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā ukkācelato nikkhamitvā vesāliṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1270_11: Evaṃ gato bhagavā “pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṃ piṇḍāya pāvisī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:1271_1: Cāpālaṃ cetiyanti pubbe cāpālassa nāma yakkhassa vasitaṭṭhānaṃ “cāpālacetiya”nti paññāyittha.
atk-s0503a:1271_2: Tattha bhagavato katavihāropi tāya ruḷhiyā “cāpālacetiya”nti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:1271_4: Sattambanti kikissa kira kāsirañño dhītaro satta kumāriyo saṃvegajātā rājagehato nikkhamitvā yattha padhānaṃ padahiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1271_7: tasmiṃ adhivatthaṃ devataṃ bahū manussā putte patthenti,
atk-s0503a:1271_10: Iti sabbāneva tāni buddhuppādato pubbe devatāpariggahitattā cetiyavohārena voharitāni,
atk-s0503a:1271_11: bhagavato vihāre katepi ca tatheva paññāyanti.
atk-s0503a:1271_12: Ramaṇīyāti ettha vesāliyā tāva bhūmibhāgasampattiyā puggalasampattiyā sulabhapaccayatāya ca ramaṇīyabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1271_13: Vihārānaṃ pana nagarato nātidūratāya nāccāsannatāya gamanāgamanasampattiyā anākiṇṇavihāraṭṭhānatāya chāyūdakasampattiyā
atk-s0503a:1271_15: Cattāro iddhipādāti ettha iddhipādapadassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0503a:1272_0: Evaṃ aniyamena kathetvā puna niyametvā dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1272_3: Tiṭṭheyyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1272_5: Kappāvasesaṃ vāti “appaṃ vā bhiyyo vā”ti vuttaṃ vassasatato atirekaṃ vā.
atk-s0503a:1272_8: Yatheva hi veḷuvagāmake uppannaṃ māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ dasa māse vikkhambhesi,
atk-s0503a:1272_9: evaṃ punappunaṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vikkhambhento imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1272_12: buddhā ca pana khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ appatvā pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse bahujanassa piyamanāpakāleyeva parinibbāyanti.
atk-s0503a:1272_13: Buddhānubuddhesu aggasāvakamahāsāvakesu parinibbutesu aparivārena ekakeneva ṭhātabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1272_17: Evaṃ vuttepi so pana na ruccati,
atk-s0503a:1273_2: “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya yadidaṃ “yassa kassaci, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:1273_3: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvibhāvanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1273_5: Pākaṭañcetaṃ vacanaṃ pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukameva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1274_6: Bhagavato hi dhammacakkappavattanasuttadesanāya aññātakoṇḍaññappamukhā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo dhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1274_7: Evaṃ yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā dhammapaṭividdhasattānaṃ gaṇanā natthi,
atk-s0503a:1274_8: mahāsamayasuttaṃ maṅgalasuttaṃ cūḷarāhulovādasuttaṃ samacittasuttanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ suttānaṃ desanākāle abhisamayappattasattānaṃ paricchedo natthi,
atk-s0503a:1274_9: etassa aparimāṇassa sattalokassa anukampāya bhagavato ṭhānaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1274_12: avasesānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi atthāya hitāya sukhāya bhagavato ṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1274_13: Sahetukapaṭisandhike pana maggaphalasacchikiriyāya bhabbapuggale dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1274_14: tasmā aññesampi atthatthāya hitatthāya sukhatthāya bhagavā tiṭṭhatūti attho.
atk-s0503a:1275_0: Yathā taṃ mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittoti ettha nti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1275_1: yathā mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto ajjhotthaṭacitto aññopi koci puthujjano paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-s0503a:1275_3: Māro hi yassa keci vipallāsā appahīnā,
atk-s0503a:1275_5: Yassa pana sabbena sabbaṃ dvādasa vipallāsā appahīnā,
atk-s0503a:1275_9: So pana cittapariyuṭṭhānaṃ karonto kiṃ karotīti?
atk-s0503a:1275_12: tato sattā taṃ disvā vā sutvā vā satiṃ vissajjetvā vivaṭamukhā honti.
atk-s0503a:1275_13: Tesaṃ mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayaṃ maddati,
atk-s0503a:1275_15: Therassa panesa mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0503a:1275_17: Taṃ disvā thero nimittobhāsaṃ na paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0503a:1275_22: Passati hi bhagavā “ayaṃ mayi ativiya siniddhahadayo,
atk-s0503a:1275_23: so parato bhūmicālakāraṇañca āyusaṅkhārossajjanañca sutvā mama ciraṭṭhānaṃ yācissati,
atk-s0503a:1275_24: athāhaṃ ‘kissa tvaṃ puretaraṃ na yācasī’ti tasseva sīse dosaṃ pātessāmi,
atk-s0503a:1275_25: sattā ca attano aparādhena na tathā vihaññanti,
atk-s0503a:1276_1: ānandāti yasmā divāvihāratthāya idhāgato, tasmā, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:1277_0: Māro pāpimāti ettha satte anatthe niyojento māretīti māro.
atk-s0503a:1277_3: Bhāsitā kho panesāti ayañhi bhagavati bodhimaṇḍe satta sattāhe atikkamitvā ajapālanigrodhe viharante
atk-s0503a:1277_4: attano dhītāsu āgantvā icchāvighātaṃ patvā gatāsu ayaṃ “attheso upāyo”ti cintento āgantvā “bhagavā yadatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1277_8: kiṃ te lokavicaraṇenā”ti vatvā yathā ajja evameva “parinibbātu dāni,
atk-s0503a:1278_2: Visāradāti sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādīnaṃ pahānena visāradabhāvaṃ pattā.
atk-s0503a:1278_5: Atha vā bahussutāti pariyattibahussutā ceva paṭivedhabahussutā ca.
atk-s0503a:1278_6: Dhammadharāti pariyattidhammānaṃ ceva paṭivedhadhammānañca dhāraṇato dhammadharāti evampettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1278_9: Anudhammacārinoti sallekhikaṃ tassā paṭipadāya anurūpaṃ appicchatādidhammaṃ caraṇasīlā.
atk-s0503a:1278_20: Uttānīkarissantīti anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti.
atk-s0503a:1279_0: Ettha ca “paññapessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni,
atk-s0503a:1279_1: ādito pana dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadānīti.
atk-s0503a:1279_2: Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1280_3: Vitthārikanti vitthataṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge patiṭṭhahanavasena.
atk-s0503a:1280_6: Yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitanti yattakā viññujātikā devā manussā ca atthi,
atk-s0503a:1281_5: mā mayhaṃ parinibbānatthāya vāyāmaṃ karohī”ti vadati.
atk-s0503a:1281_6: Sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissaji pajahi.
atk-s0503a:1281_7: Tattha na bhagavā hatthena leḍḍuṃ viya āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji,
atk-s0503a:1281_8: temāsamattameva pana samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato paraṃ na samāpajjissāmīti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0503a:1282_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā kappaṃ vā kappāvasesaṃ vā ṭhātuṃ samattho tattakaṃ kālaṃ aṭṭhatvā parinibbāyituṃ mārassa yācanāya āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji?
atk-s0503a:1282_1: Na bhagavā mārassa yācanāya āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji,
atk-s0503a:1282_3: temāsato pana paraṃ buddhaveneyyānaṃ abhāvato āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji.
atk-s0503a:1282_4: Ṭhānañhi nāma buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ yāvadeva veneyyavinayanatthaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1282_5: te asati vineyyajane kena nāma kāraṇena ṭhassanti.
atk-s0503a:1282_11: Evaṃ mahānubhāvā buddhā bhagavantoyeva tiṭṭhantāpi attano ruciyāva tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0503a:1284_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ saṅkhāravisaṅkhārānaṃ visesasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1284_1: Imaṃ udānanti anavasesasaṅkhāre vissajjetvā attano visaṅkhāragamanadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1284_3: Koci nāma vadeyya “mārena pacchato pacchato anubandhitvā ‘parinibbātu,
atk-s0503a:1284_4: bhante’ti upadduto bhayena bhagavā āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1284_6: bhītassa udānaṃ nāma natthī”ti etassa dīpanatthaṃ pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1284_7: Tato temāsamatteneva ca pana buddhakiccassa nipphajjanato evaṃ dīgharattaṃ mayā parihaṭoyaṃ dukkhabhāro
atk-s0503a:1284_8: na cirasseva nikkhipiyatīti passato parinibbānaguṇapaccavekkhaṇe tassa uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajji,
atk-s0503a:1284_10: Ekantena hi visaṅkhāraninno nibbānajjhāsayo satthā mahākaruṇāya balakkārena viya sattahitatthaṃ loke suciraṃ ṭhito.
atk-s0503a:1284_11: Tathā hi devasikaṃ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo vaḷañjeti,
atk-s0503a:1284_12: sodāni mahākaruṇādhikārassa nipphannattā nibbānābhimukho anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi.
atk-s0503a:1284_13: Teneva hi bhagavato kilesaparinibbānadivase viya khandhaparinibbānadivasepi sarīrābhā visesato vippasannā parisuddhā pabhassarā ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1285_0: Gāthāya soṇasiṅgālādīnampi paccakkhabhāvato tulitaṃ paricchinnanti tulaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1285_3: tulaṃ vā sadisamassa aññaṃ lokiyakammaṃ natthīti atulaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1285_19: bhavābhavābhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena bhavasaṅkhāranti ca laddhanāmaṃ tulātulasaṅkhātaṃ lokiyakammañca ossaji,
atk-s0503a:1285_20: saṅgāmasīse mahāyodho kavacaṃ viya attasambhavaṃ kilesañca ajjhattarato samāhito hutvā abhindī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1286_4: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho nibbānaṃ nicca”ntiādinā nayena tulento buddhamuni bhave ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1286_5: nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā taṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ bhavasaṅkhārakammaṃ “kammakkhayāya saṃvattatī”ti
atk-s0503a:1286_10: samathavasena samāhitoti evaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya samathavipassanābalena kavacaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1286_11: attani sambhavattā “attasambhava”nti laddhanāmaṃ sabbaṃ kilesajālaṃ abhindi,
atk-s0503a:1286_12: kilesābhāveneva kammaṃ appaṭisandhikattā avassaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ kilesappahānena kammaṃ pajahi.
atk-s0503a:1286_13: Iti bodhimūleyeva avassaṭṭhabhavasaṅkhāro bhagavā vekhamissakena viya jarasakaṭaṃ samāpattivekhamissakena
atk-s0503a:1286_14: attabhāvaṃ yāpentopi “ito temāsato uddhaṃ samāpattivekhamassa na dassāmī”ti cittuppādanena āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajīti.
atk-s0503a:1289_3: So kira pāsādo lohapāsādo viya samantā catudvārakoṭṭhakaparivuto pākāraparikkhitto.
atk-s0503a:1289_4: Tesu pācīnadvārakoṭṭhakassa bahi pāsādacchāyāyaṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:1289_7: Ekasāṭakāti ekasāṭakanigaṇṭhā viya ekaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ hatthe bandhitvā tenāpi sarīrassa purimabhāgaṃ paṭicchādetvā vicaraṇakā.
atk-s0503a:1289_11: Avidūre atikkamantīti vihārassa avidūramaggena nagaraṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0503a:1290_4: Kasmā pana rājā loke aggapuggalassa santike nisinno evarūpānaṃ nagganissirīkānaṃ añjaliṃ paggaṇhātīti?
atk-s0503a:1290_6: Evañhissa ahosi “sacāhaṃ ettakampi etesaṃ na karissāmi,
atk-s0503a:1290_7: mayaṃ puttadāraṃ pahāya etassatthāya dubbhojanadukkhaseyyādīni anubhoma,
atk-s0503a:1290_9: Tasmiñhi kate amhe ‘ocarakā’ti jano aggahetvā ‘pabbajitā’icceva sañjānissati,
atk-s0503a:1290_10: kiṃ imassa bhūtatthakathanenāti attanā diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ paṭicchādetvā na katheyyuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1290_13: Rājā kira bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamantopi katipayakālaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ na saddahi.
atk-s0503a:1290_14: Tenassa evaṃ ahosi “yadi bhagavā sabbaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0503a:1290_15: mayā imesaṃ nipaccakāraṃ katvā ‘ime arahanto’ti vutte nānujāneyya,
atk-s0503a:1290_18: Evaṃ so satthu ajjhāsayajānanatthaṃ tathā akāsi.
atk-s0503a:1290_19: Bhagavā pana “ujukameva ‘na ime samaṇā ocarakā’ti vutte yadipi rājā saddahati,
atk-s0503a:1290_20: mahājano pana tamatthaṃ ajānanto na saddaheyya,
atk-s0503a:1290_21: samaṇo gotamo ‘rājā attano kathaṃ suṇātī’ti yaṃ kiñci mukhāruḷhaṃ kathetī’ti vadeyya,
atk-s0503a:1290_23: añño ca guḷhakammaṃ vivaṭaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0503a:1290_24: sayameva rājā tesaṃ ocarakabhāvaṃ kathessatī”ti ñatvā “dujjānaṃ kho eta”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1291_4: puttadāresu uppilāvitena tesaṃ gharāvāsādihetu sokābhibhavena cittassa saṃkiliṭṭhataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1292_1: Sīlaṃ veditabbanti “ayaṃ pesalo vā dussīlo vā”ti saṃvasantena ekasmiṃ ṭhāne saha vasantena jānitabbo.
atk-s0503a:1292_2: Tañca kho dīghena addhunā na ittaranti tañca sīlaṃ dīghena kālena veditabbaṃ,
