atk-s0503a:1292_4: Katipayadivase hi saññatākāro saṃvutindriyākāro ca hutvā sakkā dassetuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1292_5: Manasi karotā no amanasi karotāti tampi “sīlamassa pariggaṇhissāmī”ti manasi karontena paccavekkhantena sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-s0503a:1292_8: Bālo hi manasi karontopi jānituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0503a:1294_0: Evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāhi, vāṇijo so na brāhmaṇo”ti. –
atk-s0503a:1295_5: Ekaccassa hi sammukhākathā parammukhākathāya na sameti,
atk-s0503a:1295_9: So kathentoyeva sakkā jānituṃ “asuci eso puggalo”ti.
atk-s0503a:1295_14: tasmā kathentena sakkā sucibhāvo jānitunti pakāsento āha –
atk-s0503a:1296_2: so uppannesu upaddavesu gahetabbagahaṇaṃ kattabbakaraṇaṃ apassanto advārikaṃ gharaṃ paviṭṭho viya carati. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:1296_6: Duppaññassa hi kathā udake geṇḍu viya uplavati,
atk-s0503a:1296_8: Udakavipphandaneneva hi maccho khuddako mahanto vāti paññāyati.
atk-s0503a:1297_0: Iti bhagavā rañño ujukameva te “ime nāmā”ti avatvā arahantānaṃ anarahantānañca jānanūpāyaṃ pakāsesi.

atk-s0503a:1297_2: bhante”tiādinā attano pasādaṃ pakāsetvā idāni te yāthāvato bhagavato ārocento “ete, bhante,
atk-s0503a:1297_4: Tattha carāti apabbajitā eva pabbajitarūpena raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjantā paṭicchannakammantattā.
atk-s0503a:1297_6: Carā hi pabbatamatthakena carantāpi heṭṭhā carakāva nihīnakammattā.
atk-s0503a:1297_9: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dese taṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1297_16: kāmabandhanehi vā samappitāti suṭṭhu appitā allīnā.
atk-s0503a:1297_18: Paricāressantīti indriyāni samantato cāressanti kīḷāpessanti vā.
atk-s0503a:1298_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ rājapurisānaṃ attano udarassa kāraṇā pabbajitavesena lokavañcanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1299_0: Tattha na vāyameyya sabbatthāti dūteyyaocarakakammādike sabbasmiṃ pāpadhamme ime rājapurisā viya pabbajito na vāyameyya,
atk-s0503a:1299_2: sabbattha yattha katthaci vāyāmaṃ akatvā appamattakepi puññasmiṃyeva vāyameyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1299_3: Nāññassa puriso siyāti pabbajitarūpena aññassa puggalassa sevakapuriso na siyā. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1299_5: Nāññaṃ nissāya jīveyyāti aññaṃ paraṃ issarādiṃ nissāya “tappaṭibaddhaṃ me sukhadukkha”nti evaṃcitto hutvā na jīvikaṃ pavatteyya,
atk-s0503a:1299_7: Atha vā anatthāvahato “ocaraṇa”nti laddhanāmakattā aññaṃ akusalakammaṃ nissāya na jīveyya.
atk-s0503a:1299_8: Dhammena na vaṇiṃ careti dhanādiatthāya dhammaṃ na katheyya.
atk-s0503a:1299_9: Yo hi dhanādihetu paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0503a:1299_12: Atha vā dhanādīnaṃ atthāya kosalarañño puriso viya ocarakādikammaṃ karonto parehi anāsaṅkanīyatāya pabbajjāliṅgasamādānādīni
atk-s0503a:1299_14: Yopi idha parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantopi aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati,
atk-s0503a:1302_1: Tatiye attano aneke pāpake akusale dhamme pahīneti lobhadosamohaviparītamanasikāraahirikānottappakodhūpanāhamakkhapalāsaissāmacchariyamāyā-
atk-s0503a:1302_7: diyaḍḍhasahassakilese taṃsahagate cāpi aneke pāpake lāmake akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusale dhamme anavasesaṃ
atk-s0503a:1302_8: saha vāsanāya bodhimūleyeva pahīne ariyamaggena samucchinne paccavekkhamāno “ayampi me kileso pahīno,
atk-s0503a:1302_9: ayampi me kileso pahīno”ti anupadapaccavekkhaṇāya paccavekkhamāno bhagavā nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:1303_0: Aneke ca kusale dhammeti sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0503a:1303_71: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādike aneke attano kusale
atk-s0503a:1303_72: anavajjadhamme anantakālaṃ pāramiparibhāvanāya maggabhāvanāya ca pāripūriṃ vuddhiṃ gate “imepi anavajjadhammā
atk-s0503a:1303_74: imepi anavajjadhammā mayi saṃvijjantī”ti rucivasena manasikārābhimukhe buddhaguṇe vaggavagge puñjapuñje katvā paccavekkhamāno nisinno hoti.
atk-s0503a:1303_77: Sabbe buddhaguṇe bhagavatāpi anupadaṃ anavasesato manasi kātuṃ na sakkā anantāparimeyyabhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1312_0: Tadā hi bhagavā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto vihāraṃ pavisitvā gandhakuṭippamukhe ṭhatvā bhikkhūsu
atk-s0503a:1312_1: vattaṃ dassetvā gatesu mahāgandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno attano atītajātivisayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1312_3: Athassa tāni nirantaraṃ poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ anantāparimāṇappabhedā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1312_4: So “evaṃ mahantassa nāma dukkhakkhandhassa mūlabhūtā ime kilesā”ti kilesavisayaṃ ñāṇācāraṃ pesetvā te
atk-s0503a:1312_5: pahānamukhena anupadaṃ paccavekkhitvā “ime vata kilesā anavasesato mayhaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnā”ti puna tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:1312_6: pahānakaraṃ sākāraṃ saparivāraṃ sauddesaṃ ariyamaggaṃ paccavekkhanto anantāparimāṇabhede attano sīlādianavajjadhamme
atk-s0503a:1313_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā attano aneke pāpake akusale dhamme pahīne paccavekkhamāno nisinno hoti,
atk-s0503a:1313_1: aneke ca kusale dhamme bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gate”ti.
atk-s0503a:1314_0: Evaṃ paccavekkhitvā uppannapītisomanassuddesabhūtaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1315_0: Tattha ahu pubbeti arahattamaggañāṇuppattito pubbe sabbopi cāyaṃ rāgādiko kilesagaṇo mayhaṃ santāne ahu āsi,
atk-s0503a:1315_1: na imasmiṃ kilesagaṇe kocipi kileso nāhosi.
atk-s0503a:1315_2: Tadā nāhūti tadā tasmiṃ kāle ariyamaggakkhaṇe so kilesagaṇo na ahu na āsi,
atk-s0503a:1315_3: tattha aṇumattopi kileso aggamaggakkhaṇe appahīno nāma natthi.
atk-s0503a:1315_6: Nāhu pubbeti yo cāyaṃ mama aparimāṇo anavajjadhammo etarahi bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gato upalabbhati,
atk-s0503a:1315_7: sopi ariyamaggakkhaṇato pubbe na ahu na āsi.
atk-s0503a:1315_8: Tadā ahūti yadā pana me aggamaggañāṇaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1315_10: Aggamaggādhigamena hi saddhiṃ sabbepi sabbaññuguṇā buddhānaṃ hatthagatā eva honti.
atk-s0503a:1316_1: na cetarahi vijjatīti yo pana so anavajjadhammo ariyamaggo mayhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe uppanno,
atk-s0503a:1316_3: so yathā mayhaṃ maggakkhaṇato pubbe na cāhu na ca ahosi,
atk-s0503a:1316_4: evaṃ attanā pahātabbakilesābhāvato te kilesā viya ayampi na ca bhavissati anāgate na uppajjissati,
atk-s0503a:1316_5: etarahi paccuppannakālepi na vijjati na upalabbhati attanā kattabbakiccābhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1317_0: Iti bhagavā ariyamaggena attano santāne anavasesaṃ pahīne akusale dhamme bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gate aparimāṇe
atk-s0503a:1317_1: anavajjadhamme ca paccavekkhamāno attupanāyikapītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1320_1: Catutthe nānātitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakāti ettha taranti etena saṃsāroghanti titthaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1320_3: Idha pana viparītavipallāsavasena diṭṭhigatikehi tathā gahitadiṭṭhidassanaṃ “tittha”nti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1320_5: nagganigaṇṭhādisamaṇā ceva kaṭhakalāpādibrāhmaṇā ca pokkharasātādiparibbājakā ca samaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakā.
atk-s0503a:1320_6: Nānātitthiyā ca te samaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakā cāti nānātitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakā.
atk-s0503a:1321_0: “Sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādinā passanti etāya,
atk-s0503a:1321_4: Sassatādivasena nānā anekavidhā diṭṭhiyo etesanti nānādiṭṭhikā.
atk-s0503a:1321_7: atthato “sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādinā pavatto cittavipallāso saññāvipallāso ca.
atk-s0503a:1321_10: Diṭṭhigatikā hi pubbabhāge tathā tathā cittaṃ rocetvā khamāpetvā ca pacchā “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti abhinivisanti.
atk-s0503a:1321_11: Atha vā “aniccaṃ nicca”ntiādinā tathā tathā dassanavasena diṭṭhi,
atk-s0503a:1321_13: ruccanavasena rucīti evaṃ tīhipi padehi diṭṭhi eva vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:1321_14: Nānādiṭṭhinissayanissitāti sassatādiparikappavasena nānāvidhaṃ diṭṭhiyā nissayaṃ vatthuṃ kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1321_15: diṭṭhisaṅkhātameva vā nissayaṃ nissitā allīnā upagatā,
atk-s0503a:1321_17: Diṭṭhiyopi hi diṭṭhigatikānaṃ abhinivesākārānaṃ nissayā honti.
atk-s0503a:1322_4: lokena vā samaṇāti ca brāhmaṇāti ca evaṃ gahitā.
atk-s0503a:1322_5: Evaṃvādinoti evaṃ idāni vattabbākārena vadantīti evaṃvādino.
atk-s0503a:1322_6: Evaṃ idāni vattabbākārena pavattā diṭṭhi etesanti evaṃdiṭṭhino.
atk-s0503a:1322_8: paṭhamena tesaṃ yathābhinivesaṃ paresaṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpanavasena vohāro.
atk-s0503a:1323_1: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ettha lokoti attā.
atk-s0503a:1323_2: So hi diṭṭhigatikehi lokiyanti ettha puññaṃ pāpaṃ tabbipākā,
atk-s0503a:1323_3: sayaṃ vā kārakādibhāvena abhiyuttehi lokiyatīti lokoti adhippeto.
atk-s0503a:1323_4: Svāyaṃ sassato amaro nicco dhuvoti yadidaṃ amhākaṃ dassanaṃ idameva saccaṃ aviparītaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1323_5: aññaṃ pana asassatotiādi paresaṃ dassanaṃ moghaṃ micchāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1323_9: “Asassato”ti sassatabhāvappaṭikkhepeneva ucchedo dīpitoti sattapi ucchedavādā dīpitā honti.
atk-s0503a:1324_2: Etena sarīraparimāṇo aṅguṭṭhaparimāṇo avayavaparimāṇo paramāṇuparimāṇo attāti evamādivādā dassitā honti.
atk-s0503a:1325_0: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti yaṃ sarīraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1325_3: tadeva sarīranti jīvañca sarīrañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0503a:1325_4: Etena ājīvakānaṃ viya “rūpī attā”ti ayaṃ vādo dassito hoti.
atk-s0503a:1325_5: Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti iminā pana “arūpī attā”ti ayaṃ vādo dassito.
atk-s0503a:1326_0: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti ettha tathāgatoti satto.
atk-s0503a:1326_2: niccadhuvādisaṅkhātaṃ vā tathābhāvaṃ gatoti tathāgatoti voharati,
atk-s0503a:1326_3: so maraṇato idhakāyassa bhedato paraṃ uddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1326_5: Etena sassataggāhamukhena soḷasa saññīvādā aṭṭha asaññīvādā aṭṭha ca nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā dassitā honti.
atk-s0503a:1326_8: Hoti ca na ca hotīti atthi ca natthi cāti.
atk-s0503a:1326_9: Etena ekaccasassatavādā satta saññīvādā ca dassitā.
atk-s0503a:1326_10: Neva hoti na na hotīti iminā pana amarāvikkhepavādo dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1327_0: Ime kira diṭṭhigatikā nānādesato āgantvā sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasantā ekadā samayappavādake sannipatitvā attano
atk-s0503a:1327_1: attano vādaṃ paggayha aññavāde khuṃsentā vivādāpannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1328_7: Phalūpacārena viya hi kāraṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena phalampi vohariyati yathā taṃ “sukho buddhuppādo,
atk-s0503a:1328_10: Ediso dhammoti dhammo aviparītasabhāvo ediso evarūpo,
atk-s0503a:1328_15: So ca titthiyānaṃ vivādo sakalanagare pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0503a:1328_16: Atha bhikkhū sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhā taṃ sutvā “atthi no idaṃ kathāpābhataṃ,
atk-s0503a:1328_17: yaṃ nūna mayaṃ imaṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato āroceyyāma,
atk-s0503a:1328_18: appeva nāma taṃ nissāya satthu saṇhasukhumaṃ dhammadesanaṃ labheyyāmā”ti te pacchābhattaṃ dhammadesanākāle bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1329_0: Taṃ sutvā bhagavā aññatitthiyānaṃ dhammassa ayathābhūtapajānanaṃ pakāsento “aññatitthiyā,
atk-s0503a:1329_6: Tattha atthaṃ na jānantīti idhalokatthaṃ paralokatthaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0503a:1329_11: Anatthaṃ na jānantīti yadaggena te atthaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0503a:1329_15: Te hi vipariyesaggāhitāya dhammaṃ kusalampi akusalaṃ karonti,
atk-s0503a:1329_19: Tathā hi te kammampi vipākaṃ katvā voharanti,
atk-s0503a:1330_0: Iti bhagavā titthiyānaṃ mohadiṭṭhipaṭilābhabhāvena paññācakkhuvekallato andhabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni tamatthaṃ jaccandhūpamāya pakāsetuṃ “bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1330_4: Aññataro rājā ahosīti purātano nāmagottehi loke apākaṭo eko rājā ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1330_5: So rājā aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesīti tassa kira rañño sobhaggappattaṃ sabbaṅgasampannaṃ attano opavayhaṃ hatthiṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0503a:1330_8: Tena ca samayena eko jaccandho rājaṅgaṇena gacchati.
atk-s0503a:1330_10: “mahājāniyā kho ime andhā ye evarūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ na labhanti daṭṭhuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1330_11: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ imissā sāvatthiyā yattakā jaccandhā sabbe te sannipātāpetvā ekadesaṃ ekadesaṃ hatthena phusāpetvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ suṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0503a:1330_12: Keḷisīlo rājā ekena purisena sāvatthiyā sabbe jaccandhe sannipātāpetvā tassa purisassa saññaṃ adāsi “yathā
atk-s0503a:1330_13: ekeko jaccandho sīsādikaṃ ekekaṃyeva hatthissa aṅgaṃ phusitvā ‘hatthī mayā diṭṭho’ti saññaṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0503a:1330_16: Atha rājā te jaccandhe paccekaṃ pucchi “kīdiso, bhaṇe,
atk-s0503a:1330_18: Te attanā diṭṭhadiṭṭhāvayavameva hatthiṃ katvā vadantā “ediso hatthī,
atk-s0503a:1330_19: nediso hatthī”ti aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ karontā hatthādīhi upakkamitvā rājaṅgaṇe mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1330_20: Rājā saparijano tesaṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā phāsukehi bhijjamānehi hadayena uggatena mahāhasitaṃ hasi.
atk-s0503a:1331_6: Hatthiṃ dassehīti yathāvuttaṃ hatthiṃ sayāpetvā dassehi.
atk-s0503a:1331_8: Diṭṭho no hatthīti hatthena parāmasanaṃ dassanaṃ katvā āhaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1331_9: Tena purisena sīsaṃ parāmasāpetvā “ediso hatthī”ti saññāpitattā tādisaṃyeva naṃ hatthiṃ sañjānantā jaccandhā
atk-s0503a:1331_23: Attamano ahosīti keḷisīlattā so rājā tena jaccandhānaṃ kalahena attamano pahāsena gahitamano ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1332_3: yathā te jaccandhā acakkhukā ekaṅgadassino anavasesato hatthiṃ apassitvā attanā diṭṭhāvayavamattaṃ hatthisaññāya
atk-s0503a:1332_4: itarehi diṭṭhaṃ ananujānantā aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ āpannā kalahaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1332_5: evameva ime aññatitthiyā sakkāyassa ekadesaṃ rūpavedanādiṃ attano diṭṭhidassanena yathādiṭṭhaṃ “attā”ti
atk-s0503a:1332_6: maññamānā tassa sassatādibhāvaṃ āropetvā “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti abhinivisitvā aññamaññaṃ vivadanti,
atk-s0503a:1332_7: yathābhūtaṃ pana atthānatthaṃ dhammādhammañca na jānanti.
atk-s0503a:1333_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ titthiyānaṃ dhammasabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ jaccandhānaṃ viya hatthimhi yathādassanaṃ micchābhinivesaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1333_1: tattha ca vivādāpattiṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1334_2: jātimattena brāhmaṇā “sassato loko”tiādinayappavattesu imesu eva asāresu diṭṭhigatesu diṭṭhābhinandanavasena,
atk-s0503a:1334_3: imesu vā rūpādīsu upādānakkhandhesu evaṃ aniccesu dukkhesu vipariṇāmadhammesu taṇhābhinandanadiṭṭhābhinandanānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1334_9: atha kho viggayha naṃ vivadanti “na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsi,
atk-s0503a:1334_10: ahaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāmī”tiādinā viggāhikakathānuyogavasena viggayha vivadanti vivādaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0503a:1334_12: Atha vā viggayha nanti naṃ diṭṭhinissayaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhimeva vā viparītadassanattā sassatādivasena aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0503a:1334_14: attano eva vādaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ aviparītaṃ katvā abhinivissa voharanti.
atk-s0503a:1334_16: Janā ekaṅgadassino yatheva jaccandhajanā hatthissa ekekaṅgadassino “yaṃ yaṃ attanā phusitvā ñātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1334_17: taṃ tadeva hatthī”ti gahetvā aññamaññaṃ viggayha vivadiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1337_1: Pañcame sassato attā ca loko cāti rūpādīsu aññataraṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā taṃ sassataṃ niccanti aññepi ca tathā gāhentā voharanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:1338_0: “Rūpaṃ attā ceva loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapenti. Vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-s0503a:1338_1: viññāṇaṃ attā ca loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1339_5: Attāti vā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu eko khandho,
atk-s0503a:1339_9: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ attāti ca lokoti ca yathādassanaṃ dvidhā gahetvā tadubhayaṃ “nicco dhuvo sassato”ti abhinivissa voharanti.
atk-s0503a:1339_12: Sassato ca asassato cāti ekacco attā ca loko ca sassato,
atk-s0503a:1339_13: ekacco asassatoti evaṃ sassato ca asassato cāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1339_14: Atha vā sveva attā ca loko ca attagatidiṭṭhikānaṃ viya sassato ca asassato ca,
atk-s0503a:1339_17: Neva sassato nāsassatoti iminā amarāvikkhepavādo dassito.
atk-s0503a:1339_18: Te hi sassatavāde asassatavāde ca dosaṃ disvā “neva sassato nāsassato attā ca loko cā”ti vikkhepaṃ karontā vivadanti.
atk-s0503a:1340_1: Yathā hi tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ attā ca attano dhammānudhammaṃ katvā sukhadukkhāni paṭisaṃvedeti,
atk-s0503a:1340_2: evaṃ attāva attānaṃ tassa ca upabhogabhūtaṃ kiñcanaṃ palibodhasaṅkhātaṃ lokañca karoti,
atk-s0503a:1340_3: abhinimminātīti attaladdhi viya ayampi tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-s0503a:1340_5: attato parena issarena vā purisena vā pajāpatinā vā kālena vā pakatiyā vā attā ca loko ca kato,
atk-s0503a:1340_7: Sayaṃkato ca paraṃkato cāti yasmā attānañca lokañca nimminantā issarādayo na kevalaṃ sayameva nimminanti,
atk-s0503a:1340_8: atha kho tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ dhammādhammānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ labhitvāva,
atk-s0503a:1340_9: tasmā sayaṃkato ca paraṃkato ca attā ca loko cāti ekaccānaṃ laddhi.
atk-s0503a:1340_10: Asayaṃkāro aparaṃkāroti natthi etassa sayaṃkāroti asayaṃkāro,
atk-s0503a:1340_13: Ayaṃ ubhayattha dosaṃ disvā ubhayaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0503a:1340_15: adhiccasamuppannoti yadicchāya samuppanno kenaci kāraṇena vinā uppannoti adhiccasamuppannavādo dassito.
atk-s0503a:1341_0: Idāni ye diṭṭhigatikā attānaṃ viya sukhadukkhampi tassa guṇabhūtaṃ kiñcanabhūtaṃ vā sassatādivasena abhinivissa voharanti,
atk-s0503a:1341_1: tesaṃ taṃ vādaṃ dassetuṃ “santeke samaṇabrāhmaṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1342_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti ettha pana idha jaccandhūpamāya anāgatattā taṃ hitvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho yojetabbo,
atk-s0503a:1343_3: evaṃ diṭṭhigatesu diṭṭhinissayesu āsajjamānā diṭṭhigatikā kāmoghādīnaṃ catunnaṃ oghānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1343_4: saṃsāramahoghasseva vā antarāva vemajjhe eva yaṃ tesaṃ pārabhāvena patiṭṭhaṭṭhena vā ogadhasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1343_5: nibbānaṃ tadadhigamūpāyo vā ariyamaggo taṃ appatvāva anadhigantvāva visīdanti saṃsīdanti.
atk-s0503a:1346_2: Imaṃ udānanti ettha pana diṭṭhitaṇhāmānesu dosaṃ disvā te dūrato vajjetvā saṅkhāre yathābhūtaṃ passato
atk-s0503a:1346_3: ca tattha anādīnavadassitāya micchābhiniviṭṭhassa yathābhūtaṃ apassato ca yathākkamaṃ saṃsārato ativattanānativattanadīpakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1347_0: Tattha ahaṅkārapasutāyaṃ pajāti “sayaṃkato attā ca loko cā”ti evaṃ vuttasayaṃkārasaṅkhātaṃ ahaṅkāraṃ
atk-s0503a:1347_1: tathāpavattaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pasutā anuyuttā ayaṃ pajā micchābhiniviṭṭho sattakāyo.
atk-s0503a:1347_2: Paraṃkārūpasaṃhitāti paro añño issarādiko sabbaṃ karotīti evaṃ pavattaparaṃkāradiṭṭhisannissitā tāya upasaṃhitāti paraṃkārūpasaṃhitā.
atk-s0503a:1347_3: Etadeke nābbhaññaṃsūti etaṃ diṭṭhidvayaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā tattha dosadassino hutvā nānujāniṃsu. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0503a:1347_4: Sati hi sayaṃkāre kāmakārato sattānaṃ iṭṭheneva bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1347_6: Na hi koci attano dukkhaṃ icchati,
atk-s0503a:1347_10: svāyaṃ issaro attatthaṃ vā kareyya paratthaṃ vā.
atk-s0503a:1347_13: Atha vā paratthaṃ sabbesaṃ hitasukhameva nipphajjeyya,
atk-s0503a:1347_16: Yadi ca issarasaṅkhātaṃ aññanirapekkhaṃ niccamekakāraṇaṃ pavattiyā siyā,
atk-s0503a:1347_22: Yathā ca issarahetuko paraṃkāro na sijjhati,
atk-s0503a:1347_23: evaṃ pajāpatipurisapakatibrahmakālādihetutopi na sijjhateva tesampi asiddhattā vuttadosānativattanato ca.
atk-s0503a:1347_25: Ye pana yathāvutte sayaṃkāraparaṃkāre nānujānantāpi adhiccasamuppannaṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti,
atk-s0503a:1347_26: tepi na naṃ sallanti addasuṃ adhiccasamuppannantivādinopi micchābhinivesaṃ anatikkamanato yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:1347_27: ajānantānaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ tattha tattha dukkhuppādanato vijjhanaṭṭhena “salla”nti na passiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1348_0: Etañca sallaṃ paṭikacca passatoti yo pana āraddhavipassako pañcapi upādānakkhandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato samanupassati,
atk-s0503a:1348_1: so etañca tividhaṃ viparītadassanaṃ aññañca sakalaṃ micchābhinivesaṃ tesañca nissayabhūte pañcupādānakkhandhepi
atk-s0503a:1348_2: tujjanato duruddhārato ca “salla”nti paṭikacca pubbeyeva vipassanāpaññāya passati.
atk-s0503a:1348_3: Evaṃ passato ariyamaggakkhaṇe ekanteneva ahaṃ karomīti na tassa hoti.
atk-s0503a:1348_4: Yathā ca attano kārakabhāvo tassa na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0503a:1348_5: evaṃ paro karotīti na tassa hoti,
atk-s0503a:1348_8: Tena ca arahattappattiyā saṃsārasamatikkamo pakāsito hoti.
atk-s0503a:1349_1: na so saṃsārato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1349_3: Tattha mānupetā ayaṃ pajāti ayaṃ sabbāpi diṭṭhigatikasaṅkhātā pajā sattakāyo “mayhaṃ diṭṭhi sundarā,
atk-s0503a:1349_4: mayhaṃ ādāno sundaro”ti attano gāhassa saṃpaggahalakkhaṇena mānena upetā samannāgatā.
atk-s0503a:1349_5: Mānaganthā mānavinibaddhāti tato eva tena aparāparaṃ uppajjamānena yathā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ na paṭinissajjati,
atk-s0503a:1349_6: evaṃ attano santānassa ganthitattā vinibaddhattā ca mānaganthā mānavinibaddhā.
atk-s0503a:1349_8: saṃsāraṃ nātivattatīti “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti attukkaṃsanaparavambhanavasena attano diṭṭhābhinivesena
atk-s0503a:1349_9: paresaṃ diṭṭhīsu sārambhakathā virodhakathā saṃsāranāyikānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ appahānato saṃsāraṃ nātivattati,
atk-s0503a:1352_2: So hi āyasmā padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle katābhinīhāro kappasatasahassaṃ upacitapuññasambhāro imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1352_3: buddhuppāde uḷāravibhave gahapatikule uppanno bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saṃvegajāto gharā nikkhamma
atk-s0503a:1352_4: pabbajitvā katādhikārattā ghaṭento vāyamanto na cirasseva chaḷabhiñño jāto,
atk-s0503a:1352_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ araṇavihārīnaṃ yadidaṃ subhūtī”ti araṇavihāre bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0503a:1352_8: So ekadivasaṃ sāyanhasamayaṃ divāṭṭhānato vihāraṅgaṇaṃ otiṇṇo catuparisamajjhe bhagavantaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ
atk-s0503a:1352_9: disvā “desanāpariyosāne vuṭṭhahitvā vandissāmī”ti kālaparicchedaṃ katvā bhagavato avidūre aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1353_0: Tattha dutiyajjhānato paṭṭhāya rūpāvacarasamādhi sabbopi arūpāvacarasamādhi avitakkasamādhi eva.
atk-s0503a:1353_2: Dutiyajjhānādīhi pahīnā micchāvitakkā na tāva suppahīnā accantapahānābhāvato,
atk-s0503a:1353_3: ariyamaggena pana pahīnā eva puna pahānakiccābhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1353_4: Tasmā aggamaggapariyosānabhūto arahattaphalasamādhi sabbesaṃ micchāvitakkānaṃ pahānante uppannattā visesato “avitakkasamādhī”ti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-s0503a:1354_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato subhūtissa sabbamicchāvitakkasabbasaṃkilesapahānasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1354_1: sabbākārato jānitvā tadatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1355_0: Tattha yassa vitakkā vidhūpitāti yena ariyapuggalena,
atk-s0503a:1355_1: yassa vā ariyapuggalassa kāmavitakkādayo sabbepi micchāvitakkā vidhūpitā ariyamaggañāṇena santāpitā samucchinnā.
atk-s0503a:1355_2: Ajjhattaṃ suvikappitā asesāti niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte attano santāne uppajjanārahā suvikappitā suṭṭhu vikappitā asesato,
atk-s0503a:1355_4: Taṃ saṅgamaticca arūpasaññīti ettha nti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1355_8: sabbampi vā kilesasaṅgaṃ aticca atikkamitvā atikkamanahetu rūpasabhāvābhāvato ruppanasaṅkhātassa ca vikārassa
atk-s0503a:1355_9: tattha abhāvato nibbikārahetubhāvato vā “arūpa”nti laddhanāmaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattāhi maggaphalasaññāhi
atk-s0503a:1355_11: Catuyogātigatoti kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogoti cattāro yoge yathārahaṃ catūhipi maggehi atikkamitvā gato.
atk-s0503a:1355_17: Iti bhagavā āyasmato subhūtissa arahattaphalasamāpattivihāraṃ anupādisesanibbānañca ārabbha pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1358_5: Rājagahe kira ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase bahū dhuttapurisā gaṇabandhanena vicarantā ekamekassa ekamekaṃ vesiṃ ānetvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā chaṇakīḷaṃ kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1358_6: Tato parampi dve tayo chaṇadivase taṃ taṃyeva vesiṃ ānetvā chaṇakīḷaṃ kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1358_7: Athāparasmiṃ chaṇadivase aññepi dhuttā tatheva chaṇakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmā vesiyo ānentā purimadhuttehi pubbe ānītaṃ ekaṃ vesiṃ ānenti.
atk-s0503a:1358_8: Itare taṃ disvā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ pariggaho”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1358_11: amhākaṃ pariggaho”ti kalahaṃ vaḍḍhetvā pāṇippahārādīni akaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1358_13: “tena kho pana samayena rājagahe dve pūgā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:1359_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ kāmesu gedhaṃ vivādamūlaṃ sabbānatthamūlanti sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1359_1: Imaṃ udānanti antadvaye ca majjhimāya paṭipattiyā ādīnavānisaṃsavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1360_0: Tattha yañca pattanti yaṃ rūpādipañcakāmaguṇajātaṃ pattaṃ “natthi kāmesu doso”ti diṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā
atk-s0503a:1360_1: vā apurakkhatvā vā etarahi laddhaṃ anubhuyyamānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1360_9: so bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavatī”ti diṭṭhiṃ upanissāya taṃ anissajjitvā katena kammunā anāgate pattabbaṃ anubhavitabbañca.
atk-s0503a:1360_10: Ubhayametaṃ rajānukiṇṇanti etaṃ ubhayaṃ pattaṃ pattabbañca rāgarajādīhi anukiṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1360_11: Sampatte hi vatthukāme anubhavanto rāgarajena vokiṇṇo hoti,
atk-s0503a:1360_12: tattha pana saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa phale āyatiṃ āpanne domanassuppattiyā dosarajena vokiṇṇo hoti,
atk-s0503a:1360_16: tassa ca phalena dukkhāturassa ca ubhayatthāpi paṭikārābhilāsāya kilesaphale anusikkhato.
atk-s0503a:1361_0: Tathā yañca pattanti yaṃ acelakavatādivasena pattaṃ attaparitāpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1361_1: Yañca pattabbanti yaṃ micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānahetu apāyesu pattabbaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1362_0: Ye ca sikkhāsārāti yehi yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlabbatādisaṅkhātaṃ sikkhaṃ sārato gahetvā “iminā saṃsārasuddhī”ti kathitā. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:1362_9: evametehi yathāvuttehi sīlādīhi saṃsārasuddhi hotīti tāni sārato gahetvā ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā sikkhāsārā
atk-s0503a:1362_11: Ayameko antoti ayaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsavasena attakilamathānuyogasaṅkhāto majjhimāya paṭipattiyā uppathabhūto lāmakaṭṭhena ca eko anto.
atk-s0503a:1362_12: Ayaṃ dutiyo antoti ayaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogo kāmesu pātabyatāpattisaṅkhāto dutiyo vuttanayena anto.
atk-s0503a:1363_0: Iccete ubho antāti kāmasukhallikānuyogo attakilamathānuyogo ca iti ete ubho antā.
atk-s0503a:1363_2: āyatiṃ pattabbe ca kilesadukkharajānukiṇṇe kāmaguṇe attaparitāpane ca allīnehi kilesadukkhāturānaṃ anusikkhantehi,
atk-s0503a:1363_3: sayañca kilesadukkhāturehi paṭipajjitabbattā lāmakā uppathabhūtā cāti antā.
atk-s0503a:1363_4: Kaṭasivaḍḍhanāti andhaputhujjanehi abhikaṅkhitabbaṭṭhena kaṭasisaṅkhātānaṃ taṇhāavijjānaṃ abhivaḍḍhanā.
atk-s0503a:1363_5: Kaṭasiyo diṭṭhiṃ vaḍḍhentīti tā pana kaṭasiyo nānappakāradiṭṭhiṃ vaḍḍhenti.
atk-s0503a:1363_6: Vatthukāmesu assādānupassino hi te pajahituṃ asakkontassa taṇhāavijjāsahakārīkāraṇaṃ labhitvā “natthi
atk-s0503a:1363_8: attaparitāpanaṃ anuyuttassa pana avijjātaṇhāsahakārīkāraṇaṃ labhitvā “sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1363_12: Keci pana “kaṭasīti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1363_13: Tesaṃ yadaggena tato antadvayato saṃsārasuddhi na hoti,
atk-s0503a:1363_15: Apare pana “kaṭasivaḍḍhanā”ti padassa “aparāparaṃ jarāmaraṇehi sivathikavaḍḍhanā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1364_0: Ete te ubho ante anabhiññāyāti te ete yathāvutte ubhopi ante ajānitvā “ime antā te ca evaṃgahitā evaṃanuṭṭhitā
atk-s0503a:1364_2: “Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā”tiādīsu viyassa hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0503a:1364_3: Olīyanti eketi eke kāmasukhānuyogavasena saṅkocaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0503a:1364_5: Kāmasukhamanuyuttā hi vīriyassa akaraṇato kosajjavasena sammāpaṭipattito saṅkocamāpannatā olīyanti nāma,
atk-s0503a:1364_6: attaparitāpanamanuyuttā pana kosajjaṃ pahāya anupāyena vīriyārambhaṃ karontā sammāpaṭipattiyā atikkamanato atidhāvanti nāma,
atk-s0503a:1364_9: “ubho ante anabhiññāya olīyanti eke atidhāvanti eke”ti.
atk-s0503a:1365_2: Gosīlādivasena hi attaparitāpanamanuyuttā ekacce “imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā,
atk-s0503a:1365_3: tattha nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva ṭhassāmī”ti sassatadassanaṃ abhinivisantā saṃsāre olīyanti nāma,
atk-s0503a:1365_4: kāmasukhamanuyuttā pana ekacce yaṃkiñci katvā indriyāni santappetukāmā lokāyatikā viya tadanuguṇaṃ ucchedadassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1365_5: abhinivisantā anupāyena vaṭṭupacchedassa pariyesanato atidhāvanti nāma.
atk-s0503a:1366_0: Ye ca kho te abhiññāyāti ye ca kho pana ariyapuggalā te yathāvutte ubho ante “ime antā evaṃgahitā evaṃanuṭṭhitā
atk-s0503a:1366_1: evaṃgatikā evaṃabhisamparāyā”ti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya jānitvā majjhimapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0503a:1366_4: Tatra ca nāhesunti tatra tasmiṃ antadvaye patitā na ahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1366_6: Tena ca nāmaññiṃsūti tena antadvayapahānena “mama idaṃ antadvayapahānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1366_8: iminā antadvayapahānena seyyo”tiādinā taṇhādiṭṭhimānamaññanāvasena na amaññiṃsu sabbamaññanānaṃ sammadeva pahīnattā.
atk-s0503a:1366_9: Ettha ca aggaphale ṭhite ariyapuggale sandhāya “tatra ca nāhesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1366_10: tena ca nāmaññiṃsū”ti atītakālavasena ayaṃ desanā pavattā,
atk-s0503a:1366_11: maggakkhaṇe pana adhippete vattamānakālavaseneva vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-s0503a:1366_12: Vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ natthi paññāpanāyāti ye evaṃ pahīnasabbamaññanā uttamapurisā,
atk-s0503a:1366_13: tesaṃ anupādāparinibbutānaṃ kammavipākakilesavasena tividhampi vaṭṭaṃ natthi paññāpanāya,
atk-s0503a:1366_14: vattamānakkhandhabhedato uddhaṃ anupādāno viya jātavedo apaññattikabhāvameva gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1369_4: Andhakāropi “timisā”ti na vattabbo hoti abbhamahikādiupakkilesavirahite deve.
atk-s0503a:1369_6: Ayaṃ pana amāvasī ratti devo ca meghapaṭalasañchanno.
atk-s0503a:1370_0: Nanu ca bhagavato byāmappabhā pakatiyā byāmamattappadesaṃ abhibyāpetvā candimasūriyālokaṃ abhibhavitvā
atk-s0503a:1370_1: ghanabahalaṃ buddhālokaṃ vissajjentī andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0503a:1370_2: kāyappabhāpi nīlapītādivasena chabbaṇṇaghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjetvā pakatiyāva samantato asītihatthappadesaṃ obhāsentī tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0503a:1370_3: evaṃ buddhālokeneva ekobhāsabhūte bhagavato nisinnokāse padīpakaraṇe kiccaṃ natthīti?
atk-s0503a:1370_5: tathāpi puññatthikā upāsakā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pūjākaraṇatthaṃ devasikaṃ telappadīpaṃ upaṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0503a:1370_10: Pūjākaraṇatthameva hi tadāpi upāsakehi padīpā kāritā.
atk-s0503a:1371_0: Tasmiñhi divase sāvatthivāsino bahū upāsakā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gantvā uposathaṅgāni
atk-s0503a:1371_1: samādiyitvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā mahādānāni pavattetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1371_2: bhikkhusaṅghañca anugantvā nivattitvā attano attano gehāni gantvā sayampi paribhuñjitvā suddhavatthanivatthā
atk-s0503a:1371_3: suddhuttarāsaṅgā gandhamālādihatthā vihāraṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā keci manobhāvanīye bhikkhū payirupāsantā
atk-s0503a:1371_5: Te sāyanhasamaye bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā satthari dhammasabhāmaṇḍapato paṭṭhāya gandhakuṭisamīpe ajjhokāse paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinne,
atk-s0503a:1371_6: bhikkhusaṅghe ca bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsante uposathavisodhanatthañceva yonisomanasikāraparibrūhanatthañca
atk-s0503a:1371_8: Atha te bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pūjākaraṇatthaṃ bahū telappadīpe āropetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0503a:1371_9: vanditvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca añjaliṃ katvā bhikkhūnaṃ pariyante nisinnā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “bhante,
atk-s0503a:1371_10: ime titthiyā nānāvidhāni diṭṭhigatāni abhinivissa voharanti,
atk-s0503a:1371_13: ucchedādīsu aññataranti ekasmiṃyeva aṭṭhatvā navanavāni diṭṭhigatāni ‘idameva saccaṃ moghamañña’nti paggayha tiṭṭhanti ummattakasadisā,
atk-s0503a:1371_16: Tena ca samayena bahū paṭaṅgapāṇakā patantā patantā tesu telappadīpesu nipatanti.
atk-s0503a:1372_7: āpāthe padīpassa attano āpāthagamane sati paripatitvā paripatitvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1372_12: Tattha keci pāṇakā saha patanena mariṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1373_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ adhipātakapāṇakānaṃ attahitaṃ ajānantānaṃ attupakkamavasena niratthakabyasanāpattiṃ
atk-s0503a:1373_1: viditvā tesaṃ viya diṭṭhigatikānaṃ diṭṭhābhinivesena anayabyasanāpattidīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1374_0: Tattha upātidhāvanti na sāramentīti sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiādibhedaṃ sāraṃ na enti,
atk-s0503a:1374_2: Tasmiṃ pana saupāye sāre tiṭṭhanteyeva vimuttābhilāsāya taṃ upentā viya hutvāpi diṭṭhivipallāsena atidhāvanti atikkamitvā gacchanti,
atk-s0503a:1374_3: pañcupādānakkhandhe “niccaṃ subhaṃ sukhaṃ attā”ti abhinivisitvā gaṇhantāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1374_4: Navaṃ navaṃ bandhanaṃ brūhayantīti tathā gaṇhantā ca taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ navaṃ navaṃ bandhanaṃ brūhayanti vaḍḍhayanti.
atk-s0503a:1374_6: diṭṭhe sute itiheke niviṭṭhāti evaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhibandhanehi baddhattā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā diṭṭhe attanā
atk-s0503a:1374_7: cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhidassaneneva vā diṭṭhe anussavūpalabbhamatteneva ca sute “itiha ekantato evameta”nti
atk-s0503a:1374_9: ekantahitaṃ vā nissaraṇaṃ ajānantā rāgādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi ādittaṃ bhavattayasaṅkhātaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃyeva ime viya adhipātakā imaṃ pajjotaṃ patanti,
atk-s0503a:1374_10: na tato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkontīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1377_4: yasmiṃ kāleti vā attho. Evametaṃ, ānandāti, ānanda,
atk-s0503a:1377_5: tathāgate uppanne tathāgatassa tathāgatasāvakānaṃyeva ca lābhasakkāro abhivaḍḍhati,
atk-s0503a:1377_6: titthiyā pana nittejā vihatappabhā pahīnalābhasakkārā hontīti yaṃ tayā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1377_9: Cakkavattino hi cakkaratanassa pātubhāvena loko cakkaratanaṃ muñcitvā aññattha pūjāsakkārasammānaṃ na pavatteti,
atk-s0503a:1377_10: cakkaratanameva pana sabbo loko sabbabhāvehi sakkaroti garuṃ karoti māneti pūjeti.
atk-s0503a:1377_12: kimaṅgaṃ pana vivaṭṭānusāripuññaphalūpatthambhassa anantāparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhārassa buddharatanassa dhammaratanassa saṅgharatanassa cāti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1378_0: Bhagavā hi sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattavaradhammacakko anukkamena loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu jātesu
atk-s0503a:1378_1: saṭṭhi arahante janapadacārikāya vissajjetvā uruvelaṃ patvā uruvelakassapappamukhe sahassajaṭile arahatte
atk-s0503a:1378_2: patiṭṭhāpetvā tehi parivuto laṭṭhivanuyyāne nisīditvā bimbisārappamukhānaṃ aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ dvādasa
atk-s0503a:1378_3: nahutāni sāsane otāretvā yadā rājagahe vihāsi,
atk-s0503a:1378_4: tato paṭṭhāya bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca yathā yathā uparūpari uḷāralābhasakkāro abhivaḍḍhati,
atk-s0503a:1378_5: tathā tathā sabbatitthiyānaṃ lābhasakkāro parihāyi eva.
atk-s0503a:1379_0: Athekadivasaṃ āyasmā ānando divāṭṭhāne nisinno bhagavato ca ariyasaṅghassa ca sammāpaṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0503a:1379_1: pītisomanassajāto “kathaṃ nu kho titthiyāna”nti tesaṃ paṭipattiṃ āvajjesi.
atk-s0503a:1379_3: So “evaṃmahānubhāve nāma puññūpanissayassa dhammānudhammappaṭipattiyā ca ukkaṃsapāramippatte bhagavati,
atk-s0503a:1379_4: ariyasaṅghe ca dharante kathaṃ ime aññatitthiyā evaṃ duppaṭipannā akatapuññā varākā lābhino sakkatā bhavissantī”ti
atk-s0503a:1379_5: titthiyānaṃ lābhasakkārahāniṃ nissāya kāruññaṃ uppādetvā atha attano parivitakkaṃ “yāvakīvañca,
atk-s0503a:1379_8: tayā micchā parivitakkita”nti avatvā suvaṇṇāliṅgasadisaṃ gīvaṃ unnāmetvā supupphitasatapattasassirikaṃ mahāmukhaṃ abhippasannataraṃ katvā “evametaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1379_13: Atha bhagavā tassaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ atītepi mayi anuppanne ekacce nīcajanā sammānaṃ labhitvā mama uppādato
atk-s0503a:1380_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti diṭṭhigatikānaṃ tāva sakkārasammāno yāva na sammāsambuddhā loke uppajjanti,
atk-s0503a:1380_1: tesaṃ pana uppādato paṭṭhāya te hatalābhasakkārā nippabhā nittejāva honti,
atk-s0503a:1380_2: duppaṭipattiyā dukkhato ca na muccantīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1381_0: Tattha obhāsati tāva so kimīti so khajjūpanakakimi tāvadeva obhāsati jotati dibbati.
atk-s0503a:1381_1: Yāva na unnamate pabhaṅkaroti tīsupi mahādīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇena “pabhaṅkaro”ti laddhanāmo sūriyo yāva na uggamati na udeti.
atk-s0503a:1381_2: Anuggate hi sūriye laddhokāsā khajjūpanakā viparivattamānāpi kaṇṭakaphalasadisā tamasi vijjotanti.
atk-s0503a:1381_4: hatappabho hoti na cāpi bhāsatīti samantato andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā kiraṇasahassena virocanasabhāvatāya
atk-s0503a:1381_5: verocananāmake ādicce uṭṭhite so khajjūpanako hatappabho nittejo kāḷako hoti,
atk-s0503a:1381_6: rattandhakāre viya na bhāsati na dibbati.
atk-s0503a:1382_0: Evaṃ obhāsitameva takkikānanti yathā tena khajjūpanakena sūriyuggamanato pureyeva obhāsitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1382_1: evaṃ takketvā vitakketvā parikappanamattena diṭṭhīnaṃ gahaṇato “takkikā”ti laddhanāmehi titthiyehi obhāsitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1382_4: Na takkikā sujjhanti na cāpi sāvakāti yadā pana sammāsambuddhā loke uppajjanti,
atk-s0503a:1382_5: tadā diṭṭhigatikā na sujjhanti na sobhanti,
atk-s0503a:1382_7: aññadatthu vihatasobhā rattikhittā viya sarā na paññāyanteva.
atk-s0503a:1382_8: Atha vā yāva sammāsambuddhā loke nuppajjanti,
atk-s0503a:1382_9: tāvadeva takkikānaṃ obhāsitaṃ attano samayena jotanaṃ bālalāpanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1382_13: Te hi durakkhātadhammavinayā sammāpaṭipattirahitā na saṃsārato sujjhanti aniyyānikasāsanattā.
atk-s0503a:1382_15: Takkikā hi ayāthāvaladdhikatāya duddiṭṭhino micchābhiniviṭṭhadiṭṭhikā viparītadassanā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ anissajjitvā saṃsāradukkhato na kadācipi muccantīti.
atk-s0503a:1387_1: Cūḷavaggassa paṭhame lakuṇḍakabhaddiyanti ettha bhaddiyoti tassa āyasmato nāmaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1387_3: So kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto mahaddhano mahābhogo rūpena apāsādiko dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimako.
atk-s0503a:1387_4: So ekadivasaṃ satthari jetavane viharante upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0503a:1387_5: pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:1387_6: Tadā sekkhā bhikkhū yebhuyyena āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācanti,
atk-s0503a:1387_9: So tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ pūrento kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhati,
atk-s0503a:1387_18: Te disvā lakuṇḍakabhaddiyopi sekho samāno kālaṃ ñatvā attano cittakallatañca sallekhañca paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0503a:1387_19: dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā katapaṭisanthāro sammodamāno dhammadesanaṃ yāci.
atk-s0503a:1387_22: “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ lakuṇḍakabhaddiyaṃ anekapariyāyena dhammiyā kathāya sandassetī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:1388_3: Dhammiyā kathāyāti pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayādipakāsaniyā dhammiyā kathāya.
atk-s0503a:1388_4: Sandassetīti tāniyeva aniccādilakkhaṇāni udayabbayādike ca sammā dasseti,
atk-s0503a:1388_6: Samādapetīti tattha lakkhaṇārammaṇikaṃ vipassanaṃ sammā ādapeti,
atk-s0503a:1388_9: Samuttejetīti vipassanāya āraddhāya saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayādīsu upaṭṭhahantesu yathākālaṃ paggahaniggahasamupekkhaṇehi
atk-s0503a:1388_10: bojjhaṅgānaṃ anupavattanena bhāvanaṃ majjhimaṃ vīthiṃ otāretvā yathā vipassanāñāṇaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā vahati,
atk-s0503a:1388_11: evaṃ indriyānaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇena vipassanācittaṃ sammā uttejeti,
atk-s0503a:1388_13: Sampahaṃsetīti tathā pavattiyamānāya vipassanāya samappavattabhāvanāvasena ceva upariladdhabbabhāvanābalena ca cittaṃ sammā pahaṃseti,
atk-s0503a:1388_15: Anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccīti yathā yathā dhammasenāpati dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0503a:1388_16: tathā tathā tathalakkhaṇaṃ vipassantassa therassa ca desanānubhāvena,
atk-s0503a:1388_17: attano ca upanissayasampattiyā ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā desanānusārena ñāṇe anupavattante kāmāsavādīsu
atk-s0503a:1388_18: kañci āsavaṃ aggahetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyāva anavasesato cittaṃ vimucci,
atk-s0503a:1389_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato lakuṇḍakabhaddiyassa aññārādhanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1390_3: Vippamuttoti pubbabhāge vikkhambhanavimuttiyā aparabhāge samucchedapaṭipassaddhivimuttīhi sabbappakārena vimutto.
atk-s0503a:1390_4: Ettha ca uddhaṃ vippamuttoti etena pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanapahānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1390_9: Ubhayaggahaṇeneva tadubhayapaṭisaṃyuttattā paccuppanno addhā gahito hoti,
atk-s0503a:1390_14: anāgato atīto paccuppannoti evaṃ tiyaddhasaṅgahite sabbasmiṃ bhave vippamuttoti.
atk-s0503a:1391_1: so rūpavedanādīsu “ayaṃ nāma dhammo ahamasmī”ti diṭṭhimānamaññanāvasena evaṃ nānupassati.
atk-s0503a:1391_2: Tassa tathā dassane kāraṇaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1391_3: Atha vā ayaṃhamasmīti anānupassīti idaṃ yathāvuttāya vimuttiyā adhigamupāyadīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1391_6: eso me attā”ti pavattanasabhāvāya maññanāya anadhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā “netaṃ mama,
atk-s0503a:1391_8: na me so attā”ti evaṃ uppajjamānā yā pubbabhāgavuṭṭhānagāminī vipassanā,
atk-s0503a:1391_11: atiṇṇapubbaṃ apunabbhavāyāti evaṃ dasahi saṃyojanehi sabbākusalehi ca sabbathā vimutto arahā ariyamaggādhigamanato
atk-s0503a:1391_12: pubbe supinantepi atiṇṇapubbaṃ kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjoghoti imaṃ catubbidhaṃ oghaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1391_13: saṃsāramahoghameva vā apunabbhavāya anupādisesāya nibbānāya udatāri uttiṇṇo,
atk-s0503a:1394_8: So hi apariyositasikkhattā tadadhimuttattā ca ekantena sikkhanasīlo,
atk-s0503a:1394_9: na pariniṭṭhitasikkho asekho viya tattha paṭippassaddhussukko,
atk-s0503a:1394_10: nāpi vissaṭṭhasikkho pacurajano viya tattha anadhimutto.
atk-s0503a:1394_11: Atha vā ariyāya jātiyā tīsu sikkhāsu jāto,
atk-s0503a:1394_15: Āyasmā hi lakuṇḍakabhaddiyo paṭhamasutte vuttena vidhinā paṭhamovādena yathānisinnova āsavakkhayappatto.
atk-s0503a:1394_16: Dhammasenāpati pana tassa taṃ arahattappattiṃ anāvajjanena ajānitvā “sekhoyevā”ti maññamāno appaṃ yācito
atk-s0503a:1394_17: bahuṃ dadamāno uḷārapuriso viya bhiyyo bhiyyo anekapariyāyena āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ kathetiyeva.
atk-s0503a:1394_19: kiṃ iminā ovādenā”ti acintetvā saddhammagāravena pubbe viya sakkaccaṃ suṇātiyeva.
atk-s0503a:1394_20: Taṃ disvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnoyeva buddhānubhāvena yathā dhammasenāpati tassa kilesakkhayaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0503a:1395_0: Gāthāyaṃ pana acchecchi vaṭṭanti anavasesato kilesavaṭṭaṃ samucchindi,
atk-s0503a:1395_4: Taṃ nirāsaṃ visesena agā adhigatoti byagā,
atk-s0503a:1395_5: aggamaggassa adhigatattā puna adhigamakāraṇena vinā adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0503a:1395_7: tāya pahīnāya appahīno nāma kileso natthi,
atk-s0503a:1395_8: tasmāssa taṇhāpahānaṃ savisesaṃ katvā dassento “visukkhā saritā na sandatī”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1395_10: catutthasūriyapātubhāvena viya mahānadiyo catutthamaggañāṇuppādena anavasesato visukkhā visositā taṇhāsaritā nadī na sandati,
atk-s0503a:1395_16: Chinnaṃ vaṭṭaṃ na vattatīti evaṃ kilesavaṭṭasamucchedena chinnaṃ vaṭṭaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ avipākadhammatañca
atk-s0503a:1395_17: āpādanena upacchinnaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ na vattati na pavattati.
atk-s0503a:1395_18: Esevanto dukkhassāti yadetaṃ sabbaso kilesavaṭṭābhāvato kammavaṭṭassa appavattanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1395_19: so āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭassa ekaṃseneva anuppādo eva sakalassāpi saṃsāradukkhassa anto paricchedo parivaṭumabhāvoti.
atk-s0503a:1398_3: Sattāti ayonisomanasikārabahulatāya vijjamānampi ādīnavaṃ anoloketvā assādameva saritvā sajjanavasena sattā,
atk-s0503a:1398_5: Rattāti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmakaraṇena chandarāgena rattā sārattā.
atk-s0503a:1398_6: Giddhāti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhijjhanena giddhā gedhaṃ āpannā.
atk-s0503a:1398_7: Gadhitāti rāgamucchitā viya dummocanīyabhāvena tattha paṭibaddhā.
atk-s0503a:1398_8: Mucchitāti kilesavasena visaññībhūtā viya anaññakiccā mucchaṃ mohaṃ āpannā.
atk-s0503a:1398_9: Ajjhopannāti anaññasādhāraṇe viya katvā gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0503a:1398_10: Sammattakajātāti kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjantā appasukhavedanāya sammattakā suṭṭhu mattakā jātā.
atk-s0503a:1398_14: Ettha ca paṭhamaṃ “kāmesū”ti vatvā punapi “kāmesū”ti vacanaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tadadhimuttidīpanatthaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1398_15: Tena sabbiriyāpathesu kāmaguṇasamaṅgino hutvā tadā vihariṃsūti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1399_0: Tasmiñhi samaye ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe sāvatthivāsino ussavaṃ ghosetvā yathāvibhavaṃ āpānabhūmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1399_1: sajjetvā bhuñjantā pivantā āvi ceva raho ca kāme paribhuñjantā indriyāni paricārentā kāmesu pātabyataṃ
atk-s0503a:1399_3: Bhikkhū sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carantā tattha tattha gehe ārāmuyyānādīsu ca manusse ussavaṃ ghosetvā kāmaninne
atk-s0503a:1399_4: tathā paṭipajjante disvā “vihāraṃ gantvā saṇhasukhumaṃ dhammaṃ labhissāmā”ti bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1400_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ manussānaṃ āpānabhūmiramaṇīyesu mahāpariḷāhesu anekānatthānubandhesu
atk-s0503a:1400_1: ghorāsayhakaṭukaphalesu kāmesu anādīnavadassitaṃ sabbākārato viditvā kāmānañceva kilesānañca ādīnavavibhāvanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1401_0: Tattha kāmesu sattāti vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena rattā mattā sattā visattā laggā laggitā saṃyuttā.
atk-s0503a:1401_1: Kāmasaṅgasattāti tāyeva kāmasattiyā vatthukāmesu rāgasaṅgena ceva diṭṭhimānadosaavijjāsaṅgehi ca sattā āsattā.
atk-s0503a:1401_4: satte vā dukkhehi saṃyojanato bandhanato saṃyojananāmake kāmarāgādikilesajāte saṃyojanīyesu dhammesu
atk-s0503a:1401_5: assādānupassitāya vaṭṭadukkhamūlabhāvādikaṃ vajjaṃ dosaṃ ādīnavaṃ apassantā.
atk-s0503a:1401_7: oghaṃ tareyyuṃ vipulaṃ mahantanti evaṃ ādīnavadassanābhāvena saṃyojanasabhāvesu saṅgesu,
atk-s0503a:1401_8: saṃyojanasaṅkhātehi vā saṅgehi tesaṃ visayesu tebhūmakadhammesu sattā vipulavisayatāya anādikālatāya ca vipulaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ mahantañca kāmādioghaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1401_10: ekaṃseneva tassa oghassa pāraṃ na gaccheyyunti attho.
atk-s0503a:1404_0: 64. Catutthe andhīkatāti kāmā nāma anandhampi andhaṃ karonti.
atk-s0503a:1406_0: “Luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0503a:1407_0: Andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate nara”nti. –
atk-s0503a:1408_0: Tasmā kāmena anandhāpi andhā katāti andhīkatā.
atk-s0503a:1408_2: Tattha hi manussānaṃ pavatti bhikkhūhi disvā bhagavato ārocitā,
atk-s0503a:1408_3: idha bhagavatā sāmaṃyeva diṭṭhāti ayameva viseso.
atk-s0503a:1408_4: Satthā sāvatthito nikkhamitvā jetavanaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge aciravatiyaṃ nadiyaṃ macchabandhehi oḍḍitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1408_5: kuminaṃ pavisitvā nikkhantuṃ asakkonte bahū macche passi,
atk-s0503a:1408_6: tato aparabhāge ekaṃ khīrapakaṃ vacchaṃ goravaṃ katvā anubandhitvā thaññapipāsāya gīvaṃ pasāretvā mātu antarasatthiyaṃ mukhaṃ upanentaṃ passi.
atk-s0503a:1408_7: Atha bhagavā vihāraṃ pavisitvā pāde pakkhāletvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno pacchimaṃ vatthudvayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1408_8: purimassa upamānabhāvena gahetvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1409_0: Tattha kāmandhāti vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena andhā vicakkhukā katā.
atk-s0503a:1409_2: tannissitesu ca dhammesu atītādivasena anekabhedabhinnesu heṭṭhupariyavasena aparāparaṃ uppattiyā antogadhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1409_3: anatthāvahato ca jālabhūtāya taṇhāya sukhumacchiddena jālena parivuto viya udakarahado sañchannā paliguṇṭhitā
atk-s0503a:1409_5: Taṇhāchadanachāditāti taṇhāsaṅkhātena chadanena sevālapaṇakena viya udakaṃ chāditā,
atk-s0503a:1410_0: Pamattabandhunā baddhāti kilesamārena devaputtamārena ca baddhā.
atk-s0503a:1412_0: Tena taṃ bādhayissāmi, na me samaṇa mokkhasī”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:1413_0: Namuci kaṇho pamattabandhūti tīṇi mārassa nāmāni.
atk-s0503a:1413_1: Devaputtamāropi hi kilesamāro viya anatthena pamatte satte bandhatīti pamattabandhu.
atk-s0503a:1413_6: Macchāva kumināmukhe yathā nāma macchabandhakena oḍḍitassa kuminassa mukhe paviṭṭhā macchā tena baddhā hutvā maraṇamanventi pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0503a:1413_7: evameva mārena oḍḍitena kāmaguṇabandhanena baddhā ime sattā jarāmaraṇamanventi.
atk-s0503a:1413_8: Vaccho khīrapakova mātaraṃ yathā khīrapāyī taruṇavaccho attano mātaraṃ anveti anugacchati,
atk-s0503a:1413_9: na aññaṃ evaṃ mārabandhanabaddhā sattā saṃsāre paribbhamantā maraṇameva anventi anugacchanti,
atk-s0503a:1416_1: Pañcame sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhitoti āyasmā lakuṇḍakabhaddiyo ekadivasaṃ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0503a:1416_2: saddhiṃ gāmantarena piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco pattaṃ vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā aṃse laggetvā
atk-s0503a:1416_3: cīvaraṃ saṅgharitvā tampi vāmaṃse ṭhapetvā pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena
atk-s0503a:1416_4: samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno attano satipaññāvepullaṃ pakāsento viya satisampajaññaṃ
atk-s0503a:1416_5: sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā samāhitena cittena pade padaṃ nikkhipanto gacchati,
atk-s0503a:1416_6: gacchanto ca bhikkhūnaṃ pacchato pacchato gacchati tehi bhikkhūhi asaṃmisso. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1416_8: Apica tassāyasmato rūpaṃ paribhūtaṃ paribhavaṭṭhānīyaṃ puthujjanā ohīḷenti.
atk-s0503a:1416_9: Thero taṃ jānitvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchati “mā ime maṃ nissāya apuññaṃ pasaviṃsū”ti.
atk-s0503a:1416_10: Evaṃ te bhikkhū ca thero ca sāvatthiṃ patvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamanti.
atk-s0503a:1417_1: Tenassa vaṇṇasampattiyā saṇṭhānasampattiyā ca abhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1417_3: Tenassa anubyañjanasampattiyā ākārasampattiyā ca abhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1417_7: Puthujjanā ekacce chabbaggiyādayo tassāyasmato guṇaṃ ajānantā hatthakaṇṇacūḷikādīsu gaṇhantā parāmasantā kīḷantā paribhavanti, na ariyā,
atk-s0503a:1418_2: Evaṃ kira bhagavato ahosi “ime bhikkhū mama puttassa mahānubhāvataṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0503a:1418_4: taṃ nesaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1418_5: handāhaṃ imassa guṇe bhikkhūnaṃ pakāsetvā paribhavato naṃ mocessāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1419_2: yā tena bhikkhunā asamāpannapubbāti rūpasamāpatti arūpasamāpatti brahmavihārasamāpatti nirodhasamāpatti
atk-s0503a:1419_3: phalasamāpattīti evaṃ pabhedā sāvakasādhāraṇā yā kāci samāpattiyo nāma,
atk-s0503a:1419_4: tāsu ekāpi samāpatti na sulabharūpā, dullabhā,
atk-s0503a:1419_5: natthiyeva sā tena lakuṇḍakabhaddiyena bhikkhunā asamāpannapubbā.
atk-s0503a:1419_8: tattha mahiddhikataṃ pakāsetvā idāni mahānubhāvataṃ dassetuṃ “yassa catthāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1419_14: ayaṃ bhikkhu na yo vā so vā dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimakoti bhikkhūnaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito āgacchatīti ca ettakena na oññātabbo,
atk-s0503a:1419_18: tasmā taṃ pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garuṃ katvā oloketha,
atk-s0503a:1419_19: taṃ vo dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1420_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato lakuṇḍakabhaddiyassa mahiddhikatāmahānubhāvatādibhedaṃ guṇarāsiṃ sabbākārato
atk-s0503a:1421_5: Taṃ nelaṃ padhānabhūtaṃ aṅgaṃ etassāti nelaṅgo.
atk-s0503a:1421_12: So pana suparisuddhadhavalabhāvena seto vā hoti rattanīlādīsu vā aññataro.
atk-s0503a:1421_13: Idha pana arahattaphalavimuttiyā adhippetattā suparisuddhabhāvaṃ upādāya “setapacchādo”ti vuttaṃ yathā aññatrāpi “ratho sīlaparikkhāro”ti.
atk-s0503a:1422_2: Āyantanti sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito āgacchantaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1422_4: Pakatirathassa hi sukhapavattanatthaṃ akkhasīsesu nābhiyañca upalittānaṃ sappitelādīnaṃ soto savanaṃ sandanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1422_6: Ayaṃ pana chattiṃsatiyā sotānaṃ anavasesato pahīnattā chinnasoto nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:1422_9: Rathūpattharassa hi akkhena saddhiṃ niccalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ bahūni bandhanāni honti,
atk-s0503a:1422_11: Ayaṃ pana sabbasaṃyojanabandhanānaṃ anavasesato parikkhīṇattā abandhano,
atk-s0503a:1422_13: Passāti bhagavā therassa guṇehi somanassappatto hutvā attānaṃ vadati.
atk-s0503a:1423_0: Iti satthā āyasmantaṃ lakuṇḍakabhaddiyaṃ arahattaphalasīsena sucakkaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1423_5: saṃyojanādīnaṃ abhāvena abandhanaṃ suparikkhittaṃ suyuttaṃ ājaññarathaṃ katvā dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1426_1: Chaṭṭhe aññāsikoṇḍaññoti ettha koṇḍaññoti tassāyasmato gottato āgatanāmaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1426_2: Sāvakesu pana sabbapaṭhamaṃ ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhīti bhagavatā “aññāsi vata, bho,
atk-s0503a:1426_4: Taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttinti taṇhā saṅkhīyati pahīyati etthāti taṇhāsaṅkhayo, nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1426_6: Taṇhā vā saṅkhīyati pahīyati etenāti taṇhāsaṅkhayo,
atk-s0503a:1427_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa aggaphalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1428_0: Tattha yassa mūlaṃ chamā natthīti yassa ariyapuggalassa attabhāvarukkhamūlabhūtā avijjā,
atk-s0503a:1428_1: tassāva patiṭṭhā hetubhūtā āsavanīvaraṇaayonisomanasikārasaṅkhātā chamā pathavī ca natthi aggamaggena samugghātitattā.
atk-s0503a:1428_2: Paṇṇā natthi kuto latāti natthi latā kuto paṇṇāti padasambandho.
atk-s0503a:1428_5: Atha vā paṇṇā natthi kuto latāti rukkhaṅkurassa vaḍḍhamānassa paṭhamaṃ paṇṇāni nibbattanti.
atk-s0503a:1428_7: Tattha yassa ariyamaggabhāvanāya asati uppajjanārahassa attabhāvarukkhassa ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā yaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ mūlaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1428_9: Mūlaggahaṇeneva cettha mūlakāraṇattā bījaṭṭhāniyaṃ kammaṃ tadabhāvopi gahitoyevāti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1429_0: Taṃ dhīraṃ bandhanā muttanti taṃ catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyayogena vijitamārattā dhīraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1429_2: Ko taṃ ninditumarahatīti ettha nti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1429_3: Evaṃ sabbakilesavippamuttaṃ sīlādianuttaraguṇasamannāgataṃ ko nāma viññujātiko nindituṃ garahituṃ arahati nindānimittasseva abhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1429_4: Devāpi naṃ pasaṃsantīti aññadatthu devā sakkādayo guṇavisesavidū,
atk-s0503a:1429_6: Kiñca bhiyyo brahmunāpi pasaṃsito mahābrahmunāpi aññehipi brahmanāgayakkhagandhabbādīhipi pasaṃsito thomitoyevāti.
atk-s0503a:1432_1: Sattame papañcasaññāsaṅkhāpahānanti papañcenti yattha sayaṃ uppannā,
atk-s0503a:1432_2: taṃ santānaṃ vitthārenti ciraṃ ṭhapentīti papañcā, kilesā.
atk-s0503a:1433_0: “Rāgo papañco, doso papañco, moho papañco, taṇhā papañco, diṭṭhi papañco, māno papañco”ti. –
atk-s0503a:1434_10: Atthato saddhiṃ nimittehi taṃtaṃpapañcassa pakkhiyo kilesagaṇo.
atk-s0503a:1434_15: tena tena maggena rāgādikilesānaṃ samucchedananti attho.
atk-s0503a:1435_0: Tadā hi bhagavā atītāsu anekakoṭisatasahassasaṅkhāsu attano jātīsu anatthassa nimittabhūte kilese imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1435_1: carimabhave ariyamaggena bodhimaṇḍe savāsane pahīne paccavekkhitvā sattasantānañca kilesacaritaṃ rāgādikilesasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1435_2: kañjiyapuṇṇalābuṃ viya takkabharitacāṭiṃ viya vasāpītapilotikaṃ viya ca dubbinimociyaṃ disvā “evaṃ gahanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1435_3: nāmidaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ anādikālabhāvitaṃ mayhaṃ anavasesaṃ pahīnaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1435_6: “atha kho bhagavā attano papañcasaññāsaṅkhāpahānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1436_0: Tattha yassa papañcā ṭhiti ca natthīti yasmā bhagavā attānameva paraṃ viya katvā niddisati tasmā yassa aggapuggalassa vuttalakkhaṇā papañcā,
atk-s0503a:1436_1: tehi katā saṃsāre ṭhiti ca natthi.
atk-s0503a:1436_7: papañcānaṃ ṭhiti vijjamānatā maggena asamucchedo papañcaṭṭhiti,
atk-s0503a:1436_8: papañcā eva vā avasiṭṭhakusalākusalavipākānaṃ pavattiyā hetubhāvato vaṭṭassa ṭhiti papañcaṭṭhiti,
atk-s0503a:1436_10: Sandānaṃ palighañca vītivattoti yo bandhanaṭṭhena santānasadisattā “sandāna”nti laddhanāmā taṇhādiṭṭhiyo,
atk-s0503a:1436_11: nibbānanagarapavesanisedhanato palighasadisattā palighasaṅkhātaṃ avijjañca vītivatto savāsanapahānena visesato atikkanto.
atk-s0503a:1437_0: Taṃ nittaṇhaṃ muniṃ carantanti taṃ sabbathāpi taṇhābhāvena nittaṇhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1437_2: ekanteneva sabbasattahitatthaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi nānāsamāpatticārehi anaññasādhāraṇena ñāṇacārena ca carantaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1437_3: Nāvajānāti sadevakopi lokoti sabbo sapaññajātiko sattaloko sadevakopi sabrahmakopi na kadācipi avajānāti na paribhoti,
atk-s0503a:1437_4: atha kho ayameva loke aggo seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti garuṃ karonto sakkaccaṃ pūjāsakkāranirato hotīti.
atk-s0503a:1440_1: Aṭṭhame ajjhattanti ettha ayaṃ ajjhattasaddo “cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānī”tiādīsu ajjhattajjhatte āgato.
atk-s0503a:1440_4: “Sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādīsu visayajjhatte,
atk-s0503a:1440_8: bhikkhunā tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabba”ntiādīsu gocarajjhatte.
atk-s0503a:1440_10: Tasmā ajjhattanti gocarajjhattabhūte kammaṭṭhānārammaṇeti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1440_14: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “ajjhattaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānavasena paṭiladdhaṃ uḷāraṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1441_0: Ayañhi thero bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ viharante ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto
atk-s0503a:1441_1: vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā divāṭṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisinno nānāsamāpattīhi divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0503a:1441_2: vītināmetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ vihāramajjhaṃ otaritvā bhagavati gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinne “akālo tāva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1441_4: aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle kālaparicchedaṃ katvā yathāvuttaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:1441_5: Satthā taṃ tathānisinnaṃ gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnoyeva passi.
atk-s0503a:1442_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato mahākaccānattherassa satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāvasena adhigataṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1442_1: katvā samāpajjanaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1443_1: satataṃ kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti yassa āraddhavipassakassa ekadivasaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā sabbasmimpi kāle
atk-s0503a:1443_2: nāmarūpabhedena duvidhepi kāye gatā kāyārammaṇā pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ aniccādisammasanavasena
atk-s0503a:1443_3: satataṃ nirantaraṃ sātaccābhiyogavasena sati upaṭṭhitā siyā.
atk-s0503a:1444_0: Ayaṃ kirāyasmā paṭhamaṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānavasena jhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānamukhena
atk-s0503a:1444_2: So aparabhāgepi yebhuyyena tameva jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva ca vipassitvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati.
atk-s0503a:1444_4: taṃ vidhiṃ dassento satthā “yassa siyā sabbadā sati,
atk-s0503a:1444_5: satataṃ kāyagatā upaṭṭhitā”ti vatvā tassā upaṭṭhānākāraṃ vibhāvetuṃ “no cassa no ca me siyā,
atk-s0503a:1444_6: na bhavissati na ca me bhavissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1445_0: Tassattho dvidhā veditabbo sammasanato pubbabhāgavasena sammasanakālavasena cāti.
atk-s0503a:1445_1: Tesu pubbabhāgavasena tāva no cassa no ca me siyāti atītakāle mama kilesakammaṃ no cassa na bhaveyya ce,
atk-s0503a:1445_2: imasmiṃ paccuppannakāle ayaṃ attabhāvo no ca me siyā na me uppajjeyya.
atk-s0503a:1445_3: Yasmā pana me atīte kammakilesā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1445_4: tasmā taṃnimitto etarahi ayaṃ me attabhāvo pavattati.
atk-s0503a:1445_5: Na bhavissati na ca me bhavissatīti imasmiṃ attabhāve paṭipakkhādhigamena kilesakammaṃ na bhavissati na uppajjissati me,
atk-s0503a:1445_6: āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ na ca me bhavissati na me pavattissatīti.
atk-s0503a:1445_7: Evaṃ kālattaye kammakilesahetukaṃ idaṃ mayhaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1446_0: Sammasanakālavasena pana no cassa no ca me siyāti yasmā idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1446_3: evaṃ yadi ayaṃ attā nāma nāpi khandhapañcakavinimutto koci no cassa no ca siyā na bhaveyya, evaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:1446_4: no ca me siyā mama santakaṃ nāma kiñci na bhaveyya.
atk-s0503a:1446_5: Na bhavissatīti attani attaniye bhavitabbaṃ yathā cidaṃ nāmarūpaṃ etarahi ca atīte ca attattaniyaṃ suññaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1446_6: evaṃ na bhavissati na me bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1446_7: anāgatepi khandhavinimutto attā nāma na koci na me bhavissati na pavattissati,
atk-s0503a:1446_8: tato eva kiñci palibodhaṭṭhāniyaṃ na me bhavissati āyatimpi attaniyaṃ nāma na me kiñci bhavissatīti.
atk-s0503a:1446_9: Iminā tīsu kālesu “aha”nti gahetabbassa abhāvato “mama”nti gahetabbassa ca abhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1447_0: Anupubbavihāri tattha soti evaṃ tīsupi kālesu attattaniyaṃ suññataṃ tattha saṅkhāragate anupassanto anukkamena
atk-s0503a:1447_2: Kāleneva tare visattikanti so evaṃ vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhito yogāvacaro indriyānaṃ paripākagatakālena
atk-s0503a:1447_3: vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya maggena ghaṭitakālena ariyamaggassa uppattikālena sakalassa bhavattayassa
atk-s0503a:1448_0: Iti bhagavā aññāpadesena āyasmato mahākaccānassa arahattuppattidīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1451_1: Navame mallesūti mallā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0503a:1451_2: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena “mallā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:1451_9: Thūṇaṃ nāma mallānaṃ brāhmaṇagāmoti puratthimadakkhiṇāya disāya majjhimadesassa avadhiṭṭhāne malladese thūṇanāmako brāhmaṇabahulatāya brāhmaṇagāmo.
atk-s0503a:1451_17: na tesaṃ savanantarāyo ahosīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1451_24: Gahapatikāti khattiyabrāhmaṇe vajjetvā ye keci agāraṃ ajjhāvasantā vuccanti,
atk-s0503a:1452_6: Bhagavā ca anuttarena ariyamaggena sabbaso samitapāpo.
atk-s0503a:1452_19: Kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya nekkhammādhigamasaddhāya pabbajitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1452_20: Udapānaṃ tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūresunti pānīyakūpaṃ tiṇena ca bhusena ca mukhappamāṇena vaḍḍhesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1453_0: Tassa kira gāmassa bahi bhagavato āgamanamagge brāhmaṇānaṃ paribhogabhūto eko udapāno ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1453_1: Taṃ ṭhapetvā tattha sabbāni kūpataḷākādīni udakaṭṭhānāni tadā visukkhāni nirudakāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1453_2: Atha thūṇeyyakā ratanattaye appasannā maccherapakatā bhagavato āgamanaṃ sutvā “sace samaṇo gotamo sasāvako imaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā dvīhatīhaṃ vaseyya,
atk-s0503a:1453_3: sabbaṃ imaṃ janaṃ attano vacane ṭhapeyya,
atk-s0503a:1453_4: tato brāhmaṇadhammo patiṭṭhaṃ na labheyyā”ti tattha bhagavato avāsāya parisakkantā “imasmiṃ gāme aññattha udakaṃ natthi,
atk-s0503a:1453_6: evaṃ samaṇo gotamo sasāvako imaṃ gāmaṃ na pavisissatī”ti sammantayitvā sabbe gāmavāsino sattāhassa udakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1453_7: gahetvā cāṭiādīni pūretvā udapānaṃ tiṇena ca bhusena ca pidahiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1453_9: “udapānaṃ tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūresuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1454_0: Tattha muṇḍakā samaṇakāti muṇḍe “muṇḍā”ti samaṇe “samaṇā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya,
atk-s0503a:1454_5: Etamhāti yo udapāno tehi tathā kato,
atk-s0503a:1454_7: Kiṃ pana bhagavā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vippakāraṃ anāvajjitvā evamāha –
atk-s0503a:1454_10: Jānanto eva bhagavā attano buddhānubhāvaṃ pakāsetvā te dametvā nibbisevane kātuṃ evamāha,
atk-s0503a:1454_13: Dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko pana satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ajānanto thūṇeyyakehi kataṃ vippakāraṃ ācikkhanto “idāni so,
atk-s0503a:1455_3: Thero dvikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā tatiyavāre “na kho tathāgatā tikkhattuṃ paccanīkā kātabbā,
atk-s0503a:1455_4: kāraṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ bhavissati dīghadassinā”ti mahārājadattiyaṃ bhagavato pattaṃ gahetvā udapānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1455_5: Gacchante there udapāne udakaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hutvā uttaritvā samantato sandati,
atk-s0503a:1455_6: sabbaṃ tiṇaṃ bhusañca uplavitvā sayameva apagacchi.
atk-s0503a:1455_7: Tena ca sandamānena salilena uparūpari vaḍḍhantena tasmiṃ gāme sabbeva pokkharaṇīādayo jalāsayā visukkhā paripūriṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1455_9: Sabbo gāmappadeso mahoghena ajjhotthaṭo mahāvassakāle viya ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1455_10: Kumuduppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīni jalajapupphāni tattha tattha ubbhijjitvā vikasamānāni udakaṃ sañchādiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1455_11: Saresu haṃsakoñcacakkavākakāraṇḍavabakādayā e udakasakuṇikā vassamānā tattha tattha vicariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1455_12: Thūṇeyyakā taṃ mahoghaṃ tathā uttarantaṃ samantato vīcitaraṅgasamākulaṃ pariyantato samuṭṭhahamānaṃ ruciraṃ
atk-s0503a:1455_13: pheṇabubbuḷakaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā evaṃ sammantesuṃ “mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa udakupacchedaṃ
atk-s0503a:1455_15: ayaṃ pana mahogho tassa āgamanakālato paṭṭhāya evaṃ abhivaḍḍhati,
atk-s0503a:1455_19: yathā yaṃ mahogho uṭṭhahitvā amhākaṃ gāmampi otthareyya.
atk-s0503a:1455_20: Handa mayaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsitvā accayaṃ desentā khamāpeyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1456_0: Te sabbeva ekajjhāsayā hutvā saṅghasaṅghī gaṇībhūtā gāmato nikkhamitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1456_1: Upasaṅkamitvā appekacce bhagavato pāde sirasā vandiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1456_6: Evaṃ pana katvā sabbeva ekamantaṃ nisīditvā “idha mayaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1456_8: bhoto ceva gotamassa gotamasāvakānañca udakappaṭisedhaṃ kārayimha,
atk-s0503a:1456_10: So pana udapāno acetanopi samāno sacetano viya bhoto guṇaṃ jānanto viya sayameva sabbaṃ tiṇaṃ bhusaṃ apanetvā suvisuddho jāto,
atk-s0503a:1456_11: sabbopi cettha ninnappadeso mahatā udakoghena paripuṇṇo ramaṇīyova jāto,
atk-s0503a:1456_13: Mayaṃ pana manussāpi samānā bhoto guṇe na jānimha,
atk-s0503a:1456_15: sādhu no bhavaṃ gotamo tathā karotu,
atk-s0503a:1456_16: yathāyaṃ mahogho imaṃ gāmaṃ na otthareyya,
atk-s0503a:1456_18: taṃ no bhavaṃ gotamo accayaṃ paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti accayaṃ desesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1456_20: taṃ vo mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma āyatiṃ saṃvarāyā”ti tesaṃ accayaṃ paṭiggahetvā pasannacittataṃ ñatvā uttari ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0503a:1456_21: Te bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacittā saraṇādīsu patiṭṭhitā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1456_22: Tesaṃ pana āgamanato puretaraṃyeva āyasmā ānando taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajāto pattena
atk-s0503a:1456_23: pānīyaṃ ādāya bhagavato upanāmetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:1457_0: Tattha mukhato ovamitvāti sabbaṃ taṃ tiṇādiṃ mukhena chaḍḍetvā.
atk-s0503a:1457_1: Vissandanto maññeti pubbe dīgharajjukena udapānena ussiñcitvā gahetabbaudakogho bhagavato pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0503a:1457_2: therassa gatakāle mukhena vissandanto viya samatittiko kākapeyyo hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:1457_3: Idañca therassa gatakāle udakappavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1457_4: Tato paraṃ pana pubbe vuttanayena tasmiṃ gāme sakalaṃ ninnaṭṭhānaṃ udakena paripuṇṇaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1457_7: atha kho bhagavato puññānubhāvena parittadesanatthaṃ rājagahato vesāligamane viya.
atk-s0503a:1457_8: Keci pana “thūṇeyyakānaṃ bhagavati pasādajananatthaṃ tesaṃ atthakāmāhi devatāhi kata”nti.
atk-s0503a:1457_11: yathā bhagavato puññānubhāvenayeva tathā udakuppattiyā paridīpitattā.
atk-s0503a:1458_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ adhiṭṭhānena vinā attanā icchitanipphattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1459_1: āpā ce sabbadā siyunti yassa sabbakālaṃ sabbattha ca āpā ce yadi siyuṃ yadi upalabbheyyuṃ yadi ākaṅkhāmattapaṭibaddho,
atk-s0503a:1459_3: tena udapānena kiṃ kayirā kiṃ kareyya,
atk-s0503a:1459_6: kissa pariyesanaṃ careti yāya taṇhāya vinibaddhā sattā akatapuññā hutvā icchitālābhadukkhena vihaññanti,
atk-s0503a:1459_8: mūle vā chinditvā ṭhito mādiso sabbaññubuddho kissa kena kāraṇena pānīyapariyesanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1459_11: taṇhāya mūlaṃ mūleyeva vā chedakoti attho.
atk-s0503a:1459_12: Atha vā mūlato chettāti mūlato paṭṭhāya taṇhāya chedako.
atk-s0503a:1459_14: yo bodhiyā mūlabhūtamahāpaṇidhānato paṭṭhāya aparimitaṃ sakalaṃ puññasambhāraṃ attano acintetvā lokahitatthameva
atk-s0503a:1459_15: pariṇāmanavasena paripūrento mūlato pabhuti taṇhāya chettā,
atk-s0503a:1459_16: so taṇhāhetukassa icchitālābhassa abhāvato kissa kena kāraṇena udakapariyesanaṃ careyya,
atk-s0503a:1459_17: ime pana thūṇeyyakā andhabālā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ ajānantā evamakaṃsūti.
atk-s0503a:1462_1: Dasame rañño utenassāti utenassa nāma rañño,
atk-s0503a:1462_5: “antepura”nti pana padaṃ apekkhitvā sambandhepetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1462_9: bhaddavatiyaṃ seṭṭhino dhītā ghosakaseṭṭhinā dhītuṭṭhāne ṭhapitā pañcasataitthiparivārā rañño utenassa
atk-s0503a:1462_12: vitthārato pana ādito paṭṭhāya sāmāvatiyā uppattikathā dhammapadavatthumhi vuttanayena veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:1462_13: Māgaṇḍiyassa nāma brāhmaṇassa dhītā attano mātāpitūnaṃ –
atk-s0503a:1467_0: Bhagavatā desitaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā satthari baddhāghātā māgaṇḍiyā aparabhāge raññā utenena mahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapitā bhagavato kosambiṃ upagatabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1467_1: sāmāvatīpamukhānañca pañcannaṃ itthisatānaṃ upāsikābhāvaṃ ñatvā “āgato nāma samaṇo gotamo imaṃ nagaraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1467_4: imāsampi sāmāvatīpamukhānañca kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti anekapariyāyehi tathāgatassa tāsañca anatthaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0503a:1467_5: vāyamitvāpi asakkontī punekadivasaṃ raññā saddhiṃ uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchantī cūḷapitu sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “sāmāvatiyā
atk-s0503a:1467_6: pāsādaṃ gantvā dussakoṭṭhāgāratelakoṭṭhāgārāni vivarāpetvā dussāni telacāṭīsu temetvā thambhe veṭhetvā
atk-s0503a:1467_7: tā sabbā ekato katvā dvāraṃ pidahitvā bahi yantaṃ datvā daṇḍadīpikāhi gehe aggiṃ dadamāno otaritvā gacchatū”ti.
atk-s0503a:1468_0: Taṃ sutvā so pāsādaṃ abhiruyha koṭṭhāgārāni vivaritvā vatthāni telacāṭīsu temetvā thambhe veṭhetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0503a:1468_1: Atha naṃ sāmāvatīpamukhā itthiyo “kiṃ etaṃ cūḷapitā”ti vadantiyo upasaṅkamiṃsu. “Ammā,
atk-s0503a:1468_2: rājā daḷhikammatthāya ime thambhe telapilotikāhi bandhāpeti,
atk-s0503a:1468_4: mā me santike hothā”ti vatvā tā āgatā gabbhesu pavesetvā dvārāni pidahitvā bahi yantakaṃ datvā ādito paṭṭhāya aggiṃ dento otari.
atk-s0503a:1468_6: anamatagge saṃsāre vicarantīnaṃ evameva agginā jhāmattabhāvānaṃ buddhañāṇenapi paricchedo na sukaro,
atk-s0503a:1468_8: Tā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā adhigataphalāya viññātasāsanāya khujjuttarāya ariyasāvikāya sekkhapaṭisambhidāpattāya
atk-s0503a:1468_9: satthārā desitaniyāmeneva dhammaṃ desentiyā santike sotāpattiphalassa adhigatā antarantarā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena
atk-s0503a:1468_10: yuttappayuttā gehe jhāyante vedanāpariggahakammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontiyo kāci dutiyaphalaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1468_12: Atha bhikkhū kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya carantā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā pacchābhattaṃ bhagavato ārocetvā tāsaṃ abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1468_13: Bhagavā ca tāsaṃ ariyaphalādhigamaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0503a:1474_0: Gāthāhi ovadiyamānā vedanāpariggahakammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontiyo vipassitvā dutiyatatiyaphalāni paṭilabhiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1474_2: pubbe tādisassa kammassa akatattā ca tato pāsādato bahi ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1474_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0503a:1474_11: pubbe katakammassa pana yuttameva tāhi laddha”nti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0503a:1475_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente aṭṭha paccekabuddhā rañño nivesane nibaddhaṃ bhuñjanti.
atk-s0503a:1475_3: eko nadītīrasamīpe ekasmiṃ tiṇagahane samāpattiyā nisīdati.
atk-s0503a:1475_4: Athekadivasaṃ rājā paccekabuddhesu gatesu tāhi itthīhi saddhiṃ udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo tattha gato.
atk-s0503a:1475_5: Tā itthiyo divasabhāgaṃ udake kīḷitvā sītapīḷitā visibbitukāmā taṃ tiṇagahanaṃ upari visukkhatiṇasañchannaṃ
atk-s0503a:1475_6: “tiṇarāsī”ti saññāya parivāretvā aggiṃ datvā tiṇesu jhāyitvā patantesu paccekabuddhaṃ disvā “rañño paccekabuddho jhāyati,
atk-s0503a:1475_8: sudaḍḍhaṃ naṃ karissāmā”ti sabbā ito cito ca dāruādīni āharitvā tassa upari rāsiṃ katvā ālimpetvā “idāni jhāyissatī”ti pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1475_9: Tā paṭhamaṃ asañcetanikā hutvā idāni kammunā bajjhiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1475_10: Paccekabuddhaṃ pana antosamāpattiyaṃ sace dārūnaṃ sakaṭasahassampi āharitvā ālimpentā usumākāramattampi gāhetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0503a:1475_11: tasmā so sattame divase uṭṭhāya yathāsukhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1475_12: Tā tassa kammassa katattā bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa
atk-s0503a:1475_13: vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate imināva niyāmena gehe jhāyamāne jhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1476_0: Yasmā pana te imasmiṃ attabhāve ariyaphalāni sacchākaṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1477_0: Rājāpi kho uteno “sāmāvatiyā gehaṃ kira jhāyatī”ti sutvā vegena āgacchantopi taṃ padesaṃ tāsu daḍḍhāsuyeva sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:1477_1: Āgantvā pana gehaṃ nibbāpetvā uppannabalavadomanasso māgaṇḍiyāya tathā kāritabhāvaṃ upāyena ñatvā ariyasāvikāsu
atk-s0503a:1477_2: katāparādhakammunā codiyamāno tassā rājāṇaṃ kāresi saddhiṃ ñātakehi.
atk-s0503a:1477_3: Evaṃ sā saparijanā samittabandhavā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:1478_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ sāmāvatīpamukhānaṃ tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ aggimhi anayabyasanāpattihetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1478_1: māgaṇḍiyāya ca samittabandhavāya rājāṇāya anayabyasanāpattinimittaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1479_1: bhabbarūpova dissatīti yo idha sattaloko bhabbarūpova hetusampanno viya hutvā dissati,
atk-s0503a:1479_2: sopi mohasambandhano mohena paliguṇṭhito attahitāhitaṃ ajānanto hite na paṭipajjati,
atk-s0503a:1479_7: tato eva bhavarūpova sassatasabhāvo viyassa attā dissati,
atk-s0503a:1480_2: Sassatoriva khāyatīti na kevalañca mohasambandhano eva,
atk-s0503a:1480_3: apica kho upadhibandhanopi ayaṃ andhabālaloko avijjātamasā parivārito.
atk-s0503a:1480_5: yena ñāṇena aviparītaṃ kāme ca khandhe ca “aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti passeyya,
atk-s0503a:1480_6: tassa abhāvato yasmā bālo andhaputhujjano aññāṇatamasā samantato parivārito nivuto,
atk-s0503a:1480_7: tasmā so kāmūpadhi kilesūpadhi khandhūpadhīti imesaṃ upadhīnaṃ vasena ca upadhibandhano,
atk-s0503a:1480_8: tato eva cassa sopadhissa passato sassato viya nicco sabbakālabhāvī viya khāyati.
atk-s0503a:1480_11: attā sabbakālaṃ vijjati upalabbhatīti añño asassati aniccoti lokassa so upadhi micchābhinivesavasena ekadeso viya khāyati,
atk-s0503a:1480_14: Passato natthi kiñcananti yo pana saṅkhāre pariggahetvā aniccādivasena vipassati,
atk-s0503a:1480_15: tasseva vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya yathābhūtaṃ passato jānato paṭivijjhato rāgādikiñcanaṃ natthi,
atk-s0503a:1480_17: Tathā apassanto eva hi avijjātaṇhādiṭṭhiādibandhanehi saṃsāre baddho siyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1485_1: Pāṭaligāmiyavaggassa paṭhame nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāyāti amatadhātusannissitāya asaṅkhatadhātuyā pavedanavasena pavattāya.
atk-s0503a:1485_4: Samādapetīti tameva atthaṃ te bhikkhū gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0503a:1485_5: Samuttejetīti tadatthagahaṇe ussāhaṃ janento tejeti joteti.
atk-s0503a:1486_0: Atha vā sandassetīti “so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggā taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1486_1: nayeneva sabbathā tena tena pariyāyena tesaṃ tesaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ sammā dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1486_2: Samādapetīti “iminā ariyamaggena taṃ adhigantabba”nti adhigamapaṭipadāya saddhiṃ tattha bhikkhū ninnapoṇapabbhāre karonto sammā ādapeti gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0503a:1486_3: Samuttejetīti etaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavanti “mā sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ pamādaṃ antarāvosānaṃ āpajjatha,
atk-s0503a:1486_5: tasmā sīlavisuddhiādivisuddhipaṭipadāya uṭṭhahatha ghaṭayatha vāyameyyāthā”ti nibbānādhigamāya ussāheti,
atk-s0503a:1486_10: amatañca santantiādinā ca anekapariyāyena nibbānānisaṃsappakāsanena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittaṃ tosento hāsento sampahaṃseti samassāseti.
atk-s0503a:1487_1: Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti “atthi kiñci ayaṃ no attho adhigantabbo”ti evaṃ sallakkhetvā tāya desanāya atthikā hutvā.
atk-s0503a:1487_2: Manasi katvāti citte ṭhapetvā anaññavihitā taṃ desanaṃ attano cittagatameva katvā.
atk-s0503a:1487_3: Sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvāti sabbena kārakacittena ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā desanaṃ āvajjetvā,
atk-s0503a:1487_5: Atha vā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvāti sabbasmā cittato desanaṃ sammā anu anu āharitvā.
atk-s0503a:1487_8: sabbasmā cittato pavattaṃ desanaṃ bahi gantuṃ adento sammā aviparītaṃ anu anu āharitvā attano cittasantānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1487_13: Tameva upalabbhamānopi hi savane avikkhepo satisaṃvaro viya cakkhundriyādīsu sotindriyepi vattumarahatīti.
atk-s0503a:1487_14: Ettha ca “aṭṭhiṃ katvā”tiādīhi catūhipi padehi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tapparabhāvato savane ādaradīpanena sakkaccasavanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1488_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tassā nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammakathāya savane ādarakāritaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1488_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ nibbānassa tabbidhuradhammadesanāmukhena paramatthato vijjamānabhāvavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1489_3: Nanu ca udānaṃ nāma pītisomanassasamuṭṭhāpito vā dhammasaṃvegasamuṭṭhāpito vā dhammapaṭiggāhakanirapekkho udāhāro,
atk-s0503a:1489_5: idha kasmā bhagavā udānento te bhikkhū āmantesīti?
atk-s0503a:1489_7: Nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttañhi bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā nibbānaguṇānussaraṇena uppannapītisomanassā udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1489_8: Idha nibbānavajjo sabbo sabhāvadhammo paccayāyattavuttikova upalabbhati,
atk-s0503a:1489_10: Ayaṃ pana nibbānadhammo katamapaccaye upalabbhatīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cetoparivitakkamaññāya te ca saññāpetukāmo “atthi,
atk-s0503a:1489_13: na ekantatova te paṭiggāhake katvāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1489_16: Nibbānañhi maggaphalañāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvato rūpādīni viya cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhūtānīti kāraṇaṭṭhena “āyatana”nti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:1489_17: Ettāvatā ca bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvaṃ pavedesi.
atk-s0503a:1490_1: idha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ vijjamānattā asaṅkhatāyapi dhātuyā bhavitabbaṃ tappaṭipakkhattā sabhāvadhammānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1490_2: Yathā hi dukkhe vijjamāne tappaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sukhampi vijjatiyeva,
atk-s0503a:1497_0: Apica nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvavicāraṇaṃ parato āvibhavissati.
atk-s0503a:1498_0: Evaṃ bhagavā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvaṃ sammukhena dassetvā idāni tabbidhuradhammāpohanamukhenassa sabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1498_2: Tattha yasmā nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhāravidhurasabhāvaṃ yathā saṅkhatadhammesu katthaci natthi,
atk-s0503a:1498_6: yattha yasmiṃ nibbāne yassaṃ asaṅkhatadhātuyaṃ neva kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu atthi,
atk-s0503a:1498_10: Iti catumahābhūtābhāvavacanena yathā sabbassapi upādārūpassa abhāvo vutto hoti tannissitattā.
atk-s0503a:1498_11: Evaṃ anavasesato kāmarūpabhavassa tattha abhāvo vutto hoti tadāyattavuttibhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1498_12: Na hi mahābhūtanissayena vinā pañcavokārabhavo ekavokārabhavo vā sambhavatīti.
atk-s0503a:1499_0: Idāni arūpasabhāvattepi nibbānassa arūpabhavapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1499_3: Tattha na ākāsānañcāyatananti saddhiṃ ārammaṇena kusalavipākakiriyabhedo tividhopi ākāsānañcāyatanacittuppādo natthīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1499_5: Yadaggena ca nibbāne kāmalokādīnaṃ abhāvo hoti,
atk-s0503a:1499_9: yvāyaṃ “itthattaṃ diṭṭhadhammo idhaloko”ti ca laddhavohāro khandhādiloko,
atk-s0503a:1499_10: yo ca “tato aññathā paro abhisamparāyo”ti ca laddhavohāro khandhādiloko,
atk-s0503a:1499_12: Na ubho candimasūriyāti yasmā rūpagate sati tamo nāma siyā,
atk-s0503a:1499_14: Sabbena sabbaṃ pana yattha rūpagatameva natthi,
atk-s0503a:1499_17: tasmā candimā sūriyo cāti ubhopi tattha nibbāne natthīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1500_0: Ettāvatā ca anabhisametāvīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anādimatisaṃsāre supinantepi ananubhūtapubbaṃ paramagambhīraṃ
atk-s0503a:1500_1: atiduddasaṃ saṇhasukhumaṃ atakkāvacaraṃ accantasantaṃ paṇḍitavedanīyaṃ atipaṇītaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ vibhāvento
atk-s0503a:1500_4: tadāyatana”nti tassa atthibhāvā tesaṃ aññāṇādīni apanetvā “yattha neva pathavī …pe…
atk-s0503a:1500_5: na ubho candimasūriyā”ti tadaññadhammāpohanamukhena taṃ vibhāveti dhammarājā.
atk-s0503a:1501_3: yattha saṅkhārapavatte kutoci kassaci āgatiṃ na vadāmi yathāpaccayaṃ tattha dhammamattassa uppajjanato.
atk-s0503a:1501_4: Evaṃ tasmimpi āyatane nibbāne kutoci āgatiṃ āgamanaṃ neva vadāmi āgantabbaṭṭhānatāya abhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1501_5: Na gatinti katthaci gamanaṃ na vadāmi gantabbaṭṭhānatāya abhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1501_6: Na hi tattha sattānaṃ ṭhapetvā ñāṇena ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ āgatigatiyo sambhavanti,
atk-s0503a:1501_10: tampi āyatanaṃ gāmantarato gāmantaraṃ viya na āgantabbatāya na āgati,
atk-s0503a:1501_15: uppādanirodhābhāvato ceva tadubhayaparicchinnāya ṭhitiyā ca abhāvato na ṭhitiṃ na cutiṃ na upapattiṃ vadāmi.
atk-s0503a:1501_16: Kevalaṃ pana taṃ arūpasabhāvattā apaccayattā ca na katthaci patiṭṭhitanti appatiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1501_18: Arūpasabhāvattepi vedanādayo viya kassacipi ārammaṇassa anālambanato upatthambhanirapekkhato ca anārammaṇameva taṃ “āyatana”nti vuttaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1501_19: Ayañca evasaddo appatiṭṭhameva appavattamevāti padadvayenapi yojetabbo.
atk-s0503a:1501_20: Esevanto dukkhassāti yadidaṃ “appatiṭṭha”ntiādīhi vacanehi vaṇṇitaṃ thomitaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇaṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1501_21: eso eva sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa anto pariyosānaṃ tadadhigame sati sabbadukkhābhāvato.
atk-s0503a:1501_22: Tasmā “dukkhassa anto”ti ayameva tassa sabhāvoti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1504_1: Dutiye imaṃ udānanti imaṃ nibbānassa pakatiyā gambhīrabhāvato duddasabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1504_2: Tattha duddasanti sabhāvagambhīrattā atisukhumasaṇhasabhāvattā ca anupacitañāṇasambhārehi passituṃ na sakkāti duddasaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1504_13: kāmādīsu ca bhavesu namanato tanninnabhāvena pavattito sattānañca tattha namanato taṇhā natā nāma,
atk-s0503a:1504_20: Ettha ca “duddasa”nti iminā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇehi rāgādikilesehi cirakālabhāvitattā sattānaṃ apaccayabhāvanā
atk-s0503a:1504_21: na sukarāti nibbānassa kicchena adhigamanīyataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1504_22: Na hi saccaṃ sudassananti imināpi tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
atk-s0503a:1504_24: Tañhi kenaci pariyāyena asantasabhāvābhāvato ekanteneva santattā aviparītaṭṭhena saccaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1504_25: Na hi taṃ sudassanaṃ na sukhena passitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1504_26: sucirampi kālaṃ puññañāṇasambhāre samānentehipi kasireneva samadhigantabbato.
atk-s0503a:1505_0: Paṭividdhā taṇhā jānato passato natthi kiñcananti tañca nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena abhisamentena
atk-s0503a:1505_1: visayato kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca ārammaṇappaṭivedhena asammohappaṭivedhena ca paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1505_4: evaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena asammohato ca paṭividdhā taṇhā hoti.
atk-s0503a:1505_5: Evañca cattāri saccāni yathābhūtaṃ ariyamaggapaññāya jānato passato bhavādīsu natabhūtā taṇhā natthi,
atk-s0503a:1505_7: tatova kammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ asambhavoyevāti evaṃ bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anavasesavaṭṭadukkhavūpasamahetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:1508_1: Tatiye atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvāti tadā kira bhagavatā anekapariyāyena saṃsārassa ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0503a:1508_2: pakāsetvā sandassanādivasena nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammadesanāya katāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi –
atk-s0503a:1508_3: “ayaṃ saṃsāro bhagavatā avijjādīhi kāraṇehi sahetuko pakāsito,
atk-s0503a:1508_4: nibbānassa pana tadupasamassa na kiñci kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1508_7: Atha bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ parivitakkasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1508_8: Imaṃ udānanti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vimatividhamanatthañceva idha samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ “nibbānaṃ nibbānanti vācāvatthumattameva,
atk-s0503a:1508_9: natthi hi paramatthato nibbānaṃ nāma anupalabbhamānasabhāvattā”ti lokāyatikādayo viya vippaṭipannānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1508_10: bahiddhā ca puthudiṭṭhigatikānaṃ micchāvādabhañjanatthañca imaṃ amatamahānibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvadīpanaṃ
