atk-s0503a:1509_0: Tattha ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatanti sabbānipi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni.
atk-s0503a:1509_1: Atha vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti ajātaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1509_3: sayameva vā na bhūtaṃ na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti abhūtaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1509_4: evaṃ ajātattā abhūtattā ca yena kenaci kāraṇena na katanti akataṃ,
atk-s0503a:1509_6: na asaṅkhatasabhāvassa nibbānassāti dassanatthaṃ asaṅkhatanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1509_7: Paṭilomato vā samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ,
atk-s0503a:1509_9: Evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe “siyā nu kho ekeneva kāraṇena kata”nti āsaṅkāya “na
atk-s0503a:1509_11: Evaṃ apaccayampi samānaṃ “sayameva nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti āsaṅkāya tannivattanatthaṃ “abhūta”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1509_12: “Ayañcetassa asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo sabbena sabbaṃ ajātidhammattā”ti dassetuṃ “ajāta”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1509_13: Evametesaṃ catunnampi padānaṃ sātthakabhāvaṃ viditvā “tayidaṃ nibbānaṃ atthi,
atk-s0503a:1509_14: bhikkhave”ti paramatthato nibbānassa atthibhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1510_2: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti vatvā tattha hetuṃ dassento “no cetaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1510_6: yadi ajātādisabhāvā asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa na siyā,
atk-s0503a:1510_7: idha loke jātādisabhāvassa rūpādikkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ anavasesavūpasamo na paññāyeyya na upalabbheyya na sambhaveyya.
atk-s0503a:1510_8: Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ariyamaggadhammā anavasesakilese samucchindanti.
atk-s0503a:1510_9: Tenettha sabbassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa appavatti apagamo nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0503a:1511_0: Evaṃ byatirekavasena nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni anvayavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1511_12: dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādīhi anekehi suttapadehi, “atthi,
atk-s0503a:1511_14: ajāta”nti imināpi ca suttena nibbānadhātuyā paramatthato sambhavo sabbalokaṃ anukampamānena sammāsambuddhena desito,
atk-s0503a:1511_15: tasmā yadipi tattha apaccakkhakārīnampi viññūnaṃ kaṅkhā vā vimati vā natthiyeva.
atk-s0503a:1511_18: yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ kāmānaṃ rūpādīnañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0503a:1511_19: evaṃ taṃsabhāvānaṃ sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena tabbidhurasabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1511_22: Kiñca bhiyyo saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ api anulomañāṇaṃ kilese samucchedavasena pajahituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0503a:1511_23: Tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati,
atk-s0503a:1511_25: Iti saṅkhatadhammārammaṇassa sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato
atk-s0503a:1511_26: tesaṃ samucchedappahānakarassa ariyamaggañāṇassa tadubhayaviparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1511_30: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti idaṃ nibbānapadassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakaṃ vacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā.
atk-s0503a:1511_32: taṃ aviparītatthaṃ paramatthaṃ yathā taṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā,
atk-s0503a:1511_35: tathā nibbānasaddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāramattavuttisabbhāvato seyyathāpi sīhasaddo.
atk-s0503a:1511_36: Atha vā attheva paramatthato asaṅkhatā dhātu,
atk-s0503a:1511_38: Evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1514_1: Catutthe atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvāti tadā kira bhagavatā anekapariyāyena sandassanādivasena
atk-s0503a:1514_2: nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammadesanāya katāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi –
atk-s0503a:1514_3: “ayaṃ tāva bhagavatā amatamahānibbānadhātuyā anekākāravokāraṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassentena anaññasādhāraṇo ānubhāvo pakāsito,
atk-s0503a:1514_5: kathaṃ nu kho paṭipajjantehi amhehi ayaṃ adhigantabbā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1514_6: Atha bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etaṃ yathāvuttaparivitakkasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:1514_7: Imaṃ udānanti taṇhāvasena katthaci anissitassa passaddhakāyacittassa vīthipaṭipannavipassanassa ariyamaggena
atk-s0503a:1514_8: anavasesato taṇhāpahānena nibbānādhigamavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1515_0: Tattha nissitassa calitanti rūpādisaṅkhāre taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nissitassa calitaṃ “etaṃ mama,
atk-s0503a:1515_2: Appahīnataṇhādiṭṭhikassa hi puggalassa sukhādīsu uppannesu tāni abhibhuyya viharituṃ asakkontassa “mama vedanā,
atk-s0503a:1515_3: ahaṃ vediyāmī”tiādinā taṇhādiṭṭhigāhavasena kusalappavattito cittasantānassa calanaṃ kampanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1515_5: Anissitassa calitaṃ natthīti yo pana visuddhipaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjanto samathavipassanāhi taṇhādiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0503a:1515_7: tassa taṃ anissitassa yathāvuttaṃ calitaṃ avakkhalitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1516_0: Calite asatīti yathāvutte calite asati yathā taṇhādiṭṭhigāhā nappavattanti,
atk-s0503a:1516_2: Passaddhīti vipassanācittasahajātānaṃ kāyacittānaṃ sārambhakarakilesavūpasaminī duvidhāpi passaddhi hoti.
atk-s0503a:1516_3: Passaddhiyā sati nati na hotīti pubbenāparaṃ visesayuttāya passaddhiyā sati anavajjasukhādhiṭṭhānaṃ samādhiṃ
atk-s0503a:1516_4: vaḍḍhetvā taṃ paññāya samavāyakaraṇena samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ yojetvā maggaparamparāya kilese
atk-s0503a:1516_5: khepentassa kāmabhavādīsu namanato “natī”ti laddhanāmā taṇhā arahattamaggakkhaṇe anavasesato na hoti,
atk-s0503a:1517_0: Natiyā asatīti arahattamaggena taṇhāya suppahīnattā bhavādiatthāya ālayanikanti pariyuṭṭhāne asati.
atk-s0503a:1517_1: Āgatigati na hotīti paṭisandhivasena idha āgati āgamanaṃ cutivasena gati ito paralokagamanaṃ peccabhāvo na hoti na pavattati.
atk-s0503a:1517_2: Āgatigatiyā asatīti vuttanayena āgatiyā ca gatiyā ca asati.
atk-s0503a:1517_3: Cutūpapāto na hotīti aparāparaṃ cavanupapajjanaṃ na hoti na pavattati.
atk-s0503a:1517_5: pacchinne ca tasmiṃ kuto vipākavaṭṭassa sambhavo. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:1518_0: Iti bhagavā idhāpi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anavasesato vaṭṭadukkhavūpasamahetubhūtaṃ amatamahānibbānassa ānubhāvaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā pakāseti.
atk-s0503a:1521_3: So hi bhikkhusaṅgho sīlādiguṇavisesayogenapi mahā tattha sabbapacchimakassa sotāpannabhāvato,
atk-s0503a:1521_5: Āyusaṅkhārossajjanato paṭṭhāya hi āgatāgatā bhikkhū na pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1521_8: So kira aḍḍho mahākuṭumbiko bhagavato paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpanno hutvā attano ambavane satthuvasanānucchavikaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1521_10: dvārakoṭṭhakayuttaṃ vihāraṃ katvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0503a:1521_12: “tatra sudaṃ bhagavā pāvāyaṃ viharati cundassa kammāraputtassa ambavane”ti.
atk-s0503a:1522_5: Apare pana “sūkaramaddavaṃ nāma ekaṃ rasāyana”nti bhaṇiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1522_6: Tañhi cundo kammāraputto “ajja bhagavā parinibbāyissatī”ti sutvā “appeva nāma naṃ paribhuñjitvā cirataraṃ
atk-s0503a:1523_0: Tena maṃ parivisāti tena mamaṃ bhojehi.
atk-s0503a:1523_4: Tena abhihaṭabhikkhāya paresaṃ aparibhogārahato ca tathā vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1523_5: Tasmiṃ kira sūkaramaddave dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu devatā ojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1523_6: Tasmā taṃ añño koci sammā jīrāpetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1523_7: tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā parūpavādamocanatthaṃ “nāhaṃ taṃ, cunda,
atk-s0503a:1523_9: Ye hi pare upavadeyyuṃ “attanā paribhuttāvasesaṃ neva bhikkhūnaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1523_12: “tesaṃ vacanokāso mā hotū”ti parūpavādamocanatthaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0503a:1525_5: Sato sampajāno adhivāsesīti satiṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā adhivāsesi.
atk-s0503a:1525_6: Avihaññamānoti vedanānuvattanavasena asallakkhitadhammo viya aparāparaṃ parivattanaṃ akaronto apīḷiyamāno adukkhiyamāno viya adhivāsesi.
atk-s0503a:1525_7: Bhagavato hi veḷuvagāmakeyeva tā vedanā uppannā,
atk-s0503a:1525_8: samāpattibalena pana vikkhambhitā yāva parinibbānadivasā na uppajjiṃsu divase divase samāpattīhi paṭipaṇāmanato.
atk-s0503a:1525_9: Taṃ divasaṃ pana parinibbāyitukāmo “koṭisahassahatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārentānaṃ vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1525_10: aparimitakālaṃ upacitapuññasambhārānampi bhave sati evarūpā vedanā pavattanti,
atk-s0503a:1525_11: kimaṅgaṃ pana aññesa”nti sattānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ samāpattiṃ na samāpajji,
atk-s0503a:1526_0: Cundassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvātiādikā aparabhāge dhammasaṅgāhakehi ṭhapitā gāthā.
atk-s0503a:1526_1: Tattha bhuttassa ca sūkaramaddavenāti bhuttassa udapādi,
atk-s0503a:1526_5: siniddhabhojanaṃ pana bhuttattā tanukā vedanā ahosi,
atk-s0503a:1526_7: Etena yvāyaṃ “yassa taṃ paribhuttaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyya aññatra tathāgatassā”ti sīhanādo nadito,
atk-s0503a:1526_10: Yasmā taṃ paribhuttaṃ bhagavato na kiñci vikāraṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0503a:1526_11: kammena pana laddhokāsena uppādiyamānaṃ vikāraṃ appamattatāya upasamento sarīre balaṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0503a:1526_12: yena yathā vakkhamānaṃ tividhaṃ payojanaṃ sampādesi,
atk-s0503a:1526_14: māraṇantikattā pana vedanānaṃ aviññātaṃ apākaṭaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1527_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā evaṃ roge uppanne kusināraṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:1527_2: Parinibbāyituṃ nāma na katthaci na sakkā,
atk-s0503a:1527_4: mayi kusināraṃ gate mahāsudassanasuttadesanāya aṭṭhuppatti bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1527_5: tāya yā devaloke anubhavitabbasadisā sampatti manussaloke mayā anubhūtā,
atk-s0503a:1527_7: taṃ sutvā bahū janā kusalaṃ kattabbaṃ maññissanti.
atk-s0503a:1527_8: Subhaddopi kattha maṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanapariyosāne saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya pabbajitvā
atk-s0503a:1527_9: laddhūpasampado kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā mayi dharanteyeva arahattaṃ patvā pacchimasāvako nāma bhavissati.
atk-s0503a:1527_10: Aññattha mayi parinibbute dhātunimittaṃ mahākalaho bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1527_12: Kusinārāyaṃ pana parinibbute doṇabrāhmaṇo taṃ vivādaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo vibhajitvā dassatīti imāni
atk-s0503a:1527_13: tīṇi kāraṇāni passanto bhagavā mahatā ussāhena kusināraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1528_3: Bhagavā hi attano ānubhāvena tadā padasā agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:1528_4: aññesaṃ pana yathā paduddhārampi kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0503a:1528_5: tathā vedanā tikhiṇā kharā kaṭukā vattiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1529_9: kakudhāpi nadī vimalavālikā samokiṇṇā setavaṇṇā sandati.
atk-s0503a:1529_12: Ramaṇīyāti manoharabhūmibhāgatāya ramitabbā yathāvuttaudakasampattiyā ca manoramā.
atk-s0503a:1533_0: Evaṃ vuttesu dasasu hatthikulesu kāḷāvakasaṅkhātānaṃ yaṃ dasannaṃ pakatihatthīnaṃ balaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1533_1: taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassāti evaṃ dasaguṇitāya gaṇanāya pakatihatthīnaṃ koṭisahassabalappamāṇaṃ sarīrabalaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1533_2: Taṃ sabbampi tasmiṃ divase pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya caṅgavāre pakkhittaudakaṃ viya parikkhayaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0503a:1533_4: Etasmiṃ antare pañcavīsatiyā ṭhānesu nisīditvā mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ katvā āgacchanto sūriyatthaṅgamanavelāya
atk-s0503a:1533_5: bhagavā kusināraṃ pāpuṇīti evaṃ “rogo nāma sabbaṃ ārogyaṃ maddanto āgacchatī”ti imamatthaṃ dassento sadevakassa
atk-s0503a:1534_0: Sīhaseyyanti ettha kāmabhogīseyyā petaseyyā tathāgataseyyā sīhaseyyāti catasso seyyā.
atk-s0503a:1534_3: kāmabhogī vāmena passena seyyaṃ kappentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogīseyyā.
atk-s0503a:1534_9: migarājā dakkhiṇena passena seyyaṃ kappetī”ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā.
atk-s0503a:1534_17: jāṇunā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjanti,
atk-s0503a:1535_0: Gantvāna buddhoti imā gāthā aparabhāge dhammasaṅgāhakehi ṭhapitā.
atk-s0503a:1535_2: Appaṭimodha loketi appaṭimo idha imasmiṃ sadevake loke.
atk-s0503a:1535_3: Nhatvā ca pivitvā cudatārīti gattānaṃ sītikaraṇavasena nhatvā ca pānīyaṃ pivitvā ca nadito uttari.
atk-s0503a:1535_4: Tadā kira bhagavati nhāyante antonadiyaṃ macchakacchapā, udakaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1535_6: sabbo ca so bhūmibhāgoti sabbaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇameva ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1535_7: Purakkhatoti guṇavisiṭṭhasattuttamagarubhāvato sadevakena lokena pūjāsammānavasena purakkhato.
atk-s0503a:1535_9: Tadā bhikkhū bhagavato vedanānaṃ adhimattabhāvaṃ viditvā āsannā hutvā samantato parivāretvāva gacchanti.
atk-s0503a:1535_11: Pavattā bhagavā idha dhammeti bhāgyavantatādīhi bhagavā idha sīlādisāsanadhamme pavattā,
atk-s0503a:1535_13: Ambavananti tassā eva nadiyā tīre ambavanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1535_14: Āmantayi cundakanti tasmiṃ kira khaṇe āyasmā ānando udakasāṭikaṃ pīḷento ohīyi,
atk-s0503a:1535_17: Pamukhe nisīdīti vattasīsena satthu purato nisīdi “kiṃ nu kho satthā āṇāpetī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1535_19: Evaṃ anuppattaṃ atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0503a:1536_1: vippaṭisārassa uppādako koci puriso siyā api bhaveyya.
atk-s0503a:1536_2: Alābhāti ye aññesaṃ dānaṃ dadantānaṃ dānānisaṃsasaṅkhātā lābhā honti,
atk-s0503a:1536_6: Uttaṇḍulaṃ vā atikilinnaṃ vā ko taṃ jānāti,
atk-s0503a:1536_7: kīdisampi pacchimaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā tathāgato parinibbuto,
atk-s0503a:1536_8: addhā tena yaṃ vā taṃ vā dinnaṃ bhavissatīti.
atk-s0503a:1537_0: Nanu ca yaṃ sujātāya dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā tathāgato abhisambuddho,
atk-s0503a:1537_5: Bhagavā hi sujātāya dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto,
atk-s0503a:1537_6: cundena dinnaṃ bhuñjitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutoti evaṃ parinibbānasamatāyapi samaphalāni.
atk-s0503a:1537_7: Abhisambujjhanadivase ca aggamaggassa hetubhūtā catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo samāpajji,
atk-s0503a:1538_0: “Yassa cetaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā anuttaraṃ appamāṇaṃ cetosamādhiṃ upasampajja viharati,
atk-s0503a:1539_0: Sujātā ca aparabhāge assosi “na kira sā rukkhadevatā,
atk-s0503a:1539_2: taṃ kira piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0503a:1539_4: Tassā idaṃ sutvā “lābhā vata me”ti anussarantiyā balavapītisomanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0503a:1539_7: mayhaṃ kira piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā satthā attanā cirakālābhipatthitāya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0503a:1539_8: parinibbuto”ti sutvā “lābhā vata me”ti anussarato balavapītisomanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0503a:1539_9: Evaṃ anussaraṇasamatāyapi samaphalāni dvepi piṇḍapātadānānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0503a:1541_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ dānassa mahapphalatañceva sīlādiguṇehi attano ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:1541_1: anupādāparinibbānañcāti tividhampi atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1542_0: Tattha dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānaṃ dentassa cittasampattiyā ca dakkhiṇeyyasampattiyā ca dānamayaṃ puññaṃ upacīyati,
atk-s0503a:1542_2: Atha vā dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti deyyadhammaṃ pariccajanto pariccāgacetanāya bahulīkatāya anukkamena
atk-s0503a:1542_3: sabbattha anāpattibahulo suvisuddhasīlaṃ rakkhitvā samathavipassanañca bhāvetuṃ sakkotīti tassa dānādivasena
atk-s0503a:1542_4: tividhampi puññaṃ abhivaḍḍhatīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1542_7: Veraṃ na cīyatīti pañcavidhaveraṃ na pavaḍḍhati,
atk-s0503a:1542_8: adosapadhānattā vā adhisīlassa kāyavācācittehi sayaṃmanto suvisuddhasīlo khantibahulatāya kenaci veraṃ na karoti,
atk-s0503a:1542_12: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti kusalo pana ñāṇasampanno suvisuddhasīle patiṭṭhito aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu
atk-s0503a:1542_13: attano anurūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā upacārappanābhedaṃ jhānaṃ sampādento pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ kāmacchandādiakusalaṃ
atk-s0503a:1542_15: So tameva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāresu khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1542_16: ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggena anavasesaṃ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ akusalaṃ samucchedavasena jahāti.
atk-s0503a:1542_17: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti so evaṃ pāpakaṃ pajahitvā rāgādīnaṃ khayā anavasesakilesanibbānena,
atk-s0503a:1542_18: tato paraṃ khandhanibbānena ca nibbuto hotīti evaṃ bhagavā cundassa ca dakkhiṇasampattiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1542_19: attano ca dakkhiṇeyyasampattiṃ nissāya pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1545_2: Mahatāti idhāpi guṇamahattenapi aparicchinnasaṅkhyattā gaṇanamahattenapi mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0503a:1545_4: Tassa kira gāmassa māpanadivase gāmaggahaṇaṭṭhāne dve tayo pāṭalaṅkurā pathavito ubbhijjitvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1545_8: Heṭṭhā vuttanayena sāvatthiyaṃ dhammasenāpatino cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā tato nikkhamitvā rājagahe vasanto tattha
atk-s0503a:1545_9: āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa ca cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā tato nikkhamitvā ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ vasitvā aturitacārikāvasena
atk-s0503a:1545_10: janapadacārikaṃ caranto tattha tattha ekarattivāsena vasitvā lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto anukkamena pāṭaligāmaṃ
atk-s0503a:1546_1: Te kira bhagavato paṭhamadassanena keci saraṇesu,
atk-s0503a:1546_3: keci saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0503a:1546_5: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti pāṭaligāme kira ajātasattuno licchavirājūnañca manussā kālena kālaṃ gantvā
atk-s0503a:1546_6: gehasāmike gehato nīharitvā māsampi aḍḍhamāsampi vasanti.
atk-s0503a:1546_7: Tena pāṭaligāmavāsino manussā niccupaddutā “etesañceva āgatakāle vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti ekapasse issarānaṃ bhaṇḍappaṭisāmanaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1546_11: ekapasse gilānānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti sabbesaṃ aññamaññaṃ aghaṭṭetvā vasanappahonakaṃ nagaramajjhe mahāsālaṃ kāresuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1546_14: Te tattha gantvā hatthakammasudhākammacittakammādivasena supariniṭṭhitaṃ susajjitaṃ devavimānasadisaṃ
atk-s0503a:1546_15: taṃ dvārakoṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya oloketvā “idaṃ āvasathāgāraṃ ativiya manoramaṃ sassirikaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1546_16: kena nu kho paṭhamaṃ paribhuttaṃ amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assā”ti cintesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1546_17: tasmiṃyeva ca khaṇe “bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ anuppatto”ti assosuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1546_18: Tena te uppannapītisomanassā “amhehi bhagavā gantvāpi ānetabbo siyā,
atk-s0503a:1546_19: so pana sayameva amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sampatto,
atk-s0503a:1546_20: ajja mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ idha vasāpetvā paṭhamaṃ paribhuñjāpessāma tathā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1546_21: bhikkhusaṅghe āgate tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āgatameva bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1546_24: Iti tīhi ratanehi paribhutte pacchā amhākañca paresañca paribhogo bhavissati,
atk-s0503a:1546_25: evaṃ no dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā etadatthameva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1547_0: Yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti kiñcāpi taṃ taṃ divasameva pariniṭṭhitattā devavimānaṃ viya susajjitaṃ supaṭijaggitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1547_4: tasmā bhagavato ruciṃ jānitvāva paññāpessāmā”ti cintetvā te bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1547_5: idāni bhagavato ruciṃ jānitvā tathā paññāpetukāmā yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1547_6: Sabbasanthariṃ āvasathāgāraṃ santharitvāti yathā sabbameva santhataṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1547_7: evaṃ taṃ santharitvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ tāva “gomayaṃ nāma sabbamaṅgalesu vattatī”ti sudhāparikammakatampi
atk-s0503a:1547_8: bhūmiṃ allagomayena opuñjāpetvā parisukkhabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ na paññāyati,
atk-s0503a:1547_9: evaṃ catujjātiyagandhehi limpetvā upari nānāvaṇṇakaṭasārake santharitvā tesaṃ upari mahāpiṭṭhikakojavādiṃ
atk-s0503a:1547_10: katvā hatthattharaṇādīhi nānāvaṇṇehi attharaṇehi santharitabbayuttakaṃ sabbokāsaṃ santharāpesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1548_0: Āsanānañhi majjhaṭṭhāne tāva maṅgalathambhaṃ nissāya mahārahaṃ buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā tattha yaṃ yaṃ mudukañca manoramañca paccattharaṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1548_1: taṃ taṃ paccattharitvā ubhatolohitakaṃ manuññadassanaṃ upadhānaṃ upadahitvā upari suvaṇṇarajatatārakāvicittaṃ
atk-s0503a:1548_2: vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhadāmapupphadāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā samantā dvādasahatthe ṭhāne pupphajālaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0503a:1548_3: tiṃsahatthamattaṭṭhānaṃ paṭasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā pacchimabhittiṃ nissāya bhikkhusaṅghassa pallaṅkaapassayamañcapīṭhādīni
atk-s0503a:1548_4: paññāpetvā upari setapaccattharaṇehi paccattharāpetvā sālāya pācīnapassaṃ attano nisajjāyoggaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1549_1: Evaṃ bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgho ca yathāruciyā hatthapāde dhovissanti,
atk-s0503a:1549_2: mukhaṃ vikkhālessantīti tesu tesu ṭhānesu maṇivaṇṇassa udakassa pūretvā vāsatthāya nānāpupphāni ceva
atk-s0503a:1549_3: udakavāsacuṇṇāni ca pakkhipitvā kadalipaṇṇehi pidahitvā patiṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1550_0: Telappadīpaṃ āropetvāti rajatasuvaṇṇādimayadaṇḍadīpikāsu yodhakarūpavilāsakhacitarūpakādīnaṃ hatthe ṭhapitasuvaṇṇarajatādimayakapallikāsu
atk-s0503a:1550_2: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ettha pana te pāṭaligāmiyā upāsakā na kevalaṃ āvasathāgārameva,
atk-s0503a:1550_3: atha kho sakalasmimpi gāme vīthiyo sajjāpetvā dhaje ussāpetvā gehadvāresu puṇṇaghaṭe kadaliyo ca ṭhapāpetvā
atk-s0503a:1550_4: sakalagāmaṃ dīpamālāhi vippakiṇṇatārakaṃ viya katvā “khīrapake dārake khīraṃ pāyetha,
atk-s0503a:1550_8: buddhā nāma appasaddakāmā hontī”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ daṇḍadīpikā ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1551_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamīti “yassa dāni, bhante,
atk-s0503a:1551_1: bhagavā kālaṃ maññatī”ti evaṃ kira tehi kāle ārocite bhagavā lākhārasena tintarattakoviḷārapupphavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1551_3: saṃvidhāya timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādento nivāsetvā suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena padumakalāpaṃ parikkhipanto viya,
atk-s0503a:1551_4: vijjulatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā rattakambalena gajakumbhaṃ pariyonandhanto viya,
atk-s0503a:1551_13: bālasūriyo viya ca attanā nisinnacārumaṇḍapato nikkhami.
atk-s0503a:1552_0: Athassa kāyato meghamukhato vijjukalāpā viya rasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasadhārāparisekapiñjarapattapupphaphalasākhāviṭape
atk-s0503a:1552_2: Tāvadeva attano attano pattacīvaramādāya mahābhikkhusaṅgho bhagavantaṃ parivāresi.
atk-s0503a:1552_3: Te ca naṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā
atk-s0503a:1552_4: vattāro vacanakkhamā codakā pāpagarahino sīlasampannā samādhisampannā paññāsampannā vimuttisampannā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā.
atk-s0503a:1552_5: Tehi parivuto bhagavā rattakambalaparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇakkhandho,
atk-s0503a:1552_9: Mahākassapappamukhā pana mahātherā meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā maṇivammavammitā viya mahānāgā
atk-s0503a:1552_10: parivārayiṃsu vantarāgā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā chinnabandhanā kule vā gaṇe vā alaggā.
atk-s0503a:1553_5: sayaṃ buddho anubuddhehi parivārito pattaparivāritaṃ viya kesaraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1553_13: anupamena buddhavesena aparimāṇena buddhavilāsena pāṭaligāminaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0503a:1554_0: Athassa puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1554_1: tathā pacchimakāyato dakkhiṇapassato vāmapassato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1554_2: uparikesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesāvaṭṭehi moragīvarājavaṇṇā asitā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1554_3: heṭṭhāpādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1554_5: nakhānaṃ maṃsavimuttaṭṭhānato odātā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1554_6: rattapītavaṇṇānaṃ sambhinnaṭṭhānato mañjeṭṭhavaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1554_8: Evaṃ samantā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā vidhāvamānā kañcanadaṇḍadīpikādīhi
atk-s0503a:1554_10: cātuddīpikamahāmeghato nikkhantavijjulatā viya ca disodisaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1554_11: Yāhi sabbe disābhāgā suvaṇṇacampakapupphehi vikiriyamānā viya,
atk-s0503a:1555_4: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitānaṃ dvattiṃsasūriyānaṃ dvattiṃsacandimānaṃ dvattiṃsacakkavattīnaṃ dvattiṃsadevarājānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1555_5: dvattiṃsamahābrahmānaṃ siriyā siriṃ abhibhavamānaṃ viya virocittha,
atk-s0503a:1555_6: yathā taṃ dasahi pāramīhi dasahi upapāramīhi dasahi paramatthapāramīhīti sammadeva paripūritāhi samatiṃsapāramitāhi
atk-s0503a:1555_7: alaṅkataṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dinnena dānena rakkhitena sīlena katena kalyāṇakammena
atk-s0503a:1555_8: ekasmiṃ attabhāve samosaritvā vipākaṃ dātuṃ okāsaṃ alabhamānena sambādhappattaṃ viya nibbattitaṃ nāvāsahassabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0503a:1555_11: pañcavīsatiyā gaṅgānaṃ sambhinnamukhadvāre ekato rāsibhūtakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1556_0: Imāya buddhasiriyā obhāsamānassapi bhagavato purato anekāni daṇḍadīpikāsahassāni ukkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1556_2: ceva nīlapītādivaṇṇasugandhacuṇṇāni ca cātuddīpikamahāmeghavissaṭṭhā salilavuṭṭhiyo viya vippakiriṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1556_3: Pañcaṅgikatūriyanigghosā ca buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇāsaṃyuttā thutighosā ca sabbā disā pūrayamānā mukhasambhāsā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1556_5: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā padasahassehi gamanavaṇṇanaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0503a:1564_0: Unnatañca samaṃ hoti, pathavī ca acetanā.
atk-s0503a:1568_0: Aghaṭṭayanto niyyāti, ubho jāṇū ca gopphake.
atk-s0503a:1570_0: Na cāpi saṇikaṃ yāti, gacchamāno samāhito.
atk-s0503a:1571_0: “Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, disañca vidisaṃ tathā;
atk-s0503a:1576_0: Tosayanto bahū satte, gāmaṃ seṭṭho upāgamī”ti. –
atk-s0503a:1577_1: Evaṃvidhesu kālesu bhagavato sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā dhammakathikassa thāmoyeva pamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1577_6: tesaṃ buddhāpi anavasesato vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ asamatthā.
atk-s0503a:1577_7: Sakalampi hi kappaṃ vaṇṇentā pariyosāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0503a:1577_10: pavisitvā bhagavā pasannacittena janena pupphagandhadhūmavāsacuṇṇādīhi pūjiyamāno āvasathāgāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0503a:1577_12: “atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1578_0: Pāde pakkhāletvāti yadipi bhagavato pāde rajojallaṃ na upalimpati,
atk-s0503a:1578_1: tesaṃ pana upāsakānaṃ kusalābhivuddhiṃ ākaṅkhanto paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanatthañca bhagavā pāde pakkhāleti.
atk-s0503a:1578_2: Apica upādinnakasarīraṃ nāma sītaṃ kātabbampi hotīti etadatthampi bhagavā nhānapādadhovanādīni karotiyeva.
atk-s0503a:1578_4: Tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnañceva upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno gandhodakena nhāpetvā dukūlacumbaṭakena vodakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1578_5: katvā jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā rattakambalena paliveṭhetvā pīṭhe ṭhapitā rattasuvaṇṇaghanapaṭimā viya
atk-s0503a:1592_0: Pāṭaligāmiye upāsake āmantesīti yasmā tesu upāsakesu bahū janā sīlesu patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0503a:1592_1: tasmā paṭhamaṃ tāva sīlavipattiyā ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā pacchā sīlasampadāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1593_2: Ettha ca “dussīlo”ti padena puggalassa sīlābhāvo vutto.
atk-s0503a:1593_3: So panassa sīlābhāvo duvidho asamādānena vā samādinnassa bhedena vāti.
atk-s0503a:1593_12: Gahaṭṭho hi yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ kappeti yadi kasiyā yadi vāṇijjāya yadi gorakkhena,
atk-s0503a:1593_13: pāṇātipātādivasena pamatto taṃ taṃ yathākālaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0503a:1593_15: Māghātakāle pana pāṇātipātādīni karonto daṇḍavasena mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati.
atk-s0503a:1593_16: Pabbajito dussīlo pamādakāraṇā sīlato buddhavacanato jhānato sattaariyadhanato ca jāniṃ nigacchati.
atk-s0503a:1594_0: Pāpako kittisaddoti gahaṭṭhassa “asuko amukakule jāto dussīlo pāpadhammo pariccattaidhalokaparaloko salākabhattamattampi
atk-s0503a:1594_1: na detī”ti parisamajjhe pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
atk-s0503a:1594_2: Pabbajitassa “asuko nāma thero satthu sāsane pabbajitvā nāsakkhi sīlāni rakkhituṃ,
atk-s0503a:1594_5: chahi agāravehi samannāgato”ti evaṃ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
atk-s0503a:1595_0: Avisāradoti gahaṭṭho tāva avassaṃ bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne “koci mama kammaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0503a:1595_5: Pabbajitopi bahubhikkhusaṅghe sannipatite “avassaṃ koci mama kammaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0503a:1595_6: atha me uposathampi pavāraṇampi ṭhapetvā sāmaññato cāvetvā nikkaḍḍhissatī”ti sabhayo upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0503a:1595_8: Ekacco pana dussīlopi samāno susīlo viya carati,
atk-s0503a:1596_0: Sammūḷho kālaṃ karotīti dussīlassa hi maraṇamañce nipannassa dussīlakammāni samādāya pavattitaṭṭhānāni āpāthaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0503a:1596_4: sattisatena pahariyamāno viya aggijālābhighātena jhāyamāno viya ca hoti.
atk-s0503a:1597_2: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā.
atk-s0503a:1597_5: Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasaṅkhātā ayā apetattā,
atk-s0503a:1597_9: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatīti duggati.
atk-s0503a:1597_11: vinassantā vā ettha nipatanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti vinipāto.
atk-s0503a:1598_4: So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā,
atk-s0503a:1598_6: na tu vinipāto asurasadisaṃ avinipatitattā petamahiddhikānampi vijjamānattā.
atk-s0503a:1598_8: So hi yathāvuttenaṭṭhena “apāyo” ceva “duggati” ca sabbasampattisamussayehi vinipatitattā “vinipāto”ti ca vuccati.
atk-s0503a:1599_3: Sīlasampannoti parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇañca katvā sīlassa samādānena sīlasampanno.
atk-s0503a:1599_5: Sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokanti ettha sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhati,
atk-s0503a:1600_0: Pāṭaligāmiye upāsake bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāyāti aññāyapi pāḷimuttāya dhammakathāya ceva āvasathānumodanakathāya ca.
atk-s0503a:1600_1: Tadā hi bhagavā yasmā ajātasattunā tattha pāṭaliputtanagaraṃ māpentena aññesu gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu ye sīlācārasampannā kuṭumbikā,
atk-s0503a:1600_2: te ānetvā dhanadhaññagharavatthukhettavatthādīni ceva parihārañca dāpetvā nivesiyanti.
atk-s0503a:1600_3: Tasmā pāṭaligāmiyā upāsakā ānisaṃsadassāvitāya visesato sīlagarukā sabbaguṇānañca sīlassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
atk-s0503a:1600_4: tesaṃ paṭhamaṃ sīlānisaṃse pakāsetvā tato paraṃ ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya,
atk-s0503a:1600_7: yojanikamadhukaṇḍaṃ cakkayantena pīḷetvā madhurasaṃ pāyamāno viya pāṭaligāmikānaṃ upāsakānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ
atk-s0503a:1600_8: pakiṇṇakakathaṃ kathento “āvāsadānaṃ nāmetaṃ gahapatayo mahantaṃ puññaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1600_11: mayā ca bhikkhusaṅghena ca paribhutte pana dhammaratanenapi paribhuttoyeva hoti.
atk-s0503a:1600_12: Evaṃ tīhi ratanehi paribhutte aparimeyyo ca vipāko,
atk-s0503a:1600_13: apica āvāsadānasmiṃ dinne sabbadānaṃ dinnameva hoti,
atk-s0503a:1600_14: bhūmaṭṭhakapaṇṇasālāya vā sākhāmaṇḍapassa vā saṅghaṃ uddissa katassa ānisaṃso paricchindituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0503a:1600_15: Āvāsadānānubhāvena hi bhave nibbattamānassapi sampīḷitagabbhavāso nāma na hoti,
atk-s0503a:1600_16: dvādasahattho ovarako viyassa mātukucchi asambādhova hotī”ti evaṃ nānānayehi vicittaṃ bahuṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā –
atk-s0503a:1602_0: Sarīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0503a:1606_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano.
atk-s0503a:1611_0: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. –
atk-s0503a:1612_0: Evaṃ ayampi āvāsadāne ānisaṃsoti bahudeva rattiṃ atirekataraṃ diyaḍḍhayāmaṃ āvāsadānānisaṃsakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0503a:1612_1: Tattha imā gāthā tāva saṅgahaṃ āruḷhā,
atk-s0503a:1613_1: Yassa dāni kālaṃ maññathāti yassa gamanassa tumhe kālaṃ maññatha,
atk-s0503a:1613_6: Tiyāmarattiñhi tattha nisīditvā vītināmentānaṃ tesaṃ sarīre ābādho uppajjeyyāti,
atk-s0503a:1613_7: bhikkhusaṅghepi ca vippabhātasayananisajjāya okāso laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0503a:1613_9: Suññāgāranti pāṭiyekkaṃ suññāgāraṃ nāma tattha natthi.
atk-s0503a:1613_10: Tena kira gahapatayo tasseva āvasathāgārassa ekapasse paṭasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā kappiyamañcaṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0503a:1613_11: tattha kappiyapaccattharaṇaṃ attharitvā upari suvaṇṇarajatatārakāgandhamālādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ vitānaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0503a:1613_12: telappadīpaṃ āropesuṃ “appeva nāma satthā dhammāsanato vuṭṭhāya thokaṃ vissamitukāmo idha nipajjeyya,
atk-s0503a:1613_13: evaṃ no idaṃ āvasathāgāraṃ bhagavatā catūhi iriyāpathehi paribhuttaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1613_14: Satthāpi tadeva sandhāya tattha saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0503a:1613_16: Tattha pādadhovanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva dhammāsanā agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:1613_22: Upāsake uyyojetvā dhammāsanato oruyha yathāvutte ṭhāne sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi.

atk-s0503a:1616_0: Tāvatiṃsehīti yathā hi ekasmiṃ kule ekaṃ paṇḍitamanussaṃ,

atk-s0503a:1627_1: Sattame addhānamaggapaṭipannoti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ dīghamaggaṃ paṭipanno gacchanto hoti.

atk-s0503a:1646_2: katvā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ paññāpetvā nisinno kālaparicchedaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0503a:1646_3: Athāyasmā yathākālaparicchedaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā attano āyusaṅkhāre olokesi.
atk-s0503a:1646_7: yamahaṃ satthu anārocetvā sabrahmacārīhi ca avidito idha yathānisinnova parinibbāyissāmi.
atk-s0503a:1646_8: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā parinibbānaṃ anujānāpetvā satthu vattaṃ dassetvā sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1646_9: mayhaṃ iddhānubhāvaṃ vibhāvento ākāse nisīditvā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā parinibbāyeyyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1646_10: Evaṃ sante ye mayi assaddhā appasannā,
atk-s0503a:1646_13: Evañca so āyasmā cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva akāsi.
atk-s0503a:1646_15: “atha kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:1647_0: Tattha parinibbānakālo meti “bhagavā mayhaṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānakālo upaṭṭhito,
atk-s0503a:1647_6: ‘Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pubbe maṃ amūlakena pārājikena anuddhaṃsesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1647_8: Tesaṃ saddahitvā aññepi puthujjanā mayi agāravaṃ paribhavañca karonti.
atk-s0503a:1647_9: Imañca dukkhabhāraṃ niratthakaṃ vahitvā kiṃ payojanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1647_10: tasmāhaṃ idāneva parinibbāyissāmī’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā satthāraṃ āpucchī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1647_12: Na hi khīṇāsavā aparikkhīṇe āyusaṅkhāre paresaṃ upavādādibhayena parinibbānāya cetenti ghaṭayanti vāyamanti,
atk-s0503a:1647_13: na ca paresaṃ pasaṃsādihetu ciraṃ tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0503a:1647_14: atha kho saraseneva attano āyusaṅkhārassa parikkhayaṃ āgamenti. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:1650_0: Bhagavāpissa āyusaṅkhāraṃ oloketvā parikkhīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā “yassadāni tvaṃ, dabba,
atk-s0503a:1651_7: Thero hi tadā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “bhagavā kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0503a:1651_8: tumhehi saddhiṃ tattha tattha vasanto puññāni karonto imamevatthaṃ sandhāya akāsiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1651_14: Athassa bhagavā cittācāraṃ ñatvā “tena hi, dabba,
atk-s0503a:1651_15: mayhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ca iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassehī”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1651_17: Athāyasmā dabbo “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”tiādinā nayena āgatāni sāvakasādhāraṇāni sabbāni pāṭihāriyāni
atk-s0503a:1651_18: dassetvā puna ca bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā ākāse pathaviṃ nimminitvā tattha pallaṅkena
atk-s0503a:1651_19: nisinno tejokasiṇasamāpattiyā parikammaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sarīraṃ āvajjitvā puna
atk-s0503a:1651_21: Saha adhiṭṭhānena sabbo kāyo agginā āditto ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1651_22: Khaṇeneva ca so aggi kappavuṭṭhānaggi viya aṇumattampi saṅkhāragataṃ masimattampi tattha kiñci anavasesento adhiṭṭhānabalena jhāpetvā nibbāyi.
atk-s0503a:1651_25: Tattha vuṭṭhahitvā parinibbāyīti iddhicittato vuṭṭhahitvā bhavaṅgacittena parinibbāyi.
atk-s0503a:1652_2: Atha vā jhāyamānassāti jālāpavattikkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1652_8: Kasmā pana thero uttarimanussadhammaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi,
atk-s0503a:1652_10: Na codetabbametaṃ gihīnaṃ sammukhā pāṭihāriyakaraṇassa paṭikkhittattā.
atk-s0503a:1652_13: Ayaṃ panāyasmā dhammasāminā āṇattova pāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0503a:1653_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa anupādāparinibbānaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthaparidīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1654_0: Tattha abhedi kāyoti sabbo bhūtupādāyapabhedo catusantatirūpakāyo bhijji,
atk-s0503a:1654_4: Nirodhi saññāti rūpāyatanādigocaratāya rūpasaññādibhedā sabbāpi saññā appaṭisandhikena nirodhena nirujjhi.
atk-s0503a:1654_5: Vedanā sītibhaviṃsu sabbāti vipākavedanā kiriyavedanāti sabbāpi vedanā appaṭisandhikanirodhena niruddhattā
atk-s0503a:1654_10: Vūpasamiṃsu saṅkhārāti vipākakiriyappabhedā sabbepi phassādayo saṅkhārakkhandhadhammā appaṭisandhikanirodheneva niruddhattā visesena upasamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1654_11: Viññāṇaṃ atthamāgamāti viññāṇampi vipākakiriyappabhedaṃ sabbaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodheneva atthaṃ vināsaṃ upacchedaṃ agamā agacchi.
atk-s0503a:1655_0: Iti bhagavā āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa pañcannampi khandhānaṃ pubbeyeva kilesābhisaṅkhārupādānassa
atk-s0503a:1655_1: anavasesato niruddhattā anupādāno viya jātavedo appaṭisandhikanirodhena niruddhabhāvaṃ nissāya pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1658_1: Dasame tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesīti bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0503a:1658_2: caranto anukkamena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavane viharantoyeva yesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa
atk-s0503a:1658_5: yepi ca mettiyabhūmajakehi katena abhūtena abbhācikkhaṇena there gāravarahitā puthujjanā,
atk-s0503a:1658_9: Tesu “tatrā”ti iminā “bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesī”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ vuccamānataṃyeva joteti.
atk-s0503a:1658_11: nāssa āmantane koci antarāyo ahosīti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1658_16: Jeṭṭhattā seṭṭhattā āsannattā sabbakālaṃ sannihitattā dhammadesanāya visesato bhājanabhūtattā ca.
atk-s0503a:1659_1: Bhadanteti āmantitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāravena satthu paṭivacanadānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1659_2: Tattha “bhikkhavo”ti vadanto bhagavā te bhikkhū ālapati.
atk-s0503a:1659_6: “Bhadante”ti iminā satthari ādarabahumānagāravadīpanavacanena te bhikkhū attano sussūsataṃ ovādappaṭiggahagāravabhāvañca paṭivedenti.
atk-s0503a:1659_7: Bhagavato paccassosunti te bhikkhū bhagavato vacanaṃ patiassosuṃ sotukāmataṃ janesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1659_8: Etadavocāti bhagavā etaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi. Dabbassa,
atk-s0503a:1660_0: Gāthāsu pana ayoghanahatassāti ayo haññati etenāti ayoghanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1660_3: Keci pana “ayoghanahatassāti ghanaayopiṇḍaṃ hatassā”ti atthaṃ vadanti. Eva-
atk-s0503a:1660_8: Yathā na ñāyate gatīti yathā tassa gati na ñāyati.
atk-s0503a:1660_12: tathā uppannassa vā saddassa anukkamena upasantassa suvūpasantassa dasasu disāsu na katthaci gati paññāyati
atk-s0503a:1661_0: Evaṃ sammāvimuttānanti evaṃ sammā hetunā ñāyena tadaṅgavikkhambhanavimuttipubbaṅgamena ariyamaggena catūhipi
atk-s0503a:1661_1: upādānehi āsavehi ca vimuttattā sammā vimuttānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1661_2: tato eva kāmapabandhasaṅkhātaṃ kāmoghaṃ bhavoghādibhedaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ oghañca taritvā ṭhitattā kāmabandhoghatārinaṃ
atk-s0503a:1661_3: suṭṭhu paṭipassambhitasabbakilesavipphanditattā kilesābhisaṅkhāravātehi ca akampanīyatāya acalaṃ anupādisesanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1661_4: sabbasaṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhaṃ pattānaṃ adhigatānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ gati devamanussādibhedāsu gatīsu ayaṃ nāmāti
atk-s0503a:1661_5: paññapetabbatāya abhāvattā paññāpetuṃ natthi na upalabbhati,
atk-s0503a:1661_6: yathāvuttajātavedo viya apaññattikabhāvameva hi so gatoti attho.
